SA01yabhkvyu:395_4: akārādeśaḥ kṛto hanteś ca ghādeśaḥ. tasya taṭ sāmantakam iti. tasyāghasya kuḍyādikasya
SA01yabhkvyu:395_5: sāmantakaṃ samīpasthaṃ. tad apekṣya vyavasthāpitam ity arthaḥ. atrāpi vyākhyāne kilaśabdo
SA01yabhkvyu:395_6: vaibhāṣikavyākhyānapradarśānārthaḥ. svamataṃ tu yat tat paścād ucyate. tad āha. aghaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:395_7: ca tat. anyasya rūpasya tatrāpratighātān na pratihanyate 'nyad rūpam asminn iti kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:395_8: sāmantakaṃ cānyasya rūpasyeti citasthasya. asmin pakṣe karmadhārayaḥ samāsaḥ. aghaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:395_9: ca tat sāmantakaṃ ca tad iti aghasāmantakaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:397: [Tib. 53a] iti. janmano hetor vijñānasyābhipretatvāt. kuta iti cet. ata āha. yasmād ime ṣaḍdhātava iṣṭā.
SA01yabhkvyu:399_0: ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣa iti. ṣaṭ khalu dhātūn pratītya mātuḥ kukṣau garbhasyāvakrāntir
SA01yabhkvyu:399_1: iti vacanāt. ete hi janmana iti vistaraḥ. ete hi janmano janakapoṣakasaṃvardhakatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:399_2: ādhārabhūtāḥ. janako hy atra vijñānadhātuḥ pratisaṃdhibījatvāt. poṣakāni bhūtāni
SA01yabhkvyu:400: ākāśadhātur avakāśadānāt. ata evaiṣāṃ dhātutvavacanaṃ. pratisaṃdhiṃ dadhata iti dhātavaḥ. anāsravās tu dharmā naivam iti. na janmaniśrayā janmanirodhitvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:402_0: iti. kim idaṃ nidarśanaṃ nāma. yena viśeṣeṇa yogāt tad vastu tathā nidarśayituṃ śakyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:402_1: sa viśeṣo nidarśanam ity ucyate. vacanena parasya cakṣurvijñānām utpannaṃ vā nidarśanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:402_2: tena saha vartate sanidarśana eko rūpadhātur atrāṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu. rūpadhātur evaikaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:402_3: sanidarśana ity avadhāraṇād uktaṃ bhavati. anidarśanāḥ śeṣā iti. anena cāsya sanidarśanatvena
SA01yabhkvyu:402_4: prādhānyam uktam iti. na punaruktadoṣaprasaṃga iti tatsiddheḥ. ete ca sanidarśanatvādayaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:402_5: prabhedāḥ prāyeṇa sūtroktā eva pradarśyante. [Tib. 53b] tathā hi sūtra uktaṃ. cakṣur
SA01yabhkvyu:402_6: bhikṣo ādhyātmikam āyatanaṃ. catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpaprasādaḥ rūpy anidarśanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:402_7: sapratighaṃ. yāvat kāyo bhikṣo ādhyātmikam āyatanaṃ pūrvavat. mano bhikṣo ādhyātmikam
SA01yabhkvyu:402_8: āyatanaṃ arūpy anidarśanam apratighaṃ. rūpāṇi bhikṣo bāhyam āyatanaṃ. catvāri mahābhūtāny
SA01yabhkvyu:402_9: upādāya rūpi sanidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ. śabdā hi bhikṣo bāhyam āyatanaṃ. catvāri mahābhūtāny
SA01yabhkvyu:402_10: upādāya rūpy anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ. yāvat spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyam āyatanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:402_11: catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpy anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:402_12: dharmā bhikṣo bāhyam āyatanaṃ. ekādaśabhir āyatanair asaṃgṛhītaṃ arūpy anidarśanam
SA01yabhkvyu:402_13: apratigham iti. ete ca prabhedā dhātūnām eva ā prathamakośasthānaparisamāpteḥ kathyante.
SA01yabhkvyu:404_0: iti. rūpigrahaṇam arūpinirāsārthaṃ. rūpaṇaṃ rūpaṃ. tad eṣām astīti rūpiṇaḥ. daśeti
SA01yabhkvyu:404_1: cakṣurdhātvādayaḥ paṃca tadviṣayadhātavaś ca paṃca ceti. dharmadhātor nirāsaḥ kathaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:404_2: kṛtaḥ. sa cāpi hi rūpīti śakyate vaktuṃ. tatrāvijñaptirūpasadbhāvāt. rūpiṇa evety
SA01yabhkvyu:404_3: avadhāraṇāt tannirāsaḥ kṛto bhavati. ye hi dhātavo rūpisvabhāvā eva te grahītavyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:404_4: dharmadhātus tu rūpyarūpisvabhāva [Tib. 54a] iti. svadeśe parasyotpattipratibandha
SA01yabhkvyu:404_5: iti vistaraḥ. yatraikaṃ sapratighaṃ vastu. tatra dvitīyasyotpattir na bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:405_0: yathā hasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ pratihanyate. upale vā. hasto hastasthāne upalasthāne
SA01yabhkvyu:405_1: vā notpadyate. upalo 'pi. tayor hastopalayoḥ sthāne upalo 'pi notpadyate. jale pratihanyata
SA01yabhkvyu:405_2: iti. jale svaviṣaye pravartata ity arthaḥ. prāyeṇa manuṣyāṇām (Abhidh-k-vy 59)
SA01yabhkvyu:406_0: iti prāyagrahaṇaṃ kaivartādinivṛttyarthaṃ. asti nobhayatreti. garbhe niyatamṛtyūnāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:406_1: etān ākārān iti. etāṃ prakārān ity arthaḥ. titīlā jatunyaḥ. mārjārādīnām ity ādigrahaṇena
SA01yabhkvyu:406_2: cauramanuṣyādīnāṃ vyāghrādīnāṃ ca grahaṇaṃ. yasmiṃ yasya kāritraṃ. sa tasya viṣaya
SA01yabhkvyu:406_3: iti. kāritraṃ puruṣakāraḥ. cakṣuḥśrotrādīnāṃ rūpaśabdādiṣv ālocanaśravaṇādikāritraṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:406_4: tac ca svacittacaittān praty āśrayabhāvaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ. yac cittacaittair
SA01yabhkvyu:406_5: gṛhyate daṇḍāvaṣṭambhanayogena. tad ālambanaṃ rūpādi. tad evaṃ sati cittacaittānām
SA01yabhkvyu:406_6: evālambanaṃ. viṣayaḥ punaś cakṣurādīnām api na kevalaṃ cittacaittānāṃ. tasmāt pareṇāpravṛtter
SA01yabhkvyu:406_7: iti. yo hi loke yataḥ pareṇa na pravartate. sa tatra pratihanyate kāṣṭhe kuḍye vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:406_8: tathā cakṣurādi viṣayāt pareṇa na kāritraṃ karoti. viṣaya eva tu karoti tasmāt tatra
SA01yabhkvyu:406_9: pratihanyata ity ucyate. [Tib. 54b] nipāto vātra pratighāta iti vistaraḥ. atra viṣaye
SA01yabhkvyu:406_10: nipatanaṃ nipātaḥ. yā svaviṣaye pravṛttiḥ. kāritram ity arthaḥ. tad ihāvaraṇapratighāteneti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:408_0: atrāvaraṇapratighātena te daśa dhātavaḥ sapratighā abhipretāḥ. tatra viṣayālambanapratighātābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:408_1: cittacaittānām api sapratighatvaprasaṃgāt catuṣkoṭikaḥ praśnaś catuṣkoṇaś catuḥprakāra
SA01yabhkvyu:408_2: ity arthaḥ. paścātpādaka iti. yadi praśnasya paścādbhāgaṃ gṛhītvā visarjanāyottiṣṭhate
SA01yabhkvyu:408_3: sa paścātpādakaḥ. yadi pūrvaṃ bhāgaṃ gṛhītvā sa pūrvapādakaḥ. viṣayapratighātenāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:408_4: ta iti cittacaittāḥ. te hi viṣayapratighātenālambanapratighātena ca sapratighāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:410: iti vistaraḥ. yatrāśraye ālambane ca utpattukāmasya manasaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:416_1: pratighātena sapratighatvād ity apare. kiṃ punas tat. paṃcendriyapaṃcaviṣayadhātusvabhāvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:419_0: yatrotpitsor manasaḥ pratighāto na śakyate paraiḥ kartuṃ yathā manodhātor dharmadhātoś
SA01yabhkvyu:419_1: ca manovijñānotpattau [Tib. 55a] antarāvaraṇaṃ na śakyate paraiḥ kartuṃ. ataḥ saptacittadhātudharmadharmadhātusvabhāvam
SA01yabhkvyu:421_0: iti. avyākṛtā evāṣṭāv ity avadhāraṇaṃ. kuśalākuśalabhāvenāvyākaraṇāt avyākṛtāḥ. ye
SA01yabhkvyu:421_1: kuśalākuśalavyatiriktāḥ. ta evāvyākṛtā ihābhipretāḥ. na tu kuśalāḥ akuśalāvyākṛtāvyākaraṇāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:421_2: nāpy akuśalāḥ kuśalāvyākṛtāvyākaraṇāt. kuśalākuśalānāṃ kuśalākuśalabhāvena vyākṛtatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:423_0: iti. dhātava ity adhikṛtaṃ. traidhaivānye naikadhā na dvidheti avadhāraṇaṃ. alobhādisaṃprayuktāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:423_1: kuśalā iti vistaraḥ. alobhadveṣamohahryapatrapāsaṃprayuktāḥ saptacittadhātavaḥ kuśalāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:423_2: lobhadveṣamohāhrīanapatrāpyasaṃprayuktā akuśalāḥ. kutsitāc chalitā gatā apakrāntā
SA01yabhkvyu:423_3: iti kuśalāḥ. prajñā vā kuśa iva tīkṣṇeti kuśaḥ. taṃ lānti ādadata ity kuśalaḥ. tadviparītā
SA01yabhkvyu:423_4: akuśalāḥ. anye tv alobhādilobhādyasaṃprayuktā avyākṛtāḥ. dharmadhātur iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:423_5: alobhādisvabhāvo [Tib. 55b] yo 'yam uktaḥ. alobhādisaṃprayukto vedanādiḥ. alobhādisamuttho
SA01yabhkvyu:423_6: viprayuktaḥ. prātijātyādiḥ. avijñaptiś ca. pratisaṃkhyānirodhaś cāpara iti caturvidhaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:423_9: ākāśam apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. teṣāṃ ca yathāśaṃbhavaṃ prāptijātyādayaḥ. eṣo 'vyākṛto
SA01yabhkvyu:423_10: dharmadhātuḥ. tadanyāv avyākṛtāv iti. tābhyāṃ kuśalākuśalacittasamutthābhyāṃ rūpaśabdadhātubhyām
SA01yabhkvyu:423_11: anyau rūpaśabdadhātū avyākṛtacittasamutthau kāyavāgvijñaptisaṃgṛhītau vijñaptyasaṃgṛhītau cāvyākṛtau.
SA01yabhkvyu:425: iti. kāmadhātvāptāḥ sarva evety avadhāryate. aṣṭādaśadhātutvamātrasaṃgrahāt. na tu pratyekaṃ sākalyataḥ. tata āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:427_0: tayoḥ kavaḍīkārāhāratvād iti. tayor gandharasayoḥ. gandho 'pi hi kavaḍīkārāhāraḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:427_1: sūkṣmaḥ. tatrābhāvaprasaṃga iti. tatra rūpadhātau spraṣṭavyadhātor abhāvaprasaṃgaḥ kavaḍīkārāhāratvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:430_0: [Tib. 56] iti siddhāntāt. gandharasayor apy eṣa prasaṃga iti. yau nāhārasvabhāvau.
SA01yabhkvyu:430_1: tau tatra syātām ity arthaḥ. asti tu spraṣṭavyasyeti. kiṃ. paribhoga indriyāśrayabhāvena
SA01yabhkvyu:430_2: ādhārabhāvena prāvaraṇabhāvena ca. anye punar āhur iti bhadantaśrīlātaḥ. praśrabdhisahagateneti.
SA01yabhkvyu:430_4: anādṛtya vaibhāṣikamataṃ sāvakāśaṃ dṛṣṭvā viniścayam ārabhate. evaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:430_5: vaibhāṣikair arthata etat pratijñātaṃ. na sto rūpadhātau gandharasau. niḥprayojanatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:430_6: strīpuruṣendriyaviṣayavad iti. taṃ pakṣam ācāryo dūṣayati. duṣṭo 'yaṃ pakṣaḥ. dharmiviśeṣaviparyayāpakṣālatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:430_8: prāpnoti. yathā hi strīpuruṣendriyaviṣayo niḥprayojanatvena avidyamānasvagrāhako
SA01yabhkvyu:430_9: bhavati. tathā gandharasākhyo 'pi viṣayaḥ prāpnoti. sphuṭam apy anumānam asti. yenaiṣa
SA01yabhkvyu:430_10: dharmiviśeṣaviparyayo vyajyate. na sto rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye niḥprayojanaviṣayatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:430_11: puruṣendriyavad iti. vaibhāṣikadeśīyaḥ kaścit pratividhatte. asti prayojanam iti
SA01yabhkvyu:430_12: vistaraḥ. tābhyāṃ ghrāṇajihvendriyābhyāṃ [Tib. 56b] vinā śarīraśobhaiva na syāt vāgvijñaptiś
SA01yabhkvyu:430_13: ca. anena dṛṣṭabādhena prasaṃgaṃ nivartayati. anumānaṃ hy atra dṛṣṭaṃ bādhate. kiṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:430_14: ity ucyate. sto rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye. saprayojanatvāt. cakṣurindriyavad iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:430_15: ācārya āha. yady etat prayojanam iti vistaraḥ. adhiṣṭhānenaivāśrayaśobhā vacanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:430_16: ca bhavati nendriyeṇeti saprayojanatvasya hetor asiddhatāṃ darśayati. vaibhāśikadeśīya
SA01yabhkvyu:430_17: āha. nānindriyam adhiṣṭhānam iti vistaraḥ. na rūpadhātau saṃbhavaty anindriyaṃ ghrāṇajihvendriyādhiṣṭhānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:430_18: indriyādhiṣṭhānatvāt. puruṣendriyādhiṣṭhānavad iti. etena saprayojanatvasya siddhatāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:430_19: sthāpayati. ācārya āha. yuktas tadasaṃbhava iti vistaraḥ. yuktas tatra puruṣendriyādhiṣṭhānasyāsaṃbhavo
SA01yabhkvyu:430_21: saprayojanaṃ. ato 'sya vināpīndriyeṇa yuktaḥ saṃbhavaḥ. sādhanaṃ tatrocyate. saṃbhavati
SA01yabhkvyu:430_23: iti. anena tām eva saprayojanatvasyāsiddhatāṃ vyavasthāpayati. evam atra saprayojanatvavādini
SA01yabhkvyu:430_24: vaibhāṣikadeśīye kasmiṃścin niṣiddhe yad etad ādāv uktaṃ. evaṃ tarhi ghrāṇajihvendriyayor
SA01yabhkvyu:430_25: apy abhāvaprasaṃgaḥ niḥprayojanatvād iti taddūṣaṇābhāsatāṃ darśayanto vaibhāṣikā
SA01yabhkvyu:430_26: āhuḥ. niḥprayojanāpīti vistaraḥ. yathā garbhe [Tib. 57a] niyatamṛtyūnāṃ niḥprayojanābhinirvṛttiḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 62)
SA01yabhkvyu:431_0: na hi teṣāṃ rūpadarśanādir bhavati. evaṃ rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriyābhinirvṛttir
SA01yabhkvyu:431_1: niḥprayojanāpi bhaviṣyatīti. tena na sto rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye. niḥprayojanatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:431_2: puruṣendriyavad iti niḥprayojanatvam anaikāntikaṃ pradarśyate. ācārya āha. syān nāma
SA01yabhkvyu:431_3: niḥprayojaneti vistaraḥ. bhaven niḥprayojanendriyābhinirvṛttiḥ. na tu nirhetukā saṃskṛtānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:431_4: sahetukatvāt. yaś ca viṣayād vitṛṣṇaḥ. sa niyatam indriyād apīti. anena hetvabhāvaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:431_5: pradarśyate. tataś caivaṃ sādhanam ucyate. na sto rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye. nirhetukatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:431_6: nirhetukāṃkuravat puruṣendriyavad vā. puruṣendriyam api vā kiṃ nirvartata ity ācārya
SA01yabhkvyu:431_7: eva vikalpaṃ vāhayati. ko 'bhiprāyaḥ. yadi niḥprayojanā hetum antareṇāpi vā ghrāṇajihvendriyayor
SA01yabhkvyu:431_8: utpattiḥ puruṣendriyam api vā na nirvartate. vaibhāṣikānāṃ hy ayaṃ pakṣaḥ. saghrāṇajihvendriyo
SA01yabhkvyu:431_9: rūpadhātusattvasaṃtānaḥ. rūpiprāṇitvāt. kāmāvacarasattvasaṃtānavad iti. ācāryas tu
SA01yabhkvyu:431_10: puruṣendriyam api kiṃ na nirvartata ity anena tasya pakṣasya dharmiviśeṣaviparyayaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:431_11: darśayati. avidyamānapuruṣendriyo rūpadhātusattvasaṃtāno dharmī. tasya viparyayo
SA01yabhkvyu:432_0: aśobhākaratvād itil. katham iti. na rūpadhātau puruṣendriyam asti. aśobhākaratvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:432_1: kāṇakuṇṭhatvavat. tadanumānabādhanān na viparyety asmākam eṣā pratijñā. yadi dṛṣṭaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:432_2: na bādhata iti naiyāyikasiddhāntād ity abhiprāyaḥ. ācārya āha. kośagatavastiguhyānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:432_3: kiṃ na śobhate. vastau guhyaṃ vastiguhyaṃ. vastir yena tat puruṣendriyaṃ veṣṭitaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:432_4: guhyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ. kośo yatra tad vastiguhyaṃ tiṣṭhati. kośagataṃ vastiguhyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:432_5: yeṣāṃ ta ime kośagatavastiguhyāḥ. teṣāṃ kiṃ na śobhate śobhata evety arthaḥ. anenāśobhākaratvam
SA01yabhkvyu:432_6: asiddhaṃ darśayati. na ca prayojanavaśād utpattir iti vistaraḥ. vaibhāṣikair aśobhākaratvād
SA01yabhkvyu:432_7: iti bruvadbhir arthāpattyaitat pratijñātaṃ bhavati. prayojanavaśotpādyaṃ puruṣendriyam
SA01yabhkvyu:432_8: iti. sa ca pakṣo 'numānabādhito dharmisvarūpaviparyayāpakṣālatvāt. katham iti. ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:432_9: na prayojanavaśotpādyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ. svakāraṇotpādyatvāt. kāṇakuṇṭhatvavat. vaibhāṣikā
SA01yabhkvyu:432_10: āhuḥ. sūtraṃ tarhi virudhyata iti vistaraḥ. yo 'yam avidyamānaghrāṇajihvendriyo rūpadhātusattvasaṃtāna
SA01yabhkvyu:432_11: iti pakṣaḥ. sa sāpakṣālaḥ. prākpakṣavirodhāt. [Tib. 58a] tathā hi bhagavatā rūpāvacarāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:432_12: sattvā avikalā ahīnendriyā iti uktāḥ. kāṇakuṇṭhatvābhāvatvāt. ahīnendriyāś cakṣurādibhir
SA01yabhkvyu:432_13: ahīnatvāt. ācārya āha. yāni tatreti vistaraḥ. yāni tatra rūpadhātau ghrāṇendriyādirahitāni
SA01yabhkvyu:432_14: cakṣurādīni tair ahīnendriyā iti sūtrārthaparigrahād avirodhaḥ. evaṃ tu varṇayanti
SA01yabhkvyu:432_15: vaibhāṣikāḥ. sta eveti vistaraḥ. bhavata. eva tatra (Abhidh-k-vy 63)
SA01yabhkvyu:433_0: rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye na tu gandharasau. ātmabhāvamukhena hi svasaṃtānamukhena
SA01yabhkvyu:433_1: ṣaḍāyatane cakṣurādike tṛṣṇāsamudācārḥ prāṇināṃ pravartate. tadabhiṣyanditaṃ ca karmeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:433_2: sahetuke rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye. tataś ca sahetukatvāt. sta eva te rūpadhātau.
SA01yabhkvyu:433_3: sahetukāṃkurādivad iti. anena ca na sto rūpadhātau ghrāṇajihvendriye nirhetukatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:433_4: iti yat sādhanam uktaṃ. tad asiddham iti pratipādayanti. puruṣendriye tu maithunasparśamukhena.
SA01yabhkvyu:433_5: kiṃ. tṛṣṇāsamudācāra iti prakṛtaṃ. maithunasparśavītarāgāś ca rūpāvacarāḥ sattvāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:433_6: tasmāt tasmāt tatra na tṛṣṇāpūrvakaṃ karma bhavati. tasmād ahetukatvāt. tatra puruṣendriyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:433_7: nāsti nirhetukāṃkurādivad iti siddhaṃ rūpadhātau caturdaśaiva dhātava iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:437_0: [Tib. 58b] evārūpyāptā ity avadhāraṇād anye dhātavo na santīty uktaṃ bhavati. yasmād
SA01yabhkvyu:437_1: rūpavītarāgānāṃ tatropapattiḥ. ato daśa rūpasvabhāvā dhātavaś cakṣurādayaḥ paṃca
SA01yabhkvyu:437_2: rūpādayaś cāpi paṃca na santi. tadāśrayālambanāś ca paṃca vijñānadhātavo na santīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:437_3: te cakṣurādayo rūpādayaś ca yathākramam āśrayā ālambanāni ca yeṣāṃ. ta ime tadāśrayālambanāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:437_4: āśrayāṇāṃ cakṣurādīnām ālambanānāṃ ca rūpādīnāṃ abhāvāt te 'pi cakṣurvijñānādidhātavas tatra na santi.
SA01yabhkvyu:439: iti. eta eva trayaḥ sāsravānāsravā ity avadhāraṇaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:441_0: iti. kim artham idam ucyate. nanv eta eva trayaḥ sāsravānāsravā ity avadhāraṇāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:441_1: śeṣāḥ sāsravā iti siddhaṃ. na siddhaṃ. kathaṃ. śeṣāṃ sāsravā evānāsravā eva vā syur
SA01yabhkvyu:441_2: ity āśaṃkāḥ. tannivṛttyartham idam ucyate. śeṣāḥ sāsravā eveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:445_0: iti. antyā eva triprakārā ity avadhāraṇaṃ. anyatra vitarkavicārābhyām iti. vitarkavicārau
SA01yabhkvyu:445_1: saṃprayuktakadharmadhātusvabhāvau tayor atra grahaṇaprasaṃga iti parivarjyete. [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:445_2: 59a] vitarko hi dvitīyaprakārāntare 'ntarbhaviṣyati. vicāro 'pi dhyānāntarajas tṛtīye
SA01yabhkvyu:446_0: triṣv api prakāreṣu nāntarbhavatīti vakṣyati. te ete manodhātvādayaḥ saṃprayuktadharmadhātuparyantāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:446_1: kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne sasāmantake maule savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ vitarkavicārasaṃprayogāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:446_2: ata eva dhyānāntare 'vitarkā vitarkābhāvāt. vicāramātrā vicārasaṃprayogāt. ata eva
SA01yabhkvyu:446_3: dvitīyāt prabhṛti yāvad bhavāgraṃ tayor abhāvād avitarkā avicārāḥ. sarvaś cāsaṃprayukto
SA01yabhkvyu:446_4: dharmadhātur iti. yathāsaṃbhavaṃ traidhātukarūpacittaviprayuktā asaṃskṛtāś ca dhyānāntare
SA01yabhkvyu:446_5: ca vicāraḥ avitarko. vitarkābhāvāt. avicāro dvitīyavicārābhāvāt. vicāra eṣu triṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:446_6: prakāreṣu nāntarbhavatīti. kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmiko vicāraḥ prathame tāvat
SA01yabhkvyu:446_7: prakāre nāntarbhavati. savitarkaḥ savicāra iti. sa hi savitarkaḥ saṃbhavati na tu
SA01yabhkvyu:446_8: savicāro vicārasaṃprayogāt. dvitīye 'pi nāntarbhavati. avitarko vicāramātra iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:446_9: vitarkasaṃprayogāt. dvitīyavicārābhāvāc ca. tṛtīye 'pi nāntarbhavati. avitarkaḥ avicāra
SA01yabhkvyu:446_10: iti. sa hi yady api avicāro dvitīyavicārābhāvāt. na tv avitarko [Tib. 59b] vitarkasaṃprayogāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:446_11: sa kathaṃ vaktavya ity ata āha. avicāro vitarkamātra iti. dvitīyavicārābhāvāt avicāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:446_12: vitarkasaṃprayogāt vitarkamātraḥ. ata eveti. yasmāt savitarkasavicārāṇāṃ bhūmau vicāra
SA01yabhkvyu:446_13: eva caturthaḥ prakāro bhavati. avicāro vitarkamātra iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:448: iti. śesā daśa rūpiṇo dhātava uktāḥ. te 'vitarkā vicāramātrā vā avitarkā avicārāḥ syur iti āśaṃkāyām avadhārya tadubhayavarjitā eva śeṣā avitarkā avicārā evety arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:449_0: (I.32) katham avikalpakā ity ucyanta iti. cakṣurvijñānasamaṃgī nīlaṃ vijānāti nohati
SA01yabhkvyu:449_1: nīlam iti vacanāt. trividhaḥ kila vikalpa iti. kilaśabdaḥ paramatadyotanārthaḥ. svābhiprāyas
SA01yabhkvyu:449_2: tu cetanāprajñāviśeṣa eva vitarka iti na svabhāvavikalpo 'nyo dharmo 'stīti. tathā
SA01yabhkvyu:449_3: hy anena paṃcaskandhaka uktaṃ. vitarkaḥ katamaḥ. paryeṣako manojalpaḥ cetanāprajñāviśeṣaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:449_4: yā cittasyaudārikatā. vicāraḥ katamaḥ. pratyavekṣako manojalpas tathaiva yā cittasya
SA01yabhkvyu:449_5: sūkṣmatā. anabhyūhāvasthāyāṃ cetanā abhyūhāvasthāyāṃ prajñeti vyavasthāpyate. tad
SA01yabhkvyu:449_6: eṣāṃ svabhāvavikalpo 'stīti. tad iti vākyopanyāse nipātas tasmādarthe vā. svabhāvenaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:449_7: [Tib. 60a] vikalpa audārikalakṣaṇatvāt. svabhāvavikalpo vitarkaḥ. sa eṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:449_8: vijñānakāyānāṃ saṃprayogato 'sti tasmāt savikalpā uktāḥ. netarāv abhinirūpaṇānusmaraṇavikalpāv
SA01yabhkvyu:449_9: eṣāṃ staḥ. tasmād avikalpakā ucyante. yathā ekapādako 'śvaḥ apādaka iti. pādatraye
SA01yabhkvyu:450_0: apādaka ity ucyate. tadvad ekavikalpā avikalpakā iti. sā hy abhinirūpaṇāvikalpa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:450_1: sā mānasy asamāhitā prajñā śrutacintāmayy upapattipratilaṃbhikā ca. sā hi manasi
SA01yabhkvyu:450_2: bhavā mānasī. vyagrā vividhāgrā vyagrā vividhālambanety arthaḥ. vigatapradhānā vā
SA01yabhkvyu:450_3: muhurmuhur ālambanāntarāśrayaṇāt. vyagrā kasmād abhinirūpaṇāvikalpa ity ucyate. tatratatrālambane
SA01yabhkvyu:450_4: nāmāpekṣayābhipravṛtteḥ. rūpaṃ vedanā anityaṃ duḥkham ityādyabhinirūpaṇāc ca. samāhitā
SA01yabhkvyu:450_5: tu bhāvanāmayī nāmanapekṣyālambane pravartata iti. naiṣābhinirūpaṇāvikalpa ity ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:450_6: mānasy eva sarvā smṛtir iti. samāhitā cāsamāhitā ca. sā kila nāmānapekṣā anubhūtārthamātrālambanā
SA01yabhkvyu:450_7: pravartate. smṛtiḥ katamā. cetaso 'bhilāṣa iti lakṣaṇāt. paṃcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktā
SA01yabhkvyu:452: ity ubhayāvadhāraṇaṃ. saptaiva sālambanāḥ sālambanā eva ca sapteti.
SA01yabhkvyu:454_0: sālambanam iti. uktavyatirekeṇedam ucyate. atrāpy ubhayāvadhāraṇaṃ. dharmārdham eva
SA01yabhkvyu:454_1: sālambanaṃ. sālambanam eva ca dharmārdham iti. yasmāc ca saptaiva sālambanā dharmārdhaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:454_2: caiva sālambanam iti avadhāraṇam asti tasmāc ccheṣā rūpiṇo dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaś
SA01yabhkvyu:454_3: cāsaṃyukto 'nālambanā iti siddham ity uktaṃ. tathā hy anavadhāraṇe hy ayam artho na sidhyet.
SA01yabhkvyu:456: iti navānupāttā evety avadhāraṇaṃ. aṣṭamasyārdhena sārdham iti. saheti yāvat.
SA01yabhkvyu:458: iti. te ca sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuś ca yasyārdhaṃ sālambanam uktaṃ. aṣṭagrahaṇaṃ sakaladharmadhātugrahaṇārthaṃ. mā dharmadhātvardhāgrahaṇaṃ vijñāyīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:462: cakṣurādayaḥ paṃca śabdavarjyāś ca rūpādayaś catvāra iti nava te dvidhaiva. upāttānupāttā ity arthaḥ. na tūpāttā eveti. etadarthaṃ ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:464: punaḥ sūtritaṃ. anugrahopaghātābhyām anyonyānuvidhānād [Tib. 61a] iti. cakṣurdhātvādīnām anugrahopaghātābhyām aṃjanādipāṇighātādilakṣaṇābhyāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 66)
SA01yabhkvyu:465_0: cittacaittānām anugrahopaghātau bhavataḥ. cittacaittānāṃ cānugrahopaghātābhyāṃ saumanasyadaurmanasyalakṣaṇābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:465_1: cakṣurdhātvādīnām anugrahopaghātau bhavataḥ. atas te cittacaittair adhiṣṭhānabhāvenopagṛhītā
SA01yabhkvyu:465_2: ucyante svīkṛtā ity arthaḥ. yal loke sacetanam iti sajīvam ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:467: ity ubhayāvadhāraṇaṃ. spraṣṭavyam eva dvividhaṃ dvividham eva spraṣṭavyam eveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:471_0: ity atrāpy ubhayāvadhāraṇaṃ. yasmāc caite ubhayāvadhāritāḥ. tasmāc cheṣāḥ sapta cittadhātavo
SA01yabhkvyu:471_1: dharmadhātuś cāvijñaptivarjyo nobhayatheti siddhaṃ. bhūtānāṃ catuṣkakhakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇād
SA01yabhkvyu:471_2: iti. catuṣkāvadhāraṇāt pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātavaḥ spraṣṭavyadhātau catvāri bhūtāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:471_3: ślakṣṇatvādayas tatra cakṣurādayaś ca na bhūtāni. khakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāc ca
SA01yabhkvyu:471_4: pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātuṣv anye dharmāś cakṣurādayo nāntarbhāvaṃ gacchanti. kathaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:471_5: catvāri mahābhūtāni pṛthivīdhātur [Tib. 61b] abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātuḥ. pṛthivīdhātuḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:471_6: katamaḥ khakkhaṭatvam iti vistaraḥ. teṣāṃ ca spraṣṭavyatvād iti. teṣāṃ ca khakkhaṭatvādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:471_7: spraṣṭavyatvāt. yasmāt tāni spraṣṭavyāni. varṇādayas tu draṣṭavyāḥ śrotavyā ghrātavyāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:471_8: svādayitavyāḥ. kathaṃ gamyate spraṣṭavyāni tānīti. ata āha. na hi kāṭhinyādīni cakṣurādibhir
SA01yabhkvyu:471_9: gṛhyante. kiṃ tarhi. kāyendriyeṇaivety ato 'vagamyate spraṣṭavyāni tānīti. syān mataṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:471_10: te 'pi varṇādayaḥ spraṣṭavyā ity ata āha. nāpi varṇādayaḥ kāyendriyeṇa. kiṃ. gṛhyanta
SA01yabhkvyu:471_11: iti prakṛtaṃ. uktaṃ ca sūtra iti vistaraḥ. aparasminn api sūtre spaṣṭam ādarśitaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:471_12: katham iti vistareṇa yāvad idam uktaṃ. spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyam āyatanaṃ catvāri
SA01yabhkvyu:471_13: mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpy anidarśanaṃ sapratigham iti. śeṣaṃ cakṣurādyāyatanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:471_14: na bhūtānīti spaṣṭam ādarśitaṃ. yat tarhi sūtra uktam iti vistaraḥ. yac cakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe
SA01yabhkvyu:471_15: khakkhaṭakharagataṃ kharaprakāra ity arthaḥ. cakṣurindriyaṃ khakkhaṭasvabhāvam iti
SA01yabhkvyu:471_16: matvā codayanti. tenāvinirbhāgavartino māṃsapiṇḍasyaiṣa upadeśa iti. tena cakṣurindriyeṇāvinirbhāgavartino
SA01yabhkvyu:471_17: 'dhiṣṭhānasya etad vacanaṃ. bhavati hi cakṣuradhiṣṭhāne 'pi cakṣurupacāraḥ. ata eva
SA01yabhkvyu:471_18: māṃsapiṇḍa iti grahaṇaṃ. anyathā cakṣuṣīty evāvakṣyat yadīndriyam eveṣyate. [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:472_0: bhikṣo puruṣa iti vistaraḥ. garbhāvakrāntisūtre kalalādyavasthāyām iti bhūtamātropadeśān
SA01yabhkvyu:472_1: na bhautikam astīti codyam āśaṃkyāha. mūlasattvadravyasaṃdarśānārtham iti. mūlasya
SA01yabhkvyu:472_2: sattvadravyasya saṃdarśanārtham eva. pṛthivīdhātvādayaś catvāro mūlasattvaṃ. paṃcānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:472_3: cakṣurādīnāṃ sparśāyatanānāṃ tata utpatteḥ. manodhātur api mūlasattvaṃ manaḥsparśāyatanasya
SA01yabhkvyu:472_4: tata utpatteḥ. atha vā caturṇāṃ pṛthivīdhātvādīnām upādāyarūpāśrayatvāt. vijñānadhātoś
SA01yabhkvyu:472_5: ca caitasikānām āśrayatvāt ta eva mūlasattvaṃ. kathaṃ gamyate. punaḥ ṣaṭsparśāyatanavacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:472_6: tattraiva sūtre paścād uktaṃ. ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānīti cakṣuḥsprarśāyatanaṃ yāvan manaḥsparśāyatanam
SA01yabhkvyu:472_7: iti. ato vijñāyate mūlasattvadravyasaṃdarśanārthatvāt ṣaḍdhātur ayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣa
SA01yabhkvyu:472_8: iti vacanaṃ. na tu bhūtamātratvād iti. nanu ca yathā vijñānadhātor avyatiriktam api
SA01yabhkvyu:472_9: manaḥsparśāyatanaṃ punar ucyate. evaṃ cakṣurādīny api caturdhātvavyatiriktāni punar
SA01yabhkvyu:472_10: ucyerann iti. ato na punaḥ ṣaṭsparśāyatanavacanena tadvyatiriktabhautikāstitvasiddhiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:472_11: naitad evaṃ. yadi hi pṛthivīdhātvādaya eva sparśāyatanāni abhaviṣyan bhūtāny eva
SA01yabhkvyu:472_12: sparśāyatanānīty evāvakṣyat. na tv evaṃ. kiṃ tarhi. cakṣuḥsparśāyatanaṃ yāvan manaḥsparśāyatanam
SA01yabhkvyu:472_14: tu cakṣurādisparśāyatanavacanānuṣaṃgena punar ucyate. sparśāyatanam iti ko 'rthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:472_15: sparśasya caitasikasyāśraya ity arthaḥ. cittabhāvaprasaṃgāc ceti. yadi ṣaḍdhātur
SA01yabhkvyu:472_16: ayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣa iti yathābhūtam eva dravyāṇi gṛhyeran nānyāni tadāśritāni dravyāṇi.
SA01yabhkvyu:472_17: tenaitat prāptaṃ. vijñānadhātumātragrahaṇāt. atra caitasikānāṃ tadāśritānām agrahaṇaprasaṃgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:472_18: iṣṭatvād adoṣa iti cet. na. sapakṣālatvād asya pakṣasya. sāpakṣālo hy ayaṃ pakṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:472_19: cittaviśeṣā eva caitasikā iti svasiddhāntavirodhāt. tenāha. na ca yuktaṃ cittam eva
SA01yabhkvyu:472_20: caittā ity abhyupagantuṃ. kasmāt. saṃjñā vedanā ca caitasika eṣa dharmaś cittaniśrita
SA01yabhkvyu:472_21: iti sūtravacanāt. sādhanaṃ cātropatiṣṭhate. cittād arthāntarabhūte saṃjñāvedane.
SA01yabhkvyu:472_22: skandhadeśanāyāṃ pṛthag deśitatvāt. rūpaskandhavad iti. atha vā svāśrayād arthāntarabhūte
SA01yabhkvyu:472_23: saṃjñāvedane. tadāśritatvāt. yat svāśrayāśritaṃ tat svāśrayād arthāntarabhūtaṃ. tadyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:472_24: kuḍyāśritaṃ citraṃ. sarāgādicittavacanāc ceti. sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti
SA01yabhkvyu:472_25: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:473: sadveṣaṃ cittaṃ sadveṣaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti vistaraḥ. [Tib. 63a] atra (Abhidh-k-vy 68)
SA01yabhkvyu:474: sādhanaṃ. sarāgaṃ cittam iti cittarāgayoḥ parasparato 'rthāntaratvaṃ. sahayoganirdiṣṭatvāt. saputraś caitra iti sahayoganirdiṣṭacaitraputravad iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:476: paramāṇusaṃcayasvabhāvā daśaivety arthaḥ. anye tu dhātavo 'smād avadhāraṇān na saṃcitā iti siddhaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:477_0: (I.35) tulayatīti kasya dhātor etad rūpaṃ. tathā hi tula unmāna ity asya dhātos tolayatīti
SA01yabhkvyu:477_1: rūpaṃ bhavati. naiṣa doṣaḥ. tulāṃ karoti tulayatīti prātipadikadhātor etad rūpam
SA01yabhkvyu:477_2: iṣyate. karmaṇi ca tulya iti rūpaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:479_0: iti rūpādikaṃ śabdavarjyaṃ. paraśudārvādisaṃjñakam iti. paraśvādisaṃjñakaṃ chinatti
SA01yabhkvyu:479_1: dārvādisaṃjñākaṃ chidyate. saṃbhavaṃ praty evam ucyate. kadācit paraśvādisaṃjñakaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:479_2: chidyate. dārvādisaṃjñakam api cchinatti. saṃbandhotpādina iti vistaraḥ. saṃbandhenāvibhāgenotpattuṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:479_3: śīlam asyeti saṃbandhotpādi. saṃghātasroto rūpādisaṃghātasaṃtāna ity arthaḥ. tasya
SA01yabhkvyu:479_4: vibhaktotpādanaṃ vibhaktajananaṃ yat sa chedaḥ. kṣaṇikānāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ vināpi paraśvādinā
SA01yabhkvyu:479_5: cchedo bhavaty eva. saṃtānanirodhas tu paraśvādineti. paraśvādikaṃ chinattīty ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:479_6: kāraṇasāmagrīviśeṣavaśād vikāryaviśeṣotpattir bhavati. tatra dhātucatuṣṭayam avacchinatti
SA01yabhkvyu:479_7: chidyate vety avadhāryate. tathāvadhāraṇāc cānye dhātavo nobhayatheti siddhaṃ. ata
SA01yabhkvyu:479_8: eva cāha. na kāyendriyādīni chidyanta iti vistaraḥ. atra na cakṣurindriyādīnīti vaktavye
SA01yabhkvyu:479_9: kasmāt kāyendriyādīnīti vacanaṃ. yasmāt kāyendriye parisphuṭaś chedo bhavati yadi
SA01yabhkvyu:479_10: bhaved ity ataḥ [Tib. 63b] kāyendriyapurassarāṇīndriyāṇi kathyante. niravaśesāṃgacchede
SA01yabhkvyu:479_12: kathaṃ punar gamyate tadadvaidhīkaraṇam iti. ataḥ punar āha. na hīndriyāṇi dvidhā
SA01yabhkvyu:479_13: bhavanti chinnasyāṃgasya kāyād apagatasya nirindriyatvāt. idam api kathaṃ gamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:479_14: nirindriyaṃ tad aṃgaṃ yac chinnaṃ kāyād apagatam iti. yasmāt tat pratītya spraṣṭavyādikaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:479_15: ca kāyādivijñānānupapattiḥ. kathaṃ tarhi chinnena punar lagnena nāsikāgreṇa kāyavijñānotpattiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:479_16: nāsikāmūlasaṃbandhena punaḥ kāyendriyotpatter adoṣaḥ. katham iha gṛhagodhikādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:479_17: pucchāni chinnāni spandante yadi tatra kāyendriyaṃ nāsti. vāyadhātor eṣa vikāro naitat
SA01yabhkvyu:479_18: kāyendriyasya karmety avagantavyaṃ. na cāpi chindanti maṇiprabhāvad acchatvāt. yathā
SA01yabhkvyu:479_19: maṇiprabhā na chinatti acchatvāt. tadvad indriyāṇi.
SA01yabhkvyu:482_0: ity evaṃśabdena tad eva bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ tathātvena pradarśyate. kāṣṭhādīnām
SA01yabhkvyu:482_1: agnikṛto vikāro dāhaḥ. ca cendriyānāṃ na bhavati maṇiprabhāvad acchatvāt. na hi tāni
SA01yabhkvyu:482_2: kāṣṭhādivac carmādivad vā vikriyante. kiṃ tarhi. tatsaṃbandhāt pravāhachedo bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:482_3: tulādibhūtaṃ ca tad eva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ tulayati nendriyāṇi tathaivācchatvāt. amūrtānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:482_4: tu dhātūnām amūrtatvād eva chedādyasaṃbhava iti. teṣāṃ chedādi na cintyate. na śabda
SA01yabhkvyu:482_5: uccheditvād iti. [Tib. 64a] kiṃ. chinatti chidyate dahyate tulyati vāpravāhavartitvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:484_0: ity uttaratrāpīdam anuvartate na śabda uccheditvād iti. tad eva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ dāhakaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:484_1: tulyaṃ ceti. agnikṣārādi dāhakaṃ. samastasyātra dhātucatuṣṭayasya bhasmādivikārahetutvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:484_2: lavaṇādi tulyaṃ. tatrāpi samastasya tulāvanatihetutvād ity ekeṣām abhiprāyaḥ. tejodhātūr
SA01yabhkvyu:484_3: eva dagdhā gurutvam eva ca tulyam iti. tejodhātur evāgnijvālādigata udbhūtavṛttir
SA01yabhkvyu:484_4: dahati. pṛthivīdhātvādīnām udbhūtasvavṛttitve 'py adāhakatvadarśanāt. gurutvam eva
SA01yabhkvyu:484_5: copādāyarūpam udbhūtavṛtti tulyate. ātapādiṣu laghudravyeṣu rūpādīnām udbhūtavṛttitve
SA01yabhkvyu:486_0: iti. paṃcagrahaṇaṃ manonivṛttyarthaṃ. adhyātmagrahaṇaṃ rūpādinivṛttyarthaṃ. vipākajaupacayikā
SA01yabhkvyu:486_1: eva paṃcādhyātmikā na naiṣyandikā ity avadhāraṇaṃ. kasmāt. tadvyatiriktaniṣyandābhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:486_2: vipākajā aupacayikāś ca yady api naiṣyandikā bhavanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:488_0: iti kṛtvā. te tu vipākajaupacayikatvenaiva saṃgṛhītatvāt. na naiṣyandikā iti gṛhyante.
SA01yabhkvyu:488_1: ye tu svahetusadṛśā na ca vipākajā na caupacayikāḥ. ta iha naiṣyandikā [Tib. 64b]
SA01yabhkvyu:488_2: abhipretāḥ. na caivaṃvidhāś cakṣurādayo bhavanti. kiṃ tarhi vipākajā vā aupacayikā
SA01yabhkvyu:488_3: vā bhavantīty ata evam ucyate. tadvyatiriktaniṣyandābhāvād iti. kathaṃ punar jñāyate
SA01yabhkvyu:488_4: naiṣyandikās te na santīti. mṛtasyānanuvṛtteḥ. na hi rūpādivan mṛtasya cakṣurdhātvādayo
SA01yabhkvyu:488_5: 'nuvartante. vipākahetor jātā iti. vipākasya phalasya hetur vipākahetuḥ. vipākahetor
SA01yabhkvyu:488_6: jātā vipākajāḥ. madhyapadalopāt hetuśabdalopāt gorathavat. yathā gobhir yukto ratho
SA01yabhkvyu:488_7: goratha iti. phalakālaprāptaṃ vā karmeti. vipākaphalotpattyanantarakṣaṇāvastham ity
SA01yabhkvyu:488_8: arthaḥ. vipacyata iti vipākaḥ. karmakartari ghañ. vipākāj jātā vipākajāḥ. phalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:488_9: tu vipaktir eveti vipāka iti. bhāve ghañ. bhavatu vā hetau phalopacāra iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:489_0: ucyate. tadutpādakatvāt. yathā phale hetūpucāra iti vistaraḥ. ṣaḍ imāni sparśāyatanāni
SA01yabhkvyu:489_1: cakṣurādīni paurāṇaṃ karma purāṇe janmani bhavaṃ purāṇam eva vā paurāṇaṃ karma. tāni
SA01yabhkvyu:489_2: sparśāyatanāni apaurāṇakarmasvabhāvāny api paurāṇaṃ karmety ucyaṃte. tajjātatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:489_3: evam iha viparyayopacāro draṣṭavyaḥ. āhārasaṃskārasvapnasamādhiviśeṣair upacitā aupacayikā
SA01yabhkvyu:489_4: iti. viśeṣaśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate. tatrāhārasvapnau loke pratītau. saṃskāro
SA01yabhkvyu:489_6: caya upacayaḥ. upacaye bhavā aupacayikāḥ sainikavat. upacayā eva vā aupacayikāḥ vainayikavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:489_7: svārthe taddhitavidhānāt. brahmacaryeṇa cety eke iti. brahmacāriṇām upaśāntendriyāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:489_8: śarīropacayadarśanāt. anupaghātamātraṃ tu tena syād iti. abrahmacaryeṇa śarīrāpacayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:489_9: brahmacaryeṇa tu śarīrāpacayo na bhavati. tasmād āha. anupayghātamātraṃ tu tena brahmacaryeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:489_10: syāt nopacayaḥ. upacayas tv āhārādibhir eva. kasmāt tarhi pravrajitānāṃ keṣāṃcic
SA01yabhkvyu:489_11: charīrāpacayo bhavati. kāmaparidāhādiyogād asau bhavet. pratiprākāra ivārakṣeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:489_12: upacayasaṃtāno vipākasaṃtānasya parivāryāvasthānenārakṣā. śabda aupacayika ity anupacitakāyasya
SA01yabhkvyu:489_13: śabdasauṣṭhavādarśanāt. icchātaḥ pravṛtter iti. śabdo me syād iti icchayā śabdaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:489_14: pravartate. anicchayā na pravartate. vipākajaś ca dharmo 'nicchato 'pi pravartate.
SA01yabhkvyu:489_15: tasmān na vipākajaḥ śabdaḥ. sādhanaṃ cātrocyate. na vipākajaḥ śabdaḥ. icchātaḥ pravṛtteḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:489_16: yoniśomanasikāracaitasikavat. yat tu vipākajaṃ. na tasyecchayā pravṛttiḥ. tadyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:489_17: cakṣurindriyasyeti. yat tarhīti vistaraḥ. anena svasiddhāntaviruddhatāṃ pratijñāyā
SA01yabhkvyu:489_18: udgrāhayati. tṛtīyāsau paraṃparety eka iti vistaraḥ. bhūtāni pāruṣyavirateḥ karmapathasya
SA01yabhkvyu:489_19: kaṇṭhe vipākasvabhāvāni [Tib. 65b] nirvartante. tebhyaḥ śabdaḥ. dvitīye 'pi pakṣe
SA01yabhkvyu:489_20: karmebhyo vipākajāni bhūtāni. tebhya aupacayikāni āhāropacayataḥ samādhyupacayato
SA01yabhkvyu:489_21: vā bhūtāntarāṇi. tebhyo naiṣyandikāni pūrvabhūtavyatiriktāny āgantukāni bhūtāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:489_22: tebhyaḥ śabda iti. paraṃparābhinirvartanaṃ tv abhisaṃdhāya pāruṣyavirater brahmasvaratā
SA01yabhkvyu:489_23: nirvartata ity uktaṃ. anena svasiddhāntaviruddhatā tasyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ parihriyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:489_24: yadi śabdavad yuktivirodhaḥ syād iti. śabda icchātaḥ pravartata iti vipākayuktivirodhāt
SA01yabhkvyu:489_25: na vipākaja uktaḥ. tad yadi tadvac chārīriky api vedanā icchātaḥ pravartate na vipākajā
SA01yabhkvyu:489_26: syāt. na tv icchātaḥ sā pravartate. kiṃ tarhi. anicchayāpi sā pravartate. cakṣurādivat.
SA01yabhkvyu:489_27: tasmād vipākajeti yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. kīdṛśī punaḥ sā. yā sukhaduḥkhapratyayopasaṃhāram
SA01yabhkvyu:489_28: antareṇāpi pravartate. naiṣyandikāḥ sabhāgasarvatragahetujanitā iti. sabhāgasarvatragahetubhir
SA01yabhkvyu:490: vipākajā vipākahetujanitā iti. vipākahetunā janitā eva na tu vipākahetunaiva janitā ity avadhāraṇaṃ. sabhāgahetunāpi janitā vipākajā bhavanti. tatra cāṣṭāv apratighā naiṣyandikā
SA01yabhkvyu:491: vipākajā evety avadhāryate. na hi et [Tib. 66a] aupacayikāḥ saṃcayābhāvāt. aparamāṇusaṃcayasvabhāvatvād ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:493: iti. tridhānya evety avadhāryate. tartra vipākajā indriyāvinirbhāgina eva.
SA01yabhkvyu:495_0: iti vacanāt. naiṣyandikaupacayikās tu indriyavinirbhāgino 'pi. kathaṃ punar gamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:495_1: indriyavinirbhāgino 'pi naiṣyandikāḥ santīti. mṛtasyāpi tadanuvṛttidarśanāt. na hy
SA01yabhkvyu:497_0: iti. eka eva dravyavān ity avadhāraṇaṃ. sāratvād dravyam ity avināśāt. kṣaṇam ekam
SA01yabhkvyu:497_1: anaiṣyandikā bhavantīti. kṣaṇam ekam asabhāgahetunirvartitāḥ. pūrvakṣaṇānāsravābhāvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:497_2: kṣaṇikā na tu kṣaṇāntaravināśina ity ayam artho 'bhipretaḥ. anyathā hi paścimā eva
SA01yabhkvyu:497_3: dhātavaḥ kṣaṇikā ity avadhāraṇāt taditareṣāṃ dhātūnām akṣaṇikatvaprasaṃgaḥ. kathaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:497_4: punar duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntikalāpe manodhātur manovijñānadhātuś ca yugapad bhavataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:497_5: na hi vijñānadvayasamavadhānam iṣyate. nocyate yugapat tau bhavata iti. kiṃ tarhi.
SA01yabhkvyu:497_6: ekam atra vijñānaṃ dhātudvayatvena vyavasthāpyate. nāmadvayena kathyate ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:497_7: tena vyācaṣṭe duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntisaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ manodhātur manovijñānadhātuś
SA01yabhkvyu:497_8: ceti. [Tib. 66b] śeṣās tatsahabhuvo dharmadhātur iti. tatra kṣāntikalāpe cittād anye
SA01yabhkvyu:497_9: dharmāḥ śeṣāḥ. tadsahabhuvas tayā kṣāntyā sahabhuvaḥ. tadyathā anāsravasaṃvaro rūpaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:497_10: vedanāsaṃjñācetanādayaḥ saṃprayuktāḥ. teṣāṃ ca prāptijātyādayo dharmadhātur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:498: (I.37cd) samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhata iti. prāptim alabdhapūrvāṃ labhata ity arthaḥ. cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi sa iti. kiṃ. samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhata ity adhikṛtaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:502: anena tṛtīyā koṭir darśitā. caturthī tu uktanirmukteti sugamatvān na darśitā.
SA01yabhkvyu:504: śabdena vā sāpy uktā. apṛthag asaha ceti. kāmadhātau krameṇa cakṣurindriyaṃ pratilabhamāna iti. kāmadhātau sthitaḥ pudgalaḥ krameṇa kalalādikrameṇa (Abhidh-k-vy 72)
SA01yabhkvyu:505_0: mṛtyukrameṇa vā. cakṣurindriyaṃ. kiṃpratisaṃyuktaṃ. kiṃ kāmadhātāv eva. nety ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:505_1: aviśeṣeṇa kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ vā rūpapratisaṃyuktaṃ vā pratilabhamānaḥ. kalalādyavasthāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:505_2: tathā krameṇa maraṇasyācakṣuṣmanmaraṇasya ca kāle cakṣurdhātunā asamanvāgataḥ. kalalādyavasthāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:505_3: tathā maraṇāvasthāyāṃ vā tadabhāvāt. ṣaḍāyatanotpattyavasthāyāṃ bhavasyāntarāle vā
SA01yabhkvyu:505_4: tenedānīṃ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. na tu cakṣurvijñānadhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:505_5: pratilabhate. yasmād asau kuśalakliṣṭenātītānāgatena samanvāgata eva pūrvam antarābhavapratisaṃdhikāle.
SA01yabhkvyu:505_6: viprakṛtāvasthā hy eṣādhikriyate na pratilabdhavatpratilapsyamānāvasthā. cakṣurvijñānadhātuneti
SA01yabhkvyu:505_7: [Tib. 67a] vistaraḥ. dvitīyādidhyānopapannas tatra tasya cakṣurvijñānadhātor abhāvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:505_8: tena pūrvam asamanvāgata idānīṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikam anivṛtāvyākṛtasvabhāvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:505_9: saṃmukhīkurvāṇaḥ. tena cakṣurvijñānadhātunā samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. na tu cakṣurdhātunā
SA01yabhkvyu:505_11: cādhastād upapadyamāna iti. dvitīyādidhyānapracyuto 'dhastāt prathame dhyāne kāmadhātau
SA01yabhkvyu:505_12: copapadyamānaś cakṣurvijñānadhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. antarābhavapratisaṃdhāne
SA01yabhkvyu:505_13: kuśalakliṣṭena atītānāgatena. na tu cakṣurdhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate.
SA01yabhkvyu:505_14: pratilabdhavatsamanvāgatatvāt. syād ubhayeneti vistaraḥ. ārūpyadhātucyuta ubhābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:505_17: samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. avikalendriyā hy antarābhavikāḥ. nobhayena etān ākārān
SA01yabhkvyu:505_18: sthāpayitveti. koṭītrayoktān dharmaprakārān tyaktvety arthaḥ. ārūpyadhātucyutas tatraivotpadyamāno
SA01yabhkvyu:505_19: nobhābhyām asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. asamanvāgatatvaṃ tatrāsti na
SA01yabhkvyu:505_20: tu samanvāgamapratilambhaḥ. dvitīyādidhyānopapannaś ca cakṣurvijñānam asaṃmukhīkurvāṇo
SA01yabhkvyu:505_21: nobhābhyām asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. kathaṃ. cakṣurdhātunā yady api
SA01yabhkvyu:505_22: samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate na tu cakṣurdhātunāsāv asamanvāgataḥ. cakṣurvijñānadhātunā
SA01yabhkvyu:505_23: yady apy asau asamanvāgato na tu samanvāgamaṃ [Tib. 67b] pratilabhate tadasaṃmukhīkurvāṇatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:506: nobhābhyām asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. tābhyāṃ samanvāgatatvāt. yaś cakṣurdhātunā samanvāgataś cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi sa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:508_0: anenaiva sūtreṇedam api catuḥkoṭikaṃ vartayati. lābho hi pratilambhaḥ. prāptimātre
SA01yabhkvyu:508_1: 'pi vivakṣayā kadācid bhavati. prathame catuḥkoṭike pratilambho 'dhikṛto dvitīye
SA01yabhkvyu:508_2: tu prāptimātraṃ. prathamā koṭir iti vistaraḥ. dvitīyādidhyānopapanno 'vāśyaṃ cakṣurdhātunā
SA01yabhkvyu:508_5: iti. alabdhaṃ vihīnaṃ vā cakṣur asyālabdhavihīnacakṣuḥ. alabdhacakṣuḥ kalalādyavasthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:508_6: vihīnacakṣur vinaṣṭacakṣuḥ. sa kāmadhātau cakṣurvijñānadhātunā antarābhavapratisaṃdhau
SA01yabhkvyu:508_7: pratilabdhena kuśalakliṣṭena samanvāgataḥ. na cakṣurdhātunā tasyābhāvāt. labdhāvihīnacakṣur
SA01yabhkvyu:508_8: iti. labdham avihīnaṃ cakṣur asya labdhāvihīnacakṣuḥ. sa kāmadhātau cakṣurdhātunā
SA01yabhkvyu:508_9: cakṣurvijñānadhātunā ca tathā pūrvaṃ pratilabdhenedānīṃ tv anena cāvyākṛtena samanvāgataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:508_10: prathamadhyānopapannaś ca tenobhayena samanvāgataḥ. svabhūmikasya tatrāvaśyam astitvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:508_11: parabhūmikasya cakṣuṣaḥ sambhavāt. dvitīyādidhyānopapannaś ca paśyan. prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:508_12: [Tib. 68a] cakṣurvijñānaṃ saṃmukhīkurvāṇa ity arthaḥ. sa cāpy avaśyam anenobhayena
SA01yabhkvyu:508_13: samanvāgataḥ. caturthy etān ākārān sthāpayitveti. ārūpyopapannaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:509: yathāyogam abhyūhitavyāv iti. yaś cakṣurdhātunā asmanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate rūpadhātunāpi saḥ. yo vā rūpadhātunā cakṣurdhātunāpi saḥ. cakṣurdhāturūpadhātvoḥ syāt
SA01yabhkvyu:511: pṛthak tāvat. syāc cakṣurdhātunā samanvāgataḥ. na rūpadhātunā. kāmadhātau krameṇa cakṣurindriyaṃ pratilabhamānaḥ. syād rūpadhātunā na cakṣurdhātuneti iyaṃ koṭir nāsti.
SA01yabhkvyu:513_0: syāt ubhayenāsamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. ārūpyadhātoś cyuto rūpadhātau
SA01yabhkvyu:513_1: kāmadhātau copapadyamānaḥ. nobhayena etān ākārān sthāpayitvā. yaś cakṣurdhātusamanvāgato
SA01yabhkvyu:513_2: rūpadhātunāpi sa iti pūrvapādakaḥ. yas tāvac cakṣurdhātunā samanvāgato rūpadhātunāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:513_3: saḥ. syāt rūpadhātunā na cakṣurdhātunā kalalādyavasthāsv alabdhacakṣur labdhavihīnacakṣuś
SA01yabhkvyu:514_0: yaś cakṣurvijñānadhātunā asamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate rūpadhātunāpi saḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:514_1: yo vā rūpadhātunāsamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi saḥ. tathaiva tayoḥ syāt
SA01yabhkvyu:516_0: pṛthak tāvat. syāc cakṣurvijñānadhātunā na rūpadhātunā. dvitīyādidhyānopapannaś cakṣurvijñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:516_1: saṃmukhīkurvāṇaḥ. syād rūpadhātunā na cakṣurvijñānadhātunā. [Tib. 68b] ārūpyadhātoś
SA01yabhkvyu:518_0: syād ubhavenāsamanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate. ārūpyadhātucyutaḥ kāmadhātau
SA01yabhkvyu:518_1: brahmaloke copapadyamānaḥ. nobhayena. etān ākārān sthāpayitvā. yaś cakṣurvijñānadhātunā
SA01yabhkvyu:518_2: samanvāgato rūpadhātunāpi saḥ. yo vā rūpadhātunā cakṣurvijñānadhātunāpi saḥ. pūrvapādakaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:518_3: yas tāvac cakṣurvijñānadhātunā samanvāgato rūpadhātunāpi saḥ. syād rūpadhātunā na
SA01yabhkvyu:518_5: yathā ceyaṃ cakṣurvijñānarūpadhātūnāṃ pratilambhasamanvāgamacintā. tathā śrotravijñānaśabdadhātvādīnām
SA01yabhkvyu:522_0: iti. ubhayāvadhāraṇam. avadhāraṇād eva cānye rūpādayo bāhyā iti siddhaṃ. ātmany adhy
SA01yabhkvyu:522_1: adhyātmaṃ. adhy ātmānam iti vā adhyātmaṃ. adhyātmam eva ādhyātmikāḥ. adhyātme vā
SA01yabhkvyu:522_2: bhavāḥ ādhyātmikāḥ. ahaṃkārasaṃniśrayatvāc cittam ātmety upacaryata ity ahaṃkārasaṃniśraya
SA01yabhkvyu:522_3: ātmety ātmavādinaḥ saṃkalpayanti. cittaṃ cāhaṃkārasaṃniśraya ity ātmety upacaryate. katham ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:523: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita
SA01yabhkvyu:524: ity uktaṃ gāthāyāṃ. kathaṃ punar gamyate cittam ātmaśabdenocyata iti. tata āha. cittasya cānyatra damanam uktaṃ bhagavateti. anyatra gāthāyām uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:525: [Tib. 69a] cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham
SA01yabhkvyu:526_0: iti. tenāyam arthaḥ. ātmani cittīkārye ātmānaṃ vā cittam adhikṛtya ye dharmāḥ pratyāsannabhāvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:526_1: āśrayabhāvena vartante. te ādhyātmikāḥ. ye tu viṣayabhāvena vartante. te bāhyā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:526_2: kaḥ punaḥ pratyāsannabhāvaḥ. yena vijñānaṃ tadvikāram anuvidhatte. cakṣurādiṣv eva
SA01yabhkvyu:527_0: iti. tathā hi cittam indriyasambaddhe śarīradeśe paricchidyate na viṣayadeśa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:527_1: evaṃ tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava iti vistaraḥ. iha paṃca tāvad vijñānadhātavo vartamānā
SA01yabhkvyu:527_2: eva gṛhyante. indriyaviṣayasamānakālatvāt. vartanānaviṣayā hi paṃca vijñānakāyāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:527_3: manovijñādhātur api vartamāna eveha vyavasthāpyate. yasmā manodhātur asyāśrayo 'nantarātīto
SA01yabhkvyu:527_4: vyavasthāpyate. kālabhedād eva hi manidhātumanovijñānadhātvoḥ pṛthagvyavasthānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:527_5: tasmāt ta ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti. na hy ete manodhātutvam aprāptā atītatvam aprāptāś
SA01yabhkvyu:527_6: cittasyāśrayībhavanti. yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātivartanta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:527_7: kim anena vākyena sādhitaṃ. idam anena sādhitaṃ. vartamānānām apy eṣām āśrayabhāvo
SA01yabhkvyu:527_9: vistaraḥ. atīte 'dhvani yan manodhātulakṣaṇaṃ. tad anāgatapratyutpannayor apy adhvanor
SA01yabhkvyu:527_10: asty evety abhiprāyaḥ. na hi lakṣaṇasyādhvasu [Tib.69b] vyabhicāro 'sti. na hi svabhāvaparityāgo 'stīty arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:529_0: iti. dharmasaṃjñakaḥ sabhāga evety avadhāryate. yo hi viṣayo yasya vijñānasya niyata
SA01yabhkvyu:529_1: iti. tadyathā cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ niyato viṣayo yāvan manovijñānasya dharmāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:529_2: yadi tatra tac cakṣurvijñānam utpannam utpattidharmi vā. yāvad yadi tatra manovijñanam
SA01yabhkvyu:529_3: utpannam utpattidharmi vā. sa viṣayaḥ sabhāga ity ucyate. tasya ca svabhāvasahabhūnirmuktā
SA01yabhkvyu:529_4: iti. svabhāvena sahabhūbhiś ca nirmuktāḥ svabhāvasahabhūnirmuktāḥ. sarvadharmās tasya
SA01yabhkvyu:529_5: vijñānasyālambanaṃ. na svabhāvaḥ. svātmani vṛttivirodhāt. na hi tad evāṃgulyagraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:529_6: tenaivāṃgulyagreṇa spṛśyate. na saivāsidhārā tayaivāsidhārayā chidyate. na sahabhuvaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:529_7: saṃprayuktā viprayuktā vā. atisaṃnikṛṣṭatvāt. na hy akṣistham aṃjanaṃ tena gṛhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:529_8: sa punaś cittakṣaṇo 'nyasya cittakṣaṇasya ālambanam iti. ye pūrvasmin kṣaṇe svabhāvasahabhuvo
SA01yabhkvyu:529_9: dharmā nālambitā abhūvan. te 'py ālambitā iti dvayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ sarvadharmā ālaṃbanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:529_10: bhavanti. tasmād dharmadhātur nityaṃ sabhāgaḥ. dharmadhātur hi niyato manasa eva.
SA01yabhkvyu:531_0: caśabdena sabhāgāś ceti. śeṣā eva sabhāgatatsabhāgā ity avadhāryate. nanu ca dharmadhātur
SA01yabhkvyu:531_1: [Tib. 70a] eva sabhāga evety avadhāraṇe śeṣā na sabhāgā iti sabhāgatatsabhāgāḥ setsyanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:531_2: na setsyanti. yady api na sabhāgā eveti bhaveyuḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 76)
SA01yabhkvyu:532: tatsabhāgā eveti tu saṃbhaveyuḥ. tannivṛttyartham idam ārabhyate. sabhāgatatsabhāgā eva śeṣāḥ. na tu sabhāgā eva nāpi tatsabhāgā eveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:536_0: anantaroktatvāt. uktaṃ bhavati. yaḥ svakarmakṛt sa sabhāga iti. asvakarmakṛd eva
SA01yabhkvyu:536_1: tatsabhāgas tatsabhāga eva vāsvakarmakṛd ity avadhāraṇe 'rthāpattyā svakarmakṛt sabhāga
SA01yabhkvyu:536_2: iti. rūpāṇy apaśyad iti. adrākṣīd iti vaktavyaṃ. evaṃ hy adyatanātītaṃ hyastanātītaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:536_3: ca parigṛhītaṃ bhavati. anyathā hy avyāpi lakṣaṇaṃ syāt. athaivam eva pāṭha udāharaṇamātraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:536_4: tad draṣṭavyāṃ. adyatanātītam api vaktavyaṃ. evaṃ yāvan manaḥ svena viṣayakāritreṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:536_5: vaktavyam iti. svena viṣayapuruṣakāreṇa vaktavyaṃ. katham iti. yena śrotreṇa śabdān
SA01yabhkvyu:536_6: aśṛṇot śṛṇoti śroṣyati vā. tad ucyate sabhāgaṃ śrotram iti sarvaṃ. vijñānasamāyuktam
SA01yabhkvyu:536_7: asamāyuktaṃ ceti vijñānasambaddham asambaddhaṃ cety arthaḥ. yad ekasya cakṣuḥ sabhāgaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:536_8: tad [Tib. 70b] sarveṣāṃ kiṃ. sabhāgam iti vartate evaṃ tadsabhāgam apīti. yad ekasya
SA01yabhkvyu:536_9: cakṣus tadsabhāgaṃ. tat sarveṣāṃ tatsabhāgam ity arthaḥ. prāptagrahaṇād iti. gandhādayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:536_10: ye evadattena ghrāṇādīndriyaprāptā gṛhyante. na te yajñadattena gṛhyante. svaghrāṇādikapraviṣṭatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:536_11: ity asādhāraṇatvād eṣāṃ cakṣurādivad atideśo nyāyyaḥ. ya ekasya gandhaḥ sabhāgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:536_12: sa sarveṣām. evaṃ tatsabhāgo 'pīti vaktavyaṃ. na tu vaktavyaṃ yathā rūpam evaṃ gandhādaya
SA01yabhkvyu:536_13: iti. asti hy eṣa saṃbhavo ya eva gandhādaya ekasya ghrāṇādivijñānam utpādayeyuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:536_14: ta evānyeṣām apīti. yadi te evadattaghrāṇādīndriyaprāptā bhaveyur evadattasya vijñānam
SA01yabhkvyu:536_15: utpādayeyuḥ. atha yajñadattaghrāṇādīndriyaprāptā yajñadattasya vijñānam utpādayeyur
SA01yabhkvyu:536_16: ity arthaḥ. atha vā ta evānyeṣām apīti. tatrāntargatasūkṣmakrimiprabhṛtīnām api vijñānam
SA01yabhkvyu:536_17: utpādayeyuḥ. na tasyaiva evadattasya yasya ghrāṇādīndriyaprāptās te gandhādaya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:536_19: pravṛttiḥ. tathā hīndriyadhātavo vijñānadhātūn āśrayabhāvena yathāyogaṃ bhajante.
SA01yabhkvyu:536_20: sevanta ity arthaḥ. viṣayadhātūṃś ca viṣayibhāvena. tathā viṣayadhātavaḥ svendriyadhātūn
SA01yabhkvyu:536_21: viṣayabhāvena bhajante. vijñānadhātūṃs tu viṣayabhāvena ālambanabhāvena vā bhajante.
SA01yabhkvyu:536_22: tathā [Tib. 71a] vijñānadhātavaḥ svendriyadhātūnām āśrayibhāvena bhajante. viṣayadhātūṃś
SA01yabhkvyu:536_23: ca viṣayibhāvenālambakabhāvena vā bhajanta. ity anyonyabhajanaṃ bhāgaḥ. bhāve ghañ.
SA01yabhkvyu:537_0: cakṣurādīnāṃ darśanādi. vijñānadhātūnāṃ vijñātṛtvaṃ. viṣayadhātūnāṃ tadviṣayālambanabhāvaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:537_1: tasya kāritrasya bhajanaṃ kāritrabhajanaṃ. sa eṣām astīty arthaḥ. pradarśanamātram
SA01yabhkvyu:537_2: etat. vigrahas tv evaṃ kartavyaḥ. saha bhāgena vartante sabhāgā iti. samāno vā bhāga
SA01yabhkvyu:537_3: eṣāṃ eṣāṃ ta ime sabhāgāḥ. samānārthasya sahaśabdasya sabhāva ādiṣṭaḥ. sparśasamānakāryatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:537_4: vā. kiṃ. sabhāgā iti prakṛtam. atra karmaṇi ghañ. bhajyata iti bhāgaḥ. vigrahas tu
SA01yabhkvyu:537_5: pūrvavat. sparśaś caitasikaḥ. eṣām indriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ samānaṃ kāryaṃ. cakṣuḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:537_6: pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ. trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśa ityādivacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:537_7: ye punar asabhāgā iti vistaraḥ. ye punar anye cakṣurādaya ittham asabhāgāḥ. teṣāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:537_8: sabhāgānām uktalakṣaṇānāṃ sabhāgāḥ sadṛśāḥ. te tatsabhāgāḥ. teṣāṃ tair vā sabhāgās
SA01yabhkvyu:537_9: te tatsabhāgāḥ. tulyārthe hy atra sabhāgaśabdo gṛhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:538: (I.39) darśanaheyā iti. darśanaṃ prathamataḥ satyadarśanam anāsravaṃ paṃcadaśacittakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītaṃ. bhāvanā tad eva punaḥpunardarśanaṃ. laukikaṃ vā samāhitaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanā.
SA01yabhkvyu:540: rūpiṇo dhātavo daśa paṃca ca tadvijñānadhātava iti. [Tib. 71b] kathaṃ punar etad gamyate. eta eva ta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:542_0: vacanāt. antyatrayāt anye paṃcadaśa dhātava eva ta ucyanta iti. te bhāvanāheyā evety
SA01yabhkvyu:542_1: avadhāryante. triprakārā iti. darśanaheyā bhāvanāheyā aheyāś cety arthaḥ. eta eva
SA01yabhkvyu:542_2: tridhā aṣṭāśītyanuśayās tatsahabhuva iti. dhātuprakārākārabhinnāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo
SA01yabhkvyu:542_3: 'nuśayās tatsahabhuvo vijñānavedanādayaḥ saṃprayuktāḥ asaṃprayuktāni ca tallakṣaṇānulakṣaṇāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:542_4: tatprāptayaś ca sānucarā iti. tacchabdena anuśayādayaḥ saṃbadhyante. teṣām anuśayānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:542_5: tatsahabhuvāṃ ca prāptayas tatprāptayaḥ. yady apy anuśayasahabhuvo bhavanti. na tu
SA01yabhkvyu:542_6: sarvāḥ. kāścid dhi prāptayo 'nuśayādisahabhuvo bhavanti yāḥ sahajāḥ. kāścit tu pūrvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:542_7: paścāc ca tebhyo bhavanty ataḥ pṛthak prāptigrahaṇaṃ. sānucarā iti grahaṇena anuprāptayas
SA01yabhkvyu:542_8: tallakṣaṇāni ca saṃgṛhyante. śeṣāḥ sāsravā bhāvanāheyā iti. eta eva trayo 'ntyā dhātavo
SA01yabhkvyu:542_9: ye śeṣā darśanaheyebhyo 'nye sāsravāḥ. te bhāvanāheyāḥ. ke punas te. daśānuśayās
SA01yabhkvyu:542_10: tatsahabhuvas tatprāptayaś ca sānucarāḥ. kuśalasāsravāḥ. anivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca saṃskārāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:542_11: avijñaptirūpaṃ ca sāsravaṃ sānucaraṃ. [Tib. 72a] anāsravā aheyā iti mārgasatyāsaṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:542_12: nanu cānyad apīti vistaraḥ. pṛthagjanatvam anivṛtāvyākṛtasaṃskārasvabhāvatvād bhāvanāheyamadhyagatam.
SA01yabhkvyu:543_0: kāyavākkarma rūpasvabhāvatvād bhāvanāheyam uktam. ity ataś codayanti vātsīputrīyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:543_1: āryamārgavirodhitvād iti. pṛthagjanatvam āryamārgotpāde na bhavati. niyate cāpāyike
SA01yabhkvyu:543_2: karmaṇi sati āryamārgo notpadyate. āryamārgotpāde ca saty āpāyikaṃ karma notpadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:543_3: tasmāt satkāyadṛṣṭyādivat tad ubhayaṃ darśanaheyam iti varṇayanti. tatpratiṣedhārtham
SA01yabhkvyu:543_4: uktam apy etad abhisaṃkṣepeṇa. sukhapratipattyarthaṃ punar ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:544: na dṛṣṭiheyam akliṣṭaṃ na rūpaṃ nāpy aṣaṣṭhajaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:545: dṛṣṭir darśanam. akliṣṭam anivṛtavyākṛtaṃ kuśalaṃ vā na darśanaheyaṃ. rūpaṃ tu kliṣṭam api na darśanaheyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:547_0: paṃcendriyajaṃ paṃcavijñānaṃ tad arūpaṃ kliṣṭam api san na darśanaheyaṃ. ato 'nyat
SA01yabhkvyu:547_1: tu darśanaheyaṃ saṃbhavati yathoktam. akliṣṭāvyākṛtaṃ ca pṛthagjanatvaṃ samucchinnakuśalamūlavītarāgāṇām
SA01yabhkvyu:547_2: api tatsamanvāgamād iti. samucchinnakuśalamūlāḥ kuśalair dharmair asamanvāgatā iṣṭāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:547_3: pṛthagjanatvena tu samanvāgatāḥ. [Tib. 72b] yasmāt te pṛthagjanā iṣyante. tasmān
SA01yabhkvyu:547_4: na kuśalaṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ. kliṣṭam api tan na bhavati. vītarāgānām api tena samanvāgamāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:547_5: kliṣṭasya hi vastunaḥ svabhāvaprahāṇam iṣyate. prāptichedaḥ prahāṇam ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:547_6: tad yadi pṛthagjanatvaṃ kliṣṭaṃ syāt laukikavītarāgāṇāṃ tasya prāpticheda iti tenasamanvāgamaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:547_7: syāt. iṣyate ca teṣāṃ tena samanvāgamaḥ. tathā hi te laukikavītarāgāḥ pṛthagjanā
SA01yabhkvyu:547_9: ity arthaḥ. na tu tadātmīyaprāpticheda iṣyate. tathā hy uktaṃ bhagavatā yo bhikṣavo
SA01yabhkvyu:547_10: rūpe chandarāgaḥ. taṃ prajahīta. evaṃ vas tad rūpaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavatīti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:547_11: tasmād akliṣṭāvyākṛtaṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ teṣāṃ prahīṇam api cakṣurādivat samudācarati.
SA01yabhkvyu:547_12: atas tena samanvāgamo bhavati. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ. akliṣṭavyākṛtatvāt pṛthagjanatvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:547_13: na darśanaprahātavyaṃ. rūpatvāc ca kāyavākkarma ity āha. satyeṣv avipratipatteḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:547_14: akleśaduṣṭatvāt pṛthagjanatvaṃ na duḥkhādiṣu satyeṣu vipratipadyate. na viparītarūpeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:547_15: pravartata ity arthaḥ. anālambakatvāc ca. kāyavākkarmāpy anālambakatvād eva na vipratipadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:547_16: tasmāt tad ubhayaṃ na darśanaheyaṃ. ayaṃ ca satyeṣv avipratipatter [Tib. 73a] iti
SA01yabhkvyu:547_17: hetur aṣaṣṭhaje 'py anuvartayitavyaḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau pṛthagjanatvaprasaṃgāc
SA01yabhkvyu:547_18: ceti. ayam upacayahetuḥ pṛthagjanatvasyaiva darśanaheyatvanivṛttyartham ucyate kāyavākkarmaṇo
SA01yabhkvyu:550_0: iti vacanāt. duḥkhe dharmajñāne tu tatprāptiś chinnā. tena tatprāptisadbhāvāt duḥkhe
SA01yabhkvyu:550_1: dharmajñānakṣāntyavasthāyāṃ sa pudgalaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ syāt. na cāsau tasyām avasthāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:550_2: pṛthagjana iti śakyate vyavasthāpayitum adhigatāryamārgatvāt. tathā hi pṛthagjanatvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:550_3: katamad. āryadharmāṇām alābha iti pṛthagjanatvalakṣaṇaṃ. sa cāryadharmāṇāṃ lābhenālābho
SA01yabhkvyu:550_4: vyāvartate. tasmād ārya evāsāv iti. idaṃ tāvat bhavanto vaibhāṣikāḥ praṣṭavyāḥ. tat
SA01yabhkvyu:550_5: pṛthgjanatvaṃ kiṃ bhāvanāmārgapratilambhād eva prahīyate. nety ucyate. tat pṛthagjanatvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:550_6: navabhaumikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ yāvat bhāvāgrikaṃ. tac cākliṣṭaṃ. tena pratibhūmibhūminavamakleśaprakāraprahāṇāvasthāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:550_7: prahīyate. sarvaṃ hy akliṣṭaṃ sāsravaṃ navama eva vimuktimārge prahīyate. yady evam
SA01yabhkvyu:550_8: avītarāgāvasthāyām āryaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ syāt. na. pṛthagjanatvasya vihīnatvāt. [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:550_9: 73b] duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ prabhṛti hi tad vihīnam eva. na tu prahīṇaṃ. kaḥ punar
SA01yabhkvyu:550_10: vihānaprahāṇayor viśeṣa iti. vihānaṃ prāptichede vyavasthāpitaṃ. prahāṇaṃ tu pratipakṣalābhe
SA01yabhkvyu:550_11: vyavasthāpitaṃ. tasmāt prāptichedāt tena pṛthagjanatvenāsamanvāgamāt tasyām avasthāyām
SA01yabhkvyu:550_12: ārya eva bhavati. na pṛthagjana ity adoṣa eṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:551: (I.40, 41) cakṣuś ca dharmadhātoś ca pradeśo dṛṣṭir
SA01yabhkvyu:552_0: iti. cakṣur eva dharmadhātupradeśa eva dṛṣṭir ity avadhāryate. satkāyadṛṣṭyādiketi.
SA01yabhkvyu:552_1: satkāyadṛṣṭir antagrāhadṛṣṭir mithyādṛṣṭir dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaś ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:552_2: śaikṣasyānāsraveti prajñety adhikṛtaṃ. aśaikṣasyāśaikṣīti. aśaikṣasyānāsravā prajñā
SA01yabhkvyu:554_0: iti. sameghāmegheti vistareṇa yāvat kliṣṭākliṣṭalaukikīśaikṣyaśaikṣībhir dṛṣṭibhir
SA01yabhkvyu:554_1: dharmadarśanam iti. loke bhavā laukikī. kliṣṭā cāklṣṭā ca kliṣṭākliṣṭe. kliṣṭākliṣṭe
SA01yabhkvyu:554_2: cāsau laukikī ca. kliṣṭākliṣṭalaukikī. kliṣṭākliṣṭalaukikī ca śaikṣī cāśaikṣī ca
SA01yabhkvyu:554_3: kliṣṭākliṣṭalaukikīśaikṣyaśaikṣyaḥ. tābhir dharmadarśanaṃ. kīdṛśam ity āha. sameghāmegharātriṃdivarūpadarśanavad
SA01yabhkvyu:554_4: iti. yathā [Tib. 74a] sameghāyāṃ rātrau rūpadarśanaṃ. evaṃ kliṣṭayā laukikyā satkāyadṛṣṭyādikayā
SA01yabhkvyu:554_5: dṛṣṭyā dharmadarśanaṃ. avyaktataram ity arthaḥ. yathā tasyām eva rātrau ameghāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:554_6: rūpadarśanaṃ. evam akliṣṭayā laukikyā dṛṣṭyā dharmadarśanaṃ. (Abhidh-k-vy 80)
SA01yabhkvyu:555_0: avyaktam ity arthaḥ. yathā sameghe divase rūpadarśanaṃ. evaṃ śaikṣyā dṛṣtyā dharmadarśanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:555_1: vyaktaṃ na tv atyarthaṃ. yathā punar ameghe divase rūpadarśanaṃ. evam aśaikṣyā dṛṣṭyā
SA01yabhkvyu:557_0: iti asaṃtīraṇāt. saṃtīraṇaṃ punar viṣayopanidhyānapūrvakaṃ niścayākarṣaṇaṃ. ata eva
SA01yabhkvyu:557_1: cānyāpīti vistaraḥ. ata evāsaṃtīraṇād anyāpi mānasī kliṣṭā rāgādisaṃprayuktā akliṣṭā
SA01yabhkvyu:557_2: vā kṣayānutpādajñānānivṛtāvyākṛtā prajñā na dṛṣṭiḥ. rūpālocanārtheneti. cakṣur na
SA01yabhkvyu:557_3: saṃtīrakatvena dṛṣṭiḥ. kiṃ tarhi. rūpālocanārthena. prajñā tu saṃtīrakatveneti darśitaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:557_5: arthaḥ. paśyec cakṣurindriyaṃ viṣayādisāṃnidhyāt. yasya tu cakṣurvijñānaṃ paśyatīti
SA01yabhkvyu:557_6: pakṣaḥ. tasya tadvijñānāsaṃbhavād adoṣaḥ. tad eva cakṣurāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ paśyatīty
SA01yabhkvyu:557_7: astv iti. darśanasya tadbhāve bhāvāt tadabhāve cābhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:559_0: [Tib. 74b] iti kilaśabdaḥ paramatau. tasyāpratighatvād iti. vijñānam amūrtiṃ kuḍyādīny
SA01yabhkvyu:559_1: atikramyāpi paśyet. vijñānavādy āha. naiva hy āvṛte cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate ity
SA01yabhkvyu:559_2: anābhāsagatatvāt viṣayasyety abhiprāyaḥ. kiṃ khalu notpadyata ity apratighatvāt kuḍyādīni
SA01yabhkvyu:559_3: vyatibhidya kuḍyādyavyavahita iva viṣaye vijñānam utpatsyata iti bhāvaḥ. yasya tv
SA01yabhkvyu:559_4: iti. yasya mama vaibhāṣikasya pakṣaḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti. tasya mama cakṣuṣaḥ sapratighatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:559_5: vyavahite kuḍyādibhir vṛttyabhāvaḥ. tasya cakṣuṣa ālocanavṛttyabhāvaḥ. vijñānaṃ tarhi
SA01yabhkvyu:559_6: vaibhāṣikasya vyavahite 'pi prāpnotīti codyam antarnītam āśaṃkya sa eva vaibhāṣikaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:559_7: punar āha. vijñānasyāpy anutpattir iti. yathaiva cakṣuṣo vyavahite vṛttyabhāvo yujyate
SA01yabhkvyu:559_8: vijñānasyāpy anutpattir vijñānavṛttyabhāva āśrayeṇa sahaikaviṣayapravṛttatvāt yujyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:559_9: ya eva hi cakṣuṣo vyavahito 'rtho viṣayaḥ syāt. sa eva vijñānasyeti yuktā vijñānasyāpy
SA01yabhkvyu:559_10: anutpattiḥ. tava tu vijñānavādino 'pratighatvād vijñānasya vyavahite vijñānam utpadyeta.
SA01yabhkvyu:559_11: na tūtpadyate. tasmāc cakṣuḥ paśyati na vijñānam iti siddhaṃ. evaṃ vijñānavādini
SA01yabhkvyu:559_12: pratiṣiddhe tatpakṣam ācāryo gṛhītvāha. kiṃ nu vai cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayam iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:559_13: yathā kāyendriyaṃ prāptaviṣayaṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ [Tib. 75a] viṣayaṃ na gṛhṇāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:559_14: kuḍyādipratighātāt. tataḥ pareṇa pravartitum alahamānatvāt. kim evaṃ cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:559_15: kuḍyādipratighātena pratihataṃ sat tataḥ pareṇa gantum alabhamānaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 81)
SA01yabhkvyu:560_0: taṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ viṣayaṃ na gṛhṇātīti. naitad yujyate. tasmāt sapratighatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:560_1: āvṛtaṃ cakṣur na paśyed iti na vaktavyaṃ. kācābhrapaṭalasphaṭikāṃbubhiś cāntaritaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:560_2: kathaṃ dṛśyata iti. kācenābhrapaṭalena sphaṭikenāmbunā cāntaritaṃ vyavahitaṃ rūpaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:560_3: kathaṃ dṛśyate. sapratighatvād dhi kuḍyādivyavahitavat kācādivyavahitaṃ cakṣur na
SA01yabhkvyu:560_4: paśyet tac ca paśyatīti siddhāntaḥ. yatrālokasyāpratibandha iti. āloke hi sati viṣaya
SA01yabhkvyu:560_5: ābhāsagato bhavatīti vijñānotpattisaṃbhavaḥ. evaṃ hi vijñānakāraṇaṃ paṭhyate. cakṣurindriyam
SA01yabhkvyu:560_6: anupahataṃ bhavati. viṣaya ābhāsagato bhavati. tajjaś ca manasāraḥ pratyupasthito
SA01yabhkvyu:560_7: bhavatīty ata āvṛte rūpe kācādibhis tatrotpadyate eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ yatra tu pratibandho
SA01yabhkvyu:560_8: 'kācādisvabhāvaiḥ kuḍyādibhis tamasvadbhiḥ tatrāvṛte notpadyate. kiṃ. cakṣur vijñānam
SA01yabhkvyu:560_9: iti. anutpannatvād āvṛtaṃ nekṣata iti. yat tvayā kiṃ khalu notpadyata iti anutpattau
SA01yabhkvyu:560_10: kāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭam idaṃ tatkāraṇam iti brūmaḥ. yat tarhi sūtra uktam iti vistaraḥ. cakṣuṣā
SA01yabhkvyu:560_11: rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyaṃjanagrāhīti viṣtaraḥ. yasmāc cakṣuḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:560_12: paśyati. tasmāt pudgalaś cakṣuṣā paśyatīty abhiprāyaḥ. ācāryaḥ prāha. tenāśrayeṇeti
SA01yabhkvyu:560_13: [Tib. 75b] ayam atrābhisaṃdhiḥ. cakṣur aśrityety evātrābhisaṃdhiḥ. cakṣuṣā āśrayeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:560_14: vijñānena dṛṣṭvety arthaḥ. kathaṃ jñāyata ity āha. yathā manasā dharmān vijñāyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:560_15: manasā āśrayeṇa vijñānena vijñāyeti bhavati. na hy anantarātītaṃ mano dharmān vijānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:560_16: vartamānāvasthāyāṃ hi vijñānaṃ kāritraṃ karoti. āśritakarma vā āśrayasyopacaryata
SA01yabhkvyu:560_17: iti. āśritasya vijñānasya karma darśanam āśrayasya cakṣuṣa upacaryate. vijñāne paśyati
SA01yabhkvyu:560_18: sati cakṣuḥ paśyatīty upacāraḥ. yathā maṃcāḥ krośaṃtīti. yathā maṃcastheṣu puruṣeṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:560_19: krośatsu maṃcāḥ krośantīty upacāraḥ. tadvat. yathā ca sūtra uktam iti vistaraḥ. vaibhāṣikāṇām
SA01yabhkvyu:560_20: apy ayaṃ pakṣaḥ. na cakṣur vijānāti. kiṃ tarhi. vijñānaṃ vijānātīti. atha coktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:560_21: cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi kāntānīti. tatrāśritakarma āśrayasyopacaryata iti avaśyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:560_22: pratipattavyaṃ. dvāraṃ yāvad eva rūpāṇāṃ darśanāyeti. dvāram iva dvāraṃ hetur āśraya
SA01yabhkvyu:560_23: iti abhiprāyaḥ. anenāgamena tenāśrayeṇeti yo 'rtha uktaḥ. tam eva samarthayati. tena
SA01yabhkvyu:560_24: cakṣuṣā dvāreṇa vijñānaṃ paśyatīti. darśane tatra dvārākhyeti. cakṣur brāhmaṇa dvāraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:560_25: yāvad eva rūpāṇāṃ dārśanāyety atra. na hy etad yujyate darśanaṃ rūpāṇāṃ darśanāyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:560_26: atrāvācakatvān naitad yujyata ity [Tib. 76a] abhiprāyaḥ. yadi darśanaṃ karaṇaṃ dṛśyate
SA01yabhkvyu:560_27: 'neneti darśanam iti. kartari vā lyuṭ paśyatīti darśanam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:561: darśanāyeti ca bhāvasādhanaṃ. dṛṣṭir darśanaṃ tasmai darśanāyeti. katham (Abhidh-k-vy 82)
SA01yabhkvyu:562_0: etad yujyate. yasmāc cakṣurvyatiriktaṃ darśanaṃ nāsti. ālocanam iti cet. na. vijñānāvyatiriktatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:562_1: vijñānam eva hy ālocanaṃ. nāto 'nyat paśyāmaḥ. yadi tu cakṣurdvāraṃ vivaraṃ rūpāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:562_2: darśanāya vijñānāyety artho gṛhyeta tad yujyate. tadyathā kācit prajñā paśyaty apy
SA01yabhkvyu:562_3: ucyata iti. paśyatīty apy ucyata iti itiśabdo 'trādhyāhāryaḥ. anenopanyāsena darśanavijñānayor
SA01yabhkvyu:562_4: anarthāntarabhāva iti darśayati. kā punar asau yā prajñaivam ucyate. yā darśanātmikoktā.
SA01yabhkvyu:564_0: iti. tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyata iti sūtre 'pi vacanāt. kiṃcid iti vacanān na sarvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:564_1: vijñānaṃ paśyatīty uktaṃ bhavati. cakṣurvijñānaṃ hi paśyatīty ucyate. na tu śrotrādivijñānam
SA01yabhkvyu:564_2: iti. kānyā dṛṣṭikriyeti. yasyopalambhakatvaṃ. tasya darśanaṃ yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:564_3: tad etad acodyam iti vistaraḥ. yadi vijñānaṃ vijānāti. kartṛbhūtasya vijñānasya kānyā
SA01yabhkvyu:564_4: vijñānakriyeti vaktavyam iti tulyaṃ codyam āpadyate. na ca tatra kartṛkriyābhedaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:564_5: na kartur vijñānasya kriyāyāś ca vijñānalakṣaṇāyā bhedo 'nyatvam asti. bhavati ca
SA01yabhkvyu:564_6: kartṛkriyāsambandhavyapadeśaḥ. vijñānaṃ vijānātīti. [Tib. 76b] tadvad ihāpi bhavet.
SA01yabhkvyu:564_7: cakṣuḥ paśyatīti acodyam etat. cakṣurvijñānaṃ darśanam ity apare. tasyāśrayabhāvāc
SA01yabhkvyu:564_8: cakṣuḥ paśyatīty ucyate. yathā nādasyāśrayabhāvāt ghaṇṭā nadatīty ucyate. [vijñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:564_9: tarhi kasyāśrayabhāvād rūpaṃ vijānātīty āha.] vijñānasyāśrayabhāvād iti. cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayabhāvād
SA01yabhkvyu:564_10: ity arthaḥ. tad vijñānaṃ darśanam iti rūḍhaṃ loke iti. darśanam iti loke rūḍhaṃ na
SA01yabhkvyu:564_11: tu vijñānam iti rūḍhaṃ. kathaṃ gamyata ity āha. tathā hi tasminn utpanne rūpaṃ dṛṣṭam
SA01yabhkvyu:564_12: ity ucyate na vijñātam iti. vibhāṣāyām apy ucyata iti. sa evartho 'bhidhīyata ity
SA01yabhkvyu:564_13: abhiprāyaḥ. cakṣuḥsaṃprāptaṃ cakṣurābhāsagataṃ. vijñānaṃ tu sāṃnidhya mātreṇeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:564_14: nāśrayabhāvayogeneti darśayati. yathā sūryo divasakara iti. yathā yathā sāṃnidhyamātreṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:564_15: sūryo divasaṃ karotīty ucyate. tathā vijñānaṃ vijānātīty ucyate. kasmāt. loke tathā
SA01yabhkvyu:564_16: siddhatvāt. nirvyāpāraṃ hīdaṃ iti vistaraḥ. nirvyāparam iti nirīham. anena hi kartur
SA01yabhkvyu:564_17: arthāntarabhūtāṃ vā kriyāṃ pratiṣedhati. dharmamātram iti. svataṃtrasya kartuḥ pratiṣedhaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:564_18: karoti. hetuphalamātraṃ ceti. asaty api kartari hetuphalayoḥ kāryakāraṇam arthatvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:564_19: darśayati. tatra chandata upacārāḥ kriyante yad vastu vyavahārāṃgaṃ teneha vyavahārārthasaṃsiddhyartham
SA01yabhkvyu:564_20: asad api sadrūpeṇa parikalpya [Tib. 77a] kartṛkriyādivyavasthāṇaṃ kriyate. cakṣuḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:567_0: ityādi janapadaniruktiṃ nabhiniviśeteti. janapadas tatra niyatā niścitā coktir janapadaniruktiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:567_1: tāṃ nābhiniviśeta. tasmād atreyaṃ niruktir iti. na vā sarvām evārthavatīṃ niruktiṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:567_2: kalpayet. saṃjñāṃ ca lokasya nābhidhāved iti. ātmā jīva ity evamādikāṃ saṃjñāṃ lokasya
SA01yabhkvyu:567_3: nādhyāropayet. abhūtasamāropeṇāsty ātmā śarīrādivyatirikta iti gacched ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:567_4: atha vā saṃjñāṃ ca lokasya nābhidhāven nātisaret. arthābāvāt saṃjñāpi nāstīti na
SA01yabhkvyu:567_5: kalpayed ity arthaḥ. atisaraṇam atikramaṇam ity eko 'rthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:569_0: apiśabdād ekenāpi nātra niyamaḥ. dvayor vivṛtayoḥ parriśuddhataraṃ darśanam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:569_1: uktaṃ bhavati naikatarānyathībhāvād iti. unmīlitārdhanimīlitayor akṣṇoḥ ekatarasyānyathībhāvād
SA01yabhkvyu:569_2: dvayor ekatarad yady anyathībhavati. yadi yad unmīlitaṃ. tad ardhanimīlitaṃ kriyet
SA01yabhkvyu:569_3: sarvanimīlitaṃ vā. yac cārdhanimīlitaṃ. yadi tat sarvanimīlitaṃ kriyet sarvonmīlitaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:569_4: vā. tadā dvicandradarśanaṃ na bhavati. ato 'vagamyate dvayor api cakṣuṣor atra vijñānotpattau
SA01yabhkvyu:569_5: vyāpāro 'stīti. deśapratiṣṭhitatvāt rūpavad iti viparītadṛṣṭāntaḥ. yathā rūpasya
SA01yabhkvyu:569_6: deśapratiṣṭhitatvāt āśrayavicchedād [Tib. 77b] vicchedo bhavati. naivaṃ vijñānasya.
SA01yabhkvyu:569_7: na hi vijñānaṃ ca nāśrayavicchedād vicchedo bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:570_0: (I.42cd) tathā hi dūrād rūpaṃ paśyatīti. yatra rūpaṃ dṛśyate. na tatra tadgrāhakaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:570_2: yathā cakṣuḥ. evaṃ śrotram api vaktavyaṃ. itara āha. svaviṣayadeśaprāpti cakṣuḥśrotram.
SA01yabhkvyu:570_3: indriyatvāt. ghrāṇendriyādivat. anenānumānena tatra pramāṇānupalabhyamānatvaṃ hetum
SA01yabhkvyu:570_4: asiddhaṃ darśayati. ācārya āha. sati ca prāptaviṣayatva iti vistaraḥ. yadi prāptaviṣayaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:570_5: cakṣuḥśrotraṃ kalpyeta divyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotram iha manuṣyeṣu dhyāyināṃ nopajāyet. yadi
SA01yabhkvyu:570_6: hi cakṣuḥśrotram api viprakṛṣṭadeśasthaṃ vyavahitaṃ ca kuḍyādibhir yathāyogaṃ rūpaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:570_7: śabdaṃ gṛhṇīyāt. evam asya divyatvaṃ saṃbhavet. tac ca prāptaviṣayatve na syāt. ghrāṇādivat.
SA01yabhkvyu:570_8: yathā ghrāṇajihvākāyāḥ prāptaviṣayatvāt divyā dhyāyināṃ nopajāyeran. tadvat. anena
SA01yabhkvyu:570_10: hi cakṣuḥśrotre dharmī. asaṃbhavaddivyatvabhāvo viśeṣaviparyayaḥ. sa prāpnotīti (Abhidh-k-vy 84)
SA01yabhkvyu:571_0: doṣaḥ anena doṣeṇānumānatvāt. tatpramāṇānupalabhyamānatvaṃ siddhaṃ vyavasthāpayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:571_1: tasmād aprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraṃ. yady aprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣur iti vistaraḥ. āsannenātidūrasthena
SA01yabhkvyu:571_2: tiraskṛtena vā tulyā tadaprāptir iti [Tib. 78a] tatra darśanaṃ prasaṃjayati. kim
SA01yabhkvyu:571_3: idaṃ parasya sādhanam uta dūṣaṇam iti. yadi tāvad evaṃ sādhanam atidūraṃ tiraskṛtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:571_4: cakṣuḥśrotreṇa gṛhyate. aprāptatvāt. āsannaviṣayavad iti. tadasādhanaṃ hetoḥ svayam
SA01yabhkvyu:571_5: aniścitatvāt. pūrvābhyupagamavirodhād vā. atha dūṣaṇaṃ sarvaprāptagrāhakatvaṃ cakṣuḥśrotralakṣaṇasya
SA01yabhkvyu:571_6: dharmiṇaḥ prasajyate. tad adūṣaṇam anumānabādhanāt. katham ity āha. kathaṃ tāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:571_7: ayaskānto na sarvam aprāptam ayaḥ karṣayatīti praśnamukhenāyaskāntanidarśanam upanyasya
SA01yabhkvyu:571_8: sarvāprāptagrāhakatvaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrasya sādhayati. na sarvāprāptagrāhakaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:571_9: sarvāprāptagrahaṇaśaktihīnatvāt. ayaskāntavat. ayaskānto hy aprāptam ayo gṛhṇāti
SA01yabhkvyu:571_10: karṣatīty arthaḥ. na ca sarvam aprāptaṃ gṛhṇāti. tadvac cakṣuḥśrotraṃ. prāptaviṣayatve
SA01yabhkvyu:571_11: 'pi caitat samānam iti. nātidūratiraskṛto viṣayaś cakṣuḥśrotreṇa gṛhyate. grahaṇāyogyatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:571_12: saṃprāptāṃjanadaśalākāvat. atha vā na sarvasvagrāhyagrāhi cakṣuḥśrotram. indriyasvābhāvyāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:571_13: ghrāṇendriyādivat. ghrāṇādīnāṃ hi prāpto viṣayo na tu sarvaḥ. sahabhūgandhādyagrahaṇāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:571_14: ghrāṇādisahabhūni hi gandharasaspraṣṭavyāni ghrāṇādibhir na gṛhyante. śaktir hīndriyāṇām
SA01yabhkvyu:571_15: īdṛśīti. manas tv arūpitvād iti. prāptatvaṃ mūrtānām eva vyavasthāpyeta nāmūrtānām
SA01yabhkvyu:571_16: iti. mano 'prāptaviṣayam [Tib. 78b] iti na vicāraḥ kriyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:573_0: prāptaviṣayam eva trayam iti iṣṭāvadhāraṇārtham ārambhaḥ. anyathā hi prāptāprāptaviṣayam
SA01yabhkvyu:573_1: ity api saṃbhāvyeta. nirucchvāsasya gandhāgrahaṇād iti. yad ucchvāsena sardhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:573_2: bhūtacatuṣkaṃ ghrāṇam āgataṃ. tasya gandho ghrāṇena ghrāyate. vāyau gandhāntaram
SA01yabhkvyu:573_3: utpannam ity apare. miśṛībhaveyur ekadeśībhaveyuḥ. athaikadeśena. kiṃ. spṛśeyur iti
SA01yabhkvyu:573_4: vartate. kathaṃ śabdābhiniṣpattir iti. yadi na spṛśanti. anabhighāte śabdābhiniṣpattir
SA01yabhkvyu:573_5: na prāpnotīty abhiprāyaḥ. ata eveti kāśmīrāḥ. yadi hi spṛśeyuḥ. hasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:573_6: sajjeta jatuneva jatvantaraṃ. kathaṃ citaṃ pratyāhataṃ na viśīryata iti. anyonyam
SA01yabhkvyu:573_7: aspṛśatāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ saṃghātaḥ pratyāhataḥ pāṇyādibhiḥ kathaṃ na viśīryate. tad
SA01yabhkvyu:573_8: evaiṣāṃ nirantaratvaṃ yan madhye nāsti kiṃcid ity ālokādi madhye nāstīti nirantaratvam
SA01yabhkvyu:573_9: eṣāṃ vyavasthāpyate. tad eva ca prāptatvaṃ nānyatheti. api (Abhidh-k-vy 85)
SA01yabhkvyu:574_0: khalv iti. api cety arthaḥ. saṃghātāḥ sāvayavatvāt spṛśantīty adoṣaḥ. yo 'sau doṣa
SA01yabhkvyu:574_1: ukto yadi sarvātmanā spṛśeyur miśrībhaveyur dravyāṇy athaikadeśena sāvayavāḥ prasajyerann
SA01yabhkvyu:574_2: iti. kāraṇaṃ pratīti. yasya yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ. tasya tat kāraṇaṃ. spṛṣṭam aspṛṣṭaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:574_3: vā pratīty āha. kadācid iti vistaraḥ. spṛṣṭahetukam iti. spṛṣṭam anyonyaṃ hetur asya
SA01yabhkvyu:574_4: spṛṣṭahetukaṃ. evam aspṛṣṭahetukaṃ. [Tib. 79a] yadā viśīryata iti. tadyathā śuṣkā
SA01yabhkvyu:574_5: mṛc cūrṇīkriyamāṇā. yadā cayaṃ gacchatīti. tadyathā himaṃ. tad dhi pūrvaṃ sūkṣmaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:574_6: paścān mahad bhavati. cayavatāṃ caya iti. tadyathā mṛtpiṇḍadvayasaṃnipāte. uttarakṣaṇāvasthānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:574_7: syād iti. utpadya spṛṣṭiyogāt. nirantare tu spṛṣṭasaṃjñeti bhadantaḥ. bhadantamataṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:574_8: caiṣṭavyam iti. vaibhāṣikamataṃ kasmān naiṣṭavyaṃ. nanu vaibhāṣikair apy evam uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:574_9: tad evaiṣāṃ nirantaratvaṃ yan madhye nāsti kiṃcid iti. asty evam. sāvakāśaṃ tu tad
SA01yabhkvyu:574_10: vacanam. yan madhye nāsti kiṃcid iti bruvāṇā vaibhāṣikā madhye ālokādi necchanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:574_11: anyaparamāṇupraveśānavakāśaṃ tu na bruvate. anyathā hi sāntarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ śūnyeṣv
SA01yabhkvyu:574_12: antareṣu gatiḥ kena pratibadhyeta gatimata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. ayaṃ cāparo doṣaḥ. na
SA01yabhkvyu:574_13: ca paramāṇubhyo 'nye saṃghātāḥ yathā vaibhāṣikāḥ kalpayanti. ta eva te saṃghātāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:574_14: paramāṇavaḥ spṛśyante. yathā rūpyanta iti. saṃghātā eva naika ity arthaḥ. yadi ca
SA01yabhkvyu:574_15: paramāṇor iti vistaraḥ. paramāṇvapariniṣpattiṃ vaktukāmaḥ ācāryo vicārayati. yadi
SA01yabhkvyu:574_16: paramāṇor ekasya pūrvādidigbhāgabhedaḥ kalpyeta spṛṣṭasyānyonyam aspṛṣṭasya vā sāvayavatvaprasaṃgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:574_17: na cet. kim. digbhāgabheda iti vartate. spṛṣṭasyāpy aprasaṃgaḥ. kasya. sāvayavatvasya.
SA01yabhkvyu:574_18: [Tib. 79b] atra sādhanam. na niravayavaḥ paramāṇuḥ. digbhāgabhedavattvāt. māṣarāśivad
SA01yabhkvyu:574_19: iti. tad etad digbhāgabhedavattvaṃ necchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ. digbhāgabhedo hi saṃghātarūpāṇām
SA01yabhkvyu:574_20: eva kalpyate. evaṃ ca varṇayanti. dharmataiveyaṃ yat sapratighānāṃ bhinnadeśatvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:574_21: teṣāṃ nairantaryeṇāvasthānāt abhinnadeśatvaṃ mā bhūd iti sāntarāṇām api sapratighatvena
SA01yabhkvyu:575_0: (I.43ab) āśuvṛttyā ca parvatādīnām alātacakrādivad iti. ātmaparimāṇatulyasyaivārthasya
SA01yabhkvyu:575_1: grahaṇa iṣyamāṇe kathaṃ parvatādīnāṃ mahatāṃ sakṛd iva grahaṇaṃ lakṣyate na krameṇety
SA01yabhkvyu:575_2: āśaṃkya yuktiṃ tathā grahaṇe kathayati. āśuvṛttyā cetyādi. yathā alātacakrādigrahaṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:575_3: krameṇa vartamānaṃ sakṛd iva lakṣyate. tathā parvatanadīśabdādigrahaṇam āśuvṛttyā
SA01yabhkvyu:575_4: bhavatīti. āhosvit tulyātulyasyeti. drākṣāphalādidarśane tulyasya. vālāgraparvatādidarśane
SA01yabhkvyu:575_5: atulyasyety abhiprāyaḥ. unmiṣitamātreṇeti na kramadarśananyāyena. evaṃ śrotreṇeti (Abhidh-k-vy 86)
SA01yabhkvyu:576_0: vistaraḥ. kadācid alpīyāṃso yadā maśakaśabdaṃ śṛṇoti. kadācit samāḥ yadā śrotraparamāṇusamapramāṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:576_1: kasyacic chabdaṃ śṛṇoti. kadācid bhūyāṃso yadā meghaśabdaṃ śṛṇotīti. ajājīpuṣpavad
SA01yabhkvyu:576_2: avasthitāḥ kālajīrakapuṣpavad avasthitāḥ ekatalāvasthitā ity arthaḥ. bhūrjābhyantarāvasthitā
SA01yabhkvyu:576_3: iti karṇābhyantare yad bhūrjapattravarṇākāraṃ. tad bhūrjam iveti bhūrjaṃ. tadabhyaṃtare
SA01yabhkvyu:576_5: avasthitānīti. maṇḍalena samapaṃktyāvasthitānīti. vālāgramātraṃ kileti. āgamasūcanārthaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:576_6: kilaśabdaḥ. asphuṭam avyāptaṃ. sa kileti karmasāmarthyād evāviśaraṇaṃ syād iti. kilaśabdena
SA01yabhkvyu:576_7: aruciṃ sūcayati. saṃcitāśrayālambanatvād iti saṃcitāśrayatvāt saṃcitālambanatvāc ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:578_0: iti. atīta evety avadhāraṇaṃ. ata evocyata iti. yasmāt paṃca vijñānakāyā indriyadvayāśrayāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:578_1: cakṣurādīndriyāśrayā manaindriyāśrayāś ca. tasmāc catuḥkoṭika uttiṣṭhate. prathamā
SA01yabhkvyu:578_2: koṭiś cakṣur iti. cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣur āśrayabhāvena na samanantarapratyayabhāvena.
SA01yabhkvyu:580_0: iti ca samanantarapratyayalakṣaṇaṃ. dvitīyā koṭiḥ samanantarātītaś caitasiko dharmadhātus
SA01yabhkvyu:580_1: tasya samanantarabhāvena. ṣaḍ eva hy āśrayā vijñānasyeṣyante cakṣurādayo manaḥparyantā
SA01yabhkvyu:580_2: nānye. tṛtīyā samanantarātītaṃ manaḥ. ubhayalakṣaṇayuktatvāt. caturthī uktanirmuktā
SA01yabhkvyu:580_3: dharmāḥ. koṭitrayamuktā viprayuktā asaṃskṛtādayaḥ. [Tib. 80b] evaṃ yāvat kāyavijñānasya
SA01yabhkvyu:580_4: svam indriyaṃ vaktavyam iti. yaḥ śrotravijñānasyāśrayabhāvena. samantarapratyayabhāvenāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:580_5: sa. tasyeti catuḥkoṭikaḥ. prathamā koṭiḥ śrotraṃ. dvitīyā samanantarātītaś caitasiko
SA01yabhkvyu:580_6: dharmadhātuḥ. tṛtīyā samanantarātītaṃ manaḥ. caturthī koṭir uktanirmuktā dharmā.
SA01yabhkvyu:580_7: ity evam api vaktavyaṃ. manovijñānasya pūrvapādaka iti. yo manovijñānasyāśrayabhāvena.
SA01yabhkvyu:580_8: samanantarapratyayabhāvenāpi sa. tasyeti pūrvapādakaḥ. yas tāvad āśrayabhāvena. samanantarapratyayabhāvenāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:580_9: sa iti. manas tāvad avaśyam asau samanantarapratyayaḥ. syāt samanantarapratyayabhāvena
SA01yabhkvyu:582: iti vistaraḥ. teṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ vikāras tadvikāraḥ. tadvikāreṇa vikāras tadvikāravikāraḥ. sa eṣām astīti tadvikāravikārīṇi vijñānāni. tadbhāvas (Abhidh-k-vy 87)
SA01yabhkvyu:583_0: tadvikāravikāritvam. tasmāt. cakṣurādaya evaiṣām āśrayā ity avadhāryate. anugrahopaghātapaṭumandatānuvidhānād
SA01yabhkvyu:583_1: iti. cakṣurādīnāṃ aṃjanādibhir anugrahaṃ reṇvādibhiś copaghātaṃ cakṣurādivijñānāny
SA01yabhkvyu:583_2: anuvidadhate. sasukhotpādāt saduḥkhotpādāc ca. yathākramaṃ paṭumandatāṃ ca teṣām
SA01yabhkvyu:583_4: bhavatīti. nanu ca paṭuni rūpe paṭucakṣurvijñānam utpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate. mande maṃdam
SA01yabhkvyu:583_5: iti. [teṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ.] yady api rūpasya paṭumaṃdate cakṣurvijñānam anuvidadhīta.
SA01yabhkvyu:583_6: vidhurāvasthayos tu cakṣūrūpayoś cakṣuravasthām eva cakṣurvijñānam anuvidhatte. na
SA01yabhkvyu:583_7: rūpavasthāṃ. tathā hi cakṣuṣi anugṛhīte rūpe copahate tadvītarāgāṇāṃ madhyasthānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:583_8: ca cakṣurvijñānam avikāram utpadyate. na tu saduḥkham utpadyate. rūpe punar anugṛhīte
SA01yabhkvyu:583_9: 'parityakte cakṣuṣi copahate kāmalavyādhinā timiropaghātena vā pītadarśanaṃ bhrāntaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:583_10: keśoṇḍukādidarśanaṃ vā pravartate. tathā paṭuni rūpe jarayā mande cakṣuṣi mandaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:583_11: cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate. evaṃ mande rūpe cakṣur yady atipaṭu bhavet paṭu cakṣurvijñānam
SA01yabhkvyu:583_12: utpadyate. tathā hi jātisvabhāvena paṭuni gṛdhracakṣuṣi mande 'pi śavarūpe anekayojanaviprakṛṣṭe
SA01yabhkvyu:583_13: 'pi cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate. ity evaṃ śrotrādīny api yojyāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:585_0: ata āśrayabhāvāt. asādhāraṇatvāc ca. āśrayabhāvo vyākhyāta iti na taṃ praty ādriyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:585_1: asādhāraṇatvam eva tu vyācakṣāṇa āha. katham asādhāraṇatvam ityādi. anyacakṣurvijñānasyāpīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:585_2: anyasaṃtānavijñānasyāpīty arthaḥ. tair [Tib. 81b] eva nirdiśyata iti. cakṣurādibhiś
SA01yabhkvyu:585_3: cakṣurvijñānaṃ yāvan manovijñānaṃ. na rūpādibhiḥ rūpavijñānaṃ yāvad dharmavijñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:585_4: yathā bherīśabdo yavāṃkura iti. asādhāraṇatvāt tābhyāṃ bherīyavābhyāṃ yathā nirdeśo
SA01yabhkvyu:585_5: loke bherīśabdo yavāṃkura iti na tu daṇḍaśabdaḥ kṣetrāṃkura iti vā. daṇḍo hi paṭahādiśabdasyāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:585_6: kāraṇībhavet. kṣetraṃ ca śāligodhūmāṃkurasyāpīti sādhāraṇatvāt na tābhyāṃ nirdeśaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:585_7: kriyate. asādhāraṇābhyāṃ tu bherīyavābhyāṃ nirdeśaḥ. tadvad ihāpi draṣṭavyam. api
SA01yabhkvyu:585_8: khalu cakṣur iva vijñānam ubhayoḥ sattvasaṃkhyātatvāt. rūpaṃ tv asattvasaṃkhyātam
SA01yabhkvyu:585_9: api. cakṣuṣā vijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānam. tasya kāraṇabhāvāt. cakṣuṣi vijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:585_11: vijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānam. asādhāraṇatvena tataḥ pravṛtteḥ. cakṣuṣo vijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:585_12: sattvasaṃkhyātasyaiva svāmibhāvāt. cakṣuṣi vijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānam. tatsaṃprayoginyāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:586_0: vedanāyāś cakṣuṣy eva paricchidyamānatvāt. evaṃ śrotrādiṣu yojyam. tad evaṃ cakṣurādibhir
SA01yabhkvyu:586_1: eva vijñānanirdeśo yujyate na rūpādibhiḥ. evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikena cakṣuṣā
SA01yabhkvyu:586_2: tadbhūmikādharabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato [Tib. 82a] yojayitavyam iti. tasyaiva kāmadhātūpapannasya
SA01yabhkvyu:586_3: yojayitavyam. evaṃ tṛtīyādidhyānacakṣuṣā yojyam iti. tasyaiva prathamadhyānopapannasya
SA01yabhkvyu:588_0: iti. adharabhūmikam ity arthaḥ. svabhūmikam ūrdhvabhūmikaṃ cābhyanujñātaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:588_1: paṃcabhūmikāni hi kāyacakṣūrūpāṇi. kāyaḥ śarīraṃ. etāni kāyādīni paṃcabhūmikāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:588_2: kāmāvacarāṇi prathamadhyānabhūmikāni yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāny ārūpyadhātāv abhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:588_3: dvibhūmikaṃ cakṣurvijñānam iti. kāmāvacaraṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca. tayor vitarkavicārasadbhāvāc
SA01yabhkvyu:590: iti. nordhvabhūmikaṃ rūpaṃ cakṣuṣo viṣayo bhavati. ūrdhvabhūmikasya rūpasya sūkṣmatvāt. svabhūmikam adharabhūmikaṃ cābhyanujñātaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:592_0: kim. ūrdhvaṃ na cakṣuṣa iti prakṛtaṃ. kāmāvacarasya cakṣuṣo 'dharabhūmikasya prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:592_1: cakṣurvijñānaṃ na bhavati. svabhūmikam adharabhūmikaṃ vābhyanujñātaṃ bhavati. kāmāvacarasya
SA01yabhkvyu:592_2: cakṣuṣaḥ svabhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaram eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhavati. prathamadhyānabhūmikasya
SA01yabhkvyu:592_3: cakṣuṣaḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikam eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhavati. kāmāvacaraṃ tu cakṣurvijñānam
SA01yabhkvyu:592_4: asya na bhavati. nanu coktam adharabhūmikam abhyanujñātam iti. satyam uktam etat.
SA01yabhkvyu:592_5: [Tib. 82b] kiṃ tu. asaty ātmīye adharabhūmikam iṣyate. na satīti. dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānacakṣuṣo
SA01yabhkvyu:592_6: hy asaty ātmīye prathamadhyānabhūmikam evādharaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ bhavati. na tu kāmāvacaraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:592_7: paramanihīnatvāt. saṃbhavatas tv evam uktam adharabhūmikam abhyanujñātam iti. asyety
SA01yabhkvyu:592_8: anantaroktasya cakṣurvijñānasyeti. cakṣurvijñānajāteḥ rūpaṃ sarvato viṣayaḥ. saṃbhavatas
SA01yabhkvyu:592_9: tu yojyam. kāmāvacarasya cakṣurvijñānasya svabhūmikam eva rūpam. prathamadhyānabhūmikasya
SA01yabhkvyu:592_11: ca rūpaṃ viṣayaḥ. caturthadhyānabhūmikacakṣurāśrayasya tu caturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:592_12: rūpaṃ tataś cādharabhūmikaṃ sarvaṃ viṣayaḥ. evaṃ yāvat dvitīyadhyānabhūmikacakṣurāśrayasya
SA01yabhkvyu:593_0: cādharabhūmikaṃ rūpaṃ viṣayaḥ. evaṃ cakṣurvijñānajāter ūrdhvam adhaḥ svabhūmau ca
SA01yabhkvyu:593_1: rūpaṃ viṣayo bhavati. kāyasya cobhe rūpavijñāne sarvato bhavata iti. kāmāvacarasya
SA01yabhkvyu:593_2: kāyasya śarīrasya svabhūmikordhvabhūmike rūpavijñāne bhavataḥ. prathamadhyānabhūmikasya
SA01yabhkvyu:593_3: kāyasya prathamadhyānabhūmikam eva vijñānam. rūpaṃ tu svordhvādharabhūmikam. yathā
SA01yabhkvyu:593_4: svāśrayaṃ cakṣuḥ. dvitīyādidhyānabhūmikasya kāyasya vijñānam adharabhūmikam eva prathamadhyānabhūmikam
