SA01yabhkvyu:593_5: evety arthaḥ. rūpaṃ tu dvitīyatṛtīyadhyānabhūmikasya kāyasya svordhvādharabhūmikaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:593_6: [Tib. 83a] yathā svāśrayaṃ cakṣuḥ. caturthadhyānabhūmikasya kāyasya rūpaṃ svādharabhūmikam.
SA01yabhkvyu:595_0: iti. yathā cakṣur uktam. tathā śrotraṃ vyākhyātavyam. katham ity āha. yatra kāye
SA01yabhkvyu:595_1: sthitaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śṛṇoti. kiṃ tāni kāyaśrotraśabdavijñānāny ekabhūmikāny eva
SA01yabhkvyu:595_2: bhavanti. āhosvid anyabhūmikāny api. āha. sarveṣāṃ bhedaḥ. kāmadhātūpapannasya svena
SA01yabhkvyu:595_3: śrotreṇa svāṃ śabdāṃ śṛṇvataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa anayā diśātra
SA01yabhkvyu:595_4: grantho vaktavyaḥ. yāvad ayaṃ tu niyamaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:596: na kāyasyādharaṃ śrotram ūrdhvaṃ śabdo na ca śruter
SA01yabhkvyu:597: vijñānaṃ cāsya śabdas tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvata
SA01yabhkvyu:600_0: paṃcabhūmikā hi kāyaśrotraśabdāḥ kāmāvacarā yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāḥ. dvibhūmikaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:600_1: ṣrotravijñānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca. tatra yadbhūmikaḥ kāyaḥ. tadbhūmikam
SA01yabhkvyu:600_2: ūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā śrotraṃ bhavati. na tv adharabhūmikam. yadbhūmikaṃ śrotraṃ. tadbhūmiko
SA01yabhkvyu:602: na hi kadācid ūrdhvabhūmikaḥ śabdo 'dharabhūmikena śrotreṇa śrotuṃ śakyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:605: asya śabdas tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:606: asyeti anantaroktasya śrotravijñānasya śabdaḥ sarvato viṣaya ūrdhvam adhaḥ svabhūmau ca. kāyasya cobhe śabdavijñāne sarvato bhavata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:609_0: iti. yathā cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vā niyamitaṃ na kāyasyādharaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vety evamādinā.
SA01yabhkvyu:609_1: naivaṃ niyamitaṃ manaḥ. ata evāha. paṃcabhūmike 'pi kāye sarvabhūmikāni manaādīni
SA01yabhkvyu:609_2: bhavantīti [Tib. 83b] manodharmamanovijñānāni sarvabhūmikāni kāmāvacarāṇi yāvad bhāvāgrikāṇi.
SA01yabhkvyu:609_3: tadyathā kāmadhātūpapanno yadi kāmāvacarān manaso 'nantaraṃ kāmāvacaram eva kāmāvacaradharmālambanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:609_4: manovijñānam utpādayati. sarvāṇi kāmāvacarāṇi. yadi prathamadhyānabhūmikād yāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:609_5: bhavāgrabhūmikād upapattikāle samāpattikāle vā saṃbhavataḥ kāmāvacaraṃ tathaiva manovijñānam
SA01yabhkvyu:609_6: utpādayati. manas tatastyam. śeṣāni kāmāvacarāṇi. atha tatraiva tadvijñānam utpādayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:609_7: dharmās tv ālambanaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikā yāvad bhavāgrabhūmikāḥ. dharmās tatastyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:609_8: śeṣāṇi pūrvavat. evaṃ prathamadhyānopapanno yāvad bhavāgropapanno yathāyogaṃ vaktavyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:612: cakṣuś ca dharmadhātoś ca pradeśo dṛṣṭir
SA01yabhkvyu:613: ity etad ādhikārikam. atha yatra kāye sthitaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyatīty evamādir ayam ānuṣaṃgikaḥ prasaṃgaḥ. darśanasambandhād āgatatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:615_1: bāhyā eva paṃca dvivijñeyā ity avadhāraṇād anye trayodaśa dhātava ekavijñānavijñeyā
SA01yabhkvyu:617: iti. asaṃskṛtā eva nityā ity avadhāraṇam. adhvasaṃcārābhāvāt nityāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:618: dharmārdha indriyaṃ ye ca [Tib. 84a] dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ smṛtā
SA01yabhkvyu:619_0: iti. dhātava ity adhikāraḥ. dvāviṃśatīndriyāṇy uktāni sūtra iti. atha jātiśroṇo brāhmaṇo
SA01yabhkvyu:619_1: yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ. upasaṃkramya bahagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:619_2: saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikante nyaṣīdat. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo jātiśroṇo brāhmaṇo
SA01yabhkvyu:619_3: bhagavantam idam avocat. indriyāṇīndriyāṇīti bho gautama ucyante. kati bho gautama
SA01yabhkvyu:619_4: indriyāṇi. kiyatā cendriyāṇāṃ saṃgraho bhavati. dvāviṃśatir imāni brāhmaṇa indriyāṇi.
SA01yabhkvyu:619_5: katamāni dvāviṃśatiḥ. cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:619_6: manaindriyaṃ strīndriyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:620_0: śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam
SA01yabhkvyu:620_1: ājñendriyam ājñātāvīndriyam. itīmāni brāhmaṇa dvāviṃśatir indriyāṇi. iyatā indriyāṇām
SA01yabhkvyu:620_2: indriyasaṃgraho bhavati. atha jātiśroṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya
SA01yabhkvyu:624_0: iti napuṃsakanirdeśena kecit paṭhanti. teṣāṃ pāṭhe ardhadharma iti samapravibhāgaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:624_1: prāpnoti. ardhaṃ napuṃsakam iti lakṣaṇāt. ardhapippalīti yathā. atha napuṃsakaliṃgo
SA01yabhkvyu:624_2: 'py ardhaśabda ekadeśārthe vartate tadaivaṃ samāsaḥ kriyate. dharmaś cāsāv ardhaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:624_3: ca dharmārdham. dharme vārdhaṃ dharmārdham iti. ābhidhārmikās tu ṣaḍāyatanavyavasthām
SA01yabhkvyu:624_4: anādṛtyeti. cakṣurāyatanaṃ yāvat kāyāyatanaṃ [Tib. 84b] manaāyatanam iti ṣaḍāyatanam
SA01yabhkvyu:624_5: iti ṣaḍāyatanavyavasthāṃ yuktarūpām anādṛtya jīvitendriyānantaraṃ manaindriyaṃ paṭhanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:624_6: sālambanatvāt. vedanendriyādīni hi sālambanāni anantaraṃ paṭhanti. jīvitendriyādīny
SA01yabhkvyu:624_7: ekādaśeti. jīvitendriyaṃ vedanendriyāṇi paṃca śraddhādīni ceti. trayāṇāṃ ca bhāga
SA01yabhkvyu:624_8: iti. ājñāsyāmīndriyādīnāṃ navadravyātmakānāṃ. manaindriyaṃ muktvānyāny aṣṭau dravyāṇi
SA01yabhkvyu:624_9: dharmadhātvekadeśaḥ. cakṣurādayaḥ paṃca svanāmoktā iti. paṃca cakṣurādayo dhātavaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:624_10: paṃcendriyāṇi cakṣurindriyaṃ yāvat kāyendriyaṃ. strīpuruṣendriye ca kāyendriyaikadeśa
SA01yabhkvyu:624_11: eveti. paṃca cakṣurādidhātavaḥ saptendriyāṇi bhavanti. sapta cittadhātavo manaindriyam
SA01yabhkvyu:624_12: iti. evaṃ dvādaśādhyātmikā dhātavo 'ṣṭāv indriyāṇi bhavantīti. dvādaśādhyātmikā dhātava
SA01yabhkvyu:624_13: eva dharmārdha eva cendriyam iti avadhāraṇāt paṃca dhātavo rūpādayas tadanyadharmadhātupradeśo
SA01yabhkvyu:625: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtau sphuṭārthāyām abhidharmakośavyākhyāyāṃ dhātunirdeśo nāma prathamaṃ kośasthānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:630: (II.1) uktānīndriyāṇīti. prathamasya dvitīyasya ca kośasthānasya sambandhopanipātatāṃ darśayann āha. uktānīndriyāṇīti. prathamakośasthānāvasāne yasmād
SA01yabhkvyu:632_0: ity uktam. tasmād idam āyātam iti sambandhaḥ. [Tib. 85a] kaḥ punar indriyārtha iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:632_1: vaiyākaraṇair anyathā indriyaśabdārthavyutpattiḥ kṛteti. ataḥ praśnayati. kaḥ punar
SA01yabhkvyu:632_2: indriyārtha iti. idi paramaiśvarye iti paṭhyate. tasya dhātor indantītīndriyāṇīti
SA01yabhkvyu:632_3: rūpaṃ draṣṭavyam. kathaṃ kṛtvā. indantīti indrāṇi rapratyaya auṇādikaḥ. indrāṇy evendriyāṇīti
SA01yabhkvyu:632_4: svārthe ghastaddhitaḥ. atha vā indantītīndriyam. bahutvāt tu bahuvacanena kṛto nirdeśa
SA01yabhkvyu:632_5: indantītīndriyāṇīti. tasmāt indantīty asya śabdasya indriyam ity ādeśaḥ. katham.
SA01yabhkvyu:632_6: avarṇasya rabhāvaḥ tiśabdasya ceyādeśaḥ. tena nairuktena vidhānena indriyam iti bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:632_7: tadyathā kuñjara iti. vaiyākaraṇair hi kuñjo 'syāstīti kuñjara iti matvarthīyena
SA01yabhkvyu:632_8: kuñjaraśabdo vyutpādyate. nairuktais tu tad anādṛtya kuñjaraḥ kuñjacāritvād iti nairuktena
SA01yabhkvyu:632_9: nyāyena sādhyate. tadvad ihāpi draṣṭavyam. yadi hi vaiyākaraṇanayena indrasya liṅgam
SA01yabhkvyu:632_10: indriyam iti vyutpādyeta. ādhipatyārtha indriyārtho hīyetādhipatyārthaś ceṣyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:632_11: tasmād ittham indriyaśabdasya vyutpattir naiṣṭavyeti. dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca viṣamaparivarjanād
SA01yabhkvyu:632_12: iti. dṛṣṭvā śvabhrādi śrutvā ca vyāghrādirutam. śvabhrādivyāghrādirutaviṣamaparivarjanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:632_13: sasaṃprayogayor iti sacaitasikayoḥ. rūpadarśanaśabdaśravaṇayoś ceti. cakṣuḥ paśyati
SA01yabhkvyu:632_14: śrotraṃ śṛṇotītyādi vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ siddhāntaḥ. tenālambanaviśeṣalakṣaṇayor darśanaśravaṇayor
SA01yabhkvyu:633_0: ātmabhāvaśobhāyāṃ pūrvavad [Tib. 85b] iti. aghrāṇādīnāṃ sattvānām akāntarūpatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:633_1: akāntātmabhāvatvād ity arthaḥ. taiḥ kavaḍīkārāhāraparibhogād iti. tair ghrāṇādibhis
SA01yabhkvyu:633_2: tatparibhogād iti. kathaṃ gandhasya kavadīkārāhāratvam. nāsikayor gandhagrāsavyavacchedena
SA01yabhkvyu:633_3: kavaḍīkaraṇāt. kathaṃ spraṣṭavyasya kavaḍīkārāhāratvam. kāyena snānābhyaṅgādikaspraṣṭavyasya
SA01yabhkvyu:635: kilaśabdaḥ paramatadyotane. svamatam asya paścād vakṣyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:637_0: iti pratyekam abhisambandhaḥ. sattvabhedaḥ strīpuruṣa iti. strīty eko nikāyasabhāgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:637_1: puruṣa ity aparaḥ. tayor bhedaḥ. sattvavikalpa iti stanādeḥ saṃsthānasya svarasyācārasya
SA01yabhkvyu:637_2: cānyathātvaṃ viśeṣa ity arthaḥ. saṃkleśavyavadānayor ity apara iti pūrvācāryaḥ. na

SA01yabhkvyu:740_1: yāme devaputramāro nirjitaḥ. dvitīye yāme divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokya tṛtīye yāme
SA01yabhkvyu:740_2: kleśamāro nirjitaḥ. vaiśālyāṃ tu traimāsyaṃ jīvitasaṃskārān adhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārān
SA01yabhkvyu:740_3: utsṛṣṭavān. skandhamāranirjayārtham utsṛṣṭāḥ skandhāḥ. teṣūtsṛṣṭeṣu martavyaṃ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:741: niṣṭhitam ānuṣaṃgikaṃ yat praśnāt praśnāntaram upajātaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:747_0: jīvitendriyād ekantavipākād anyāni dvādaśendriyāṇi vipākaś cāvipākaś ca. tatra cakṣurādīni
SA01yabhkvyu:747_2: manoduḥkhasukham iti vistaraḥ. yāni manaādīni kuśalakliṣṭāni tāny avipākaḥ. yāni
SA01yabhkvyu:747_4: yathāyogam iti viśeṣaṇam. airyāpathikādīnāṃ mānasatvena duḥkhendriyasaṃbhavāt sukhasaumanasyayoś
SA01yabhkvyu:747_5: ca kvacid asaṃbhavāt. tatra kāmadhātāv airyāpathikaṃ manaindriyaṃ tatsaṃprayukte
SA01yabhkvyu:747_6: ca saumanasyopekṣendriye avipākaḥ. rūpadhātāv airyāpathikaṃ manaindriyam avipākaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:747_7: vedanendriyaṃ ca tatsaṃprayuktaṃ yathābhūmi. nairmāṇikaṃ pañcabhūmikam. tatra copekṣendriyam
SA01yabhkvyu:747_10: manaindriyādibhyo 'nyāni manaindriyādīni vipākajāni vipākaḥ. śeṣāṇy avipāka iti siddham
SA01yabhkvyu:747_11: iti. jīvitendriyaṃ dvādaśa cakṣurādīni hitvā tadavadhāraṇād eva śeṣāṇy avipāka iti
SA01yabhkvyu:747_12: siddham. katamāni punas tāni. daurmanasyendriyaṃ na vipākaḥ kuśalākuśalatvāt. tathā hi vakṣyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:755_0: yadi daurmanasyendriyaṃ na vipāka ity anenāgamavirodhaṃ darśayati. saṃprayogavedanīyatām
SA01yabhkvyu:755_1: adhikṛtyeti. vedanīyaṃ vedanā. daurmanasyaṃ vedanīyam asminn iti daurmanasyavedanīyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:755_2: karma. saumanasyopekṣāvedanīye apīti. saṃprayogamātravacanād daurmanasyavat saumanasyopekṣe
SA01yabhkvyu:755_3: api na vipākaḥ prāpṇuta iti parasyābhiprāyaḥ. saṃprayoge 'pi na doṣo vipāke 'pīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:755_4: saumanasyaṃ vedanīyam asmin saumanasyavedanīyaṃ karma. tathā saumanasyaṃ vipākatvena
SA01yabhkvyu:755_5: vedanīyam asya saumanasyavedanīyaṃ karmeti. agatyā hy etad evaṃ gamyeteti. yadi daurmanasyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:755_6: yuktyā paricchinnaṃ na vipāka iti. tata evam agatyākhyāyeta saṃprayogavedanīyatām
SA01yabhkvyu:755_7: adhikṛtyoktam iti. tenāha kā punar atra yuktir daurmanasyaṃ na vipāka iti. atha vā
SA01yabhkvyu:755_8: agatyā hy etad evaṃ gamyeta. kvacit saṃprayogavedanīyatā. kvacid vipākavedanīyateti.
SA01yabhkvyu:755_9: brūyās tvaṃ sarvatraiva tarhi saṃprayogavedanīyateti. ata etad antarābhiprāyam abhisamīkṣyāha.
SA01yabhkvyu:755_10: kā punar atra yuktir daurmanasyaṃ na vipāka iti. daurmanasyaṃ hīty [Tib. 97b] aniṣṭacintanādikaiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:755_11: parikalpaviśeṣair utpādyate ca [vyutpādyate ca] vyupaśāmyate ca. saumanasyam apy
SA01yabhkvyu:755_12: evam iti. parikalpaviśeṣair iṣṭacintanādibhir utpādyate ca vyupaśāmyate ca. vītarāgādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:755_13: tarhīti. yasmād vītarāgādīnāṃ daurmanasyaṃ vyāvartate. na hi cakṣurādiko vipākabhūto
SA01yabhkvyu:755_14: vītarāgādīnāṃ vyāvartate. daurmanasyaṃ tu vyāvartate. vacanād daurmanasyena kāmavītarāgo
SA01yabhkvyu:755_15: 'samanvāgata iti. sūtre 'py uktaṃ. avītarāgasya dviśalyā vedanoktā kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ

SA01yabhkvyu:755_17: kāyikam eva duḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayata iti. saumanasyam apy eṣām iti vistaraḥ. vītarāgāṇām
SA01yabhkvyu:755_18: avyākṛtaṃ vipākarūpaṃ saumanasyaṃ kīdṛśaṃ syāt. samāpattisaṃgṛhītaṃ teṣāṃ saumanasyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:755_19: saṃbhavati. tac ca kuśalatvān na vipākaḥ. ato vaktavyam. kīdṛśaṃ teṣāṃ saumanasyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:755_20: vipāka iti. yādṛśaṃ tādṛśam astv iti. aparicchidyamānam api tad asty eveti darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:755_21: tasyāsti vipākāvakāśo na daurmanasyasya. sarvathāpy asamudācārāt samāpattyavasthāyām
SA01yabhkvyu:755_22: apy asamāpattyavasthāyām apīty ato na vipāka iti siddham. manaindriyam ubhayor ubhayasyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:755_23: ubhayoḥ sugatidurgatyoḥ ubhayasya kuśalākuśalasya. vipāka ity adhikāraḥ. idam utsṛṣṭaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:755_24: jīvitendriyāṣṭamāni sugatau kuśalasya [Tib. 98a] vipāka iti. tatra katham ubhayavyaṃjanam
SA01yabhkvyu:755_25: asādhusammataṃ kuśalasya vipāka ity āha. sugatāv ubhayavyaṃjanasyākuśalena tatsthānapratilaṃbha
SA01yabhkvyu:756: pratilaṃbho viprayukto dharmaḥ. ubhayaṃ tu vyaṃjanaṃ kuśalasyaiva vipāka ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:758_0: iti. tad ekaṃ savipākam evety arthaḥ. tenāha. tuśabda evakārārtho bhinnakramaś ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:758_1: bhinnasthāna ity arthaḥ. tad ekaṃ savipākaṃ tv iti hi kramo na bhinnaḥ syāt. ślokabandhānuguṇyena
SA01yabhkvyu:758_2: tv evam uktam. na hi tad avyākṛtam iti. savipākam evety avadhāraṇe yuktiṃ darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:758_3: dve hi vastunī avipāke iṣyete. avyākṛtam anāsravaṃ ca. vikalpaviśeṣotpādyatvān na

SA01yabhkvyu:758_6: pāriśeṣyād akuśalaṃ vā tad bhavet kuśalasāsravaṃ vā. ataḥ savipākam eva nāsty avipākaṃ daurmanasyam.

SA01yabhkvyu:764_1: jīvitaṃ rūpāṇi ca saptendriyāṇy ājñāsyāmīndriyādīni ca trīṇy avipākānīti siddham

SA01yabhkvyu:768_1: cākuśalaṃ ca. anyad api dvaidham asti. kūśalaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ ca akuśalaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:768_2: ceti. tat katham idam avadhāryate. kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ceti. vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:768_3: atha vā daurmanasyaṃ savipākam eveti nirdhāritam. tasmād idam eva dvaidhaṃ bhavati nānyat.
SA01yabhkvyu:772: kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtāni. trayaḥ prakārās tredhā. dvitryoś ca dhamuñ. edhāc ceti (Abhidh-k-vy 109)
SA01yabhkvyu:773: tredhety edhāśabdavyutpattiḥ. alobhādisaṃprayuktāni kuśalāni. lobhādisaṃprayuktāny akuśalāni. ato 'nyāny [Tib. 99a] avyākṛtāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:775_0: jīvitāṣṭamam anyad ekadhaivety avadhāryate. avyākṛtam evety arthaḥ. etadarthaṃ ca
SA01yabhkvyu:775_1: punar asya karaṇam. anyathā hy akuśalam eva kuśalāvyākṛtam evākuśalāvyākṛtam eva
SA01yabhkvyu:775_2: vā tat saṃbhāvyate. tasmād abhīpsitaikadhātvaprasiddhyarthaṃ punar ucyate. yasyaikadhātvaṃ

SA01yabhkvyu:777: amalam eva hitvā kāmāptaṃ bhavati. tad dhy apratisaṃyuktam eveti. adhātupatitam evety arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:779: iti vistaraḥ. strī ca pumāṃś ca strīpumāṃsau. samāsānte vidhir anitya iti paribhāṣayā samāsānto na bhavati. tayor indriye strīpumindriye.
SA01yabhkvyu:781: duḥkhavedanāsvabhāve indriye duḥkhadaurmanasye ity arthaḥ. te strīpumindriye duḥkhadaurmanasye amalāṃ cehānuvartamānaṃ hitvā. śeṣaṃ rūpāptam indriyaṃ bhavati.

SA01yabhkvyu:782_1: ity abhiprāyaḥ. anyaḥ puruṣabhāvo 'sti. yaḥ kāmadhātau puruṣāṇāṃ bhavatīti. stanādisaṃsthānasvarācārānyathātvam.
SA01yabhkvyu:782_2: duḥkhendriyaṃ nāstīti. āśrayasyācchatvāt tad abhighātajaṃ nāsti. akuśalabhāvāc ca

SA01yabhkvyu:782_5: daurmanasyendriyaṃ nāsti. āghātavastvabhāvāc ceti. āghātaḥ kopaḥ. tasya vastu viṣayaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:782_6: āghātavastu. nava cāghātavastūni. anarthaṃ me akārṣīt karoti kariṣyati cety āghātavastutrayam.

SA01yabhkvyu:782_9: āghātavastūnām abhāvāt viṣayakṛtam api daurmanasyaṃ nāsti. na kevalaṃ hetukṛtaṃ nastīti
SA01yabhkvyu:782_10: darśayati. hetukṛtaṃ hi tad yat svasaṃtānapratighakṛtam. pratyayakṛtaṃ ca tad yan
SA01yabhkvyu:785: caśabdena pūrvoktam anukṛṣyate. tenāha. strīpumindriye duḥkhe cāmalaṃ ca hitveti vartata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:788_0: (II.14) vittitrayaṃ sukhasaumanasyopekṣā iti. sukhendriyaṃ yat tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:788_1: darśanaheyānuśayasaṃprayuktaṃ. tad darśanaheyam. tatraiva ato 'nyat sāsravam. pañcavijñānakāyikaṃ

SA01yabhkvyu:788_4: ato 'nyat sāsravaṃ bhāvanāheyam. anāsravam aheyam. upekṣendriyaṃ tu sarvagam iti sugamam.
SA01yabhkvyu:790_0: daurmanasyayogād durmanaskaḥ. tadbhāvo durmanaskatā. daurmanasyam ity arthaḥ. yasya
SA01yabhkvyu:790_1: guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveṣaḥ. tadabhidhāne tvatalāv iti lakṣaṇāt. tad darśanaheyasaṃprayuktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:792_0: iti. kāmapradhānatvāt kāmadhātuḥ kāma iti nirdiśyata iti vakṣyate. aṇḍajajarāyujasaṃsvedajais

SA01yabhkvyu:794: iti vacanāt. cakṣurādīnāṃ ca tasyām avasthāyām avidyamānatvāt.

SA01yabhkvyu:800_0: iti vacanāt. katamāni ṣaṭ. cakṣurādīni pañca jīvitaṃ ca ṣaṣṭham iti. yathā devādiṣv
SA01yabhkvyu:801_0: tāni prathamato labhyante. kiṃ punar ubhayavyañjanā apy upapādukā bhavantīti. nihīnobhayavyañjanotpattiḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:801_4: nāpy ārūpyadhātuvad arūpapradhāna iti. sūtre 'py uktam iti. sūtre 'py evaṃ dṛṣṭam.

SA01yabhkvyu:805: iti. mriyamāṇa ārūpyadhātāv etāny eva trīṇīndriyāṇi nirodhayati. sāpavādaṃ caitad veditavyam.

SA01yabhkvyu:825_4: navabhir ity āha. śraddhādibhir ājñātāvīndriyavarjyair [Tib. 102a] manaupekṣendriyābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:825_5: ceti. navabhir iti. tatraivam abhisamayakramaḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ. duḥkhe
SA01yabhkvyu:825_9: mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ. mārge dharmajñānaṃ. mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ. mārge 'nvayajñānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:825_10: iti ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇā abhisamaya ity ucyante. tatra duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntir yāvan mārge
SA01yabhkvyu:828_0: iti vacanāt. tac cājñāsyāmīndriyam ity ucyate. mārge 'nvayajñānaṃ tu ṣoḍaśaḥ sa bhāvanāmārgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:828_1: tataḥ prabhṛtyā vajropamasamādher yāvān anāsravo mārgaḥ sarvo 'sau bhāvanāmārgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:828_2: tac cājñendriyam ity ucyate. kṣayajñānāt prabhṛti sarvo 'nāsravo mārgo 'śaikṣamārgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:828_3: tac cājñātāvīndriyam ity ucyate. tatra srotaāpattiphalaṃ mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntyavasthāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:828_4: prāpyate. śraddhādīni cātra pañcendiyāṇi avaśyaṃ bhavanti. tasyā avasthāyāḥ kuśalatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:828_5: ājñāsyāmīndriyasvabhāvā cāsau mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntir vartamānā. manaindriyaṃ ca
SA01yabhkvyu:828_6: tatsaṃprayuktaṃ bhavati. upekṣendriyaṃ cāvaśyaṃ anāgamyāśrayatvāt. [Tib. 102b] anāgamyasya
SA01yabhkvyu:828_7: ca upekṣendriyasaṃprayuktatvāt. mārge 'nvayajñānaṃ tu asyām avasthāyām ājñendriyasvabhāvam
SA01yabhkvyu:828_8: utpādābhimukhaṃ vartate. tena śraddhādibhiḥ pañcabhir ājñāsyāmīndriyeṇājñendriyeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:828_9: manaupekṣendriyābhyāṃ ceti tatphalaṃ navabhiḥ prāpyate. ubhābhyāṃ hi tasya prāptir
SA01yabhkvyu:828_11: tasya prāptiḥ. visaṃyogaprāpter āvāhakasaṃniśrayatvāt yathākramaṃ. tasyā visaṃyogaprāter
SA01yabhkvyu:828_12: ānantaryamārgasyāvāhakatvāt. janakatvāt. vimuktimārgasya ca tasyāḥ saṃmniśrayatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:828_13: ādhāratvād ity arthaḥ. dvābhyāṃ cauraniṣkāsanakapāṭapidhānavat. yathā hi dvayor manuṣyayoḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:828_14: ekena cauro niṣkāsyate. dvitīyenāsya kapāṭaṃ pidhīyate. tathānantaryamārgeṇa visaṃyogaprāptir
SA01yabhkvyu:828_15: āvāhyate kleśaprāptim ādāya nirodhāt. vimuktimārgeṇādhāryate. visaṃyogaprāptisahotpādāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:828_16: arhattvasya punaḥ śraddhādibhir ājñāsyāmīndriyavarjyair iti. vajropamasamādhyavasthāyām
SA01yabhkvyu:828_17: arhattvaphalaṃ prāpyate. śraddhādīni manaindriyaṃ ca pūrvavat. vajropamasamādhikalāpas
SA01yabhkvyu:828_18: tasyām avasthāyām ānantaryamārga ājñendriyasvabhāvo vartamānaḥ. sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:828_19: cānyatamat. yadi tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityārhattvaṃ prāpyate. sukhendriyaṃ tatra vartamānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:828_20: [Tib. 103a] atha prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya tatra saumanasyendriyaṃ. athānāgamyadhyānāntaracaturthadhyānākāśavijñānākiṃcanyāyatanānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:828_21: anyatamaṃ niśritya tatropekṣendriyaṃ vartamānaṃ. kṣayajñānakalāpas tu asyām avasthāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:828_22: vimuktimārga ājñātāvīndriyasvabhāva utpādābhimukho bhavati. tena śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir
SA01yabhkvyu:831_0: prāptir iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. pratyekam iti vistaraḥ. sakṛdāgāmiphalasya saptabhir aṣṭābhir
SA01yabhkvyu:831_1: navabhir vā prāptiḥ. evam anāgāmiphalasya. tat pratipādayann āha. sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:831_2: tāvad yady ānupūrvakaḥ prāpṇoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇeti. laukiko mārgaḥ śāntādyudārādyākāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:833_0: iti vacanāt. tenottarāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ praṇītataḥ niḥsaraṇataś ceha yogī paśyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:833_1: adharām audārikato duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikataś ca paśyati. sa cāyaṃ catuḥprakāro
SA01yabhkvyu:833_2: varṇyate. prayogamārga ānantaryamārgo vimuktimārgo viśeṣamārgaś ca. tatra prayogamārgo
SA01yabhkvyu:833_3: yata ānantaryamārga utpadyate. sa punar yena kleśān prajahāti. vimuktimārgo [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:833_4: 103b] 'py ānantaryamārgād anantaram utpadyate. kleśaprahāṇaprāpter ādhārakaḥ. viśeṣamārgas
SA01yabhkvyu:833_5: tata uccaṃ viśiṣṭo mārgaḥ. tena mārgeṇa navaprakārāḥ kleśāḥ praheyāḥ. adhimātrādhimātro
SA01yabhkvyu:833_7: mṛdumadhyo mṛdumṛduś ceti. tad yadi pṛthagjanaḥ prajahāti darśanabhāvanāheyān kleśān
SA01yabhkvyu:833_8: miśrīkṛtya tena mṛdumadhyādhimātrādibhedena navadhā kṛtvā prajahāti. mṛdumṛdubhyām
SA01yabhkvyu:833_9: ānantaryavimuktimārgābhyām adhimātrādhimātraṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti. evaṃ yāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:833_11: āryas tu bhāvanāheyān eva kleśāṃs tathaiva navadhā kṛtvā prajahāti. darśanaheyānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:833_12: darśanamārgeṇa prākprahīṇatvāt. lokottaras tu bhāvanāmārgas tathaiva ṣoḍaśākāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:833_13: anityādyākārabhedāt. sa cāpi tathaiva prayogādimārgabhedāc caturbhedaḥ. ihāpi mṛdumṛdubhyām
SA01yabhkvyu:833_14: ānantaryavimuktimārgābhyām adhimātrādhimātraṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti. evaṃ yāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:833_16: eṣa laukikalokottarayor mārgayor diṅmātranirdeśaḥ. tat sakṛdāgāmiphalam ānupūrvakeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:833_17: vā labhyeta bhūyovītarāgeṇa vā. tatrānupūrviko yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpya kramāt
SA01yabhkvyu:833_18: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti. [Tib. 104a] kaś cāsau. yaḥ sakalabandhana ekaprakārādyupalikhito
SA01yabhkvyu:833_19: vā yadi na ṣaṣṭhaprakāropalikhito niyāmam avakrāmati. ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe sa srotaāpanno
SA01yabhkvyu:833_20: bhavati. sa bhāvanāheyasyaikasya yāvat ṣaṣṭhasyaiva vā prakārasya prahāṇāya śamathacaritatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:833_21: laukikam api mārgam utpādayati. sa ṣaṣṭhaprakāre prahīṇe sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:833_22: tasya phalasya saptabhir indriyaiḥ prāptiḥ śraddhādibhiḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 115)
SA01yabhkvyu:834_0: paṃcabhir manaindriyeṇa upekṣendriyeṇa ca saptamenānāgamyanirśrayatvāt. atha lokottareṇe
SA01yabhkvyu:834_1: mārgeṇa tasyāṣṭābhir indriyaiḥ prāptiḥ. tair evājñendriyeṇa cāṣṭhamena. tany eva
SA01yabhkvyu:834_2: hi śraddhādīni saptendriyāṇi ājñendriyākhyāṃ labhante. anāsravatvāt. atha bhūyovītarāga
SA01yabhkvyu:834_3: iti. yo laukikena mārgeṇa pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ ṣaṭprakāropalikhito 'bhūt. sa bhūyovītarāga
SA01yabhkvyu:834_4: ity ucyate. bhūyasā prakāreṇa vītarāga iti kṛtvā. sa yadi sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:834_5: kathaṃ sa prāpnoti iti. abhisamayakrameṇa pūrvoktena mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntyavasthāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:834_6: prāpnoti. tasya navabhir yathaiva srotaāpattiphalasya. śraddhādibhir ājñātāvīndriyavarjyaiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:834_7: manaupekṣendriyābhyāṃ ceti pūrvavat vyākhyānaṃ. ayaṃ hi srotaāpattiphalaṃ aprāpyaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:834_8: ṣoḍaśe kṣaṇe sakṛdāgāmī bhavati. anāgāmiphalaṃ yady ānupūrvakaḥ prāpnotīti. ihānupūrvako
SA01yabhkvyu:834_9: [Tib. 104b] yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca prāpya anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:834_10: yo vā bhūyovītarāgo bhūtvā srotaāpattiphalam alabdhvaiva sakṛdāgāmiphalam eva ca
SA01yabhkvyu:834_11: labdhvānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti. sa ca yadi laukikena mārgeṇa prāpnoti. tasya saptabhir
SA01yabhkvyu:834_12: indriyaiḥ prāptiḥ. yathā sakṛdāgāmiphalasyānupūrvikīyasyety abhipretaṃ. śraddhādibhiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:834_13: paṃcabhir manaupekṣendriyābhyāṃ cety arthaḥ. atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa tasyāṣṭābhis
SA01yabhkvyu:834_14: tathaiveti. yathā sakṛdāgāmiphalasyaivāṣṭābhir ity arthaḥ. ājñendriyam aṣṭamaṃ bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:834_15: atha vītarāga iti. kāmadhātumātravītarāgo laukikena mārgeṇa navame prakāre prahīṇe
SA01yabhkvyu:834_16: prathamād api vā dhyānād yāvad ākiṃcanyād api vā viṭarāgo yo 'nāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:834_17: tasya navabhiḥ prāptiḥ. yathā srotaāpattiphalasya. srotaāpattiphalasya hi darśanamārgeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:834_18: prāptiḥ. asya ca darśanamārgeṇaiva prāptir iti tulyatvam. ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ. sakhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇām
SA01yabhkvyu:834_19: anyatamaṃ bhavati. niśrayaviśeṣād iti. yadi tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmati.
SA01yabhkvyu:834_20: sukhendriyaṃ tatra bhavati. atha prathamadvitīye dhyāne niśritya saumanasyendriyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:834_21: tatra bhavati. athānāgamyadhyānāntaracaturthadhyānānām anyatamaṃ niśritya upekṣendriyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:835_0: iti vistaraḥ. yadāpy ayam adhigatapūrvaphala ānupūrvikas tīkṣṇendriyaḥ. sa navame
SA01yabhkvyu:835_1: vimuktimārge dhyānaṃ praviśati maulaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa tadāpy aṣṭābhir indriyair
SA01yabhkvyu:835_2: anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti. tatra mauladhyānasaṃgṛhīto vimuktimārgo bhavati. tatra ca
SA01yabhkvyu:835_3: saumanasyendriyaṃ. ānantaryamārgas tv anāgamyasaṃgṛhīta eva. yadi na pṛaviśati tatra
SA01yabhkvyu:835_4: copekṣendriyam eva nānyathā. tasya prāptir aṣṭābhiḥ śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir manaupekṣāsaumanasyendriyaiś
SA01yabhkvyu:835_5: ceti. ubhābhyāṃ ca tasya prāptir iti. ānantaryavimuktimārgābhyāṃ. (Abhidh-k-vy 116)
SA01yabhkvyu:836_0: cauraniṣkāsanakapāṭapidhānavad iti vyākhyātam etat. atha lokottareṇa praviśatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:836_1: sa eva ānupūrvikas tīkṣṇendriyo veditavyo 'dhikārānuvṛtteḥ. tasya navabhir indriyaiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:836_2: prāptis tair evedānīm uktair indriyaiḥ. ājñendriyeṇa ca navamena. tāny eva hi indriyāṇi
SA01yabhkvyu:836_3: anāsravatvād ājñendriyākhyāṃ labhante. idam iha codyate. kasmād ānupūrvika evam ukto
SA01yabhkvyu:836_4: na punar vītarāgapūrvī. na hi vītarāgapūrvī anāgamyaniśrayeṇa darśanamārgam utpādya
SA01yabhkvyu:836_5: ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe maulaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ praviśati. tatrādhigate 'nādarāt. ānupūrviko
SA01yabhkvyu:836_6: hi mauladhyānarthī tasyānadhigatapūrvatvāt. tasmād asti saṃbhavo yad asau maulam
SA01yabhkvyu:836_7: eva praviśati. vītarāgapūrvī tu catuḥsatyadarśanaṃ prati kṛtādaro na dhyānaṃ pratīti
SA01yabhkvyu:836_8: [Tib. 105b] na tatra ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praviśatīty abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:838: ity uktaṃ. tad virodhayati yat tarhi abhidharma uktaṃ. jñānaprasthāne. katibhir indriyair arhattvaṃ prāpnotīti. āha. ekādaśabhir iti. tat kathaṃ na virudhyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:840_0: iti. kasyacid evaikasya pudgalasya saṃbhavo na sarvasya saṃbhavaḥ. yo hi mṛdvindriyaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:840_1: parihāya parihāya sukhasaumanasyopekṣābhiḥ niśrayaviśeṣāt pāryāyikībhir arhattvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:840_2: prāpnuyāt. taṃ praty evam uktaṃ. ekādaśabhir iti. na tu saṃbhavo 'sti sakhasaumanasyopekṣāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:840_3: ekasmiṃ kāle samavadhānam ity arthaḥ. cittacaittānām ekaikadravyotpatteḥ. yo hi kaścin
SA01yabhkvyu:840_4: mṛdvindriyaḥ pudgalo 'nāgamyaṃ anyaṃ vopekṣendriyaniśrayaṃ niśritya arhattvaṃ prāpnuyāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:840_5: tasya tatprāptir upekṣendriyeṇa. tataḥ punar api parihīyate. tataḥ prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:840_6: vā dhyānaṃ niśritya punar arhattvaṃ prāpnuyāt. tasya tatprāptiḥ saumanasyendriyeṇa.
SA01yabhkvyu:840_7: tataḥ punar api parihīyate. tataḥ sa tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya punar arhattvaṃ prāpnuyāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:840_8: tasya tatprāptiḥ sukhendriyeṇa iti. pratyekaṃ tatra phalaprāptau avaśyaṃ navaivendriyāṇi
SA01yabhkvyu:840_10: cānyatamad iti. punaḥpunaḥ prāptes tad ekādaśabhir ity uktaṃ. katham anāgāmino 'py
SA01yabhkvyu:840_11: eṣa prasaṃgo [Tib. 106a] na bhavatīti. kasmāt tatra śāstre 'rhatvaphalam eva ekādaśabhiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:840_12: prāpnotīty uktaṃ. na tūktam anāgāmiphalam apīti. na hy asau parihīṇaḥ kadācit sukhendriyeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:840_13: prāpnotīti. asāv anāgāmī tṛtīyadhyānordhvabhūmilābhāt parihīṇo bhavati. ūrdhvabhūmer
SA01yabhkvyu:841_0: anāgāmiphalāt parihīṇa ity ucyate. evaṃ yāvat. dvitīyadhyānāt. yadā tu prathamāt
SA01yabhkvyu:841_1: parihīṇo bhavati. tadānāgāmiphalāt parihīṇa ity ucyate. paṃcāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇād
SA01yabhkvyu:841_2: dhi anāgāmiphalaṃ vyavasthāpyate. yadā ca sa kāmavairāgyāt parihīṇaḥ. tadā tṛtīyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:841_3: dhyānam asya nāsti. tat kathaṃ sukhendriyeṇānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuyāt. tata āha. na
SA01yabhkvyu:841_4: hy asau parihīṇaḥ kadācit sukhendriyeṇa prāpnotīti. kiṃ. saumanasyendriyeṇa prāpnuyāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:841_5: yata evaṃ sukhendriyasyaiva pratiṣedhaḥ. prāpnuyāt yadi navame vimuktimārge maulaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:841_6: dhyānaṃ praviśet. naitad asti. yo hi parihīṇo bhavet. sa mṛdvindriyaḥ. yaś ca mṛdvindriyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:841_7: sa na śaknoti navame vimuktimārge maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praveṣṭuṃ. tīkṣṇendriyas tu śaknoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:841_8: indriyasaṃcārasya duṣkaratvāt. asty etat. kiṃ tu yady asau mṛdvindriya ānupūrviko
SA01yabhkvyu:841_9: 'nāgāmiphalaṃ prāpya tataś ca parihīṇo bhūtvā indriyasaṃcāraṃ kuryāt. indriyasaṃcāreṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:841_10: ca tīkṣṇendriyo bhūtvā pūrvakeṇaiva krameṇānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuvan yadi navame vimuktimārge
SA01yabhkvyu:841_11: maulaṃ [Tib. 106b] praviśet. tasya tadānāgāmiphalaprāptir aṣṭābhir navabhir vā bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:841_12: śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir manaindriyeṇa upekṣendriyeṇa cānantaryamārgasaṃgṛhītena saumanasyendriyeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:841_13: ca mauladhyānavimuktimārgasaṃgṛhīteneti. lokottareṇa cen maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praviśet.
SA01yabhkvyu:841_14: ebhiś cāṣṭābhir ājñendyiyeṇa ca navamenety avagantavyaṃ. tasmāt sūktaṃ. na hy asau
SA01yabhkvyu:841_15: parihīṇaḥ kadācit sukhendriyeṇa prāpnotīti. vītarāgapūrvī tarhy ekādaśabhis tat prāpnuyāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:841_16: kathaṃ. yo mṛdvindriyaḥ pudgalas tṛtīyadhyānalābhī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam
SA01yabhkvyu:841_17: avakrāmet. sa ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe anāgāmī bhavati. sā tatphalaprāptiḥ. sukhendriyeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:841_18: śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir manaājñāsyāmīndriyājñendriyaiś ceti. sa tato 'nāgāmiphalāt
SA01yabhkvyu:841_19: parihīṇa indriyottāpanena tīkṣṇendriyam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā anāgamyaniśrayeṇaivānāgāmiphalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:841_20: prāpnuvan navame vimuktimārge maulaṃ praviśet. tasya tatphalaprāptiḥ pūrvavad upekṣendriyeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:841_21: saumanasyendriyeṇa ca śraddhādibhiś cāpi paṃcabhir manaindriyeṇa cāṣṭamena lokottaramārgatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:841_22: ājñendriyeṇāpi navameneti. evaṃ dvayoḥ kālayor ekādaśabhir indriyais sa pudgalas

SA01yabhkvyu:892_8: iti. saṃghātaparamāṇur na dravyaparamāṇuḥ. yatra hi pūrvaparabhāgo nāsti. tat sarvarūpāpacitaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:892_9: dravyaṃ dravyaparamāṇur itīṣyate. tasmād viśinaṣṭi saṃghātaḥ paramāṇur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:894: iti. kāmadhātau yadā śabdo 'tra notpadyate. tadā niyatam aṣṭadravyaka eva bhavati nāto nyūnadravyakaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:896_0: iti. aparam indriyam asminn ity aparendriyaḥ. cakṣurādimān ity arthaḥ. yatra hi cakṣuḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:896_1: śrotrādi vā tatra kāyendriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ tatpratibaddhavṛttitvāc cakṣurādīnāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:896_2: saśabdāḥ punar ete paramāṇava ity aṣṭadravyakādayaḥ saṃghātaparamāṇavaḥ saśabdā utpadyamānā
SA01yabhkvyu:896_3: yathākramaṃ nava daśaikādaśadravyakā utpadyante. yo 'ṣṭadravyakaḥ. sa navadravyakaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:896_4: yo navadravyakaḥ. sa daśadravyakaḥ. yo daśadravyakaḥ. sa ekādaśadravyaka iti. asti
SA01yabhkvyu:896_5: hīndriyavinirbhāgī śabdo 'pīti. indriyād vinirbhaktuṃ yo na śakyate. sa indriyāvinirbhāgī
SA01yabhkvyu:896_6: śabdaḥ. indriyāpṛthagvartīty arthaḥ. avinirbhogīti kecid bhuji paṭhanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:897: katham avinirbhāge bhūtānāṃ kaścid eva saṃghātaḥ kaṭhina ityādi. kaṭhinaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ. dravo [Tib. 112b] 'bdhātuḥ. uṣṇas tejodhātuḥ. samudīraṇā (Abhidh-k-vy 124)
SA01yabhkvyu:898_0: vāyudhātuḥ. tulyabhūtasadbhāvāt tulyarūpais tatsaṃghātair bhavitavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:898_1: yad yatra paṭutamam iti vistaraḥ. yad dravyaṃ pṛthivyādilakṣaṇaṃ. yatra saṃghāte
SA01yabhkvyu:898_2: paṭutamaṃ sphuṭatamaṃ prabhāvataḥ śaktito na tu dravyataḥ udbhūtam utpannaṃ. tasya
SA01yabhkvyu:898_3: tatropalabdhiḥ. tasya dravyasya tatra saṃghāta upalabdhir grahaṇaṃ. sūcītūlīkulāpasparśavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:898_4: tatra sūcyo lohamayyaḥ pratītā loke. tūlyo vīraṇādipuṣpamūladaṇḍāḥ. yāḥ siṃkā iti
SA01yabhkvyu:898_5: prākṛtapratītāḥ. tāsāṃ sūcīnāṃ tūlīnāṃ ca kalāpaḥ. tasya sparśaḥ sūcītūlīkalāpasparśaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:898_6: tasya copalabdhiḥ. tasya paṭutamasya prabhāvata udbhūtasya bhūtasyeti. tatra tasyeveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:898_7: anena lakṣaṇena vatiḥ. etad uktaṃ bhavati. yathā tulye 'pi sūcīnāṃ tūlīnāṃ kalāpasadbhāve
SA01yabhkvyu:898_8: tīkṣṇatvāt sūcīnām eva sparśo vyaktam upalabhyate. na tūlīnām atīkṣṇatvāt. tathā
SA01yabhkvyu:898_9: kvacid eva saṃghāte kāṣṭhādike kaṭhinam upalabhyate. kvacid dravaḥ pānīye. kvacid
SA01yabhkvyu:898_10: uṣṇo 'gnau. kvacit samudīraṇā vāyau. na ca tatratatra saṃghāte catvāri mahābhūtāni
SA01yabhkvyu:898_11: na santi. saktulavaṇacūrṇarasavac ca. saktucūrṇānāṃ lavaṇacūrṇānāṃ ca yathā rasasyopalabdhiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:898_12: lavaṇacūrṇarasa eva vyaktam upalabhyate. na tu saktucūrṇarasaḥ. tadvad ihāpīti. saṃgrahadhṛtipaktivyūhanād
SA01yabhkvyu:898_13: iti. saṃgrahakarmaṇābdhātor astitvaṃ gamyate kāṣṭhādike. anyathā pāṃsumuṣṭivat tad
SA01yabhkvyu:898_14: viśīryate. yadi tatrābdhātur na syāt. dhṛtikarmaṇāpsu nauprabhṛtīnāṃ [Tib. 113a]
SA01yabhkvyu:898_15: pṛthivīdhātor astitvaṃ gamyate. paktikarmaṇā tejodhātor astitvaṃ gamyate. yadi hi
SA01yabhkvyu:898_16: tan na syāt kāṣṭhādikaṃ na pūtībhavet. vyūhanakarmaṇā vāyudhātor astitvaṃ gamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:898_17: prasarpaṇaṃ hi tasya na syād vṛddhir vā yadi vāyudhātus tatra na syāt. evam anyatrāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:898_18: yojyaṃ. pratyayalābhe ca satīti vistaraḥ. pratyayānām agnyādīnāṃ lābhe sati kaṭhinādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:898_19: ca dravaṇādibhāvāt. dravaṇaghanatvādibhāvāt. tadyathāgnibhūte sati kkaṭhinasya lohasya
SA01yabhkvyu:898_20: dravaṇaṃ. tena jñāyate lohe 'bdhātur astīti. tathā dravasya śaityādipratyayalābhe
SA01yabhkvyu:898_21: kāṭhinyaṃ. tena jñāyate pṛthivīdhātor atrāstitvam iti. tathā kaṭhinasaṃgharṣād auṣṇyam
SA01yabhkvyu:898_22: upalabhyate. tena tejodhātor atrāstitvaṃ gamyate. iti evaṃ saṃbhavato 'nyatrāpi yojyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:898_23: apsu śaityātiśayād auṣṇyaṃ gamyate ity apara iti bhadantaśrīlātaḥ. yasmād āpaḥ śītāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:898_24: śītatarāḥ śītatamāś ca upalabhyante. tato jñāyate tejasas tatrānyataratamotpatteḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:898_25: śaityātiśayaḥ. tena ca tatra tejo 'stīti gamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:899: avyatibhede 'pīti vistaraḥ. taṃ matam ācāryo dūṣayati. yathā na ca (Abhidh-k-vy 125)
SA01yabhkvyu:900_0: śabdasya dravyāntareṇa vyatibhedo miśrībhāvo 'sti atiśayaś ca bhavati svabhāvabhedāt
SA01yabhkvyu:900_1: paṭuḥ śabdaḥ paṭutaraḥ paṭutama iti. evam ihāpi bhavet. yathā ca vedanāyā na kenacid
SA01yabhkvyu:900_3: tathehapīti. nānena tejo'stitvaṃ gamyate. tā eva hy āpaḥ kāścic chītāḥ kāścic chītatarāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:900_4: kāścic chītatamā iti. bījatas teṣu teṣāṃ bhāvo na svarūpata ity apara iti sautrāntikāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:900_5: bījataḥ śaktitaḥ sāmarthyata ity arthaḥ. na svarūpato na dravyata ity arthaḥ. śaktir
SA01yabhkvyu:900_6: eva hi nānāvidhāsti yayā yogibhir adhimokṣaviśeṣeṇa suvarṇadhātū rūpyadhātus tāmradhātur
SA01yabhkvyu:900_7: ity evamādayo dhātavaḥ kriyante. kasmād ity āha. saṃty asmiṃ dāruskandhe vividhā
SA01yabhkvyu:900_8: dhātava iti vacanāt. dhātuśaktayo hi tatraivaṃ bhagavatoktāḥ. na hi tatrātibahūnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:901: kathaṃ vāyau varṇasadbhāva iti vaibhāṣikān evaṃ codayanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:903_0: iti niyame kathaṃ vāyau varṇo 'stīti nirdhāryate. na hi kathaṃcit tatra varṇa upalabhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:903_1: śraddhānīya eṣo 'rtho nānumānīya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ. paramāptair ayam ukto 'rtha iti
SA01yabhkvyu:903_2: pratyetavyo nārtho 'numānasādhya ity abhiprāyaḥ. saṃsargato gandhagrahaṇād veti.
SA01yabhkvyu:903_3: asti vānumānam iti darśayati. gandhavatā tu dravyeṇa vāyoḥ saṃparkād gandha upalabhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:903_4: sa ca gandho varṇaṃ na vyabhicarati. yatra hi gandhaḥ. tatra varṇena bhavitavyam
SA01yabhkvyu:903_5: iti. atra ca sādhanavacanaṃ. varṇavān vāyur gandhavattvāj [Tib. 114a] jātipuṣpavad iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:906_0: iti vacanāt. tena tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ṣaṭsaptāṣṭā dravyakā iti. tatratyās tatra
SA01yabhkvyu:906_1: bhavāḥ. tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ saṃghātaparamāṇavo 'dhikṛtāḥ. ya ihāṣṭadravyaka ukto
SA01yabhkvyu:906_2: nirindriyo 'śabdaḥ. sa tatra saḍdravyakaḥ. yo navadravyakaḥ kāyendriyā. sa saptadravyakaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:906_3: yo dasadravyako 'parendriyaḥ. so 'ṣṭadravyakaḥ. saśabdakāḥ punar ete saptāṣṭanavadravyakā
SA01yabhkvyu:906_4: ity avagantavyaṃ. uktarūpatvān na punar ucyanta iti. uktakalpatvān na punaḥ sūtryanta ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:907_0: kiṃ punar atra dravyam eva dravyam iti vistaraḥ. mukhyavṛttyā yad dravyaṃ yasya svalakṣaṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:907_1: asti. tad dravyaṃ gṛhyate. āhosvid āyatanaṃ dravyam ity adhikṛtaṃ. āyatanam api hi
SA01yabhkvyu:907_2: dravyam iti śakyate vaktuṃ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇasadbhāvāt. kiṃ cātaḥ. kaś cāto doṣa
SA01yabhkvyu:907_3: ity arthaḥ. yadi dravyam eva dravyaṃ gṛhyate. yadi rūpaparyantalakṣaṇaṃ pṛthivyādiparamāṇudravyaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 126)
SA01yabhkvyu:908_0: gṛhyate. atyalpam idam ucyate. aṣṭadravyaka ityādi. saṃsthānagurutvalaghutvaślakṣṇatvakarkaśatvaśītajighatsāpipāsānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:908_1: saṃbhavato dravyāntarāṇāṃ kvacitkvacit sadbhāvāt. tathā ca sati yo 'ṣṭadravyakaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:908_2: sa navadravyako yāvac caturdaśadravyaka ity aṣṭadravyakaniyamo bhidyate. evaṃ navadravyakādiṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:908_3: yojyaṃ. evaṃrūpadhātāv [Tib. 114b] api ṣaṭsaptāṣṭadravyaniyamabhedo vaktavyaḥ. caturdravyako
SA01yabhkvyu:908_4: hi vaktavya iti. yasmād bhūtāny api pṛthivyādīni spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:910_0: iti vacanāt. tasmāt kāme caturdravyako 'śabdaḥ. rūpaṃ gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:910_1: saśabdas tu paṃcadravyaka iti vaktavyaṃ. yad āśrayabhūtam iti. pṛthivyādīni catvāri.
SA01yabhkvyu:910_2: yad āśrayibhūtam iti. rūpaṃ gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭvyaikadeśaś ca. tad evaṃ saṃsthānasya
SA01yabhkvyu:910_3: rūpe 'ntarbhāvāt. gurutvādīnāṃ ca spraṣṭavya iti. nātyalpam idam ucyate. nāpy atibahu.
SA01yabhkvyu:910_4: āśrayabhūtānāṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanān niḥkṛṣya caturdhā nirdeśāt. evam api bhūyānsīti
SA01yabhkvyu:910_5: vistaraḥ. yad bhūtacatuṣkam āśraya ekasyopādāyarūpasya nīlasya pītasya vā. na tad
SA01yabhkvyu:910_6: evānyasyopādāyarūpasya gandhasya rasasya vāśrayaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. anyad eva bhūtacatuṣkaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:910_7: tasyāśraya iti vaibhāṣikasiddhāntaḥ. tatra punar jātidravyam iti. bhūtacatuṣkajātir
SA01yabhkvyu:910_8: atra gṛhyate. yā hy ekasya bhūtacatuṣkasya jātiḥ. tām anyāni bhūtacatuṣkāni nātikrāmanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:910_9: evaṃ vikalpena vaktum iti. kiṃcid atra dravyam eva dravyaṃ gṛhyate yad āśrayabhūtaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:910_10: kiṃcid atrāyatanadravyaṃ gṛhyate yad āśrayibhūtaṃ. yac caitad āśrayabhūtaṃ. taj jātyā
SA01yabhkvyu:910_11: gṛhyata iti. chandato hi vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ. arthas tu parīkṣya iti. chandata icchātaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:910_12: saṃkṣepavistaravidhānānuvidhāyinyo vācaḥ pravartante. arthas tu tāsāṃ parīkṣyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:910_13: kim evaṃ niyatasahotpādāni [Tib. 115a] tāni bhavanti. na bhavantīti. yogācāracittās
SA01yabhkvyu:910_14: tu saṃghātāvasthāne bhūtānāṃ bhautikānāṃ ca niyamaṃ varṇayanti. katham iti. ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:910_15: asti samudāya ekabhautikas tadyathā śuṣko mṛtpiṇḍaḥ. asti dvibhautikaḥ sa evārdraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:910_16: asti tribhautikaḥ sa evoṣṇaḥ. asti yāvat sarvabhautikaḥ sa evārdra uṣṇaś ca mṛtpiṇḍo
SA01yabhkvyu:910_17: gamanāvasthāyām iti. upādāyarūpe 'pi yad upādāyarūpaṃ yasmin samudāye upalabhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:910_18: tat tatrāstīti veditavyaṃ. asti samudāya ekopādāyarūpikaḥ. tadyathā prabhā. asti
SA01yabhkvyu:910_19: dvyupādāyarūpikaḥ. tadyathā saśabdagandho vāyuḥ. tryupādāyarūpikaḥ. tadyathā dhūmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:910_20: tasya rūpagandhaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣaprabhāvitatvāt. spraṣṭavyaviśeṣaḥ punar atra laghutvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:910_21: veditavyaṃ. caturupādāyarūpikaḥ. tadyathā guḍapiṇḍaḥ. paṃcopādāyarūpikaḥ. tadyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:910_22: sa eva saśabdaḥ. ity evamādy api (Abhidh-k-vy 127) vaktavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:911: (II.24ab) śeṣāṇāṃ vaktavya iti cittacaittānāṃ viprayuktānāṃ ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:913: iti. na cittaṃ caittair vinā utpadyate. nāpi caittā vinā cittenety avadhāryate. na tu sarvaṃ cittaṃ sarvacaittaniyatasahotpādaṃ. nāpi sarvacaittāḥ sarvacittaniyatasahotpādā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:915_0: iti. saṃskṛtalakṣaṇair yad yuktaṃ. tat sarvaṃ taiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇair jātyādibhir
SA01yabhkvyu:915_1: avaśyaṃ sahotpadyate. kiṃ punas tad ity āha. yatkiṃcid utpadyate rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikāś
SA01yabhkvyu:915_2: cittaviprayuktāś ceti. pūrvam eva hy asaṃskṛtaṃ bahiṣkṛtaṃ. tatrāsaṃskṛtaṃ naivotpadyate
SA01yabhkvyu:915_3: iti vacanāt. vikalpārtho vāśabda iti. kiṃcit prāptyā sahotpadyate yat sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:915_4: kiṃcin na yad asattvasaṃkhyātam iti vikalpaḥ. pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhayor
SA01yabhkvyu:915_5: yady api prāptir asti na tu tāv utpadyete iti na tayor grahaṇaṃ. sahotpādananiyamo
SA01yabhkvyu:915_6: hy ayam ārambha iti. asattvasaṃkhyātasya prāptir nāstīti kim atra kāraṇaṃ. sarvasattvasādhāraṇatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:915_7: sahajayaiva ca prāptyā prāptyā prāptimān sahotpadyate. na pūrvapaścātkālajayety avagantavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:916: (II.24cd) gativiṣaya iti. utpattiviṣaya ity arthaḥ. mahābhūmikā iti. mahattvaṃ sarvacittabhavatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:917_0: (II.25) ime kileti. kilaśabdaḥ paramatadyotane. svamataṃ tu chandādayaḥ sarvacetasi
SA01yabhkvyu:917_1: na bhavanti. tathā hy anenaivācāryeṇa paṃcaskandhake likhitaṃ. chandaḥ katamaḥ. abhiprete
SA01yabhkvyu:917_2: vastuni abhilāṣaḥ. adhimokṣaḥ katamaḥ. niścite vastuni tathaivāvadhāraṇam ityādi.
SA01yabhkvyu:917_3: cetanā cittābhisaṃskāra iti. cittapraspandaḥ praspanda [Tib. 116a] iva praspanda
SA01yabhkvyu:917_4: ity arthaḥ. viṣayanimittagrāha iti. viṣayaviśeṣarūpagrāha ity arthaḥ. sparśa indriyaviṣayavijñānasaṃnipātajā
SA01yabhkvyu:917_5: spṛṣṭir iti. indriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ saṃnipātāj jātā spṛṣṭiḥ. spṛṣṭir iva spṛsṭiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:917_6: yadyogād indriyaviṣayaviṣayavijñānāny anyonyaṃ spṛśantīva sa sparśaḥ. dharmapravicaya
SA01yabhkvyu:917_7: iti. pravicinotīti pravicayaḥ. pravicīyante vā anena dharmā iti pravicayaḥ. yena
SA01yabhkvyu:917_8: saṃkīrṇā iva dharmāḥ puṣpāṇīva pravicīyante uccīyanta ity arthaḥ. ime sāsravā ime
SA01yabhkvyu:917_9: 'nāsravāḥ. ime rūpiṇaḥ ime 'rūpiṇa iti. dharmāṇāṃ pravicayaḥ dharmapravicayaḥ. pratītatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:917_10: prajñeti vaktavye ślokabandhānuguṇyena matir iti kārikāyām uktaṃ. smṛtir ālambanasaṃpramoṣa
SA01yabhkvyu:917_11: iti. yadyogād ālambanaṃ na mano vismarati. tac cābhilapatīva. sā smṛtiḥ. manaskāraś (Abhidh-k-vy 128)
SA01yabhkvyu:918_0: cetasa ābhoga iti. ālambane cetasa āvarjanam. avadhāraṇam ity arthaḥ. manasaḥ kāro
SA01yabhkvyu:918_1: manaskāraḥ. mano vā karoti āvarjayatīti manaskāraḥ. adhimuktis tadālambanasya guṇato
SA01yabhkvyu:918_2: 'vadhāraṇam. rucir ity anye. yathāniścayaṃ dhāraṇeti yogācāracittāḥ. samādhiś cittasyaikagrateti.
SA01yabhkvyu:918_3: agram ālambanam ity [Tib. 116b] eko 'rthaḥ. yadyogāc cittaṃ prabandhena ekatrālambane
SA01yabhkvyu:918_4: vartate. sa samādhiḥ. yadi samādhiḥ sarvacetasi bhavati. kim arthaṃ dhyāneṣu yatnaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:919_0: katham ekasmiṃś citte daśānāṃ bhinnalakṣaṇānāṃ caittānām astitvaṃ gamyata iti ata
SA01yabhkvyu:919_1: āha. sūkṣmo hi cittacaittānāṃ viśeṣa iti vistaraḥ. sa eṣa viśeṣaḥ cittacaittānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:919_2: durlakṣyaḥ prabandheṣv api tāvat kiṃ punaḥ kṣaṇeṣu kālaparyantalakṣaṇeṣu. rūpiṇīnām
SA01yabhkvyu:919_3: api oṣadhīnāṃ mūrtānām api kāsāṃcit harītakīprabhṛtīnāṃ bahurasānāṃ ṣaḍrasānām indriyagrāhyā
SA01yabhkvyu:919_4: jihvendriyagrāhyāḥ duravadhārā duḥparicchedā bhavanti. kiṃ punaḥ ye dharmā amūrtā
SA01yabhkvyu:919_5: buddhigrāhyā manovijñānamātragrāhyāḥ. tasmād āptopadiṣṭā iti kṛtvā tathaiva te pratipattavyā ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:920_0: (II.26) śraddhā cetasaḥ prasāda iti. kleśopakleśakaluṣitaṃ cetaḥ śraddhāyogāt prasīdati.
SA01yabhkvyu:920_1: udakaprasādakamaṇiyogād ivodakaṃ. satyaratnakarmaphalābhisaṃpratyaya ity apare iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:920_2: ākāreṇa śraddhānirdeśaḥ. satyeṣu caturṣu ratneṣu ca triṣu karmasu ca śubhāśubheṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:920_3: tatphaleṣu ca iṣṭāniṣṭeṣu saṃty evaitānīty abhisaṃpratyayo 'bhisaṃpratipattiḥ śraddheti.
SA01yabhkvyu:920_4: apramādaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvaneti. bhāvanā nāma kuśalānāṃ [Tib. 117a] pratilambhaniṣevaṇasvabhāvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:922_0: iti vacanāt sā katham apramādo nāma caitasiko bhaviṣyati. yasmin sati sā pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvanā
SA01yabhkvyu:922_1: bhavati. so 'pramādaḥ tātparyalakṣaṇaḥ. ata āha. yā teṣu avahitateti. tad evaṃ sati
SA01yabhkvyu:922_2: bhāvanāhetāv ayaṃ bhāvanopacāraḥ kṛta iti. cetasa ārakṣeti. yaḥ sāṃkleśikebhyaś cittam
SA01yabhkvyu:922_3: ārakṣate. so 'pramāda iti. cittakarmaṇyateti. yadyogāc cittaṃ karmaṇyaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:922_4: sā cittakarmaṇyatā cittalāghavam ity arthaḥ. nanu ca sūtre kāyapraśrabdhir apy ukteti.
SA01yabhkvyu:922_5: kaś ca paryāyo yat praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgadvayaṃ bhavati. asti kāyapraśrabdhir asti
SA01yabhkvyu:922_6: cittapraśrabdhiḥ. tatra yāpi kāyapraśrabdhiḥ. tad api praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgam abhijñāyai
SA01yabhkvyu:922_7: saṃbhodhaye nirvāṇāya saṃvartate. yāpi cittapraśrabdhiḥ. tad api praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṃgam
SA01yabhkvyu:923_0: iti. katham iyam ekaivocyate. praśrabdhiś cittakarmaṇyateti. sā tu yathā kāyikī vedaneti.
SA01yabhkvyu:923_1: yathā cetasy api vedanā paramāṇusaṃcayātmakendriyāśrayatvāt kāyikīty ucyate tatheyam
SA01yabhkvyu:923_2: api praśrabdhir avagantavyā. kathaṃ sā bodhyaṃgeṣu yokṣyata iti asamāhitatvāt paṃcānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:923_3: vijñānakāyānāṃ pṛcchati. tatra tarhīti vistaraḥ. [Tib. 117b] tatra sūtre kāyavaiśāradyam
SA01yabhkvyu:923_4: eva kāyakarmaṇyatā bhūtaviśeṣalakṣaṇā prītyadhyākṛtā. prītamanasaḥ kāraḥ praśrabhyata
SA01yabhkvyu:923_5: iti vacanāt. kathaṃ sā bodhyaṃgam iti. pṛthakkalāpatvāt sāsravatvāc ca na yujyata
SA01yabhkvyu:923_6: ity abhiprāyaḥ. prītiḥ prītisthānīyāś ca dharmāḥ prītisaṃbodhyaṃgam iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:923_7: tīrthikāḥ kila bhagavacchrāvakān evam āhuḥ. śramaṇo bhavanto gautama evam āha. evaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:923_8: yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ paṃca nivaraṇāni prahāya cetasa upakleśakarāṇi prajñādaurbalyakarāṇi
SA01yabhkvyu:923_9: sapta bodhyaṃgāni bhāvayateti. vayam apy evaṃ brūmaḥ. tatrāsmākam śramaṇasya ca gautamasya
SA01yabhkvyu:923_10: ko viśeṣo dharmadeśanāyāḥ. tebhyo bhagavatā etad upadiṣṭaṃ. paṃca santi daśa bhavanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:923_11: daśa santi paṃca vyavasthāpyante. pratighaḥ pratighanimittaṃ ca navāghātavastūni
SA01yabhkvyu:923_12: vyāpādanivaraṇam uktaṃ bhagavatā. tadānukūlyāt. tathā sapta santi caturdaśa bhavanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:923_13: caturdaśa santi sapta vyavasthāpyante. prītiḥ prītinimittaṃ cety anena bhedena. tadānukūlyād
SA01yabhkvyu:923_14: iti. na ca saṃkalpavyāyāmau prajñāsvabhāvāv iti. tayor yathākramaṃ vitarkavīryasvabhāvatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:923_15: na tau prajñāsvabhāvau. yadā ca triskandho mārgaḥ kriyate śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:923_16: prajñāskandha iti. tatra prajñāskandhanirdeśa uktaṃ. prajñāskandhaḥ katamaḥ. samyagdṛṣṭiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:923_17: samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvyāyāma iti. upekṣā [Tib. 118a] cittasamateti. yadyogāc cittaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:923_18: samam anābhoge vartate. sopekṣā saṃskāropekṣā nāma. trividhā hi upekṣā. vedanopekṣā
SA01yabhkvyu:924_0: nanu coktaṃ durjñāna eṣāṃ viśeṣa iti. sūkṣmo hi cittacaittānāṃ viśeṣaḥ. sa eṣa duḥparicchedaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:924_1: pravāheṣv api tāvad ityādi vacanāt. duḥkhena jñāyate durjñānaḥ. asti hi nāma durjñānam
SA01yabhkvyu:924_2: api jñāyate. yad aviruddhaṃ ekasmiṃś cittakṣaṇe dharmāntareṇa sparśādinā. idaṃ tu
SA01yabhkvyu:924_3: khalu atidurjñānaṃ yad virodhe 'py avirodha iti. ābhoganābhogayor ekasmiṃś cittakṣaṇe
SA01yabhkvyu:924_4: avirodho vyavasthāpyata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. na hi viruddhayoḥ sukhaduḥkhayor ekasmiṃś
SA01yabhkvyu:924_5: cittakṣaṇe bhāvo dṛṣṭa iti. anyatrābhoga iti. anyatrālambane ābhogo 'nyatrānābhoga
SA01yabhkvyu:924_6: ity avirodhaḥ. evaṃjātīyakam atrānyad apy āyāsyatīti. virodhajātīyaṃ yathā vitarkavicārau.
SA01yabhkvyu:924_7: tayor hi lakṣaṇaṃ cittaudārikatā vitarkaḥ. cittasūkṣmatā vicāra iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:927: iti vacanāt. tayos tu ekatra citte virodha iti vakṣyate. yas tasya nayaḥ. so 'syapīti. paryāyeṇānayor vṛttir ity abhiprāyaḥ. hrīr apatrāpyaṃ ca paścād vakṣyate iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:929: atra viparyayagrahaṇāt. sa tu prajñātmaka iti. sa tv amohaḥ prajñāsvabhāvaḥ. prajñā ca [Tib. 118b] mahābhūmiketi.
SA01yabhkvyu:931_0: iti vacanāt. nāsau kuśalamahābhūmika evocyate. kiṃ tarhi. akuśalādibhūmiko 'pīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:931_1: aviheṭhaneti. yadyogāt paro na viheṭhyate. sāvihiṃsā vihiṃsāpratipakṣaḥ caitasikaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:931_2: cetaso 'bhyutsāha iti. kuśalakriyāyāṃ yaś cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ. tad vīryaṃ. yas tv
SA01yabhkvyu:931_3: akuśalādikriyāyāṃ cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ. naitad vīryaṃ. kausīdyam eva tat. pravacane
SA01yabhkvyu:931_4: paṭhyate. sīdanātmakatvāt. tathā hy uktaṃ bhagavatā. ito bāhyakānāṃ yad vīryaṃ kausīdyam eva tad iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:934_0: paścād vyākhyāyate. bhāvanāvipakṣo dharma iti. bhāvanāyā abhāvamātrapratipattir mā
SA01yabhkvyu:934_1: bhūd iti bhāvanāvipakṣa ity āha. evaṃ kauśīdyādiṣv api vyākhyeyaṃ. kāyagurutācittaguruteti.
SA01yabhkvyu:934_2: praśrabdhipratipakṣo dharmaḥ. yathā kāyikī vedaneti. yathā vedanā rūpīndriyāśrayatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:934_3: caitasiky api kāyikīti vyākhyātā. tathā kāyikaṃ styānaṃ. paṃcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:934_4: styānaṃ kāyikam ity ucyate. auddhatyaṃ cetaso 'vyupaśama iti. nṛtyagītādiśṛṃgāraveṣālaṃkārakādyauddhatyasaṃniśrayadānakarmakaś caitasiko dharmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:935_0: na cātra styānaṃ paṭhyate ity abhidharme. prāptijño devānāṃ priyo na tv iṣṭijña [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:935_1: 119a] iti. pāṭhaprāmāṇyamātreṇa daśa kleśamahābhūmikāḥ prāptā ity etām eva prāptiṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:935_2: jānīte devānāṃ priyo na tv ācāryāṇām iṣṭim icchāṃ jānīte. ko 'yaṃ devānāṃ priyo nāma.
SA01yabhkvyu:935_3: rjukajātīyo devānāṃ priya ity eke vyācakṣate. aśaṭho hi devānāṃ priyo bhavati. mūrkho
SA01yabhkvyu:936: yo hīśvarāṇām iṣṭaḥ sa na tāḍanena śikṣata
SA01yabhkvyu:937_0: iti mūrkho bhavatīti. yathaivāmoha iti. yathaivamohaḥ kuśalamūlaṃ prajñāsvabhāvatvān
SA01yabhkvyu:937_1: mahābhūmika iti vyavasthāpito na kuśalamahābhūmika evety avadhāryate. tataś ca kuśalamahābhūmikeṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:938_0: 'pi paṃca mahābhūmikatvāt na kleśamahābhūmikā evety avadhāryante. tataś ca ime na
SA01yabhkvyu:938_1: kleśamahābhūmikamadhye paṭhyante. katham ity āha. smṛtir eva hi kliṣṭā muṣitasmṛtitā.
SA01yabhkvyu:938_2: samādhir eva kliṣṭo vikṣepa ity evamādīti. ādiśabdena prajñaiva kliṣṭā asaṃprajanyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:938_3: manaskāra eva kliṣṭo 'yoniśomanaskāraḥ. adhimuktir eva kliṣṭā mithyādhimokṣa iti darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:939_0: ata evocyata iti vistaraḥ. yata evaṃ smṛtyādayo muṣitasmṛtitādayo vyavasthāpyante.
SA01yabhkvyu:939_1: naitadvyatiriktā. ata evocyate catuṣkoṭika iti. ye mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikā
SA01yabhkvyu:939_2: api ta iti kākvāpṛcchati. catuṣkoṭikāḥ. syur mahābhūmikāḥ na kleśamahābhūmikāḥ. [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:939_3: 119b] syuḥ kleśamahābhūmikā na mahābhūmikāḥ. syur mahābhūmikāś ca kleśamahābhūmikāś
SA01yabhkvyu:939_4: ca. syur naiva mahābhūmikā na kleśamahābhūmikāḥ. tṛtīyā smṛtyādaya iti. ye muṣitasmṛtyādayaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:939_5: paṃca yathoktāḥ. ete hi mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikāś ca. caturthī etān ākārāṃ sthāpayitveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:939_6: uktanirmuktā dharmāḥ kuśalamahābhūmikādayaś caitasikā rūpādayaś cānya iti. teṣām
SA01yabhkvyu:939_7: anyathā catuṣkoṭika iti. dvitīyāyāṃ koṭyāṃ vikṣepaḥ prakṣeptavyaḥ. na tu tṛtīyāyām.
SA01yabhkvyu:939_8: ata evaṃ vaktavyaṃ. prathamā koṭiḥ pūrvavat. dvitīyā āśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ avidyā
SA01yabhkvyu:939_9: auddhatyaṃ pramādo vikṣepaś ca. tṛtīyā smṛtyādayaś catvāraḥ. muṣitāsmṛtyasaṃprajanyāyoniśomanaskāramithyādhimokṣā
SA01yabhkvyu:939_10: ity arthaḥ. caturthī pūrvavat. yat tūktaṃ na cātra styānaṃ paṭhyata iti. tān pratibravīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:939_11: styānaṃ punar iṣyata iti vistaraḥ. tasyāpāṭhe kasyāparādha iti. kim asya styānasya
SA01yabhkvyu:939_12: apāṭhe mamāparādhaḥ. kim ābhidhārmikasyeti. abhidharmakārasyāyam aparādho na mamety
SA01yabhkvyu:939_13: abhiprāyaḥ. styānasya sarvakleśasaṃyogitvenābhimatatvāt. evaṃ tv āhur iti. tatra
SA01yabhkvyu:939_14: śāstre styānasyāpāṭhe kāraṇam āhur ābhidhārmikāḥ. kṣiprataraṃ kileti. [Tib. 120a]
SA01yabhkvyu:939_15: kilaśabdo 'saṃbhāvanāyāṃ. kathaṃ hi nāma kliṣṭo dharmaḥ śuklasya samādher anuguṇo
SA01yabhkvyu:939_16: bhaviṣyati. layauddhatye hi samādhiparipaṃthinī. tat kathaṃ paripaṃthy evānuguṇe.
SA01yabhkvyu:939_17: na hy ete jātu sahacariṣṇutāṃ jahīta iti. na hy ete styānauddhatye kadācit sahacaradharmatāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:939_18: tyajata ity arthaḥ. tathāpi yad yasyādhimātram iti. evam api ca styānam auddhatyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:939_19: vā yasya pudgalasyādhimātraṃ. sa pudgalas taccaritaḥ styānacarita auddhatyacārito
SA01yabhkvyu:939_20: vāvagantavyaḥ. kvacid dhi kalāpe kaścid dharma udbhūto bhavatīti. nānyatreti kuśalādiṣu.
SA01yabhkvyu:942: tuśabdo viśeṣaṇe avadhāraṇe vā. akuśala eveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:944_0: iti. parītto 'lpakaḥ. ko 'sau. avidyāmātraṃ. avidyaiva kevalety arthaḥ. tenāvidyāmātreṇeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:944_1: nānyena rāgādinā kleśena. bhāvanāheyeneti. na darśanaheyena. manobhūmikenaiveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:944_2: na paṃcavijñānakāyikena. yasmād ime krodhādaya upakleśā manobhūmikā eva bhavanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:944_3: ato manaḥsaṃprayogāt parīttakleśabhūmikā ucyante. rāgādikalāpe hy avaśyam avidyayā
SA01yabhkvyu:944_4: bhavitavyam iti na parītto rāgādikaḥ. tad evaṃ ye sarvatra caitasike. te mahābhūmikā.
SA01yabhkvyu:944_5: ye kuśala eva. te kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ. [Tib. 120b] ye kliṣṭe nivṛte cākuśale ca. te
SA01yabhkvyu:944_6: kleśamahābhūmikāḥ. yo tv akuśala eva. te 'kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ. ye parīttakleśasaṃprayukte
SA01yabhkvyu:944_7: cetasi. te parīttakleśabhūmikāḥ. eṣāṃ tu nirdeśa upakleśeṣu kariṣyata iti. anuśayanirdeśe.
SA01yabhkvyu:945_0: (II.29-31) anye 'pi cāniyatā iti. ye kadācit kuśale kadācid akuśale kadācid avyākṛte
SA01yabhkvyu:945_2: upakleśāḥ kleśāś ca rāgādāyo 'py aniyatatvena gṛhyante. na hy ete rāgādayaḥ paṃcānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:945_3: prakārāṇām anyatamasmiṃ niyatā bhavanti. na mahābhūmikās sarvatra cetasy abhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:945_4: na kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ kuśalatvayogāt. na kleśamahābhūmikāḥ sarvatra kliṣṭe tadabhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:945_5: na hi sapratighe cetasi rāgo bhavati sarāge ca cetasi pratighaḥ. iti evam anye 'pi
SA01yabhkvyu:947: mānaś ca vicikitsā cety aṣṭāv aniyatāḥ smṛtā
SA01yabhkvyu:948: iti. tad idam aṣṭaniyamavacanaṃ na budhyāmahe. dṛṣṭayo 'pi kasmān nāniyatā iṣyante. na hi sapratighe savicikitse vā citte mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pravartate.
SA01yabhkvyu:951: iti vacanāt. tasmād yadvā tat vedam uktam iti paśyāmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:952_0: kāmāvacaraṃ tāvat paṃcavidham iti. kuśalam ekaṃ. akuśalaṃ dvividham. āveṇikam avidyāmātrasaṃprayuktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:952_1: rāgādyanyakleśasaṃprayuktaṃ ca. avyākṛtam api dvividhaṃ. nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:952_2: anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca vipākajādīni. kukṛtabhāvaḥ kaukṛtyam iti. arthasya kukṛtasya dharmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:952_3: sa tu caitasika iti na saṃbadhyate. tasmād āha. iha tu (Abhidh-k-vy 133)
SA01yabhkvyu:953_0: punaḥ kaukṛtyālambano dharma iti. kiṃsvabhāva ity āha. cetaso vipratisāra iti. yadi
SA01yabhkvyu:953_1: kaukṛtyālambano dharmaḥ kaukṛtyam ucyate. tatsaṃprayuktā apy anye cittacaittāḥ kaukṛtyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:953_2: prāpnuvanti. na prāpnuvanti. teṣām aprādhānyāt. vipratisārāvasthāyāṃ hi kaukṛtylakṣaṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:953_3: caitasikaṃ kaukṛtyākāram udbhūtavṛttikam. anye cittacaittās tadākāreṇānuvartaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:953_4: kasyacid eva hi dharmasya kasmiṃścic cittakalāpe prādhānyam iti varṇayaṃti. śūnyatālambanavimokṣamukhaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:953_6: śūnyatety ucyate. vinīlakavyādhmātakādyaśubhālambanaḥ alobhaḥ aśubhety ucyate. bhāvanāsaṃbaddhatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:953_7: strīliṃganirdeśaḥ. aśubhā bhāvaneti. tathehāpi kaukṛtyālambanaś caitasiko dharmaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:953_8: kaukṛtyam iti. [Tib. 121b] sthānena sthāninām atideśaḥ. sarvo grāma āgata iti. sabhūmikaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:953_9: śālāsamudāyo grāmaḥ. sthāniṣu manuṣyeṣv āgateṣu vaktāro bhavaṃti sarvo grāma āgata
SA01yabhkvyu:953_10: iti. evaṃ sarvo deśa āgata iti. sthānabhūtaṃ ca kaukṛtyaṃ vipratisārasyeti. vipratisārālambanatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:953_11: tasmād yuktas tathānirdeśaḥ. phale vā hetūpacāra iti. hetuḥ kaukṛtyaṃ. phalaṃ vipratisāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:953_12: tasmiṃ phale hetur upacaryate. hetuvācakena śabdena phalam ucyata ity arthaḥ. yathā
SA01yabhkvyu:953_13: ṣaḍ imāni sparśāyatanāni paurāṇaṃ karmeti. pūrvajanmakṛtasya paurāṇasya karmaṇaś
SA01yabhkvyu:953_14: cakṣurādīni ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni phalāni. teṣu yathā karmopacaryate. tadvat. yat tarhy
SA01yabhkvyu:953_15: akṛtālambanaṃ tat kathaṃ kaukṛtyam iti. yad akṛtaṃ. tan na kṛtam iti matvā codayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:953_16: akṛte 'pi kṛtākhyā bhavatīti. akṛte 'py arthe kṛtaśabdaprayogo bhavati. katham ity
SA01yabhkvyu:953_17: āha. na sādhu mayā kṛtam yat. tan na kṛtam iti. kṛtam iva tad iti kṛtvā. yat kuśalam
SA01yabhkvyu:953_18: akṛtvā tapyata iti. yat kuśalaṃ dānādikaṃ akṛtvā tapyate paścāt tāpībhavati. tat
