SA01yabhkvyu:1304_2: ca dharmāṇāṃ jātyādīn. te hi sthāpayiṣyante. satkāyadṛṣṭes tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_3: jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitveti vacanāt. tad evaṃ tāvad anāgato 'nuśayas
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_4: tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca sthāpitād anyat. tad anyat kliṣṭam ity ucyate satkāyadṛṣṭihetukam.
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_5: satkāyadṛṣṭihetur asyeti satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ. sabhāgahetunā sarvatragahetunā cātītapratyutpannasatkāyadṛṣṭihetukatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_6: na tu satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ na hy anāgato dharmaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragahetur vā vyavasthāpyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_7: na ca sahabhūhetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetur vātra saṃbhavati. na hi satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyā
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_8: saha bhavati saṃprayujyate vā. ekasmiṃ kalāpe dvitīyasatkāyadṛṣṭyabhāvāt. na cāpy
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_9: antagrāhadṛṣṭyādibhiḥ saha bhavati saṃprayujyate vā. pṛthakkalāpatvāt. viprayuktās
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_10: teṣām atītapratyutpannānāṃ duḥkhadarśanaheyānāṃ prāptayo jātyādayaś cāsthāpitāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_11: te sthāpitakād anye kliṣṭāś ca. te 'pi sarvatragahetunā pūrvotpannasatkāyadṛṣṭihetukā.
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_12: na tu te satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ. kasmāt. prāptayas tāvad vṛkṣaprapāṭikāvat svasarvatragebhyo
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_13: bahir avasthitatvān na sarvatragā vyavasthāpyante. sarvatragatvābhāvāc ca [Tib. 180b]
SA01yabhkvyu:1304_14: na satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ sarvatragahetuḥ. sarvatragajātyādayo 'py yady api sarvatragā iṣṭāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1305: prāptivarjyāḥ sahabhuvo ye 'py ebhis te 'pi sarvagā
SA01yabhkvyu:1306_0: iti siddhāntavacanāt. na tu te cittacaittavat paścimānāṃ cittacaittānāṃ sarvatragahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1306_2: sarvatragavyavasthānaṃ tu teṣāṃ jātyādīnāṃ svasaṃtānasarvatragahetutvāt. tasmān na
SA01yabhkvyu:1306_3: te satkāyadṛṣṭer hetur iti śāstrārtho lakṣyate. sabhāgahetus tarhi kasmān na bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1306_4: sabhāgahetuvyavasthā hi puruṣakārāpekṣayāpi. yasya hi dharmasya janane yaḥ puruṣakāravān
SA01yabhkvyu:1306_5: dharmaḥ. sa tasya sabhāgahetuḥ. idam eva ca jñāpakaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ sabhāgahetuvyavastheti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1306_6: vibhāṣāyām apy evam uktaṃ. cakṣuś ca cakṣuṣaḥ sabhāgahetur devadattacakṣuṣo devadattacakṣuḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1306_7: sabhāgahetuḥ. dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇasya vāmaṃ vāmasya yāvac cakṣurdravyaṃ cakṣurdravyāntarasya.
SA01yabhkvyu:1306_8: bāhyeṣv api yavo yavasya śāliḥ śāler iti. yadi hi sarvacakṣuḥ sarvasya cakṣuṣaḥ sabhāgahetur
SA01yabhkvyu:1306_9: iṣyetāvyākṛtatvaṃ tulyam iti kṛtvā naivaṃ viśeṣaṇam ucyeta. tasmān na te satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1306_10: sabhāgahetur ity avagantavyaṃ. apare tv āhuḥ. sāvaśeṣam etad bhāṣyaṃ. tasmāt [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:1307: sthāpitā veditavyā. ye hi dharmasya tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca jātyādayaḥ sahabhūhetur bhavanti. taiḥ sārdhaṃ te dharmāḥ pūrvotpannāḥ sarvatragahetuḥ sabhāgahetur vā bhavanto bhavanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1308: prāptivarjyāḥ sahabhuvo ye 'py ebhis ta 'pi sarvagā
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_0: iti siddhāntāt. ata evoktaṃ. satkāyasaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_1: anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitveti. tasmāj jātyādayo 'pi kecit sthāpitāḥ. ato 'nyad asthāpitam
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_2: ity avagantavyaṃ. yuktir iha draṣṭavyā. yato yuktiḥ. tato 'vagantavyaṃ. samudayadarśanaprahātavyā
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_3: api ye sarvatragā atītapratyutpannās tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ vedanādikaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_4: tat sthāpitaṃ. kim anyat samudayadarśanaprahātavyam asthāpitaṃ. ye sarvatragā anāgatās
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_5: tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ vedanādikaṃ. tad asthāpitaṃ. ye 'py asarvatragā rāgādayas
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_6: traiyadhvikā api. yāś ca teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ prāptayaḥ. na te sthāpitāḥ. jātyādayas tv
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_7: ekasmiṃ pakṣe naiva sthāpitāḥ. pakṣāntare tu kecit sthāpitāḥ. kecin na sthāpitāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_8: tad etat sarvam asthāpitaṃ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaṃ [Tib. 181b] sarvatragahetunā
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_9: satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ bhavati. pūrvotpannasatkāyadṛṣṭihetukatvāt. na tu satkāyadṛṣṭer
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_11: ca rāgādīnāṃ tatsahabhuvāṃ ca vedanādīnāṃ jātyādīnāṃ caikasmin pakṣe sarvaprāptīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_13: asthāpitāḥ. te sarvatragahetunā satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāḥ. na tu te satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_15: ca hetur yad etat sthāpitam iti. ye 'tītapratyutpannā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyā daśānuśayās
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_16: tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ yac ca pakṣāntare jātyādikaṃ. tat sabhāgahetunā sarvatragahetunā
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_17: ca pūrvasatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ. ye ca satkāyadṛṣṭijātyādayas tatsaṃprayuktajātyādayaś
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_18: ca. te sahabhūhetunā pūrvoktābhyāṃ ca hetubhyāṃ taddhetukāḥ. ye punaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_19: te saṃprayuktahetunā ca pūrvoktaiś ca hetubhis taddhetukāḥ. satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca tathaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_21: tatsahabhuvaś ca vedanādayo jātyādayaś ca pakṣāntare. te sarvatragahetunaiva satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_22: satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetuḥ. pūrvotpannā hi satkāyadṛṣṭis teṣāṃ hetuḥ. te ca pūrvotpannāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_23: satkāyadṛṣṭer iti. asaṃkliṣṭaṃ tu duḥkhasatyaṃ kuśalam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca na satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1309_24: na ca satkāyadṛṣṭer hetuḥ. paṃcavidhahetutvasambhavāt. janako (Abhidh-k-vy 196)
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_0: hy atra hetur adhikriyate. na kāraṇahetuḥ. sādhāraṇatvāt. vipākahetoś cehāyogaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_1: satkāyadṛṣṭer nivṛtāvyākṛtatvenāvipākatvāt. tatra yad etad uktaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭes tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_2: ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitveti tad virudhyeta. yadi
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_3: hi satkāyadṛṣtisaṃprayuktadharmajātyādayo na sahabhūhetur bhaveyuḥ. na te sthāpyeran.
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_4: ye hi sthāpitāḥ. te satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāḥ. satkāyadṛṣṭeś ca hetur iti. ye tarhi tatsaṃprayuktānām
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_5: ity etan na paṭhanti. teṣāṃ kathaṃ prakaraṇagrantho virudhyetety adhyāhāryaṃ. te
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_6: hi satkāyadṛṣṭer jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitim anityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvety evaṃ paṭhanti. tatsaṃprayukteṣv
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_7: eva tallakṣaṇāni vyāpriyante. na satkāyadṛṣṭau. [Tib. 182b] atas tāni tasyā na sahabhūhetur
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_8: iti teṣām evaṃvādinām abhiprāyaḥ. tair apy etat paṭhitavyam iti. evam apāṭhe doṣa
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_9: ity atas tair etat paraṃ paṭhitavyaṃ. tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ceti. tatsaṃprayuktā hi satkāyadṛṣṭer
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_10: ātmakalpā ekālambanakṛtyādyarthatvāt. tasmād yathā teṣu tatsaṃprayukteṣv etāni lakṣaṇāni
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_11: sahabhūhetuḥ. tathā satkāyadṛṣṭāv apīti vaibhāṣikābhiprāyaḥ. arthato vaivaṃ boddhavyam
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_12: iti. satkāyadṛṣṭigrahaṇena satkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktānām api grahaṇam adhikārānuvṛtter
SA01yabhkvyu:1310_13: vā tair evaṃ boddhavyaṃ. tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ceti. kāśmīrā na bahirdeśakā iti darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_0: sahabhv api tad iti. caittādi. cittasya hi caittās tāni ca lakṣaṇāni sahabhūhetuḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_1: sahabhūni ca tāni bhavanti. dharmasyānulakṣaṇānīti vistaraḥ. dharmasya jātijātyādīni
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_2: sahabhūni. na sahabhūhetunā hetur viprakṛṣṭatvāt. jātyādiṣu hi teṣāṃ vyāpāro na dharme.
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_3: tāni cānyonyaṃ tāni cānulakṣaṇāni anyonyaṃ sahabhūni jātyādiṣu vyāpārāt. na sahabhūhetunā
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_4: hetuḥ. dharmas tu teṣāṃ sahabhūhetur bhavati. prādhānyāt. sa hi rājeva yātrāyāṃ sabhṛtyaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_5: tad bhṛtyavargaṃ sarvaṃ svakalāpam ākarṣann iva pravartate. cittānuparivartyanulakṣanāni
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_6: ceti. cittānuparivartināṃ caittadhyānānāsravasaṃvarāṇām [Tib. 183a] teṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇānām
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_7: anulakṣaṇāni ca tathaiva cittasya sahabhūni. na tu sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ. evaśabdo
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_8: 'rthapradarśanārthaḥ. tāni cānyonyam anuparivartyanulakṣaṇāni sahabhūni. na tu sahabhūhetunā
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_9: hetuḥ. sapratighaṃ copādāyarūpam anyonyam aṣṭadravyakādiṣu paramāṇuṣu rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyātmakaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_10: sahabhūḥ. na tu sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ. sapratighagrahaṇam apratighanirāsārthaṃ. apratighaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_11: hi dhyānānāsravaṃ saṃvararūpaṃ saptavidhavijñaptisvabhāvaṃ parasparaṃ sahabhūḥ. sahabhūhetunā
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_12: ca hetur iti. sarvaṃ ca bhūtair iti. sapratighaṃ cāpratighaṃ copādāyarūpaṃ yathāsvabhūtaiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1311_13: sahabhūḥ. na tu sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ. prāptayaś ca sahajāḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 197)
SA01yabhkvyu:1312_0: prāptimato dharmasya sahotpāde 'pi na sahabhūhetuḥ pūrvaṃpaścātkālajāt prāptīnāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1312_1: asahabhūtvād eva sahabhūhetutvāprasaṃga iti. sahaja iti viśeṣaṇaṃ. kasmād ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:1312_2: anekaphalavipākaniṣyandatvād iti. yasmāt tāsāṃ prāptimatā saha naikaṃ phalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1313: nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca
SA01yabhkvyu:1314_0: iti vacanāt. [Tib. 183b] na cāpy ekaniṣyandaphalaṃ prāptīnāṃ hi prātaya eva niṣyandaphalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1314_1: pṛthaksaṃtānatvāt. cittānuparivartinām evaikaṃ phalaṃ vipākaniṣyandaphalaṃ ceṣyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1314_2: na prāptīnāṃ. na tāś cittaiḥ sahacariṣṇavaḥ sahacaraṇaśīlāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_0: sarvam apy etat syād iti. yat tāvat sahabhūhetunā hetur iti vistareṇa yad uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_1: bījādīnām iti. ādiśabdenāṃkuranālakāṇḍādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ. eṣa nyāyo na dṛṣṭa iti. sahotpannayor
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_2: hetuphalabhāvalakṣaṇo nyāyo na dṛṣṭaḥ. pūrvaṃ hi bījaṃ paścād aṃkuraḥ. pūrvam abhighātaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_3: paścāc chabda iti. tadyathā pradīpaprabhayor aṃkurachāyayoś ca. kiṃ. hetuphalabhāva
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_4: iti vartate. pradīpaḥ saprabha evotpadyate. na niṣprabhaḥ. aṃkurasyātape utpadyamānasyaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_5: chāyā bhavati. atha ca pradīpaḥ prabhāyāḥ sahotpannāyā hetur bhavati chāyāyāś cāṃkuraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_6: tadvat. saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvad iti vistaraḥ. asiddho dṛṣṭānta iti parasyābhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_7: yasmāt pūrvotpannaiva vartisnehādikā sāmagrī saprabhasya pradīpasyotpattau hetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_8: pradīpasya prabhāyāś ca saiva sāmagrī hetuḥ. na tu pradīpaḥ prabhāyā hetur iṣyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_9: evaṃ sacchāyasyāṃkurasyotpattau pūrvotpannaiva sāmagrī bījātapādikā vācyā. niyamata
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_10: iti. yasya dharmasya bhāve yasya dharmasya bhāvo niyamena na yadṛcchayā. sa hetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_11: itaro hetumān kāryadharma [Tib. 184a] ity arthaḥ. sahabhuvāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ. tadyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_12: bhūtānāṃ caturṇāṃ cittacaittānuparivartināṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇānāṃ caikasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1315_13: bhāva ekasya cābhāve sarveṣām abhāva iti yukto hetuphalabhāvaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1316_0: syāt tāvat sahotpannānām iti vistaraḥ. sahotpannānāṃ hetuphalabhāva iṣyate. tadyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:1316_1: cakṣuḥ sahotpannam api cakṣurvijñānena tadutpattau hetur bhavati. parasparaṃ tu kathaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1316_2: na hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ tasya cakṣuṣo hetur bhavatīti. āha. ata eva kāraṇād bhāvābhāvayos
SA01yabhkvyu:1316_3: tadvattvād ity arthaḥ. caittādīnāṃ bhāve cittasya bhāvād abhāve cābhāvāt te 'pi cittasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1316_4: hetavo bhavantīti. evaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. yady ekasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sarveṣāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1319_1: prasaṃgaḥ. anyonyasahabhūhetuprasaṃga ity arthaḥ. bhūtaiś ca sārdham upādāyarūpasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1319_3: ca. cittādibhir iti. atrāpy ādiśabdena cittānuparivartyanulakṣaṇānāṃ ca. cittādibhir
SA01yabhkvyu:1319_4: iti. atrāpy ādiśabdena cittānuparivartibhiś cānyonyahetuprasaṃgaḥ. tenaiva cādiśabdena
SA01yabhkvyu:1319_5: prāptibhiḥ sahajābhiḥ [Tib. 184b] prāptimatām eṣa prasaṃga iti vaktavyaṃ. tridaṇḍānyonyabalāvasthānavad
SA01yabhkvyu:1319_8: evaṃ sahabhuvāṃ cittacaittādīnāṃ hetuphalabhāvaḥ sidhyati. mīmāṃsyaṃ tāvad etad iti
SA01yabhkvyu:1319_9: vistaraḥ. parīkṣyam etat. na siddho 'yaṃ dṛṣṭānta ity abhiprāyaḥ. sahotpannās trayo
SA01yabhkvyu:1319_10: daṇḍās teṣāṃ balaṃ. tena sahotpannabalena kim eṣāṃ daṇḍānām avasthānaṃ. āhosvitpūrvasāmagrīvaśāt
SA01yabhkvyu:1319_12: sahabhāvaḥ. tathaiva paścād api parasparāśritānām utpāda iti. anyad api ca tatra
SA01yabhkvyu:1319_13: kiṃcid bhavati nānyonyabalam eveti darśayati. kiṃ tad ity āha. sūtrakaṃ daṇḍatrayaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1319_14: niveśitaṃ. śaṃkuko vā kīlako vety arthaḥ. pṛthivī vā dhārikādhastāt. eṣām api nāmeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1319_15: eṣām api sahabhuvām anye 'pi sabhāgasarvatragavipākakāraṇahetavaḥ sūtrakādisthānīyā
SA01yabhkvyu:1320_0: (II.53, 54ab) kliṣṭāḥ kliṣṭānām iti. kliṣṭā akuśalā nivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca kliṣṭatvasāmānyena
SA01yabhkvyu:1320_1: sabhāgahetutvam eṣāṃ. tenākuśalā akuśalānāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. nivṛtāvyākṛtā [Tib. 185a]
SA01yabhkvyu:1320_2: nivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ. akuśalā nivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ. nivṛtāvyākṛtāś cākuśalānāṃ sabhāgahetur
SA01yabhkvyu:1321: avyākṛtā avyākṛtānām iti. anivṛtāvyākṛtā anivṛtāvyākṛtānām ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1322_0: rūpam avyākṛtam avyākṛto rūpaskandhaḥ paṃcānāṃ skandhānāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. catvāras
SA01yabhkvyu:1322_1: tu skandhā vedanādayo na rūpasya sabhāgahetur viśiṣṭatvāt. na hi viśiṣṭo nyūnasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1324: iti vacanāt. kuśalākuśalaṃ tu rūpam ābhisaṃskārikatvāt samaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ ceti catvāras tasya sabhāgahetur bhavanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1325_0: kalalaṃ kalalādīnām iti. paṃcagarbhāvasthāḥ kalalārbudapeśīghanapraśākhāvasthāḥ paṃca
SA01yabhkvyu:1325_1: jātāvasthāḥ bālakumārayuvamadhyavṛddhāvasthā ity ete daśa daśānām avasthānāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:1350_0: grahaṇaṃ tarhi kim arthaṃ. ūrdhvabhūmikādharabhūmikayor anyonyam ity evam arthaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1350_1: ūrdhvabhūmiko 'py adharabhūmikayoḥ samaviśiṣṭayoḥ sabhāgahetur bhavati. adharabhūmiko
SA01yabhkvyu:1350_2: 'py ūrdhvabhūmikayor iti. tadyatheti vistaraḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakśāntis tasyā evānāgatāyāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1350_3: sameti kṛtvā sabhāgahetuḥ. viśiṣṭasya ca duḥkhe dharmajñānasya duḥkhe 'nbvayajñānakṣānter
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_0: . na tu nyūnasya. na hi duḥkhe dharmajñānam anāgatāyāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_1: sabhāgahetur bhavati. darśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgās tridvyekeṣām iti. darśanamārgo darśanamārgāntarasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_2: bhāvanāmārgasyāśaikṣamārgasya ca sabhāgahetur iti trayāṇāṃ. bhāvanāmārga bhāvanāmārgāntarasyāśaikṣamārgasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_3: ca sabhāgahetuḥ. na darśanamārgasyeti [Tib. 190b] dvayoḥ. aśaikṣamārgo 'śaikṣamārgāntarasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_4: na darśanamārgabhāvanāmārgayor ity ekasya sabhāgahetuḥ. tatrāpīti. tatra darśanamārgādiṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_6: tikṣṇendriyamārgas tīkṣṇdriyamārgasyaiva. na mṛdvindriyamārgasya nyūnatvāt. evaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_7: bhāvanāmārgo 'śaikṣamārgaś ca vaktavyaḥ. tad darśayann āha. tadyatheti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_8: ekasyāpi mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya ṣaṇmārgāḥ santi. prakṛtitīkṣṇendriyasya trayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_11: cātmīyāṇāṃ yathāyogam utpattyanutpattidharmāṇāṃ ceti ṣaṇṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. śraddhādhimuktamārgaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_13: api trayāṇām iti caturṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. samayavimuktamārgaḥ samayavimuktamārgāntarasyāsamayavimuktamārgasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_14: ceti dvayoḥ sabhāgahetuḥ. na tu śraddhādhimuktamārgaḥ śraddhānusāridharmānusārimārgayor
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_15: hetuḥ pūrvakālīnatvāt darśanamārgasya. bhāvanāmārgasya ca viśiṣṭatvāt. evam anyatrāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_19: na tu dhamānusārimārgaḥ śraddhānusārimārgasya sabhāgahetuḥ. dharmānusārimārgasyendriyato
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_20: viśiṣtatvāt. nāpi śraddhādhimuktamārgasyendriyato viśiṣṭatvāt. nāpi samayavimuktamārgasyendriyato
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_21: viśiṣṭatvāt. samayavimuktamārgas tarhīndriyato viśiṣṭasya dṛṣṭiprāptamārgasya sabhāgahetuḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_22: prāpnoti. na prāpnoti. aśaikṣamārgasaṃgṛhītatvāt. na hi pūrvakālīnaṃ phalaṃ paścātkālīno
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_23: hetur iti. dṛṣṭiprāptamārgaḥ punaḥ samayavimuktamārgasya na sabhāgahetur indriyato
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_24: nyūnatvāt. kathaṃ punar iti vistaraḥ. kathaṃ punar ūrdhvabkūmikasya dvitīyadhyānāt
SA01yabhkvyu:1351_25: prabhṛti yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikasya darśanamārgasya bhāvanāmārgasya vā aśaikṣamārgasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_0: prabhṛti yāvad anāgamyabhūmiko yathāyogaṃ darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārgo vā aśaikṣamārgo
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_1: vā samo vā viśiṣṭo vā bhavati. kathaṃcana bhavitavyaṃ. hīnatvād adharāyā bhūmeḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_2: [Tib. 191b] indriyato hetūpacayataś ca. indriyatas tāvat samo bhavati viśiṣṭo vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_4: śraddhānusārimārgasya samaḥ. ubhayor mṛdvindriyatvāt. tasyaivādharabhūmiko dharmānusārimārgo
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_6: dharmānusārimārgasya samaḥ. evam etāv eva śraddhānusāridharmānusārimārgau caturthadhyānabhūmikāv
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_8: vā viśiṣṭau veti saṃbhavato yojyau. tathā bhāvanāmārge ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_10: tasyaivādharabhūmiko dṛṣṭiprāptamārgo viśiṣṭaḥ. tīkṣṇendriyatvāt. tathā tasyaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_13: samo viśiṣṭo veti yathāyogaṃ yojyam. anayā diśā sarvabhūmayo yojyāḥ kathaṃ hetūpacayataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_14: ūrdhvabhūmikasyādharabhūmiko mārgaḥ samo viśiṣṭo vā bhavatīty ata idam ucyate. tatra
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_16: ūrdhvabhūmikāyā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ adhobhūmikaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ hetūpacayato
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_17: viśiṣṭaṃ bhavati. duḥkhe dharmajñānād apy ūrdhvabhūmikād adharabhūmikā duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntir
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_18: yāvad ūrdhvabhūmikān mārge dharmajñānād adharabhūmikā mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntir hetūpacayato
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_19: viśiṣṭā bhavati. ekaikādhikasabhāgahetūpacitatvāt. darśanamārgād ūrdhvabhūmikād adhobhūmiko
SA01yabhkvyu:1352_20: bhāvanāmārgo hetūpacayato viśiṣṭo bhavati. darśanamārgo hi darśanamārgahetūpacito
SA01yabhkvyu:1353_1: hetūpacayataḥ samānakṣaṇāpekṣayā samo bhavati. evaṃ bhāvanāmārgasya bhāvanāmārgo
SA01yabhkvyu:1353_2: 'śaikṣamārgasyāśaikṣamārga iti. tad evaṃ kaścid indriyataḥ samo bhavati hetūpacayato
SA01yabhkvyu:1353_3: viśiṣṭaḥ saty apy adharabhūmikatve. tadyathā prathamadhyānabhūmikāc chraddhānusārimārgād
SA01yabhkvyu:1353_4: adharabhūmikau śraddhādhimuktasamayavimuktamārgau. kaścid dhetūpacayataḥ samo bhavati
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_1: [Tib. 192b] kaścid indriyato hetūpacayataś ca viśiṣṭaḥ. tadyathā caturthadhyānabhūmikāc
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_3: cottarottare hetūpacitatarā iti. darśanamārgavarjyāḥ. tasmin mṛdumṛdvādyasaṃbhavāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_4: tatra mṛdumṛdoḥ prakārād ūrdhvabhūmikād adharabhūmiko 'pi mṛdumadhyo yāvad adhimātramadhyād
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_5: adhimātrādhimātraḥ samānāsamānakṣaṇāpekṣayā hetūpacayataḥ samo viśiṣṭo vā bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_6: ekaikādhikaprakārahetūpacitatvāt. yad uktaṃ śraddhānusārimārgaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ sabhāgahetur
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_7: iti kathaṃ śraddhānusārimārgo dharmānusārimārgasya sabhāgahetur bhavati. na hi tayor
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_8: ekasaṃtāne saṃmukhībhāvo 'sti. tenāha. yady apy ekasaṃtāne śraddhādharmānusārimārgayor
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_9: asaṃbhavaḥ. utpannas tv anāgatasya hetur iti. asaṃbhavo hy atrāsaṃmukhībhāvaḥ. na
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_10: tv abhāvaḥ. santi hi mṛdvindriyāṇāṃ mṛdvindriyamārgavad ātmīyās tīkṣṇendriyamārgā
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_11: api. dṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktamārgās tu tatsaṃtāne saṃmukhībhaveyur api yadīndriyasaṃcāraḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_14: utpattidharmāṇām anutpattidharmāṇāṃ vā samaviśiṣṭānāṃ sabhāgahetur iti. ācāryavasumitras
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_16: dṛṣṭiprāptamārgasya vā hetur yadā śraddhānusāryādaya indriyāṇi saṃcaranto dharmānusārimārgādīn
SA01yabhkvyu:1354_17: saṃmukhīkurvanti. tad ayuktaṃ. na hi śraddhānusārīndriyāṇi saṃcarati. śraddhādhimuktādayas tu saṃcareyuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1355_0: prāyogikā iti. prayogena nirvṛttāḥ prāyogikāḥ. prāyogikagrahaṇam upapattipratilaṃbhikanirāsārthaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1355_1: kāmāvacarāḥ śrutamayā iti. ye buddhavacanaśrutena niryātāḥ. te śrutamayāḥ. cintāmayāś
SA01yabhkvyu:1355_2: cintāmayānām iti. cintāmayānām eva na śrutamayānāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1357_0: iti vacanāt. bhāvanāmayabhāvād iti. kāmadhātor asamāhitatvāt bhāvanāmayā na santi.
SA01yabhkvyu:1357_1: cintāmayābhāvād iti. yadā hi cintayitum ārabhante. tadaiṣāṃ samādhir evopatiṣṭhata
SA01yabhkvyu:1357_2: iti cintāmayābhāvakāraṇaṃ. teṣām apīti. śrutamayādīnāṃ. mṛdumṛdavaḥ sarveṣām iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1357_3: mṛdumṛdavo mṛdumṛdvantarāṇāṃ samānāṃ mṛdumadhyādīnāṃ cānyeṣām aṣṭānāṃ viśiṣṭānām
SA01yabhkvyu:1357_4: iti sarveṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. mṛdumadhyā aṣṭānāṃ mṛdumṛduprakāram apāsyate 'sya nyūnatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_0: eṣā nītir iti. tadyathā mṛdvadhimātrāḥ saptānāṃ madhyamṛdavaḥ saṇṇāṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrā
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_1: adhimātrādhimātrāntarāṇāṃ ekarūpāṇāṃ sabhāgahetur iti. pūrvān pūrvān apāsya teṣāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_2: teṣāṃ nyūnatvāt. upapattipratilaṃbhikās tu kuśalā iti. upapattyā pratilaṃbha upapattipratilaṃbhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_3: sa eśām astīty upapattipratilaṃbhikāḥ. ata iniṭhanāv iti ṭhan. sarve te nava prakārāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_4: parasparaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. mṛdumṛdūnāṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrāṇām eva. adhimātrādhimātrā
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_5: mṛdumṛdūnāṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrāṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. na samaviśiṣṭānām eva. anābhisaṃskārikatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_6: ābhisaṃskārikasya hi sabhāgahetor nyūnaṃ phalaṃ neṣyate. nānābhisaṃskārikasya. kliṣṭā
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_7: apy evam iti. sarve navaprakārāḥ parasparaṃ sabhāgahetur aprāyatnikatvāt. pūrvotpannāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_8: sarve samānabhūmikānāṃ paścādvartināṃ sarveṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. nātra samaviśiṣṭate
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_9: apekṣyete. te yathākramaṃ catustridvyekeṣāṃ sabhāgahetur iti. vipākajā vipākājādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_10: caturṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ. airyāpathikā airyāpathikādīnāṃ eva trayāṇāṃ. va vipākajānāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_11: teṣām anābhisaṃskārikatvena nyūnatvāt. śailpasthānikā dvayoḥ śailpasthānikanairmāṇikayoḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_12: nairmāṇikā nairmāṇikānām eva. [Tib. 194a] na pūrveṣām. uttareṣām uttareṣām ābhisaṃskārikatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_13: nirmāṇacittam api kāmāvacaraṃ caturdhyānaphalam iti. caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ phalaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānaphalam
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_14: iti catuṣprakāraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ. tad yathākramaṃ catustridvyekeṣāṃ ca
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_18: sabhāgahetuḥ. kā punar atra yuktir yayaivaṃ niyama iti tāṃ yuktiṃ nirdikṣur āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_19: nottaradhyānaphalaṃ adharadhyānaphalasyeti vistaraḥ. na caturthadhyānaphalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_20: nirmāṇacittaṃ prathamadhyānaphalasya kāmāvacarasya nirmāṇacittasya yāvat tṛtīyadhyānadhyānaphalasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_21: kāmāvacarasya nirmāṇacittasya sabhāgahetuḥ. kasmād ity āha. na hy ābhisaṃskārikasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_22: mahāyatnasādhyasya sabhāgahetor hīyamānam amahāyatnasādhyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati. yādṛśena
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_23: hi yatnaviśeṣeṇa prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvat tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niṣpādyate. na tādṛśenaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_24: caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ niṣpādyate. [Tib. 194b] kiṃ tarhi. utkṛṣṭatareṇa yatnaviśeṣeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_25: niṣpādyate. tasmāt phalam asyotkṛṣṭatareṇaiva yatnaviśeṣeṇa niṣpādyate ity avagamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1358_26: tena adharadhyānaphalaṃ uttaradhyānaphalasya sabhāgahetuḥ. na tūttaradhyānaphalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_0: . yathā ca caturthadhyānaphalaṃ yojitaṃ. evaṃ tṛtīyadvitīyadhyānaphalam api yojyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_1: ata evāhur iti. yasmād ābhisaṃskārikasya sabhāgahetor hīyamānaṃ phalaṃ na bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_2: tasmād āhur ity arthaḥ. kim āhur ity āhuḥ. syād utpanna iti vistaraḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānam
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_3: anāsravam utpannam anutpattidharmāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntināṃ na
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_4: hetuḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntibhyo duḥkhe dharmajñānasyābhisaṃskārikatvena viśiṣṭatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_5: evaṃ hi tad viśiṣṭaṃ. yat kleśavisaṃyogaprāptyā saha utpadyate. viśiṣṭaṃ ca nyūnasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_6: na hetuḥ. tadyathārhattvāt parihīṇasya aśaikṣo mārgaḥ pūrvotpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmimārgayoḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_7: paścādutpadyamānayor na sabhāgahetuḥ. syād ekasaṃtānaniyataḥ pūrvapratilabdha iti
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_8: vistaraḥ. anāgatā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayaḥ prathama eva kṣaṇe pratilabdhā ekasaṃtānagatāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_9: duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ dvītiyakṣaṇotpannaṃ. tasya tā na hetuḥ. [Tib. 195a] yasmān na
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_10: pūrvataraṃ phalaṃ. pūrvataraṃ hi duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntibhyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_11: tasyotpannatvāt. tāsāṃ cānutpannatvāt. anāgato vā dharmaḥ yasmān na sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_12: anāgatā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayaḥ aparimitāḥ pratilabdhā eva na tūtpannāḥ. syāt
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_13: pūrvotpanna iti vistaraḥ. pūrvaṃ pratilabdhamātro dharmaḥ pṛṣṭo na tūtpannaḥ anutpannaś
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_14: ca na sabhāgahetur bhavatīti. idānīṃ pūrvotpanno 'pi kim asti na sabhāgahetur iti
SA01yabhkvyu:1359_15: atiśayarūpeṇa pṛcchyate. adhimātro nyūnasyeti. viśiṣṭo nyūnasyety arthaḥ. tadyathottaraphalaparihīṇasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1360_1: vā. yo 'rhattvamārgo 'dhimātraḥ pūrvotpannaḥ. sa paścādutpannasyānāgāmiphalasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1360_2: vā na sabhāgahetuḥ. nyūnatvāt. evam anāgāmiphalaparihīṇasya yo 'nāgāmiphalamārgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1360_3: sa pūrvotpannaḥ paścādutpannasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasya na sabhāgahetuḥ. nyūnatvāt. duḥkhe
SA01yabhkvyu:1360_4: dharmajñānaprāptiś ceti vistaraḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptir yā pūrvotpannā. sā uttarakṣaṇasahotpannānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1360_5: uttaraiḥ kṣaṇair duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇādibhir ā mārge 'nvayajñānakṣānteḥ sahotpannānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1360_6: duḥkhe [Tib. 195b] dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptīnāṃ na sabhāgahetuḥ. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. tāsāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1360_7: nyūnatvāt. tasyāś ca viśiṣṭatvāt. kathaṃ punas tāsāṃ nyūnatvaṃ tasyāś ca viśiṣṭatvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1360_8: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānter duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tadvadhyakleśaprāpter vimuktatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1360_9: hetūpacitataratvāc ca. tasmād dhetūpacitatarābhyo 'pi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāniprāptibhyo
SA01yabhkvyu:1360_10: duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptir viśiṣṭā tāś ca nyūnās tatprāptitvāt. kiṃ ca prathamakṣaṇotpannāyā
SA01yabhkvyu:1360_11: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāpter duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptis tasmād eva hetudvayād (Abhidh-k-vy 209)
SA01yabhkvyu:1361_0: viśiṣṭā. nyūnā ca sā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptiḥ. atas tatpūrvikā apy anyā uttarakṣaṇasahotpannā
SA01yabhkvyu:1361_1: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptayo hetūpacitataratve 'pi nyūnā eveti. tasmān na sā
SA01yabhkvyu:1363_0: iti. tuśabdo 'vadhāraṇe bhinnakramaś ca. cittacaittā eva saṃprayuktakahetur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1363_1: evaṃ satīti vistaraḥ. yadi cittacaittā eva saṃprayuktasahetur ity etāvad ucyate bhinnakālajā
SA01yabhkvyu:1363_2: api bhinnakālajaiḥ saha bhinnasaṃtānajā api ca bhinnasaṃtānajaiḥ saha saṃprayuktakahetuḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1363_3: [Tib. 196a] saṃprasajyate. na hi te kālasaṃtānabhinnā na cittacaittā bhavanti. ekākārālambanās
SA01yabhkvyu:1363_4: tarhīti. yadi cittacaittā ekākārā ekanīlādyākārā ekālambanāś ca ekanīlādyālambanā

SA01yabhkvyu:1381_0: vipākasya hetur iti vistaraḥ. yadi vipāka iti bhāvasādhano ghañ. vipaktir vipāka

SA01yabhkvyu:1382_2: vipāko hi karmaivocyate na vipaktiḥ. karmaṇo vipāka iti cātra bhāvasādhanārtha iṣṭe
SA01yabhkvyu:1382_3: na karmasādhanārtha iti. tasmāt karmaṇo vipāka ity etan na prāpnoti. ubhayathāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:1384_0: iti atroktaṃ vipākahetor jātā vipākajāḥ. madhyapadalopād gorathavad iti bhāvasādhanaparigrahaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1384_1: phalakālaprāptaṃ vā karma vipāka ity ucyate. vipacyata iti kṛtvā. tasmāj jātā vipākajā

SA01yabhkvyu:1387_1: ekaskaṃdhakaḥ. tathaiva sādhāraṇaphalatvāt ekaphalaḥ. asaṃjñisamāpattir api saha

SA01yabhkvyu:1388_1: tajjātyādayaś ca viprayuktā vipākaḥ. [Tib. 200b] tac caitat sarvaṃ dharmāyatanasaṃgṛhītam
SA01yabhkvyu:1388_2: ity ekam āyatanaṃ vipāko vipacyate. yasya manaāyatanaṃ. tasya dve manodharmāyatane.
SA01yabhkvyu:1388_3: tasya hi manaāyatanasya kalāpe avaśyaṃ vedanādayaḥ sahabhuvo jātyādayaś ca vipākarūpā
SA01yabhkvyu:1388_4: bhavaṃti. vedanādijātyādayo dharmāyatanasaṃgṛhītā iti te dve manodharmāyatane vipāko
SA01yabhkvyu:1388_5: vipacyate. evaṃ yasya spraṣṭavyāyatanam iti. tasya spraṣṭavyasyāvaśyaṃ jātyādayas
SA01yabhkvyu:1388_6: saṃtīti dharmāyatanam api vipacyate. na kevalaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanam iti dve āyatane
SA01yabhkvyu:1388_7: tasya vipacyete. yasya kāyāyatanaṃ tasya tṛīṇi. tad eva kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1388_8: ca tadāśrayabhūtacatuṣkaṃ. tasyāvaśyaṃ bhūtacatuṣkāśritatvāt. tasya ca jātyādibhir
SA01yabhkvyu:1388_9: bhavitavyam iti dharmāyatanam api tatra tṛtīyaṃ vipacyate. evam iti vistaraḥ. evaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1388_10: yasya rūpagaṃdharasāyatanānām anyatamad vipākaḥ. tasya trīṇy āyatanāni vipākaḥ. tad
SA01yabhkvyu:1388_11: evāyatanaṃ rūpādīnām anyatamat spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ ca tadāśrayabhūtasvabhāvaṃ dharmāyatanaṃ

SA01yabhkvyu:1388_14: yasyeti vistaraḥ. evaṃ yasya śrotrādīnām [Tib. 201a] anyatamad vipākaḥ. tasyāpi catvāry

SA01yabhkvyu:1390_6: vipacyate. vedanāprabhāvitatvād vipākasyeti. vedanayā 'pi tatra bhavitavyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_7: atrocyate. kṣaṇotpattim etat saṃdhāyoktaṃ. yasmiṃ kṣaṇe ārūpyopapannasya [Tib. 201b]
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_8: vipākajaṃ cittaṃ na samudācarati. tasmin kṣaṇe jīviteṃdriyam eva vipāko vipacyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_9: vipākasya jīviteṃdriyasyaivotpādān manaāyatanasya cāsamudācārād iti kim arthaṃ tatsamudācāre
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_10: manaāyatanam aparaṃ na bhavatīti tasya dve manodharmāyatane iti. tad idaṃ vicāryate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_11: bhavaty evaṃ cāksepakasya karmaṇo jīviteṃdriyaṃ vipāka iti. jīviteṃdriye ca vipacyamāne
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_12: manaāyatanādīny api vipacyaṃte. nāyatanāṃtaravipākaḥ pratiṣidhyate. vipākahetur iha
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_13: ciṃtyate. asti tat karma yasyaikam eva dharmāyatanaṃ vipacyate. nānyad āyatanam ity
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_14: etāvad vivakṣitaṃ. atha mataṃ jīviteṃdriyākṣepakasyaiva karmaṇo manaāyatanādīny api
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_15: vipacyaṃte. naikam āyatanam iti. atra brūmaḥ. tasyaiva karmaṇo 'nye 'pi manaāyatanādayas
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_16: tatra vartamānā vipāko na punar anyasya karmaṇa iti. kiṃ kṛto 'yaṃ niyamaḥ. asti
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_17: hi saṃbhavo yad ekasya karmaṇo nikāyasabhāgo vipākaḥ. 'nyasya jīviteṃdriyaṃ. anyasyaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_18: ca manaāyatanādīni iti. brūyās tvaṃ yathā yasya cakṣurāyatanaṃ. tasya cakṣuḥkāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanānīti
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_19: vacane yasya cakṣurāyatanaṃ vipākaḥ. tasya kāyāyatanam āvaśyakatvāt. evaṃ manaāyatanādīny
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_20: api tasyaiva karmaṇo vipāka iti. [Tib. 202a] tan na. kvacid eva kasyacit pratibaddhavṛttitvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_21: na hi vinā kāyeṃdriyeṇa cakṣuriṃdriyaprādurbhāvo 'sti. asaty api tu vipāke manasi
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_22: jīviteṃdriyaprādurbhāvo 'stīti asamam etat. ācāryasaṃghabhadras tv āha. asti karma
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_23: yasya dharmāyatanam eva vipāko vipacyate. yasya jīviteṃdriyaṃ. yasya cakṣurāyatanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1390_24: tasya paṃca. cakṣuḥkāyarūpaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni. evaṃ yāvaj jihvāyatanaṃ. yasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1391_0: karmaṇo vipāka iti samayāntaram icchati. ayaṃ tv ācāryo na rūpāyatanam avaśyaṃ tasyaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:1391_1: karmaṇo vipāka ity aparaṃ pakṣam avalaṃbate. yasya kāyāyatanaṃ. tasya trīṇi. yasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1391_2: cakṣurāyatanaṃ. tasya catvārīti. na hy anyonyamavinābhāvino jīvitanikāyasabhāgādīny
SA01yabhkvyu:1391_3: āvaśyakam ekasyaiva karmaṇo vipāka ity abhiprāyaḥ. tāv etau pakṣau vibhāṣyakārair
SA01yabhkvyu:1391_4: likhitau. tayor yo yasmai rocate. sa tena parigṛhyate. ity alaṃ prasaṃgena.
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_0: atha kathaṃ kasyacit karmaṇa ekam āyatanaṃ vipāko vipacyate. kasyacid yāvad ekādaśety
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_1: ata āha. vicitrāvicitraphalatvāt karmaṇo bāhyabījavad iti vistaraḥ. padmadāḍimanyagrodhādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_4: ca nyagrodhādayaḥ pādapā jaladharāyamāṇā dṛśyaṃte. kānicid avicitraphalāni. tadyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_5: yavagodhūmādīnāṃ bījāni. ekarūpaphalatvāt. bījadharmataiṣā. ekadhvikasya karmaṇo
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_6: 'tītasya traiyadhviko vipāko vipacyate atītapratyutpannānāgataḥ. na tu dvaiyadhvikasyāpy
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_7: atītasya pratyutpannasya caikādhviko 'nāgataḥ. na tu viparyayād iti. bahukṣaṇikasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_8: karmaṇa ekakṣaṇikaḥ. mā bhūd atinyūnaṃ hetoḥ phalam iti vartate. na ca karmaṇā saha
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_9: vipāko vipacyate. sahotpanne sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetvor vyāpārāt. vipākahetoś ca
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_10: visadṛśapākāpekṣatvāt. nāpy anaṃtaraṃ vipāko vipacyate. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. samanaṃtarapratyayaākṛṣṭatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_11: samanaṃtarakṣaṇasya. yasmāt samanaṃtarakṣaṇaḥ samanaṃtarapratyayabalenākṛṣṭo na vipākahetubalena.
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_12: yady apy asau samanaṃtarapratyayo vipākahetuḥ itthaṃ caitad eva. yasmāt samanaṃtarakṣaṇo
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_13: vipākahetoḥ samanaṃtarapratyayāt kadācit kuṣalaḥ kadācid akuśalaḥ kadācid avyākṛtaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_14: [Tib. 203a] anyathā hi avyākṛta eva syāt. atha vā samanaṃtarakṣaṇasya avipākasvabhāvasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_15: samanaṃtarapratyayākṛṣṭatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ. pravāhāpekṣo hi vipākahetuḥ cittacaittādipravāhe
SA01yabhkvyu:1392_16: sati atikrāṃte vipākahetur vipākaṃ dadyāt. dharmataiṣety abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1393: (II.56ab) uktam eṣām arthato 'dhvaniyama iti. arthata ukto na śabdata ity arthaḥ. dvividhaṃ hi vacanaṃ svaśabdābhitaṃ arthoktaṃ ca. kathaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1398_0: iti vacanāt. sabhāgasarvatragahetū atītapratyutpannāv eva sto nānāgatau. aviśeṣavacanād
SA01yabhkvyu:1398_1: eva sahabhūsaṃprayuktakavipākahetavas traiyadhvikā ity arthata uktāḥ. sabhāgasarvatragahetū
SA01yabhkvyu:1398_2: eva hi pūrvotpannau. pūrvotpannāv eva ca tāv ity avadhāraṇāt. parasparaphalatvavacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1398_3: ciṃtādyakuśalādisvābhāvyāc caiṣām anadhvapatitatvaṃ vyāvartitaṃ. sūtryata iti. sūtraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1398_4: sūtrī vā kriyate sūtryate. uktaṃ cātra kāraṇam iti. katham uktaṃ. [Tib. 203b] niṣyaṃdaphalena
SA01yabhkvyu:1398_5: hi saphalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ. tac cānāgatasyāyuktaṃ pūrvapaścimatābhāvād iti evamādi.
SA01yabhkvyu:1398_6: yac caitat kāraṇam uktaṃ sabhāgahetoḥ. sarvatragahetor apy uktarūpaṃ veditavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1398_7: sabhāgahetukalpo hi sarvatragahetuḥ. sabhāgahetur hi kliṣṭaḥ kliṣṭānāṃ. sarvatragahetur
SA01yabhkvyu:1398_8: api kliṣṭaḥ kliṣṭānām eva. kliṣṭadharmasāmānyakāraṇatvena tv ayaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ pṛthag
SA01yabhkvyu:1398_9: vyavasthāpyata ity uktam etat. sabhāgahetuvad eva cāyaṃ nānāgataḥ. niṣyaṃdaphalena
SA01yabhkvyu:1398_10: ca saphala iti. tadvad evāsya vārttā.
SA01yabhkvyu:1400_0: iti. tryadhvakā eva trayas traya eva tryadhvakā iti avadhāraṇāt. kāraṇahetur anyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:1400_1: bhavati. kathaṃ cānyathā. sarvādhvagaś cadhvavinirmuktaś ceti. svato 'nye hi svabhāvavarjyāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1400_2: sarvadharmāḥ kāraṇahetur iti. ata evam eva bhavati nānyathā.
SA01yabhkvyu:1401: (II.56cd) hetuḥ phalam iti anyonyāpekṣayaitat dvayam ity ataḥ pṛcchati. kiṃ punas tat phalaṃ yasyaitaddhetavaḥ iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1403: iti. ākāśāpratisaṃkhyānirodhavarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ phalam ity uktaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1404_0: evaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. phalatvād asaṃskṛtasya phalam asaṃskṛtam iti kṛtvā [Tib. 204a]
SA01yabhkvyu:1404_1: hetunā svato 'nyenāsya bhavitavyaṃ. yasya hetos tad asaṃskṛta phalaṃ. hetutvāc cāsaṃskṛtasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1404_2: svato 'nyenāsya phalena bhavitavyaṃ. yasya phalasya tad asaṃskṛtaṃ hetuḥ. nsaṃskṛtasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1404_3: te hetuphale. asaṃskṛtaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhalakṣaṇaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ bhavati. na
SA01yabhkvyu:1404_4: ca tasya hetur ajanyatvāt. hetuś ca bhavati saṃskṛtotpādāvighnabhāvāvasthānāt. na
SA01yabhkvyu:1404_5: ca tasya phalaṃ vyavasthāpyate. phalapratigrahaṇadānāsamarthatvāc ca. ata eva ca
SA01yabhkvyu:1404_6: ṣaḍvidhahetvasaṃbhavād iti vistaraḥ. na sahabhūhetur asya saṃprayuktakahetur vā saṃbhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1404_7: tena kasyacid dharmasyāsahabhavatvāt. asaṃprayogāc ca. na sabhāgahetur asya kaścid
SA01yabhkvyu:1404_8: bhavati. asaṃskṛtasyāsadṛśatvāt. samānabhūmitvāyogāc ca. ata eva cāsya na sarvatragahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1405_0: na cāsya vipākahetuḥ. asaṃskṛtasyāvipākasvabhāvatvāt. vipāko hi sattvasaṃkhyāto dhātupatito
SA01yabhkvyu:1405_1: dharmaḥ. anutpādyatvād eva cāsyaite hetavo na bhavaṃti. anutpādyatvād eva cāsya kāraṇahetur
SA01yabhkvyu:1405_2: na bhavati. ata evocyate. kasmān mārgo visaṃyogasya kāraṇahetur neṣyate. yasmāt sa
SA01yabhkvyu:1405_3: utpādāvighnabhāvena vyavasthāpitaḥ. na cāsaṃskṛtam utpattimad iti. anadhvapatitatvāc
SA01yabhkvyu:1405_4: cāsya hetavo na bhavanti. adhvapatitasya hi dharmasya hetur vyavasthāpyate. [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:1405_5: 204b] evaṃ ṣaḍvidhahetvasaṃbhavān nāsaṃskṛtasya hetuḥ. paṃcavidhaphalāsaṃbhavāc ca
SA01yabhkvyu:1405_6: nāsaṃskṛtasya phalaṃ. kasmāt. sāmānyatas tāvad adhvavinirmuktasya phalapratigrahaṇadānāsamarthatvāt. tathā hy uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1406: vartamānāḥ phalaṃ paṃca gṛhṇanti. dvau prayacchataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1407: ity evamādi. kiṃ ca na tāvad adhipatiphalaṃ bhavati. tad dhi sahotpannaṃ paścādutpannaṃ ceṣyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_0: iti. tac cānutpattimad iti nāsya sahajaṃ paścājjātaṃ vā phalaṃ bhavati. anutpattimattvād
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_1: eva. na ca niṣyandaphalam. utpattimato hi sadṛśo dharma utpattimān niṣyandaphalam.
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_2: ata eva ca na puruṣakāraphalaṃ asaṃskṛtasya puruṣakārābhāvāt. yasya hi balena ya
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_3: utpadyate prāpyate vā. sa tasya puruṣakāraphalaṃ. ata eva ca na visaṃyogaphalaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_4: mārgasyaiva hi balena visaṃyogaḥ prāpyaḥ. na cāsaṃskṛto mārga iti. na cāpi vipākaphalaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_5: vipākahetuvaidharmyāt. sāsravo hi vipākahetuḥ. na cāsaṃskṛtaṃ sāsravam iti. atha
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_6: vā paṃcavidhahetuvaidharmyāt paṃcavidhaphalāsaṃbhava iti nāsaṃskṛtasya phalaṃ sambhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_7: yad mārgo visaṃyogasya kāraṇahetur neṣyate kasyedānīṃ tat phalaṃ. hetumatā hi phalena
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_8: bhavitavyaṃ kathaṃ vā kena vā prakāreṇa tat phalaṃ. āha. yat tāvad uktaṃ kasyedānīṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_9: tat phalam iti [Tib. 205a] mārgasya. yad apy uktaṃ kathaṃ vā tat phalam iti phalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_10: tadbalena mārgabalena prāpter ity arthaḥ. atha vaivaṃ padasaṃbandhaḥ. kasya tat phalam
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_11: iti. mārgasya tat phalaṃ. katham vā tat phalam iti. tadbalena prāpter iti. prāptir
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_12: eva tarhi mārgasya phalaṃ prāpnoti. tasyām eva prāptau tasya mārgasya sāmarthyāt
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_13: na visaṃyogaḥ. kiṃ. mārgasya phalam ity adhikṛtaṃ. tatrāsāmarthyād iti. evaṃ tatra
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_14: visaṃyoge mārgasyāsāmarthyād ity arthaḥ. tasmān na ca tāvad asya mārgaḥ kathaṃcid
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_15: api hetuḥ. ṣaṇṇāṃ hetūnām anyatamo 'pi hetur asya mārgo na bhavati. phalaṃ cāsya
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_16: visaṃyogaḥ. prāpyaṃ phalaṃ na janyam ity abhiprāyaḥ. paṃcavidho hi hetur iti kecid
SA01yabhkvyu:1409_17: icchaṃti. kārako jñāpako vyaṃjako dhvaṃsakaḥ prāpakaś ceti. kārako hetur bījam aṃkurasya.
SA01yabhkvyu:1410_0: 'gneḥ. vyaṃjako dīpo ghaṭasya. dhvaṃsako mudgaro ghaṭasya. prāpako ratho deśāṃtaraprāpaṇīyasyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1410_1: tad evaṃ mārgaḥ prāpako 'sya. na janako hetuḥ. prāpyaṃ ca visaṃyogaphalaṃ na janyam
SA01yabhkvyu:1410_2: iti darśitaṃ bhavati. athāsaty adhipatiphala iti vistaraḥ. asaṃskṛtasya yadi phalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1410_3: syāt adhipatiphalaṃ syāt. tasya kāraṇahetutvena vyavasthāpanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1412_0: iti vacanāt tad apy asya [Tib. 205b] nivāritam iti paricchinne codakaḥ pṛcchati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1412_1: athāsaty adhipatiphale katham asaṃskṛtaṃ kāraṇahetuḥ. utpattyanāvaraṇabhāvena kāraṇahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1412_2: utpattyanāvaraṇabhāvavacanāt. saṃskṛtam eva pratīdam asaṃskṛtam kāraṇahetur vyavasthāpyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1412_3: nāsaṃskṛtaṃ pratīti darśitaṃ bhavati. kasmād asya saṃskṛtavat phalaṃ na vyavasthāpyata
SA01yabhkvyu:1412_4: ity ata āha. na cāsya phalam asti. adhvavinirmuktasya phalapratigrahaṇadānāsamarthatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:1412_5: iti. adhvasaṃgṛhītasyaiva hi dharmasya phalapratigrahaṇadānasāmarthyam asti nānyasya. vakṣyati hi
SA01yabhkvyu:1413: vartamānāḥ phalaṃ paṃca gṛhṇanti dvau prayacchata
SA01yabhkvyu:1414: iti. uktaṃ tu paryāyeṇa hetur iti. paryāyeṇoktaṃ na svaśabdenety arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1415_0: te 'py anityā iti. te 'py anityā evety avadhāraṇād arthān na nityo hetur ity uktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1415_1: bhavati. ālaṃbanapratyayo 'pīti. yathā hetavo 'trānityā uktāḥ. evaṃ pratyayā apy
SA01yabhkvyu:1415_2: anityā evoktāḥ ye hetavo ye pratyayā iti vacanāt. tasmād asaṃskṛtam ālaṃbanapratyayo
SA01yabhkvyu:1415_3: na prāpnoti. utpādāyety avadhāraṇād iti. ye hetavo ye pratyayā rūpasyotpādāya. te
SA01yabhkvyu:1415_4: 'py anityāḥ. na tu ye 'nutpādāya. dvividhā hi pratyayāḥ. janakāś cājanakāś ca. ālambanapratyayaś
SA01yabhkvyu:1415_5: cājanakaḥ ālambanamātratvāt. ālambanapratyayo hi nirudhyamāne dharme kāritraṃ karoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1417_0: iti vacanāt. nanu ca hetavo 'pīti vistaraḥ. hetur api janakaś cājanakaś ca. tasmād
SA01yabhkvyu:1417_2: sūtra iti. catasraḥ pratyayatā ity atra sūtre. na tu pratiṣiddhaḥ. dharmatāyā avirodhān
SA01yabhkvyu:1417_3: na doṣa ity abhiprāyaḥ. sūtrāṇi ca bahūny antarhitāni. mūlasaṃgītibhraṃśāt. atrācāryo
SA01yabhkvyu:1417_4: na nirbaṃdhaṃ karoti. dharmatāvirodho nāstīti. kiṃ tu asaṃskṛtam eva vicāryate 'sti
SA01yabhkvyu:1417_5: vā na veti. sarvam evāsaṃskṛtam iti. na kevalaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. rūpavedanādivad
SA01yabhkvyu:1417_6: iti. ādiśabdena saṃjñādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ. yathā rūpād vedanābhāvāntaraṃ vedanāyāś ca
SA01yabhkvyu:1417_7: saṃjñā yāvat saṃskārebhyo vijñānaṃ. tathā na rūpādibhyaḥ paṃcabhyo (Abhidh-k-vy 219)
SA01yabhkvyu:1418_0: 'saṃskṛtaṃ bhāvāntaram asti. ato nāsaṃskṛtaṃ dravyam iti sautrāntikāḥ. spraṣṭavyābhāvamātram
SA01yabhkvyu:1418_1: iti. sapratighadravyābhāvamātram ity arthaḥ. avindanta ity alabhamānāḥ. utpannānuśayajanmanirodhe
SA01yabhkvyu:1418_2: utpannānām anuśayānāṃ janmanaś ca nirodhe pratisaṃkhyābalena prajñābalena anyasyānuśayasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1418_3: janmanaś ca anutpādaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ [Tib. 206b]. tad evaṃ anuśayanirodhaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1418_4: samudayasatya nirodho janmanirodho duḥkhasatyanirodha ity uktaṃ bhavati. sopadhiśeṣanirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇavyavasthāpanārthaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_0: nuśayāḥ. kathaṃ ca teṣāṃ janmanaś ca pratisaṃkhyābalena nirodhaḥ. aṣṭānavater anuśayānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_1: vāsanā 'nuśayaḥ. yasya cānuśayasya yaḥ pratipakṣo mārgaḥ pratisaṃkhyā. tena saha
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_2: prathame kṣaṇe so 'nuśaya utpadyate. tadbalād dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu tasya nirodhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_3: tadbalād eva ca paunarbhavikasya janmanaḥ apratisaṃdhiko nirodhaḥ. tadyathā nikāyasabhāgaśeṣasyeti
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_4: vistaraḥ. nikāyasabhāgo manuṣyatvādilakṣaṇaḥ. ātmabhāvo vā paṃcaskandhalakṣaṇaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_5: tasya śeṣas tallakṣaṇa evotpadyamānaḥ. tasya nikāyasabhāgaśeṣayāntarāmaraṇe āyuṣyaparisamāpta
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_6: eva pratyayavaikalyād yo 'nutpādaḥ. so 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. pratyayavaikalyaṃ punar
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_7: aṃtyānāṃ skaṃdhānāṃ maraṇabhavākhyānāṃ nikāyasabhāgasaṃbandhane yad asāmarthyaṃ upakaraṇādipratyayāsāmagryāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_8: ato 'sau pratisaṃkhyānirodha iti. sopadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥ. duḥkhasyānutpāda iti
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_9: nirvupadhiśeṣaḥ. so 'pi tu duḥkhasyānutpādaḥ. yo 'pratisaṃkhyānirodha ity uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_11: ataḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodha evāsau. svarasaṃ nirodhād iti. svātmanā nirodhān na prajñāsāmarthyenety

SA01yabhkvyu:1419_13: akṛtotpattipratibandhānām iti. akṛte utpattau pratibandha eṣām iti akṛtotpattipratibandhāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1419_14: teṣāṃ. ya utpattipratibandhabhāvaḥ. etad atra pratisaṃkhyāyāḥ sāmarthyaṃ. yadi tarhy

SA01yabhkvyu:1419_20: iti. atītapratyutpannaduḥkhālambanakleśaprahāṇād ity arthaḥ. yo rūpe chandarāga iti.

SA01yabhkvyu:1420_0: ([Tib. 207b] chandarāgaḥ. taṃ prajahīta. chandarāge prahīṇe evaṃ vas tad vijñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1420_1: prahīṇaṃ bhaviṣyate. evaṃ triyadhvikasyāpi duḥkhasyeti. chandarāgaprahāṇam eva rūpādiduḥkhaprahāṇaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1420_2: tasya cānāgatasya chandarāgasyānutpādo bhavati. atas triyadhvikasyāpi duḥkhasya prahāṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1420_3: yujyata iti darśayati. eṣa eva naya iti. yady atītānāgatapratyutpannasya kleśasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1420_4: prahāṇāyeti pāṭhaḥ. tatrāpy eṣa eva naya iti. yaḥ kleśe rāge dveṣe vā chandarāgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1420_5: taṃ prajahīteti vistaraḥ. tadālambanakleśaprahāṇād api kleśasya prahāṇaṃ. na svabhāvata
SA01yabhkvyu:1420_6: eveti traiyadhvikasyāpi kleśasya prahāṇaṃ yujyate ity arthaḥ. atha veti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1420_7: pūrvajanmani bhavaḥ paurvajanmikaḥ. ihajanmani bhava aihajanmikaḥ. tad evam aikakṣaṇikaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:1420_8: kleśaḥ paryudasto bhavati. katham etat pratyetavyaṃ. paurvajanmikaḥ sarvakleśaḥ sambadhyate
SA01yabhkvyu:1420_9: aihajanmikaś ca. na punar aikakṣaṇika ity ata āha. yathā tṛṣṇā vicariteṣv iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_0: anyatrāpy evaṃ darśanāt evaṃ pratyetavyaṃ. aṣṭādaśa tṛṣṇāvicaritāni katham atīte
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_1: 'dhvani ekasmiṃ kṣaṇe yojyaṃta iti ato 'tītaṃ janmādhikṛtyoktaṃ. aṣṭādaśa tṛṣṇāvicaritāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_2: asmīti bhikṣavaḥ satīttham asmīti [Tib. 208a] bhavati. evam asmīti anyathāsmīti sad
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_3: asmīti asad asmīti bhavati. bhaviṣyāmīty asya bhavati. na bhaviṣyāmītthaṃ bhaviṣyāmi
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_4: evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi anyathā bhaviṣyāmīty asya bhavati. syām ity asya bhavati. itthaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_5: syām evaṃ syāṃ anyathā syām ity asya bhavati. api syām ity asya bhavati. apītthaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_6: syām apy evaṃ syām apy anyathā syām ity asya bhavati. evaṃ yāvat pratyutpannaṃ. tathehāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_7: paurvajanmikaḥ kṛtsnaḥ kleśapravāhaḥ ajhajanmikaś ca saṃbadhyate naikakṣaṇika iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_8: tad evaṃ prasādhyatābhiprāyaṃ bravīti. tena ca kleśadvayeneti vistaraḥ. paurvajanmikenaihajanmikena
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_9: ceti kleśadvayenāsyāṃ saṃtatau pratyutpannāyāṃ bījabhāvo vāsanālakṣaṇaṃ sāmarthyam
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_10: āhito 'nāgate 'syotpattaye. tasya bījabhāvasya prahāṇāt tad api kleśadvayaṃ prahīṇaṃ

SA01yabhkvyu:1421_18: asatām ākāśādīnām asaṃskṛtānām asann asaṃskṛto virāgo 'gro bhavitum arhatīti. asyottaraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1421_19: bravīti. abhāvo 'pi kaścid iti vistaraḥ. dvitīyasya ceti. dvitīyasya samudayasatyasyānaṃtaraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1422_0: (Abhidh-k-vy 221) dṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃ prajñayā uddiṣṭaṃ parebhyo deśanayā trayāṇāṃ pūraṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:1422_1: tṛtīyaṃ bhavati. kiṃ syād iti. ko dośaḥ syād ity arthaḥ. kiṃ ca punaḥ syād iti. ko
SA01yabhkvyu:1422_2: guṇaḥ syād ity arthaḥ. kiṃ ca punaḥ syād iti guṇaparipraśna āha. vaibhāṣikapakṣaḥ

SA01yabhkvyu:1422_4: syād iti. doṣaḥ syād ity arthaḥ. rūpavedanādivad iti. pratyakṣataḥ. [Tib. 209a] cakṣurādivad
SA01yabhkvyu:1422_5: iti. karmato numānata ity arthaḥ. asakṛdvyākhyātam etat. vastuna iti. rāgādivastunaḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:1422_9: nānyasyeti tasmiṃ prāptiniyame ko hetuḥ. na hi nirodhasya prāptyā sardhaṃ kaścit
SA01yabhkvyu:1422_11: ity arthaḥ. yady abhāvaḥ katham asya prāptiḥ syāt. pratipakṣalābheneti vistaraḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:1422_16: adhikaraṇasādhanam [Tib. 209b] iti darśayanti. na tu aprādurbhūtir aprādurbhāva iti

SA01yabhkvyu:1422_18: parikalpyate. tasmiṃ sati mārge prāpte vā duḥkhasyeṣyatām aprādurbhāvaḥ. kim anyena

SA01yabhkvyu:1422_20: yathāvastu yathālambanaṃ. saṃyogasya vastu yatra kleśena saṃyujyate. sa vastukā dharmā
SA01yabhkvyu:1422_21: iti sahetukāḥ. parigrahavastu parigṛhyata iti parigrahaḥ. sa eva vastu parigrahavastu.

SA01yabhkvyu:1435_2: na vyatiriktaḥ. puruṣakarmaiva hi puruṣakāro na puruṣād anyaḥ. na hi karma karmavadbhyo
