SA01yabhkvyu:3444_10: spaṅ bar bya bar nams kyi ni ma yin te. ṣes bya ba ni ciḥi phyir gzugs daṅ gzugs
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_11: med pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya bar nams kyi yoṇs su śes pa so sor mi
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_12: bstan te. de bṣin du gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya bar
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_13: nams spaṅs pa yaṅ yoṅs su śes pa gsum yin te. ṣe ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro. bsgom pa spaṅ
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_14: bar bya bar nams kyi gñen po mi ḥdra baḥi phyir ro ṣes bya ba ni ḥdi ltar sa daṅ
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_15: sa na gzugs na spyod [Tib. 165b] paḥi bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya ba rnam pa dguḥi gñen
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_16: po bar chad med pa daṅ rnam par grol baḥi lam zag pa med pa mi lcogs pa med pa la
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_17: sogs paḥi sa daṅ zag pa daṅ bcas pa bsam gtan gñis paḥi ñer ba stogs kyis bsdus pa
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_18: nas nam mkhaḥ mthaḥ yas skye mched kyi ñer bsdogs kyis bsdus paḥi bar rnam pa dgu
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_19: yod la gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi gñen po bar chad med paḥi lam daṅ. rnam
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_20: par grol baḥi lam in ci rigs par zug pa med paḥi sa ḥog ma pa ḥam. ci rigs par zag
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_21: pa daṅ bcas pa goṅ maḥi ñer bsdogs kyis bsdus pa dag yod de. gṣan kho na yin pas
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_22: gñen po mi ḥdra baḥi phyir ḥdi dag gis yoṅs su 'śes pa tha dad par stan to. mthoṅ
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_23: bas spaṅ bar bya ba rnams kyi gñen po ni ḥdra ste. rjes su śes paḥi bzod pa la sogs
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_24: pa gzugs na spyod par nams kyi gñen po de dag ñid gzugs med par nams kyi yaṅ yin
SA01yabhkvyu:3444_25: pas yoṅs su śes pa tha tad du rnam par mi bṣag go.
SA01yabhkvyu:3446_0: (V.64-66) tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa la sogs pa yoṅs su śes pa ste ṣes bya
SA01yabhkvyu:3446_1: ba ni tha maḥi cha daṅ ṃthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ. gzugs kyi ḥdod chags
SA01yabhkvyu:3446_2: zad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ. kuntu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su gtugs paḥi yoṅs su
SA01yabhkvyu:3446_3: śes paḥo. ḥdi dag ni bsgom paḥi lam gyi ḥbras bu yin paḥi phyir śes paḥi ḥbras bu
SA01yabhkvyu:3446_4: yin te. bsgom paḥi lam la bzod pa dag ni med do.
SA01yabhkvyu:3447_0: ji ltar yoṅs su śes pa bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yin ṣes bya ba ni yoṅs su śes pa daṅ śes
SA01yabhkvyu:3447_1: pa ṣes bya ba don gcig ste. śes pa daṅ yoṅs su śes pa ni zag pa med paḥi ye śes yin
SA01yabhkvyu:3447_2: no ṣes ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro. bam po bṣi bcu rtsa bṣi pa.
SA01yabhkvyu:3448: dri med bzod rnams śes pa med.
SA01yabhkvyu:3449_0: ṣas ḥbyuṅ bas bzod pa ni śes paḥi ṅo bo [Tib. 166a] ñid yin par yaṅ mi ruṅ na. de
SA01yabhkvyu:3449_1: ji ltar yoṅs su śes pa bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yin te. ḥbras bu la rgyu btags byas na
SA01yabhkvyu:3449_2: yaṅ mi ruṅ ṅo sñam du bsam pa yin no. ḥdir bzod pa rnams ni śes paḥi ḥkhor can yin
SA01yabhkvyu:3449_3: paḥi phyir ṣes bya ba smos te. ḥdi dag la ḥkhor śes pa yod pas na śes paḥi ḥkhor
SA01yabhkvyu:3449_4: can te. bzod par nams so. deḥi phyir śes paḥi ḥbras bu yaṅ bzod par nams kyi ḥbras
SA01yabhkvyu:3449_5: bu ṣes byaḥo. rgyal baḥi ḥkhor la rgyal po ñe bar btags pa bṣin te dper na rgyal
SA01yabhkvyu:3449_6: poḥi ḥkhor la rgyal po ñe bar btags paḥi phyir ḥkhor gyis byas pa la yaṅ rgyal pos
SA01yabhkvyu:3449_7: byas pa ṣes byaa daṅ ḥdra ḥo. śes pa daṅ ḥbras bu gcig phyir ro ṣes bya ba ni bzod
SA01yabhkvyu:3449_8: pa dag ni śes pa daṅ lhan cig ḥbras bu gcig pa yin te. bzod pa dag gi ḥbras bu gaṅ
SA01yabhkvyu:3449_9: yin pa de ñid śes rnams kyi yin pas bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yaṅ yoṅs su śes par ruṅ ṅo.
SA01yabhkvyu:3450: mi lcogs med ḥbras thams cad do
SA01yabhkvyu:3451: ṣes bya ba ni ḥdi ltar mi lcogs paḥi sa paḥi lam gyis khams gsum paḥi mthoṅ ba daṅ bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya baḥi zag pa rnams spaṅ ba srid de.
SA01yabhkvyu:3452: zag med mi lcogs med pa yis. thams cad las ni ḥdod chags bral.
SA01yabhkvyu:3453_0: ṣes ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro. gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na ñon moṅs pa spaṅs paḥi raṅ bṣin
SA01yabhkvyu:3453_1: gaṅ dag yin paḥo. ṣes bya ba ni bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gzugs daṅ gzugs med
SA01yabhkvyu:3453_2: pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba rnams spaṅs pa ji skad bśad paḥi yoṅs
SA01yabhkvyu:3453_3: su śes pa gsum daṅ. bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya ba gzugs na spyod pa rnams spaṅs pa gzugs
SA01yabhkvyu:3453_4: kyi ḥdod chags zad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams spaṅs pa
SA01yabhkvyu:3453_5: kun tu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su gtugs paḥi [Tib. 166b] yoṅs su śes pa ṣes bya ba
SA01yabhkvyu:3453_6: lṅa ste. bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi la brten nas gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod paḥi
SA01yabhkvyu:3453_7: ñon moṅs pa spoṅ ba srid paḥi phyir ro. ḥdod pa na spyod paḥi ñon moṅs pa spaṅs pa
SA01yabhkvyu:3453_8: ni bsam gtan gi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin te. bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi rnams ni ḥdod
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_0: khams kyi gñen po ma yin paḥi phyir ro. de lta bas na ḥdod chags daṅ bral ba rnams
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_1: la bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa yod du zin kyaṅ tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_2: paḥi yoṅs su śes pa bṣin du ḥdod pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_3: ni bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin no ṣes zer ro. btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_4: kyi lugs kyis ni brgyad de. ṣes bya ba ni btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs de ni ḥdod paḥi
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_5: ḥdod chags daṅ bral baḥi gaṅ zag gi yaṅ ḥdod pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_6: ba rnams spaṅ spa yoṅs su śes pa gsum gyi ṅo bo ñid ḥphag paḥi lam gyi ḥbras bu yin
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_7: par ḥdod do. ciḥi phyir ṣe na. bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa rñed paḥi phyir te.
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_8: bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi la rten nas ṅes pa ḥjug pa na yaṅ ma thoṅ bas spaṅ bas spaṅ
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_9: bar bya baḥi zag pa sṅon ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis spaṅs pa rnams kyis bral baḥi thob
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_10: pa zag pa med pa yaṅ ḥthob la de la na mthoṅ baḥi lam gyis nus pa yod pas gzugs daṅ
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_11: gzugs med pa ba spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa bṣin du. ḥdod pa na
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_12: spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba sṅon spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa yaṅ dṅos gṣi
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_13: bsam gtan gyi ḥbras buḥo ṣes bya bar rnam pa bṣag go. de lta ba sna ḥdod pa na spyod
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_14: paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa gsum po ḥdi dga daṅ sṅar
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_15: bśad pa gzugs daṅ gzugs med paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ bcas pa yoṅs su śes pa brgyad
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_16: bsam gtan gyi ḥbras bu yin [Tib. 167a] no. śes bya ba ni btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs kyi
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_17: gṣuṅ lugs yin no. tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa ni mi lcogs
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_18: pa med paḥi ḥbras bu kho na yin no. ṣes bya ba ni ḥdod pa las ḥdod chags ma bral
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_19: ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa kho nas tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spoṅ bar byed kyi dṅos
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_20: gṣis ni ma yin te. de na ma thob paḥi phyir ro. ḥdod chags daṅ bral ba ston du ḥgro
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_21: ba yaṅ gaṅ gi tshe bsam gtan la brten nas ñes pa la des kyaṅ so soḥi skye boḥi snas
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_22: skabs na ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis ḥdod pa na spyad paḥi ñon moṅs pa thams cad spaṅs
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_23: pas de bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin no. sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_24: la deḥi tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa yoṅs su śes pa bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_25: la brten par yaṅ rnam par bṣag mod kyi deḥi ḥbras bu ṣes bya bar rnam par bṣag pa
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_26: ni ma yin no. ḥo na ci ṣe na. gnas skabs de na tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_27: ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis thob paḥi bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa yaṅ ḥthob pas de
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_28: spaṅ spaḥi yoṅs su śes par rnam par bṣag ste. deḥi tshe ni mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_29: ba sṅa ma spaṅs pas sṅar mthoṅ baḥi lam gyis spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa gaṅ yin pa
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_30: daṅ. sṅar spaṅs pa tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa bsdoms nas tha maḥi cha daṅ
SA01yabhkvyu:3454_31: mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa gcig tu rnam par bṣag ste.
SA01yabhkvyu:3456_0: khams las ḥdod chags bral ba daṅ ḥbras bu thob phyir de dag bsdoms ṣes thams cad
SA01yabhkvyu:3456_1: bsdoms paḥi gtan tshigs yod paḥi phyir ro. de lta bas na tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa
SA01yabhkvyu:3456_2: spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa de ni mi lcogs pa med paḥi ḥbras bu kho nar rnam pa bṣag
SA01yabhkvyu:3456_3: gi. dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ni ma [Tib. 167b] yin te. ḥdi la ni bye brag tu smra ba daṅ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3456_4: btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs kyi gṣuṅ lugs mthun no.
SA01yabhkvyu:3457_0: bsam gtan khyad par can yaṅ bsams bṣin du blta bar byaḥo ṣes bya ba ni bsam gtan
SA01yabhkvyu:3457_1: khyad par can gyi zag pa med pas kyaṅ ñon moṅs pa spoṅ bar ḥgyur te. de lta bas na
SA01yabhkvyu:3457_2: mi lcogs pa med pa daṅ. dṅos gṣiḥi bsam gtan rnams kho naḥi ḥbras bu kho na bśad
SA01yabhkvyu:3457_3: kyi. bsam gtan khyad par can gyi ni ma yin no. deḥi phyir bsam gtan khyad par can
SA01yabhkvyu:3457_4: yaṅ bsam gtan bṣin du blta bar byaḥo ṣes bya ba smos te. bsam gtan khyad par can
SA01yabhkvyu:3457_5: ni bsam gtan daṅ po kho na rtog pa daṅ bral bas khyad par du ḥphags paḥi phyir ro.
SA01yabhkvyu:3457_6: [nam mkhaḥ mthaḥ yas skye mched kyi ñer bsdogs kyi ṣes ba ba ni.] dhyānāṃtaraṃ bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3457_7: ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasāmaṃtakasyeti. laukikasyāpi tasya parijñā phalaṃ vyavasthāpyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3466: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpathe
SA01yabhkvyu:3468: iti. tasya paścimās tisraḥ phalam avarabhāgīyaprahāṇarūparāgakṣayasarvasaṃyojanaparyādānaparijñāḥ. kasmād ity āha. [Tib. 168a] traidhātukabhāvanāheyapratipakṣatvād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3470: tayor dharmajñānānvayajñānayoḥ pakṣasya. ṣaṭ paṃca ca yathāyogaṃ pakṣagrahaṇena kṣāṃtijñānayor grahaṇaṃ. yā eva dharmajñānakṣāṃtijñānānām (Abhidh-k-vy 508)
SA01yabhkvyu:3471_0: iti. dharmajñānakṣāṃtīnāṃ dharmajñānānāṃ ceti samāsaḥ. dharmajñānakṣāṃtīnāṃ kāmāvacaradarśanaheyaprahāṇasvabhāvā
SA01yabhkvyu:3471_1: yathoktas tisraḥ parijñāḥ phalaṃ. dharmajñānānām iti bhāvanāmārge. duḥkhasamudayajñānasaṃgṛhītānām
SA01yabhkvyu:3471_3: yā evānvayakṣāṃtijñānānām iti. anvayajñānakṣāṃtīnāṃ anvayajñānānāṃ ca. tāś ca rūpārūpyāvacaradarśanaheyaprahāṇasvabhāvā
SA01yabhkvyu:3471_4: yathoktās tisraḥ parijñāḥ dve ca paścime iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3472: (V.67) kasmān naikaikaṃ prahāṇam iti. duḥkhadarśanaheyaprahāṇasamudayadarśanaheyaprahāṇaṃ vistareṇa yāvad bhāvāgrikasya mṛdumṛdoḥ prakārasya prahāṇam iti kasmān na gṛhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3480_0: ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ tatprahāṇam ity atra parijñeti vyavasthāpyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3480_1: anyeṣu dharmānvayajñāneṣv iti. samudayadharmajñānam ārabhya yāvat kṣayajñānam ity
SA01yabhkvyu:3480_2: eteṣu dharmajñānānvayajñāneṣu. jñānaphalaṃ tu prahāṇam iti. bhāvanāmārge. tad dhi
SA01yabhkvyu:3482_0: iti. caśabdo luptanirdiṣṭaḥ. dhātvatikramāc ceti. ata eva vivriyate caturthāc ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3482_1: yadā dhātuṃ samatikrāmatīti. kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātuṃ vā samatikrāmati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3482_2: tadā parijñākhyāṃ labhata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ. kasmāt. kṛtsnadhātuvairāgyāt. kṛtsnasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3482_3: dhātor vairāgyāt. na vikalīkaraṇamātratvāt. tadā hi suṣṭhu prahāṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3483_1: tasmād visaṃyoga ubhayasaṃyogavisaṃyogaḥ. tat paṃcamaṃ kāraṇam āhur ābhidhārmikāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3483_2: [Tib. 169a] anena ca kāraṇena prahāṇaṃ parijñety ucyata iti. yaḥ prakāraḥ prahīṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3483_3: iti duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo yāvaṃ mārgadarśanaprahātavyo bhāvanāprahātavyaś ca. yadi
SA01yabhkvyu:3484_0: prakāre anyena tadālaṃbanena kleśena darśanaprahātavyena bhāvanāprahātavyena visaṃyukto
SA01yabhkvyu:3484_1: bhavati. evam idam api paṃcamaṃ kāraṇaṃ prahāṇasya parijñāvidhāne āhur apare. sa
SA01yabhkvyu:3484_2: tu nānyad iti vistaraḥ. sa tūbhayasaṃyoga ubhayahetusamudghātāt duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3484_3: samudayadarśanaprahātavyasya ca sarvatragahetoḥ samudghātād dhātusamatikramāc ca
SA01yabhkvyu:3484_4: nānyaḥ. tathā hi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyeṣu prahīṇeṣv api na tāvad asti hetudvayasamudghāto
SA01yabhkvyu:3484_5: yāvat tadālaṃbanaḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaḥ sarvatragahetur aprahīṇo bhavati. bhāvanāprahātavyeṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:3484_6: ca prahīṇeṣv api yāvad aṣṭāsu prakāreṣu na tāvad dhātvatikramo 'sti yāvan na navamasyāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:3484_7: prakārasya prahāṇam ity ato na punar brūmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3486_0: vistaraḥ. pṛthagjanas tāvan naiva samanvāgataḥ. anāsravavisaṃyogaprāptyabhāvāt. āryo
SA01yabhkvyu:3486_2: samudayadharmajñānakṣāṃtau ca naiva samanvāgataḥ. hetudvayasyāprahīṇatvāt. samudayadharmajñāna
SA01yabhkvyu:3486_3: ekayā samanvāgataḥ samudayānvayajñānakṣāṃtāv apy ekayaiva samanvāgata ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3486_6: api dvābhyām eva. nirodhadharmajñāne tisṛbhir iti neyaṃ. yāvat paṃcabhir darśanāsthaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3486_7: samanvāgato na ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣoḍaśasya kṣaṇasya bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītatvāt. mārgānvayajñāne
SA01yabhkvyu:3486_8: ṣaḍbhir iti. pūrvoktābhiś ca rūpārūpyāvacaramārgadarśanaprahāṇaparijñayā ca. nanu ca paścād vakṣyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3490_0: bhavati prahāṇasaṃkalanaṃ. na tu parijñāsaṃkalanam ity avirodhaḥ. yāvat kāmavairāgyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3490_1: na prāpta iti. yāvacchabdena bhāvanāheyakleśaprathamaprakāraprahāṇe [Tib. 170a] yāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:3490_2: aṣṭamaprakāraprahāṇe 'pi ṣaḍbhir eva samanvāgataḥ. parihīṇo 'pi tata iti. kāmavairāgyaparihāṇyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3490_3: hi tatsaṃkalanavigataḥ. kāmavairāgyaṃ prāptaḥ pūrvaṃ paścād veti. abhisamayāt pūrvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3490_4: paścād vā. kathaṃ. laukikena mārgeṇa kāmavītarāgo bhūtvā niyāmam avakrāṃto mārge
SA01yabhkvyu:3490_5: 'nvayajñāne ekayāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā samanvāgataḥ. yasmād asāv āryaḥ ṣoḍaśakṣaṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3490_6: prāpto 'nāgāmy eva bhavati. na srotaāpannaḥ. sakṛdāgāmī (Abhidh-k-vy 510)
SA01yabhkvyu:3491_0: vā. paṃcāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇāc cānāgāmī iti paṭhyate. tasmād darśanaheyaprahāṇānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3491_3: samanvāgataḥ. arhattvaprāpta ekayaiveti. tadā parijñāsaṃkalanāt. parihīṇo 'pi rūpāvacareṇeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3491_5: ca parihāṇau dviparijñāsamanvāgamaparihārārtham iti. rūpavairāgyaṃ [Tib. 170b] prāpto
SA01yabhkvyu:3491_6: dvābhyām iti. anāgāmī rūpavītarāga ity arthaḥ. dhātuvairāgyeṇa kasmān na saṃkalanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3491_8: parijñāsaṃkalanam iṣyate. na kevalena parihīṇo 'pi. ārūpyāvacareṇety arhattvaprāptisaṃkalitayor
SA01yabhkvyu:3491_10: punarlābhāt. rūpāvacareṇa tu parihāṇāv ekayā samanvāgataḥ syāt. kāmāvacareṇa ca ṣaḍhiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3492_1: parijñādvayasamanvāgamavacanāt. na bhūyasya iti. na bahutarāḥ. ānupūrvikasrotaāpannavad
SA01yabhkvyu:3492_2: ity abhiprāyaḥ. dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām iti vyākhyātaṃ. saṃkalanam iti ko 'rthaḥ ekatvena
SA01yabhkvyu:3492_3: vyavasthāpanam iti yo 'rthaḥ. tayoś cāvasthayor iti. kāmavītarāgānāgāmyarhattvāvasthayor
SA01yabhkvyu:3492_4: etad ubhayaṃ. dhātuvairāgyaṃ phalaprāptiś ceti. ekaparijñocyata iti. rūpavītarāgasyānāgāmina
SA01yabhkvyu:3506: kaścid ekāṃ kaścid dve kaścit ṣaṭ. kaścit paṃcāpnotīty etan nāsti. ata āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:3508_0: paṃca naiva kaścid āpnoti. iti sūtrārthanayaḥ. vṛttis tu vivriyate arhattvāt parihīyamāṇo
SA01yabhkvyu:3508_1: yena kenacit cittena sarvasaṃyojanaparyādānaparijñām ekāṃ tyajati. saṃkalane tasyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3508_2: ekaikasyā arhattvāvasthāyām astitvāt. evaṃ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo rūpavītarāgo
SA01yabhkvyu:3508_3: 'nāgāmī ekām evāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñāṃ. dve parijñe tyajatīti. avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3508_4: rūparāgakṣayaparijñāṃ ca. ko 'sāv ity āha. anāgāmī rūpavītarāgaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3508_5: iti. paṃca tyajati vītarāgapūrvī mārgānvayajñāna [tib 171b] iti. abhisamayacitte
SA01yabhkvyu:3508_6: ṣoḍaśe. sa hy avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñālābhe. laukikamārgaprāptasya tasyānāsravavisaṃyogaprāptyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3508_7: pūrvikāḥ paṃca parijñāḥ paṃcadaśakṣaṇalabdhās tyajati. ṣaṣṭhīṃ tu rūpārūpyāvacaramārgadarśanaheyaprahāṇaparijñāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3508_8: na tyajati. kiṃ tu dhātuvairāgyaphalalābhato 'trāvarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñāyāṃ saṃkaliteti
SA01yabhkvyu:3508_9: naṣṭarūpeva sā nopanyasyate. ānupūrviko yo na vītarāgapūrvī kāmavairāgyāt kāraṇāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3508_10: ṣaṭ tyajati. yās traidhātukānāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaparijñāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3509_0: lābho 'py evam iti. kaścid ekāṃ labhate. paṃceti muktvā. yāvat ṣaṭ labhate. yaḥ kaścid
SA01yabhkvyu:3509_1: apūrvaṃ labhata iti. darśanamārgastho bhāvanāmārgastho vā navānāṃ parijñānāṃ yo pratilabdhapūrvāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3509_2: pratilabhate prathamataḥ. sa tām ekāṃ labhate. bhāvanāmārge 'pi hi vītarāgapūrvī
SA01yabhkvyu:3509_3: darśanamārgāṃte avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñām ekāṃ labhate. ānupārviko 'pi kāmavairāgye
SA01yabhkvyu:3509_4: navame vimuktimārge tām eva labhate. arhann apy anyām labhata iti. kevalād ārūpyavairāgyāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3509_5: parihīyata iti. nānyavairāgyād iti darśayati. sa hy avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñāṃ [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3509_6: 172a] rūparāgakṣayaparijñāṃ ca labhate. kaścit ṣaḍ yo 'nāgāmiphalāt parihīyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3509_7: ānupūrviko 'nāgāmī. na hi vītarāgapūrviṇaḥ parihāṇir asti. tadvairāgyasya dvimārgaprāpaṇāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3509_8: ata eva ca naiva kaścit paṃca labhate. vītarāgapūrviṇo hi yadi parihāṇir abhaviṣyat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3509_9: sa eva yugapat paṃca parijñā alapsyateti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3510: ācāryayaśomitrakṛtāyām abhidharmakośavyākyāyām anuśayanirdeśo nāma paṃcamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3514_0: (VI.1) paṃcamasya ṣaṣṭhasya ca kośasthānayoḥ saṃbaṃdham upadarśayann idam upanyasyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3514_1: uktaṃ yathāprahāṇam ityadi. yathāprahāṇaṃ parijñā labhata iti. phale hetūpacārād
SA01yabhkvyu:3518: iti. dvaṃdvaikavadbhāvanirdeśaḥ. satyānāṃ darśanād bhāvanāc ca bhāvanāyā iti vā. satyadarśanabhāvanāt kāraṇād darśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāś ca kleśā iti vistareṇoktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3522_0: ity ādinā. [Tib. 172b] satyadarśanaṃ ca darśanamārgeṇa satyabhāvanaṃ ca bhāvanāmārgeṇety
SA01yabhkvyu:3522_1: ata idam ucyate. tāv idānīṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgau kim anāsravau sāsravāv iti. mārganirdeśopanyāsa
SA01yabhkvyu:3522_2: iti saṃbandhaḥ. traidhātukapratipakṣatvād iti darśanamārgasya. laukikatve sati bhavāgrapratipakṣo
SA01yabhkvyu:3522_3: na syād iti. kiṃ ca navaprakārāṇāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ sakṛtprahāṇāc ca. na bhāvanāmārgavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3522_4: na hi laukikasyaiṣā śaktir asti. traidhātukaprahāṇe ca prakāraprahāṇe ca. yadi lokottarasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3522_5: navaprakārasakṛtprahāṇe śaktiḥ. bhāvanāheyānām api lokottareṇa sakṛtprahāṇaprasaṃgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3522_6: lokottareṇaiva sakṛtprahāṇam ity avadhāryate. na tu sakṛtprahāṇam eva lokottareṇeti
SA01yabhkvyu:3522_7: ato na tatprasaṃgaḥ. bhāvanāheyā hi kleśā dṛḍhāḥ savastukatvāt. ato lokottareṇāpy
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_0: (VI.2) itarathā hīti. yadi yathābhisamayaṃ nirdeśo nābhiprīyeta. pūrvaṃ hetunirdeśaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_1: samudayasatyanirdeśaḥ. hetūnāṃ loke pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭatvāt. yathā smṛtyupasthānadhyānādīnām
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_2: iti. tadyathā smṛtyupasthānādīnām upapattyanukūlā deśanā. kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ hi
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_3: pūrvam utpadyate. yathaudārikālaṃbanataḥ [Tib. 173a] sūkṣmaudārikapracārato vā pūrvottarahetuphalabhāvato
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_4: vā. tato vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ. tataś cittasmṛtyupasthānam ity eṣām upapattyanukūlā
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_5: deśanā evaṃ dhyānānām. ādiśabdena vimokṣābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanādīnām apy upapattyanukūlā
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_6: deśanā. keṣāṃcit prarūpaṇānukūleti. pradarśanānukūlā avabodhānukūlety arthaḥ. yathā
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_7: samyakprahāṇānām iti. kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣayoḥ pratyekam utpannānutpannabhedataḥ. utpannaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_8: hi sukhāvabadhaṃ nānutpannaṃ. kṛṣṇapakṣo vā vineyajanena sukham avabudhyate. katham
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_9: utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_10: vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti praṇidadhāti. anutpannānām anutpādāya chandaṃ janayatīti
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_11: pūrvavat. anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_12: utpannānāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣatāyai chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat. na hy eṣa niyamo yat
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_13: pūrvam utpannānāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati. paścād anutpannānām anutpādāyeti. kiṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_14: tarhi. pūrvaṃ cānutpannānām anutpādāya chandaṃ janayati. [Tib. 173b] paścāc cotpannānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_15: prahāṇāyety etad udāharaṇaṃ. evaṃ śuklapakṣo 'pi yojyaḥ. satyānāṃ tv abhisamayānukūleti
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_17: iti darśayati. yatra hi sakta iti. duḥkhasatye. yena bādhyata iti tenaivaṃ. yataś
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_18: ca mokṣam iti. tata eva duḥkhasatyāt. tad evādau payogāvasthāyāṃ. kasmād ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_19: vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ parīkṣāvasthāyāṃ nirvedhabhāgīyāvasthāyām ity arthaḥ. vyādhiṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_20: dṛṣṭveti. vyādhir duḥkhasatyasyopamānaṃ. tannidānaṃ samudayasatyasya. tatkṣayo nirodhasatyasya.
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_21: tadbheṣajaṃ mārgasatyasyopamānaṃ. sūtre 'py eṣa satyānāṃ dṛṣṭāṃta iti. vyādhyādisūtre.
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_22: kathaṃ. caturbhir aṃgaiḥ samanvāgato bhiṣak śalyāpahartā rājārhaś ca bhavati rājayogyaś
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_23: ca rājāṃgatve ca saṃkhyāṃ gacchati. katamaiś caturbhiḥ. ābādhakuśalo bhavati. ābādhasamutthānakuśalaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_24: ābādhaprahāṇakuśalaḥ. prahīṇasya cābādhasyāyatyām anutpādakuśalaḥ. evam eva caturbhir
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_25: aṃgaiḥ samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nuttaro bhiṣak śalyāpahartety
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_26: ucyate. katamaiś caturbhiḥ. iha bhikṣavas [Tib. 174a] tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha
SA01yabhkvyu:3524_27: idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ. ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 515)
SA01yabhkvyu:3525_0: iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti. pūrvāvedhād
SA01yabhkvyu:3525_1: iti. pūrvākṣepāt. dṛṣṭabhūminiḥsaṃgāśvaprasaraṇavad iti. yathā bhūmau dṛṣṭāyāṃ niḥsaṃgam
SA01yabhkvyu:3525_2: aśvasya prasaraṇaṃ. tadvat. aśvadhāvanavad iti kecit paṭhaṃti. dhāvi prakṛtyaṃtaraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3525_3: vyācakṣate. iṇo bodhanārthatvād iti. sarvo gatyartho bodhanārtho 'pi bhavatīti. dravyato
SA01yabhkvyu:3525_4: 'pīty apiśabdān nāmato 'pīti darśitaṃ. aviparītatvād iti. yasmāt tad āryāṇām anyeṣāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3525_5: cāviparītaṃ. duḥkham eva nānyathā. āryais tu yathaitāni satyāni. tathā dṛṣṭāni. duḥkhasatyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3525_6: duḥkhata anityataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataś ca. evaṃ yāvan mārgo mārgataḥ nyāyataḥ pratipattito
SA01yabhkvyu:3525_7: nairyāṇikataś ca. nānyair anāryaiḥ evaṃ dṛṣṭāni. ata āryāṇām etāni satyāny ucyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3525_8: na tv anāryāṇāṃ satyāny ucyaṃte. kasmāt. viparītadarśanāt. te hi duḥkham aduḥkhata
SA01yabhkvyu:3525_9: [Tib. 174b] ity evamādibhir ākārair duḥkhasatyaṃ paśyaṃti. samdayam asamudayata ity
SA01yabhkvyu:3525_10: evamādibhiḥ. nirodham anirodhata ity evamādibhiḥ. mārgam amārgata ity evamādibhir iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3527: iti. tadyathā nirodhasatyaṃ vyathaṃte 'punarbhavāt prapātād iva bāliśā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3530: dve āryāṇāṃ satye iti. duḥkhasamdayasatye aviparītadarśanāt. dve ārye. kuśalatayānāsravatayā ca. āryāṇāṃ ca satye. aviparītadarśanāt. evam ekaśeṣanirdeśāc cāryasatye iti bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3531: (VI.3) yadā vedanaikadeśo duḥkhasvabhāva iti. vedanāskandhaikadeśo duḥkhadaurmanasyasvabhāvaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3533_0: iti. manaāpā api vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca duḥkhā. amanaāpā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā
SA01yabhkvyu:3533_1: saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca. tadanye duḥkhāḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatayaiveti yathāyogārthaḥ. mana
SA01yabhkvyu:3533_2: āpnuvaṃtīti manaāpāḥ. punaḥ saṃdhikaraṇaṃ cātreti vyākhyātaṃ. tebhyo 'nya iti manaāpāmanaāpebhyo 'nya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3534_0: tisro vedanā yathākramam iti. sukhā vedanā [Tib. 175a] manaāpā duḥkhā amanaāpā aduḥkhasukhā
SA01yabhkvyu:3534_1: naiva manaāpā nāmanaāpety arthaḥ. tadvaśeneti. vedanāvaśena. avedanāsvabhāvā api
SA01yabhkvyu:3534_2: rūpaśabdādayas tadanukūlatvān manaāpādisaṃjñāṃ labhaṃte. vipariṇāmena duḥkhateti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3536: hā caitraratha hā vāpi hā maṃdākini hā priye
SA01yabhkvyu:3537: ity ārttā vilapaṃto 'pi gāṃ pataṃti divokasa
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_0: iti. duḥkhasvabhāvenaiveti. upaghātasvabhāvenety arthaḥ. duḥkhā vedanā utpādaduḥkhā
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_1: sthitiduḥkheti. nanv eṣā arthāpattito vipariṇāmasukhā prāpnoti. tathā ca sati lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_2: syāt. nedam asyā lakṣaṇaṃ. kiṃ tarhi vidūṣaṇārtham ayam upadeśa iti. atha vā bhavatv
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_3: eva sāttra. yena rūpeṇa vidūṣyate. tad evāpekṣate iti. duḥkhaiva bhavati. yathā sukhā
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_4: vedanā utpādasthitisukhatvāt sukhāpi satī vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā duḥkhety eva vidūṣyate
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_5: vidūṣaṇīyatvenābhiprīyamāṇatvād iti. saṃskāreṇaiva duḥkhateti. saṃskaraṇenaiva jananenaivety
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_6: arthaḥ. yad anityaṃ. tad duḥkhaṃ. yan na niyatasthitaṃ. tad duḥkhaṃ. yaj yāyate vinaśyati
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_7: ca. tad duḥkham [Tib. 175b] ity arthaḥ. tenoktaṃ. pratyayābhisaṃskaraṇād iti. pratyayair
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_8: abhisaṃskriyate yasmāt. tasmāt tad duḥkham iti. vedanāvat tadvedanīyā api saṃskārā
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_9: veditavyā iti. sukhavedanīyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ vipariṇāmena duḥkhatā. sukhavedanīyāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_10: saṃskārā utpādasukhāḥ sthitisukhā vipariṇāmaduḥkhā iti. duḥkhavedanīyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_11: duḥkhavedanīyasvabhāvenaiva duḥkhatā. duḥkhavedanīyāḥ saṃskārā utpādaduḥkhā sthitiduḥkhā
SA01yabhkvyu:3538_12: iti. aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃskāreṇaiva duḥkhatā. pratyayābhisaṃskaraṇāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3539_0: duḥkham eva duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā. yāvad iti vacanāt vipariṇāma eva duḥkhatā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā
SA01yabhkvyu:3539_1: saṃskāra eva duḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhateti vācyam. ayaṃ paryāyo vigraheṇaiva viśiṣṭo
SA01yabhkvyu:3539_2: nārthena. sa eva hy atrārtho grahītavyaḥ. asādhāraṇatvād iti vistaraḥ. manaāpāḥ saṃskārāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3539_3: asādhāraṇā duḥkhaduḥkhatāyāḥ. atas teṣām asādhāraṇatvād vipariṇāmaduḥkhatoktā. amanaāpāś
SA01yabhkvyu:3539_4: cāsādhāraṇā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāyāḥ. atas teṣām asādhāraṇatvād duḥkhaduḥkhatokteti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3539_5: [Tib. 176a] sarve tu manaāpādayaḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatayā duḥkhāḥ tasyā vyāpinītvāt. yadi
SA01yabhkvyu:3540: na paśyaṃtīti ata āha. tāṃ tv āryā eva paśyaṃti nānye. katham itīdam upanyasyate āha cātreti sarvam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3541: evaṃ tarhīti yadi saṃskāraduḥkhatayā sarve 'pi saṃskārā duḥkhāḥ mārge 'pi saṃskāraduḥkhatāprasaṃgaḥ. saṃskṛtatvtā pratyayajanitatvād ity arthaḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 517)
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_0: pratikūlaṃ hi duḥkham iti lakṣaṇān mārgo na duḥkham iti. kim idam anyad evocyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_1: pūrvam uktaṃ pratyayābhisaṃskaraṇāt sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ. yac cānityaṃ. tad duḥkham
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_2: iti. mārgaś ca pratyayābhisaṃskṛtatvād anityaḥ. tasmād duḥkham iti prasajyet. yadi
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_3: hi pratikūlataiva duḥkhalakṣaṇam iṣyet. tat pūrvoktam alakṣaṇaṃ syāt. tac ced duḥkhatālakṣaṇam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_4: idam alakṣaṇam iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ. kathaṃ. yad anityam āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaṃ. tad duḥkham
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_5: ity ayam atrābhipreto 'rthaḥ. kiṃ cānityam āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaṃ yat sāsravaṃ vastu.
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_6: kasmāt punar anāsravo mārgas tathaivānityo 'pi na cāryāṇāṃ pratikūla [Tib. 176b]
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_7: ity ata āha. na hi tasyotpāda āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaḥ sarvaduḥkhakṣayāvāhanād iti. aviśeṣābhidhāne
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_8: 'pi hi loke viśeṣapratipattir dṛṣṭā. tadyathā gamanād gauḥ na ca gamanān mahiṣo 'pi
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_9: gaur bhavati. evaṃ hy arthe niyate gauḥ [kāsmiṃcid bhavati.] kasmād bhavati. yasmāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_10: gacchatīti. evam ihāpi yat sāsravaṃ vastu. tat pratikūlam āryāṇāṃ. kasmāt. anityatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_11: iti. yad eva duḥkhato dṛṣṭam iti. sāsravaṃ vastu. tasyaiva nirodhaṃ śāṃtataḥ paśyaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_12: na mārgasyety avagaṃtavyaṃ. mudgādibhāve 'pi māṣarāśyapadeśavad iti. māṣarāśau mudgamasūrakalāyādisadbhāve
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_13: 'py alpatvān mudgādīnāṃ māṣarāśir iti loke vyapadeśo dṛśyate. tadvat. pariṣekasukhāṇukeneti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3542_14: sukhaṃ ca tad aṇukaṃ ca sukhāṇukaṃ. pariṣekeṇa sukhāṇukaṃ pariṣekasukhāṇukaṃ. tenāha
SA01yabhkvyu:3544: iti. sukhaṃ duḥkhasya hetur duḥkhavedanīyena karmaṇā saṃprayuktatvād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3546: yasmāc cātibahubhir duḥkhaiḥ parasevākṛtyādikṛtaiḥ samuditaṃ sukham [Tib. 177a] utpadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3548: yasmāc ca kṣutpipāsādikṛte duḥkhe sati. bhojanapānādikṛtaṃ sukhaṃ iṣṭaṃ. nānyathā. ata ebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo
SA01yabhkvyu:3550_0: sahaiva tu sukheneti. tuśabdaḥ pūrvapakṣavyāvartanārthaḥ. saṃskāraduḥkhataikarasatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3550_1: iti. saṃskāṛaduḥkhataikaprakāratvāt. katham idānīṃ sukhasvabhāvām iti. katham aduḥkhasvabhāvāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3550_2: vedanāṃ duḥkhataḥ paśyaṃti. anityatayā pratikūlatvād iti. anityatvāt pratikūlaṃ pratikūlatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3551_0: arthaḥ. yathā rūpasaṃjñādīny apīti. yathā rūpasaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāny api duḥkhataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3551_1: paśyaṃti. na ca tāny evaṃ duḥkhāni. yathā duḥkhā vedanā. tasyā upaghātakasvabhāvatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3551_2: teṣāṃ vā tallakṣaṇatvāt. yas tu manyata iti bhadantakumāralātaḥ. tasya bhadantasyāsau
SA01yabhkvyu:3551_3: samudayākāraḥ syān na duḥkhākāraḥ. duḥkhahetuto darśanāt. kiṃ cāryāṇāṃ cānāgāmināṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3551_4: rūpārūpyopapattau kathaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pravartate. naiva pravartate ity arthaḥ. na
SA01yabhkvyu:3551_5: hi teṣām anāgāmināṃ duḥkhavedanāhetuḥ duḥkhāyā vedanāyā hetuḥ. [Tib. 177b] ke. skaṃdhā
SA01yabhkvyu:3551_6: rūpārūpyāvacarāḥ. kasmān na hetuḥ. punar duḥkhasthānānāgamanāt. saṃskāraduḥkhata
SA01yabhkvyu:3551_7: ca sūtre kim artham uktā bhaved iti. yadi duḥkhahetutvāt sukham api duḥkhataḥ paśyaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3551_8: yeyaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatoktā yad anityaṃ. tad duḥkham iti. sā kiṃprayojanā duḥkhahetutvenaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:3551_9: tatprayojanasiddheḥ. duḥkhahetuvādy āha. yadi tarhīti. yadi yad anityaṃ. tad duḥkham
SA01yabhkvyu:3551_10: ity anityatvād duḥkhataḥ paśyaṃti na duḥkhahetutvād anityaduḥkhākārayoḥ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3552_0: atrācārya āha. udayavyayadharmitvād iti vistaraḥ. yathā pratikūlatvād duḥkhaṃ. tathā
SA01yabhkvyu:3552_1: tat pratipādayann āha. anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatīty anityākāro duḥkhākāram
SA01yabhkvyu:3552_2: ākarṣatīti. tad uktaṃ bhavati. yad idam uktaṃ yad anityaṃ. tad duḥkham iti. nākāraikatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3552_3: evam uktaṃ. apy tv anityaṃ tat sukhaṃ paśyatāṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavati. pratikūlatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3553_0: ekīyā iti bhadaṃtaśrīlātādayaḥ. idam atra duḥkhasyeti. idam atra duḥkhasya lakṣaṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3553_1: ity arthaḥ. sukhā vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyeti. aparaṃ sūtrapadaṃ. śītoṣṇādaya [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3553_2: 178a] iti. ādiśabdenāmlamadhurādayo gṛhyaṃte. atyupayuktā atiparibhuktāḥ. akālopayuktāś
SA01yabhkvyu:3553_3: ceti. tadyathā śītā hemaṃte uṣṇā gṛīṣme. samena veti. sukhahetunā. evam īryāpathavikalpe
SA01yabhkvyu:3553_4: 'pi vaktavyam iti. ya eva hi śayanādaya iṣyaṃte sukhahetavaḥ. ta eveti sarvaṃ yāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:3553_5: vyaktim āpadayaṃta iti vaktavyaṃ. duḥkhapratīkāre ca sukhabuddheḥ. kiṃ. nāsti sukhā
SA01yabhkvyu:3553_6: vedaneti prakṛtaṃ. duḥkhavikalpe ca. kiṃ. sukhabuddheḥ. tathaiva nāsti sukhā vedaneti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3553_7: duḥkhapratīkāre sukhabuddhiṃ pratipādayann āha. na hi tāvat sukham iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3553_8: duḥkhavikalpeneti pratipādayann āha. duḥkhavikalpe ca bālā iti vistaraḥ. aṃsād aṃsaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3553_9: bhāraṃ saṃcārayaṃto bhāravāhakā duḥkha evāvasthite bhārātikrāmaṇe sukham iti buddhim utpādayaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3554: eṣa eva ca nyāya ity ācāryaḥ. anabhiprītaṃ bhavaty āryāṇām iti kāmasukhaṃ. (Abhidh-k-vy 519)
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_0: anyathānabhipretatvād iti. pramādapadatvādinākārāṃtareṇa. tadarthaṃ darśayann āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_1: yā hi vedaneti vistaraḥ. pramādapadam iti. kuśalapracyutikāraṇam ity arthaḥ. mahābhisaṃskārasādhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_2: ca vipariṇāminīṃ ca. [Tib. 178b] samanaṃtaraduḥkhotpādinīm aduḥkhāsukhotpādinīṃ cety
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_3: arthaḥ. nyūnarūpatvam āpannām iti vā. anityāṃ ca vināśinīṃ cety arthaḥ. na tu khalu
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_4: svalakṣaṇākāreṇeti. anugrāhakasvalakṣaṇākāreṇa āryāṇām api hi sukhavedanānugrāhakebhya
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_5: visaṃvādaḥ. yadi cāsau sukhā vedanā svenātmanānugrāhakātmanānabhipretā bhavet naiva
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_6: tasyāṃ sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ kasyacid rāgo bhavet. duḥkhavedanāvad ity abhiprāyaḥ. yato
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_7: vairāgyārtham iti. yataḥ kāraṇāt vairāgyārtham ākārāṃtareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_8: anyathānāyāsenaiva rāgābhāvasiddheḥ vairāgyārthaṃ prayatno 'narthakaḥ syāt. uktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_9: cedaṃ bhagavateti sthavirānandavacanam evaitat sūtrapadaṃ. evaṃ hi so 'prakṣyad iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_10: yatkiṃcid veditam. idam atra duḥkhasyeti etad ayuktarūpaṃ vacanam iti paśyaṃ sthavirānandas
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_11: tad eva pṛṣṭavān. yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viruddham eveti kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_12: yadi tu tisro vedanā ity etad ayuktarūpam adrakṣyat. tad evāprakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_13: bhagavatā bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā ity etad viruddham eveti kṛtvā. bhagavān [Tib. 179a]
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_14: api caivaṃ vyākariṣyad idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti. na tv evaṃ vyākariṣyat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_15: saṃskārānityatām ānanda saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ. saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ. yatkiṃcid
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_16: veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti. na tv evam āha. punaś ca tisṛṇāṃ vedanānāṃ vacanāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_17: tasmāt saṃty eva svbhāvatas tisro vedanāḥ. idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkiṃcid
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_18: veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti vedanād ābhiprāyikam etad vākyaṃ darśayati bhagavān.
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_19: yatkiṃcid veditam atra duḥkhasyeti saṃskāravipariṇāmatābhiprāyāt. vipariṇāmānityadharmitvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_20: iti. vipariṇāmadharmitvād anityadharmitvāc ca. vipariṇāmaḥ punar anyathātvaṃ. kāmaguṇā
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_21: iti. iṣṭānāṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyānām iyaṃ saṃjñā. upapatter apīṣṭasya janmanaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3555_22: saṃjñā. evam upapattiṃ alpasukhāṃ bahuduḥkhām ekāṃtasukhāṃ paśyato viparyāsaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3556_0: lokānuvṛttyeti. cet. atha mataṃ lokasya vedanāṃ vyavasyato 'nuvṛttyā tisro vedanā
SA01yabhkvyu:3556_1: iti vacanaṃ. tan na bhavati. sarvaveditaduḥkhatvasya saṃdhāya bhāṣitam iti bhagavato
SA01yabhkvyu:3556_2: vacanāt. saṃskārānityatām ānanda mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ. yatkiṃcid
SA01yabhkvyu:3556_3: veditam idam atra duḥkhasyety [Tib. 179b] ato na lokānuvṛttyā tisro vedanā iti vacanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_0: nidhāryety abhiprāyaḥ. yathābhūtavacanāc ca. na lokānuvṛttyā tisro vedanā iti vacanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_1: katham ity āha. yac ca sukhendriyaṃ yac ca saumanasyendriyaṃ. sukhaiṣā vedanā draṣṭavyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_2: vistareṇoktveti. yac ca duḥkhendriyaṃ yac ca daurmanasyendriyaṃ. duḥkhaiṣā vedanā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_3: yad upakṣendriyam. aduḥkhāsukhaiṣā vedanā ity evaṃādinā vistareṇoktvā yenemāni paṃcendriyāṇy
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_4: evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā dṛṣṭānīti. idam atra vedanātrayasadbhāve jñāpakaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_5: yathābhūtam ity adhyāropāpavādābhāvāt. loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_6: sukhāṃ duḥkhām aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vyavasyed duḥkhasvābhāvyena duḥkhavyavasāyasyaiva prāpteḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_7: mṛdvadhimātramadhyāsv iti vistaraḥ. atha mataṃ mṛduni duḥkhe sukhabuddhir adhimātre
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_8: duḥkhabuddhiḥ madhya aduḥkhāsukhabuddhir iti. atra brūmaḥ. sukhasyāpi trividhatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_9: iti vistaraḥ. [Tib. 180a] mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedena mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu mṛdumadhyādhimātreṣu.
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_10: adhimātrādisukhabuddhiḥ syād adhimātramadhyamṛduḥ sukhabuddhiḥ syād ity arthaḥ. kathaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_11: mṛduni duḥkhe adhimātrasukhabuddhiḥ. madhye madhyasukhabuddhiḥ. adhimātre mṛdusukhabuddhir
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_12: iti. na cādhimātre duḥkhe mṛdusukhabuddhir yuktā. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. adhimātram eva tad
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_13: duḥkhaṃ na syād yadi tatra mṛdusukhabuddhiḥ syāt. mṛduni ca duḥkhe yady adhimātrasukhabuddhiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_14: kathaṃ tasya duḥkhasya mṛdutvaṃ. na hi tathā vyaktasyānubhavasya mṛdutvaṃ yujyata
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_15: iti. aduḥkhāsukhānaṃtaraṃ sukhānubhavaṃ paśyann āha. yadā gaṃdharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajam
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_16: iti. madhyaṃ hi duḥkham aduḥkhāsukhaṃ bhavatāṃ. na mṛduprakāram. ato vaktavyaṃ. tadā
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_17: katamad duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhir bhavatīti. viṣayabalād eva hi tat
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_19: veti. kiṃ ca yadi mṛduni duḥkhe sukhabuddhir iti manyase. anutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_20: mṛduni duḥkha iti. [Tib. 180b] anutpanne vinaṣṭe ca tasmin mṛduni duḥkhe. sutarāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_21: sukhabuddhiḥ syāt aśeṣaduḥkhāpagamāt. yasmād aśeṣaṃ duḥkham apagataṃ. saśeṣāpagate
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_22: 'pi hi duḥkhe sukhabuddhim icchasi. kim aṃgāśeṣāpagata ity abhiprāyaḥ. evaṃ kāmasukhasaṃmukhībhāve
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_23: 'pi vaktavyam iti. yathā gandharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajaṃ sukham uktam. evaṃ kāmasukhasaṃmukhībhāve
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_24: 'pi vaktavyaṃ. katham. mṛduni rāgaduḥkhe kāmasukhabuddhir bhavati. anutpanne vinaṣṭe
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_25: ca tasmin rāgaduḥkhe sutarāṃ kāmasukhaṃ syāt. na caivaṃ dṛṣṭam iti. kathaṃ ca nāmeti
SA01yabhkvyu:3557_26: vistaraḥ. kathaṃ ca nāmaitad yokṣyate. yan mṛduni (Abhidh-k-vy 521)
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_0: vedite yan mṛduni duḥkha ity arthaḥ. tīvrānubhavo gṛhyata iti vaktavyaṃ. sukhaṃ gṛhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_1: madhye punar avyakta iti. madhyaduḥkhe aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā gṛhyate ity arthaḥ. mṛduni
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_2: duḥkhe tenāvyaktena bhavitavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ. triṣu ceti vistaraḥ. triṣu ca dhyāneṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_3: prathamadvitīyatṛtīyeṣu sukhavacanāt. sukhā vedanā tatreti sūtre vacanāt. mṛduduḥkhaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_4: syāt. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. mṛduni duḥkhe sukhabuddhir iti tavābhiprāyāt. ūrdhvaṃ caturthe
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_5: dhyāne ārūpyeṣu cāduḥkhāsukhavacanāt [Tib. 181a] sūtre. madhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ syāt. kasmāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_6: madhye duḥkhe aduḥkhāsukham iti tavaivābhiprāyāt. ity ato na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_7: sukhādivedanāvyavasthānaṃ. kathaṃ hi nāmādhodhyāneṣu mṛdu duḥkham. ūrdhve punar madhyam
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_8: iti yujyate. rūpaṃ cen mahānāmann iti. rūpaṃ cen mahānāmann ekāṃtaduḥkham abhaviṣyat
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_9: na sukhaṃ na sukhānugataṃ na saumanasyaṃ na saumanasyānugataṃ na sukhaveditaṃ hetur
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_10: api na prajñāyate rūpe saṃrāgāya. yasmāt tarhi asti rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānugataṃ pūrvavad
SA01yabhkvyu:3558_11: ato rūpe hetuḥ prajñāyate yad uta saṃrāgāyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_0: sukhahetvavyavasthānād ity atra brūmaḥ. yadi sukhahetvavyavasthānān na sukham asti
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_1: vaḥ. duḥkham apy asat syāt duḥkhahetvavyavasthānāt. api ca vyavasthita eva sukhahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_2: katham ity āha. āśrayaviśeṣāpekṣo hīti vistaraḥ. yadi hi kevala eva viṣayo hetuḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_3: syāt syād evāvyavasthito hetuḥ. na tu kevalo viṣayo hetuḥ. yasmād āśrayaviśeṣo 'pi
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_4: hetur iti. sa evāgnir iti. tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣa [Tib. 181b] īṣatpakvāvasthe
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_5: taṇḍulasamūhe svādupākahetur bhavati. abhimataudanapākahetutvāt. sa evāsvādupākahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_6: taddāhahetutvād ity arthaḥ. na tu yā pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svādupākahetur āsīt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_7: tāṃ punaḥ prāpya paścān na hetuḥ svādupākasya tādṛśasyety arthaḥ. eṣa dṛṣṭāṃtaḥ tasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_8: pūrvoktasya dārṣṭāṃtikasyārthasya. dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetur
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_9: iti. na hi tad eva dhyānaṃ prathamaṃ yāvat tṛtīyaṃ cirakālam api samāpannānāṃ duḥkhahetur
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_10: bhavatīti. dhyānaje ca sukhe kasya pratītkāra iti. na hi dhyāneṣu duḥkham astīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_11: ādiśabdenedam api vaktavyaṃ. yadi duḥkhapratīkāreṣu sukhabuddhiḥ syāt. rūpaṃ cen
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_12: mahānāmann ekāṃtaduḥkham abhaviṣyat na sukhaṃ na sukhānugatam ity evamādi noktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_13: syād iti. sukham evotpadyata iti. sukhaiva sā vedanotpadyate. na sā duḥkhā vedanā
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_14: sukhatvena kalpiteti. yāvad asau tādṛśī kāyāvastheti. sukhotpattyanukūlā. anyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:3559_15: hi yady avasthāṃtarajaṃ sukham eva notpadyate yāvad asau (Abhidh-k-vy 522)
SA01yabhkvyu:3560_0: tādṛśī kāyāvasthā nāṃtarīyate. anyathā paścād bhūyasī sukhabuddhiḥ syāt. aṃte kuta
SA01yabhkvyu:3560_1: iti vistaraḥ. atha mataṃ pānabhojanādyaṃte kuto duḥkhabuddhiḥ syāt yadi tasyāditatprāraṃbho
SA01yabhkvyu:3560_2: nāsīd iti. atra brūmaḥ. kāyapariṇāmaviśeṣāt. [Tib. 182a] kāyasya tādṛśaḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3560_3: paścād utpadyate pānādyāsevanāt yat sukhotpattyavasthāyāṃ duḥkhaṃ notpadyate. aṃte

SA01yabhkvyu:3560_5: tādṛśaḥ paścātpariṇāmavīśeṣo bhavati. yat pūrvaṃ madhuratāvasthāyāṃ mādhuryasyāvidyamānā
SA01yabhkvyu:3560_6: śuktatā amlatā aṃte utpadyate. atha vā yathā madyādīnāṃ parīṇāmavīśeṣān mādhuryam

SA01yabhkvyu:3560_8: pariṇāmaviśeṣād eva ca paścāc chuktatā. mādhuryam iha sukhasyodāharaṇaṃ. śuktatā duḥkhasyeti.

SA01yabhkvyu:3565_2: pṛthivīdhātuś ca bhavaty abdhātuś ca. evaṃ tāni bījāni vṛddhiṃ virūḍhin vipulatām

SA01yabhkvyu:3565_6: yaś ca hetuḥ. sa samudayaḥ vijñānasthitayo 'pi pratiṣṭhāhetuḥ. tasmād iti. yataḥ

SA01yabhkvyu:3565_8: bhavaḥ abhiprāyeṇa vā dīvyatīty ābhiprāyikaḥ sūtre nirdeśaḥ tṛṣṇādhikṛtaṃ pudgalam
SA01yabhkvyu:3565_9: adhikṛtya kṛta ity abhiprāyaḥ. lākṣaṇikas tv abhidharme lakṣaṇe bhavo lākṣaṇiko nirdeśo
SA01yabhkvyu:3565_10: 'bhidharme. sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu samudaya iti sāsravasya skaṃdhapaṃcakasya samudayasatyatvalakṣaṇayogāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3565_11: sa eva vaibhāṣikas tṛṣṇādīnām ābhiprāyikaṃ samudayasatyatvaṃ vivakṣur [Tib. 183a] (Abhidh-k-vy 523)
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_0: āha. api tv iti vistareṇa. abhinirvṛttihetuṃ bruvatā samudayasatyaṃ tṛṣṇaivoktā sūtre.
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_1: upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ bruvatā yāvat karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyā coktā. upapattihetuḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_2: karma. abhinirvṛttihetus tṛṣṇā bhaveṣu. tayoḥ punas taddhetvoḥ karmatṛṣṇayor avidyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_3: hetur ity āha. katham etad gamyate. gāthāyām upapattihetuḥ karmābhinirvṛttihetus
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_4: tṛṣṇeti. karma hetur upapattaye tṛṣṇā hetur abhinirvṛttaya iti sūtrāt. sūtrāṃtare
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_5: vacanād iti. sahetusapratyaya iti vistaraḥ. atra sūtre krameṇa vā. kāraṇaparaṃparākrameṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_6: vā. gāthāyām eṣa nirdeśaḥ. karmatṛṣṇāvidyā saṃkārāṇāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ hetur abhisaṃparāya
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_7: iti. tad etad uktaṃ bhavati. karma hetur upapattaya iti. ato vā sūtrāt. sahetusapratyayakramasūtrād
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_8: vā. ayaṃ īdṛśaḥ gāthārtha iti. kathaṃ cakṣur bhikṣavaḥ sahetu sapratyayaṃ sanidānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_9: kaś ca bhikṣavaś cakṣuṣo hetuḥ kaḥ. pratyayaḥ. kiṃ nidanaṃ. cakṣuṣo bhikṣavaḥ karma
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_10: hetuḥ. karma pratyayaḥ karma nidānaṃ. karmāpi bhikṣavaḥ sahetu sapratyayaṃ sanidānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_11: kaś ca bhikṣavaḥ karmaṇo hetuḥ. kaḥ pratyayaḥ. kiṃ nidānaṃ. [Tib. 183b] karmaṇo bhikṣavas
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_12: tṛṣṇā hetuḥ. tṛṣṇā pratyayaḥ. tṛṣṇā nidānaṃ. tṛṣṇā bhikṣavaḥ sahetukā sapratyayā
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_13: sanidānā. kaś ca bhikṣavas tṛṣṇāyā hetuḥ. kaḥ pratyayaḥ. kiṃ nidānaṃ. tṛṣṇāyā bhikṣavo
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_14: 'vidyā hetuḥ. avidyā pratyayḥ. avidyā nidānaṃ. avidyāpi bhikṣavaḥ sahetukā sapratyayā

SA01yabhkvyu:3566_16: ayoniśomanaskāro hetuḥ. ayoniśomanaskāraḥ pratyayaḥ. ayoniśomanaskāro nidānam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_17: bījakṣetrabhāvaṃ pratipādayatā vijñānādayo 'py uktā vijñānaṃ bījaṃ. tasya kṣetraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_18: vedanādayaḥ skandhāḥ. te 'py uktaḥ samudayasatyaṃ. na kevalaṃ tṛṣṇādaya ity ābhiprāyikaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_19: sūtre nirdeśa iti sādhitaṃ. sarvasya ca duḥkhasya lākṣaṇikaḥ samudayabhāva iti. yonyādiprakārabhedeneti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_21: tayor yathākramam iti. upapatteḥ karma hetur abhinirvṛttes tṛṣṇeti. tadyathā bījam
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_22: iti vistaraḥ. śālibījaṃ śālyaṃkuropapādanasya hetuḥ yavabījaṃ yavāṃkuropapādanasyetyādi.
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_23: āpaḥ punar abhedena. yathā śālyaṃkuraprarohasya hetuḥ. evaṃ yavāṃkurasyāpītyādi.
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_24: atas tāḥ sarvāṃkuraprarohamātrasya hetur iti vinā tṛṣṇayā janmābhāvād iti. atra sādhanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_25: hetur janmanas [Tib. 184a] tṛṣṇā. tadbhāvābhāvabhāvyabhāvitvāt. takyathā bījam aṃkurasya.
SA01yabhkvyu:3566_26: saṃtatināmanāc cety asyārthaṃ vivṛṇvann āha. yatra ca satṛṣṇeti vistaraḥ. yatra viṣaye

SA01yabhkvyu:3566_28: tasnāt punarbhave 'py evam iti. punarbhave 'py evaṃ satṛṣṇā cittasaṃtatiḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 524)

SA01yabhkvyu:3567_2: iti. masūra upasnānaṃ. tasya lepaḥ śuṣkaḥ. masūropasnānalepo 'syeti śuṣkamasūropasnānalepam
SA01yabhkvyu:3567_3: aṃgaṃ. tadvad. yathā śuṣkeṇa masūropasnānalepenāgṛhītam aṃgaṃ. evaṃ tṛṣṇayātmabhāva iti darśitaṃ

SA01yabhkvyu:3600_2: iti. kāyaviśeṣasaṃniśritāḥ cittaviśeṣasaṃniśritāś cāśvāsapraśvāśāḥ. kasmād ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:3600_3: ārūpoyakalalādigatānām abhāvād iti. kāyābhāvād ārūpyagatānāṃ na bhavaṃti. kalalādigatānāṃ

SA01yabhkvyu:3604_1: vedanāyā anubhavatvaṃ. cittasyopalabdhitvam. ebhuas tribhyo 'nyeṣāṃ yathāsvaṃ svabhāvaḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:3613_0: anupaśyaḥ. pāghrādhmādheṭdṛśaḥ śa iti śapratyayaḥ. anupaśyaṃ pudgalaṃ karotīty anupaśyayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3613_1: prajñāsvabhāve tv evaṃ vigrahaḥ. anupaśyasya karaṇam anupaśyaneti. tayā hi prajñayā
SA01yabhkvyu:3613_2: tadvān prajñāvān anupaśyaḥ kriyate. yathā prajñāyogāt prājñaḥ pudgala ucyate. evam
SA01yabhkvyu:3613_3: anupaśyanāyogād anupaśya ity ato 'nupaśyanā prajñeti siddhaṃ. yataś coktaṃ bhagavatā.

SA01yabhkvyu:3614_4: vṛttir iti. yadi hi smṛtir ālaṃbanaṃ dharayaty evaṃ prajñā prajānātīti. tad evaṃ

SA01yabhkvyu:3615_1: etat. vigrahas tv evaṃ kartavyaḥ. upatiṣṭhate 'nenety upasthānaṃ. smṛte upasthānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3615_2: smṛtyupasthānam iti. kathaṃ smṛtir anayopatiṣṭhata ity āha. yathādṛṣṭasyābhilapanād

SA01yabhkvyu:3615_4: kva punar upatiṣṭhate. kāye yāvad dharmeṣu. kāye smṛtyupasthānaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ.

SA01yabhkvyu:3617_0: vedanāyā astaṃgamaḥ. nāmarūpasamudayāc cittasya samudayo bhavati. nānarūpanirodhāc

SA01yabhkvyu:3617_3: smṛtir atra kāyādiṣūpatiṣṭhata iti kṛtvā. tad evam adhikaraṇasādhanaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati.

SA01yabhkvyu:3619_4: dve paśyati dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ. tat saṃbhinnālaṃbanaṃ. yadi kāyam yāvad dharmāṃś

SA01yabhkvyu:3623_0: ity uṣmaprakāraṃ kuśalamūlaṃ. pūrvarūpatvād iti. prathamanimittatvāt. pūrvasvabhāvatvād

SA01yabhkvyu:3625_3: khalv asya śrīr iti. dve hi kuśalamūle cale. uṣmagatamūrdhalakṣaṇe parihāṇisaṃbhavāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3625_4: dve acale kṣāṃtilaukikāgradharmalakṣaṇe viparyayāt. tatra tayor yan mṛdu. tad uṣmagataṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3625_5: yad adhimātraṃ. te mūrdhānaḥ. acalayor api yan mṛdu. sā kṣāṃtiḥ. yad adhimātraṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3625_6: te laukikāgradharmāḥ. ebhyo hi pāto 'tikramo veti. mūrdhabhyaḥ pātaḥ parihāṇiḥ. atikramo
SA01yabhkvyu:3625_7: vā kṣāṃtisaṃmukhībhāvo vā. mūrdhnāṃ calatvāt. vṛkṣādimūrdhebhyo hi loke pāto vā bhaved
SA01yabhkvyu:3625_8: atipāto vā. upariṣṭhānuprāptir iti mūrdhasādharmyaṃ. satyeṣv ākārāṇāṃ prathamato
SA01yabhkvyu:3625_9: vinyasanam iti. satyeṣv anityādyākārāṇām ādita upanipātanaṃ. tadālaṃbanānāṃ pravartanam ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3629: abhyāsenottoptīkaraṇaṃ. vivardhayata iti vistaraḥ. vivardhayato yogino vardhanena (Abhidh-k-vy 533)
SA01yabhkvyu:3630_0: viśiṣṭānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvaḥ. pūrvapratilabdhānām iti. aviśiṣṭānām asaṃmukhībhāvaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3630_1: kasmāt. abahumānāt. nyūnatvenāvahumānād ity arthaḥ. adhimātrasatyakṣamaṇād iti. uṣmagatāvasthāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3630_2: mṛdu satyaṃ kṣamate rocate. mūrdhāvasthāyāṃ madhyaṃ. tadanaṃtaram idānīm adhimātrasatyakṣamaṇāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3630_3: kṣāṃtir utpadyate. katham ity ata āha. aparihāṇita iti. yasmāt kṣāṃtir na parihīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3630_4: mūrdhabhyas tu parihīyata ity asti saṃbhavaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_0: iti. mṛdumadhye kṣāṃtī tathaiva. yathā mūrdhāna uktāḥ. tathaivākaraṇāt dharmasmṛtyupasthānena.
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_1: satyeṣv ākārāṇām ākaraṇād ity arthaḥ. sarvasyā iti. mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedabhinnāyāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_2: sarvasyāḥ kṣāṃteḥ. dharmasmṛtyupasthānenaiva vacanaṃ. nānyena kāyasmṛtyupasthānādinā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_3: kasmāt. agradharmaśleṣāt. agradharmā hi darśanamārgaśleṣāt. dharmasmṛtyupasthānātmaka
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_5: anaṃtarotpādāt kṣāṃteḥ kāmāvacaratvaduḥkhasatyālaṃbanam. agradharmaśleṣād dhi tatsādṛśyam
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_6: iti. niyamāvacanād iti. adhimātrakṣāṃtivad uṣmagatādīnām ālaṃbanaṃ pratiniyamāvacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_8: sidhyati. kathaṃ. kāmāptam eva duḥkhaṃ viṣayo 'syām. seyaṃ kāmāptaduḥkhaviṣayā adhimātrā
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_9: kṣāṃtiḥ. kṣāṃter evety avadhāraṇāt anyāny uṣmagatādīni traidhātukaduḥkhādyālaṃbanānīti
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_10: siddhaṃ. yadā kileti vistaraḥ. yadā kila rūpārūpyapratipakṣādīnām. adiśabdena rūpārūpyanirodhasamudayaduḥkhānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_12: ekaikasya satyālaṃbanasya cāpahrāsena yāvat kāmāvacaram eva duḥkhaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_13: manasikaroti. eṣā sarvaiva rūpārāpyapratipakṣākārahrāsāt prabhṛti madhyā kṣāṃtiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_14: katham. anvayajñānapakṣaṃ tāvan mārgaṃ mārgato nyāyataḥ pratipattito nairyāṇikataś
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_15: ceti [Tib. 194a] taiś caturbhir ākārair ākārayati. tatas tribhir ekaṃ hitvā. tato
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_16: dvābhyāṃ dvau hitvā. tata ekena. tato mārgasatyaṃ hitvā. rūpārūpyanirodhaṃ caturbhiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_17: svair ākārair ākārayati. tatas tribhiḥ dvābhyām ekenaiva cākārya nirodhasatyaṃ cāpāsya.
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_18: samudayasatyaṃ caturbhiḥ svair ākāraiḥ. tribhiḥ dvābhyām ekena cākārya. tathaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_19: tad apāsya. duḥkhasatyaṃ svair ākārair yāvad ekenākārya. tad api satyam apāsya. kāmāvacarapratipakṣaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3632_20: svaiś caturbhir ākāraiḥ tribhiḥ dvābhyām ekena cākārayati. tad apāsya. (Abhidh-k-vy 534)
SA01yabhkvyu:3633_1: duḥkhasatyaṃ caturbhir ākārair ākārayati. tatas tribhiḥ tato dvābhyām ākārayatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3633_2: evaṃ hi hrāsāraṃbhāt prabhṛti sarva ete kṣaṇā madhyā kṣāṃtir ity uktaṃ bhavati. tṛtīye
SA01yabhkvyu:3633_3: kṣaṇe tadālaṃbanaivādhimātrā kṣāṃtiḥ. caturthe agradharmās tadālaṃbanā eva. mrdvī
SA01yabhkvyu:3633_4: tu kṣāṃtir yā purastād adhimātrebhyo mūrdhabhyo 'naṃtaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3633_5: yāvan mārgasatyaṃ. rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ ca. svaiḥsvaiḥ sarvair ākārair anapahrāsaṃ manasikurvata ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3634: [Tib. 194b] evaṃ tāvad eke vyācakṣate. ākārāpahrāsapūrvaka ālaṃbanāpahrāsa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3635_0: apare punar vyācakṣate. ekaikasatyākārālaṃbanāpahrāseneti. naivaṃ grahītavyaṃ ekaikasatyākārālaṃbanāpahrāsene
SA01yabhkvyu:3635_1: ceti. kiṃ tarhi. rūpārūpyapratipakṣādīnām ekaikeṣāṃ satyānāṃ ye ākārāḥ. teṣām ālaṃbanahrāseneti vyākhyātavyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3636_0: ekānnaviṃśatikṣaṇaśataṃ madhyā kṣāṃtir iti varṇayaṃti. ākārāpahrāsa. pūrvake hy ālaṃbanāpahrāse
SA01yabhkvyu:3636_1: sati atibahavaś cittakṣaṇā visarpaṃti. na caitan nyāyyaṃ. na hi satyeṣu vidyamāneṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:3636_2: ākāratyāgo yujyate. yadā tu satyāni tyaktāni bhavaṃti. tadākāratyāga iti yuktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3636_3: evaṃ ca sati pūrvaṃ satyālaṃbanahrāsaṃ karoti paścād ākārahrāsaṃ. na hi maule viṣaye
SA01yabhkvyu:3636_5: aṣṭau vyavasthāpyaṃte. eṣām ākārā dvātriṃśad bhavaṃtīty etad adhunā nyāyāṃtaram upadiśyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3636_6: kathaṃ kṛtvā. yadā kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ caturbhir ākārair manasikaroti. evaṃ yāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:3636_7: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ pratipakṣaṃ caturbhir ākārair manasikarotīyaṃ mṛdvī kṣāṃtiḥ. yadā
SA01yabhkvyu:3636_8: punaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhaṃ caturbhir ākārair manasikarotīty evaṃ yāvat kāmāvacarāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3636_9: [Tib. 195a] saṃskārāṇāṃ pratipakṣaṃ manasikaroti caturbhir ākāraiḥ. rūpārūkyāvacarāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3636_10: saṃskārāṇāṃ pratipakṣaṃ parityajataḥ prabhṛti madhyā kṣāṃtir ārabdhā. tatra ca rūpārūpyāvacarapratipakṣaparityāge
SA01yabhkvyu:3636_14: catvāraḥ. kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ caturbhir ākārair manasikaroti. tasya bhavaṃty ākārāś
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_0: dṛṣṭicaritaḥ. tṛṣṇācaritaś ca. dṛṣṭicarito 'pi dvividhaḥ. ātmadṛṣṭi caritaḥ. ātmīyadṛṣṭicaritaś
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_1: ca. yo hy ātmadṛṣṭicarito bhavati. so 'nātmākāreṇa niyāmam avakrāmati. yas tv ātmīyadṛṣṭicaritaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_2: sa śūnyākāreṇa. tṛṣṇāśarito 'pi dvividhaḥ. asmimanopahataḥ. kausīdyādhikaś ca. tatra
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_3: yo 'smimānophataḥ. so 'nityākāreṇa niyāmam avakrāmati. yaḥ kausīdyādhikaḥ. sa duḥkhākāreṇa.
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_4: tatrātmadṛṣṭicarito yogācāraḥ punas tat kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ tribhir ākārair manasikaroti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_5: ekam ākāraṃ hitvā. tato dvābhyām anātmaśūnyatākārābhyāṃ. tata ekam anātmākāraṃ dviḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_7: eṣā madhyā kṣāṃtir ity evam ekānnaviṃśaṃ cittaśataṃ bhavati. evam ātmīyādhimuktasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_8: tu śūnyānātmākārābhyām ākārayataḥ śūnyākāraṃ dviḥ saṃmukhīkaroti. eṣāsya madhyā kṣāṃtiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_9: evam ekānnaviṃśakṣaṇaśatam. evaṃ tṛṣṇācarito dviprakāraḥ. asmimānopahataḥ. kausīdyādhikaś
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_10: ca vaktavyā iti. adhimātrā tu kṣāṃtir ekam eva kṣaṇaṃ. sā yathāpudgalacaritam anityākāreṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_11: vā duḥkhākāreṇa vā śūnyākāreṇa vā anātmākāreṇa vā saṃprayukteti. atha kim artham
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_12: ekaikasatyākārālaṃbanahrāsaḥ kriyate. pūrvaṃ hi tena traidhātukaṃ vidūṣayatā samastaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_13: pratipakṣa ālaṃbitaḥ. paścāt kāmadhātoḥ pūrvaṃ praheyaparijñeyatvāt kāmāvacara eva
SA01yabhkvyu:3637_14: duḥkhe 'vatiṣṭhata iti. tatpuruṣakāreṇa mārgākarṣaṇād iti. vinā sabhāgahetunā. pūrvasyānāsravasyābhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3638_0: sarve tu paṃca skaṃdhāḥ saparivāragrahaṇād iti. samāhitabhūmidatvād uṣmagatādīnām
SA01yabhkvyu:3638_1: avijñaptilakṣaṇo rūpaskaṃdho 'stīti [Tib. 196a] paṃca skaṃdhā uṣmagatādayaḥ saparivāragrahaṇāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3638_2: saparivārā gṛhyaṃte iti. mā bhūd āryasyeti. prāptisaṃmukhībhāvāt āryapudgalasyoṣmagatādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3638_3: phalaprāptiprayogabhūtānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvo mā bhūd iti prāptayo noṣmagatādiṣu gṛhyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3638_4: na hi prāptaprayogaphalasyāryasya prayogasaṃmukhīkaraṇaṃ nyāyyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3639_2: samarthatvāt. pratiniyatālaṃbanatvena hi kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīny asamarthānīti anāgatāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_0: bhāvyaṃta iti. yasmāt smṛtyupasthānena kāyavedanādayo 'pi duḥkhasatyādisaṃgṛhītā
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_1: gṛhyaṃte. kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīni ca pūrvapratilabdhāni bhavaṃtīty ataś catvāry api
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_2: bhāvyaṃte prāptyutpādād iti. nirodhasatyālaṃbane tad evobhayatheti. nirodhasatyālaṃbane
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_3: uṣmagatākaraṇe. dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannaṃ. tad eva cānāgataṃ bhāvyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_5: sabhāgā iti. trisatyālaṃbanasya nirodhasatyālaṃbanasya coṣmagatasyākaraṇe sadṛśā
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_6: evākārā bhāvyaṃte. duḥkhasatyālaṃbane duḥkhasatyākārā eva catvāro bhāvyaṃte. na samudayasatyādyākārāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_7: samudayasatyādyākārālaṃbane samudayasatyādyādyākārā eva catvāro bhāvyaṃte. nānya
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_8: ityādi. vivardhana iti. trisatyālaṃbane. kāyasmṛtyupasthānādīnām anyatamat pratyutpannaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_10: ākāraḥ sarve 'pi ṣoḍaśāpi bhāvyaṃte. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. labdhatvāt gotrāṇāṃ saṃbhavastaś
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_12: iti vistaraḥ. mūrdhākaraṇe sarvatrāpi dharmasmṛtyupasthānam eva pratyutpannaṃ. kāyādismṛtyupasthānānām
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_14: itareṣām ayogāt. trisatyālaṃbanavivardhane tu caturṇām anyatamat pratyutpannam. anāgatāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_15: sarvatra catvāri. ākārā api sarve. labdhatvāt gotrāṇām ity avagaṃtavyaṃ. [Tib. 197a]
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_16: kṣāṃtīnāṃ sarvatrāṃtyam iti. ākaraṇe vivardhane cāṃtyaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_17: tathā hy uktaṃ. sarvasyāḥ kṣāṃtyā dharmeṇa vardhanam iti. agradharmeṣv aṃtyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_18: agradharmeṣu saṃmukhīkriyamāṇeṣv aṃtyaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannam. anāgatāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_19: catvāri anutpattidharmāny eva prāpyaṃte. ākāraś catvāri eveti. anityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmākārāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_20: anyābhāvād iti. yasmād anyasamudayādyākārā agradharmā na saṃti duḥkhamātrālaṃbanatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_23: ānagatā bhāvyaṃta iti kiṃ neṣyata ity ataḥ punar āha. darśanamārgasādṛśyāc ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_24: duḥkhākārā eva catvāro bhāvyaṃte. kasmāt. darśanamārgasādṛśyāt. darśanamārge hi yasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3640_25: satyasya darśanaṃ bhavati. tadākārā eva bhāvyaṃte. darśanamārgasadṛśyā hy agradharmāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3641: eṣāṃ darśanamārgeṇa sādṛśyaṃ anuśleṣāt. tathaiva prathamataḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhālaṃbanatvaṃ [Tib. 197b] tulyabhūmikatvaṃ vā. tathā hi darśanamārgam adhikṛtya vakṣyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3643: iti . yad vā pṛthagjanatvaghātāya duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāṃter ānaṃtaryamārgabhūtā agradharmā bhavaṃti. tad eṣāṃ darśanamārgeṇa sādṛśyaṃ. sadṛśā hy ānaṃtaryamārgā vimuktimārgair iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3644_0: (VI.21-23) vidha vibhāga iti vistaraḥ. tasya dhātor etad yañirūpaṃ. niścita iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3644_1: niḥśabdasyārthaṃ darśayati. kathaṃ punar niścito vedha ity āha. tena vicikitsāprahāṇāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3644_2: niścitaḥ. satyānāṃ ca vibhajanāt. idaṃ duḥkham ayaṃ yāvan mārga iti. nirvedha āryamārgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3644_3: tasya bhāgo darśanamārgaikadeśaḥ. tasyāvāhakatvenākarṣakatvena hitatvāt tasmai hitam
SA01yabhkvyu:3644_4: iti chaḥ. tena nirvedhabhāgīyam iti bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3646: iti. anāgamyaṃ cāṃtaraṃ ca dhyānāni ca bhūmayo 'syety
SA01yabhkvyu:3648_0: nordhvam iti. nārūpyeṣu nirvedhabhāgīyam asti. darśanaparivāratvāt. darśanamārgaprayogatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3648_1: ity arthaḥ. tadabhāvaḥ. dāmadhātvālaṃbanatvād iti. tasya darśanamārgasyābhāvas tadabhāvaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3648_2: kva. ūrdhvam iti vartate. ārūpyeṣv ity arthaḥ. kasmāt. kāma dhātvanālaṃbanāt. yasmād
SA01yabhkvyu:3648_3: ārūpyāḥ kāmadhātuṃ [Tib. 198a] nālaṃbaṃte. āha. kiṃ kāmadhātvālaṇbanena darśanamārgeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3648_4: prayojanam iti. ata ucyate. tasya pūrvaṃ parijñeyapraheyatvād iti. tasya kāmadhātor
SA01yabhkvyu:3648_5: duḥkharūpasya pūrvaṃ parijñeyatvāt. samudayarūpasya ca praheyatvāt. atra ca hetur
SA01yabhkvyu:3648_6: yasmāt sa yogī kāmāvacareṇa duḥkhena vihanyate. tena sa pūrvaṃ tato mokṣam anveṣata
SA01yabhkvyu:3648_7: iti. teṣāṃ rūpadhātau paṃcaskaṃdhako vipāka iti. teṣāṃ nirvedhabhāgīyānāṃ rūpāvacaratvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3648_8: yadi ca yogī rūpadhātāv upapadyeta. tatas tasya tatra paṃca skaṃdhako vipāko 'bhinirvartate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3648_9: paripūrikāṇy eva ca tānīṣṭavedanīyajananāt. nākṣepakāṇi nikāyasabhāgasya. bhavadveṣitvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3652_0: yasmād ihaiva satyābhisamayao nānyadhātau. nordhvaṃ hi dṛkpathaḥ asaṃvegāt. iha vidhā
SA01yabhkvyu:3652_1: tatra niṣṭheti cāgamād iti. triṣu dvīpeṣūttarakuruvarjyeṣv iti vyākhyāyate. uttarakauravāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3652_2: mṛdvindriyatvāt. deveṣu saṃmukhībhāva iti. kāmāvacareṣu. caturthaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ

SA01yabhkvyu:3653_0: tṛīṇi nirvedhabhāgīyāny anyatra agradharmebhyaḥ. ihaiva janmani strīpuruṣendriyaparāvṛttau
SA01yabhkvyu:3653_1: ubhayāśrayāṇi strīpuruṣendriyāśrayāṇi striyaḥ puruṣāś ca labhaṃte. striyo hy etāny
