SA01yabhkvyu:3655_0: stry evobhayāśrayān agradharmān labhate. na puruṣaḥ. tathā hi strī tān labdhvā stryāśrayais
SA01yabhkvyu:3655_1: tais tadānīṃtanaiḥ samanvāgatā bhavati. janmāṃtaraparāvṛttau ca kāmadhātau puruṣāśrayaprādurbhāve
SA01yabhkvyu:3655_2: puruṣāśrayaiḥ sa puruṣaḥ samanvāgata iti. puruṣas tu puruṣāśrayān eva labhate. kasmād
SA01yabhkvyu:3655_3: ity āha. strītvasyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhalābhād iti. tasmiṃ janmani strītvaṃ janmāṃtare
SA01yabhkvyu:3655_4: 'pi punar nāstīty asyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhalābhaḥ. yo hy agradharmān utpādayati. so
SA01yabhkvyu:3655_5: 'vaśyam anaṃtaraṃ darśanamārgam utapādayen [Tib. 199a] na ca dṛṣṭasatyasya punaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3657_0: iti vistaraḥ. yadbhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyāni pratilabdhāni prathamadhyānabhūmikāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3657_1: yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāni. tāṃ bhūmiṃ tyajan prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yavac caturthaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3657_2: tyajann āryas tāny api yathāsvaṃ prathamadhyānadhūmikāni yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3657_3: tyajati. nānyathā na mṛtyunā parihāṇyā vā. yathā pṛthagjana ity arthaḥ. bhūmityāgaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3657_4: punar bhūmisaṃcārād iti. na vairāgyata iti darśayati. pṛthagjanas tv iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3657_5: pṛthagjanas tu nikāyasabhāgatyāgenaiva tyajati nirvedhabhāgīyāni saty asati vā bhūmisaṃcāre.
SA01yabhkvyu:3657_6: tathā hi pṛthagjano yadbhūmikanirvedhabhāgīyalābhī bhavati. tata ūrdhvam upapadyamānas
SA01yabhkvyu:3657_7: tāni bhūmisaṃcāre 'pi mṛtyunaiva tyajati. avītarāgas tv asati bhūmi saṃcāre mṛtyunā
SA01yabhkvyu:3657_8: tyajati. kāmadhātāv evopadyate. na tv evam (Abhidh-k-vy 539)
SA01yabhkvyu:3658_0: āryapudgalas tat kuśalamūlasaṃtater darśanamārgopabṛṃhitatvāt. pṛthagjana eva tathā
SA01yabhkvyu:3658_1: tyajatīti kathaṃ gamyate. aṇḍakalalādigataḥ pṛthagjanaḥ kāyena samanvāgataḥ. na kāyakarmaṇeti śāstre vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_0: ācaryavasumitras tu vyācaṣṭe. pṛthagjanas tu nikāyasabhāgatyāgenaiva tyajati. saty
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_1: asati vā bhūmisaṃcāra iti. sakalaṃ dhyānam atra bhūmigrahaṇena [Tib. 199b] gṛhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_2: tatra pṛthagjano yadā brāhmakāyikebhyaś cyutvā brahmapurohiteṣūpapadyate. tadā nikāyasabhāgatyāgena
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_3: tyajati. yadā tu prathamāt dhyānāc cyutvā dvitīya upapadyate. tadā bhūmityāganikāyasabhāgatyāgābhyām
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_4: iti. tad ayuktaṃ. brahmalokopapannānāṃ nirvedhabhāgīyābhāvāt. kāmadhātau hi nirvedhabhāgīyāny
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_5: utpadyaṃte. kāmadhātucyavanād eva ca teṣāṃ nirvedhabhāgīyatyāga iti. ācāryasaṃghabhadreṇāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_6: darśitam etat. nanu ca pṛthagjano 'pi yadbhūmikanirvedhabhāgīyalābhī bhavati. tata
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_7: ūrdhvam upapadyamāno nirvedhabhāgīyāni vijahyād iti. nāsty etat. nikāyasabhāgatyāgād
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_8: eva tyaktatvāt. maraṇabhavāsthito hi tāni tyajati. aṃtarābhavasthitena tu tyaktāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_9: ata ūrdhvam upapadyamānasya tan masti yad vijahyād iti. mṛtyunaivety ucyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_10: prātimokṣasaṃvaravad iti. yathā prātimokṣasaṃvaras tyaktaḥ punar ādīyamāno 'pūrva
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_11: eva labhyate. kasmāt. anucitayatnasādhyatvāt. anucitatvāt yatnasādhyatvāc ca. yasmād
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_12: anādim atisaṃsāre nocitāni bhavaṃti. āryamārgaparivāratvāt. tasmān na vairāgyalabhyāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_13: yasmād yatnasādhyāni. tasmān na pūrvatyaktāni labhyaṃta iti. sati pratisīmādaiśika
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_14: iti. sīmā nāma [Tib. 200a] maryādā. tasyā daiśiko deśayitā praṇidhijñānalābhī. tasmin
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_15: sati labdhavihīnāt pareṇotpādayati. yad anutpāditaṃ. tad utpādayatīty arthaḥ. asati
SA01yabhkvyu:3659_16: pratisīmadaiśike mūlād evoṣmagatāt prabhṛtīty arthaḥ. ete punar vihāniparihāṇī iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3663: vacanāt praihāṇir apy uktā. tenaite iti nirdiśati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3665_0: iti vihāniparihāṇyoḥ sāmānyarūpaparigrahād ubhayor grahaṇaṃ. parihāṇis tu doṣakṛtā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3665_1: kleśakṛtety arthaḥ. nāvaśyaṃ vihānir iti. sā hi guṇakṛtāpi bhavati na kevalaṃ doṣakṛtā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3666_0: vihāniḥ. doṣakṛtā tu tadyathā mithyādṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlavihāniḥ. pratisaṃdhicittena
SA01yabhkvyu:3666_1: vā keṣāṃcid dharmāṇāṃ vihānir iti. tad evaṃ yā parihāṇiḥ. vihānir api sā. yā tu vihāniḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3666_2: nāvaśyam asau parihāṇiḥ. guṇaviśeṣebhya eva hi parihāṇir iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3667_0: (VI.24) anutpattidharmatāṃ pratilabhata iti. apratisaṃkhyānirodhaṃ teṣāṃ gatyādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3667_1: pratilabhata [Tib. 200b] ity arthaḥ. tāṃ tu yathāyogam iti. tāṃ tv anutpattidharmatāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3667_2: yathāsaṃbhavaṃ mṛdvyām adhimātrāyāṃ ca kṣāṃtau pratilabhata iti vartate. kathaṃ kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3667_3: mṛdvyāṃ kṣāṃtyām apāyagatīnām anutpattidharmatāṃ pratilabhate. adhimātrāyam aṇḍajasaṃsvedajayonyoḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3667_5: adhimātrāyām aṣṭamādibhavānāṃ. aṣṭamādinavamādibhavānāṃ. darśanaheyakleśānāṃ cānutpattidharmatām eveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3668: (VI.25) tasyaiva tu gotrasyeti. kṣāṃtiparibhāvitasya śrāvakagotrasyety ācāryamataṃ. tasya kṣāṃtiparibhāvitatvenāvivartyatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3670_0: iti. pratyekabuddhaḥ kṣāṃtim api śrāvakagotrād vivartya syāt. na hi te parārtham
SA01yabhkvyu:3670_1: apāyān avagāhanta ity abhiprāyaḥ. āniṃjyapaṭusamādhitvād iti. aṣṭapakṣālmuktatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3670_2: āniṃjyaḥ samādhiḥ. ata eva paṭur uttaptatīkṣṇendriyatvād vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3671_0: yeṣāṃ tu khaḍgād anyo 'pīti. yeṣām ābhidhārmikāṇāṃ matena khaḍgād anyo 'pi pratyekabuddho
SA01yabhkvyu:3671_1: 'sti. utpāditanirvedhabhāgīyamātro 'pi vargacārī pratyekabuddha ity abhiprāyaḥ. teṣām
SA01yabhkvyu:3673_0: iti. yaḥ kṣipraṃ mokṣaṃ prāpnoti. sa ekasmiṃ janmani mokṣabhāgīyam utpādayet. dvitīye
SA01yabhkvyu:3673_1: nirvedhabhāgīyāni. tṛtīye āryamārga iti. yas tu pūrvasmin janmani saṃbhṛtamokṣabhāgīyo
SA01yabhkvyu:3673_2: bhavati. sa ekasminn api janmani nirvedhabhāgīyāny āryamārgaṃ cotpādayatīty avagaṃtavyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3673_4: phalotpattir āryamārgaḥ. asyāṃ dharmatāyām iti. pravacanadharmatāyām. avatāraparipākavimuktayo
SA01yabhkvyu:3673_5: bhavaṃtīti. avatāro mokṣabhāgīyena. paripāko nirvedhabhāgīyaiḥ. vimuktir āryamārgeṇeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3674_0: manaḥpraṇidhānaparigrahāt. praṇidhānaṃ punaś cetanāviśeśaḥ. ekabhikṣām api dattveti
SA01yabhkvyu:3674_1: kāyakarma. ekaśikṣām api cādāyeti vākkarma. tac ca manaskarmotthānam iti. trikarmasvabhāvam
SA01yabhkvyu:3674_2: alpakam apy etat mokṣābhilāṣabalādhānān mokṣabhāgīyam ākṣipati. mokṣasya bhāgaḥ prāptir
SA01yabhkvyu:3674_3: mokṣabhāgaḥ. [Tib. 201b] tasmai hitaṃ mokṣabhāgīyam iti. nānyatra prajñānirvedayor
SA01yabhkvyu:3674_4: abhāvād yathāyogam iti. kuruṣu tāvad ubhayaṃ nāsti. apāyeṣu nirvedo 'sti prajñā nāsti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3674_5: deveṣu prajñāsti nirvedo nāstīti. ato manuṣyeṣv eva triṣu dvīpeṣv ākṣipyate. nānyatra.
SA01yabhkvyu:3677: ity ārabhya nirvedhabhāgīyānukramaḥ. tatprasaṃgena mokṣabhāgīyopanyāsa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_0: nirvedhabhāgīyair api dharmakṣamaṇam. ato niṣyandena viśeṣaṇaṃ. yasyā dharmajñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_1: niṣyaṃdaḥ. sā dharmajñānakṣāṃtiḥ. dharmajñānārthaṃ kṣāṃtir dharmajñānakṣāṃtiḥ. puṣpaphalavṛkṣavad
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_2: yathā puṣpārthaṃ vṛkṣaḥ puṣpavṛkṣaḥ. phalārthaṃ vṛkṣaḥ phalavṛkṣaḥ. kārikāyāṃ tu
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_3: dharmakṣāṃtir iti vacanam ekadeśagrahaṇato devadatto datta iti yathā. samyaktvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_4: nirvāṇam ity uktam iti. samyaktavaṃ katamat. yat tat paryādāya rāgaprahāṇam iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_5: tatra niyamo niyāma iti. tatra samyaktve niyama ekāṃtībhāvo niyāma iti ghañi rūpaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_6: api tu niyama iti yamaḥ samupaniviṣu cety appratyayasya vibhāṣitatvāt. tasyāhigamanam
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_7: avakramaṇam iti. [Tib. 202a] tasyaikāṃtībhāvasyābhigamanaṃ prāptiḥ. tad eva viparyāsasyāpakramān
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_8: niyāmāvakrāṃtir ity ucyate. tasyāṃ ceti dharmajñānakṣāṃtau. pradīpajātivad iti. pradīpasyeva
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_9: jāter iva cety arthaḥ. yathā pradīpasyānāgatasya tamovināśane sāmarthyaṃ. jāteś cānāgatāyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_10: janyajanane. tathā pṛthagjanatvavyāvartane sāmarthyam anāgatāyā dharmajñānakṣāṃter
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_11: abhyupagamyate. nānyad iti. kleśaprahāṇāṃ kāritraṃ. laukikair agradharmair iti apara
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_12: iti. pṛthagjanatvaṃ vyāvartata iti prakṛtaṃ. na. taddharmatvād iti. na yuktam etal
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_13: laukikair agradharmais tadvyāvartana iti. kasmāt. te 'pi hi pṛthagjanadharmāḥ. kathaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3679_14: pṛthagjanadharmasya pṛthagjanadharmaṃ vyāvartiṣyaṃta iti. tadvirodhitvād adoṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3680_0: yathety āha. śatruskandhārūḍhatadghātanavad iti. yathā śatruskandhārūḍha eva kaścic
SA01yabhkvyu:3680_1: chatruṃ ghātayet. evaṃ kilāgradharmāḥ pṛthagjanatvaśatruskandhārūḍhās tad eva pṛthagjanatvaṃ ghātayeyur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3681_0: ubhayair iti. laukikair agradharmaiḥ [Tib. 202b] kṣāṃtyā ca pṛthagjanatvaṃ vyāvartyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3681_1: katham ity āha. ānaṃtaryavimuktimārgasādharmyād iti. laukikānām agradharmāṇām ānaṃtaryamārgeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3681_2: sādharmyaṃ. kṣāṃter vimuktimārgeṇa. yathā hy ānaṃtaryamārgeṇa kleśaḥ prahīyate. vimuktimārgeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3681_3: prahīṇaḥ evaṃ laukikair agradharmaiḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ vihīyate. kṣāṃtyā vihīnam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3682_0: anāsravādhikāraḥ sarvatreti. tena tato 'traiva dharmajñānam anāsravam iti gamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3682_1: tad duḥkhe dharmajñānam ity ucyate iti. śāstre tena nāmnā vyavahāra it darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3682_3: ādito duḥkhādidharmatattvajñānād ity arthaḥ. tadanvayatvād iti. taddhetukatvād ity
SA01yabhkvyu:3682_4: arthaḥ. tathaivānugamād iti. yathaiva dharmajñānenānugataṃ parijñātaṃ duḥkhādisatyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3682_5: duḥkhādibhir ākāraiḥ. tathaiva rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhādyanugamād anvayajñānam etad
SA01yabhkvyu:3682_6: iti vistaraḥ. evaṃ samanaṃtarotpattikrameṇa śeṣe samudaye rūpārūpyāvacare 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtir
SA01yabhkvyu:3683_0: nikāyāṃtarīyā āryadharmaguptaprabhṛtayaḥ. abhedena hy abhisamaya ucyata iti. ṣoḍaśa
SA01yabhkvyu:3683_1: citto 'yaṃ satyābhisamaya iti. darśanābhisamaya ālaṃbanābhisamayaḥ kāryābhisamayaś
SA01yabhkvyu:3684_0: darśanābhisamaya iti. darśanam evābhisamayaḥ. evam ālaṃbanābhisamayaḥ kāryābhisamayaś
SA01yabhkvyu:3684_1: ca. darśanābhisamayo 'nāsravayā prajñayā. tad dhi bhikṣavo dṛṣṭaṃ. yad anāsravayā
SA01yabhkvyu:3684_2: prajñayā dṛṣṭam iti vacanāt. prajñaiva darśanam iti vyavasthāpyate. ālaṃbanaṃ grahaṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3684_3: tatsaṃprayuktair api vedanādibhir bhavati. apiśabdāt prajñayāpi. yasmāc cittacaittaiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3684_4: satyāny ālaṃbyaṃte. kāryaṃ yasya satyasya yat kartavyaṃ. tadyathā duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3684_5: samudayasya prahāṇaṃ. nirodhasya sākṣātkaraṇaṃ. mārgasya bhāvanaṃ. tad viprayuktair
SA01yabhkvyu:3684_6: api śīlajātyādibhir bhavati. apiśabdāt prajñātatsaṃprayuktair api. prajñāsaṃprayuktaviprayuktair
SA01yabhkvyu:3684_7: hi tatkāryacatuṣṭayaṃ [Tib. 203b] kriyate. jātyādibhir ity ādiśabdāl lakṣaṇāṃtarāṇi
SA01yabhkvyu:3684_8: prāptayaś ca gṛhyaṃte. duḥkhe hīti vistaraḥ. duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne prajñayā. tasyābhisamayitur
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_0: 'bhiṣamayo yathoktaḥ. katham ity āha. samudayādīnāṃ samudayanirodhamārgāṇām abhisamayaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_2: sākṣātkaraṇaṃ nirodhasya tatprāptyutpādāt. bhāvanaṃ mārgasya saṃmukhībhāvāt. ākārabhedād
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_3: iti. pratyekam eṣāṃ duḥkhādīnām ākārabhedāt. na ca duḥkhākāreṇa samudayādīnāṃ darśanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_4: yujyate. tadākārārthabhedataḥ. athāpy anātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ satyānāṃ darśanam iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_5: brūyāt nikāyāṃtarīyaḥ. śūnyatānātmate sarvasatyānāṃ sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇam iti kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_6: na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt. duḥkhataḥ samudayato nirodhato mārgata
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_7: iti. tathā ca saty anātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ darśanam iti bruvan sūtravirodhaḥ. yasmāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_8: sūtra evam uktam āryaśrāvakasyeti vistaraḥ. atha manyase nāsti sūtravirodho yasmād
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_9: abhisamayāvasthāyāh pūrvaṃ prayogāvasthāyām [Tib. 204a] āryaśrāvakasya duḥkhaṃ vā
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_10: duḥkhato manasikurvata ity evamādi. ato 'nātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ darśanād ekābhisamaya
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_11: eveti. tac cāyuktam. anāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto dharmāṇāṃ vicaya iti vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_12: na hi prayogāvasthāyām anāsravamanasikāraḥ saṃbhavati. bhāvanāmārga evam iti ced
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_13: ya āryaśrāvakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvata iti vistareṇa. na. yathā darśanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_14: bhāvanāt. naitad evaṃ. yathaiva hi pūrvaṃ satyānāṃ darśanaṃ. tathaiva teṣāṃ paścād
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_15: bhāvanaṃ. bhāvanāmārgo bhavatīty arthaḥ. śeṣeṣu vaśitvalābhād iti. aṃtareṇa prayogaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_16: samudayādidarśanasaṃmukhībhāvaśaktilābho vaśitvalābhaḥ. tasmād iti. aṃtarā tu vyutthānām
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_17: asti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syād iti. śeṣeṣu vaśitvalābhād aṃtarā vyutthānaṃ prāpnotīti
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_18: doṣaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. ubhayathāpi ca vicāryamāṇe bahūnāṃ sūtrāṇāṃ virodhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_19: yathā ca teṣāṃ virodhaḥ. tathāgameṣu śrotavyaḥ. ekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanād
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_20: iti. yasmād asty etat vacanaṃ. duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ. samudayādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_21: kāryabhisamayaḥ prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇabhāvanād ity [Tib. 204b] ato 'smābhir apy evam
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_22: abhyupagamān nāsti doṣaḥ. āha. yady apy abhyupagamyata ity abhisamayaḥ. sūtre satyānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_23: krameṇābhisamayo virudhyate. ata ucyate. darśanābhiśamayaṃ tu pratīti vistaraḥ. sadṛṣṭāṃtāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_24: trīṇi sūtrāṇīti. saṃyuktāgame paṭhyaṃte. kathaṃ. anāthapiṇḍada āha. kiṃ nu bhadaṃta
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_25: caturṇām āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayaḥ. āhosvid ekābhisamaya iti. caturṇāṃ gṛhapate
SA01yabhkvyu:3685_26: āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayo na tv ekābhisamayaḥ. yo gṛhapate evaṃ vaded ahaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 544)
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_0: duḥkhaṃ āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayam āryasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti vistareṇa yāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_1: duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadam āryasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti. maivaṃ voca iti syād
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_2: vacanīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ. asthānam anavakāśo yad duḥkham āryasatyam anabhisametya
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_3: samudayam āryasatyam abhisameṣyati pūrvavat. yāvan nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. sthānam
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_4: etad iti pūrvavat. tadyathā gṛhapate ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kūṭāgārasya vā kūṭāgāraśālāyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_5: vā vā mūlapādam apratiṣṭhāpya bhittiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi. bhittim apratiṣṭhāpya talakaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_6: [Tib. 205a] talakam apratiṣṭhāpya cchadanaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti. maivaṃ voca iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_7: syād vacanīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ. asthānam anavakāśo yat kūṭāgārasyeti pūrvavat. yāvat
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_8: sthānam etad vidyate. yan mūlapādaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bhittiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti pūrvavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_9: yāvad evam eva gṛhapate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. yad duḥkhasatyam adṛṣṭvā samudayasatyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_10: drakṣyatīti vistaraḥ. athānyataro bhikṣur āha. kiṃ nu bhadaṃta caturṇām āryasatyānām
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_11: anupūrvābhisamayaḥ. āhosvid ekābhisamaya iti. bhagavān āha. caturṇāṃ bhikṣo satyānām
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_12: iti. pūrvavad yāvat tadyathā bhikṣo ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ catuṣkaḍevarasya sopānasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_13: prathamasopānakaḍevaram anabhiruhya dvitīyam abhirokṣyāmīti. dvitīyam anabhiruhya
SA01yabhkvyu:3686_14: tṛtīyaṃ. tṛtīyam anabhiruhya caturtham abhirokṣyāmīti. maivaṃ voca iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_0: syād vacanīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ. asthānam anavakāśo yac catuṣkaḍevarasya sopānasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_1: prathamasopānakaḍevaram anabhiruhya dvitīyakaḍevaram abhirokṣyati. evaṃ yāvat tṛtīyam
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_2: anabhiruhya caturtham abhirokṣyati. evam ihāpi nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. yad duḥkhasatyam
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_3: adṛṣṭvā samudayasatyaṃ drakṣyatītyādi. [Tib. 205b] tathāryānanda āha. kiṃ nu bhadaṃta
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_4: caturṇām āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayaḥ. utāho ekābhisamaya iti. pūrvasūtravat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_5: yāvat. tadyathānanda ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ catuṣpadikāyā niḥśreṇyāḥ prathamaṃ niḥśreṇīpadam
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_6: anabhiruhya prāsādam abhirokṣyāmīti. maivaṃ voca iti syād vacanīyaḥ. vistareṇa yāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_7: evam evānanda ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayasatyam
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_8: abhisameṣyāmīti vistareṇa yāvan nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti. etāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi. yo
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_9: duḥkha iti vistaraḥ. atha mataṃ syād yo duḥke niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_10: iti sūtrād ekābhisamaya iti. katham. aśaikṣā hi dharmā buddhaḥ. ta evāśaikṣā dharmā
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_11: mārgaḥ. tasmād duḥkhābhisamayān mārgo 'pi tenābhisamito yasmād duḥkhavad buddhe 'pi
SA01yabhkvyu:3687_12: niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitsa iti. kāṃkṣā vicikitsety anarthāṃtaraḥ. atha vāniścayābhilāṣaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3688_0: yathoktalakṣaṇā. nāsamudācārāvaśyaṃprahāṇābhisaṃdhivacanād iti. naitad evaṃ sūtrād
SA01yabhkvyu:3688_2: duḥkhe 'bhisamite buddhaviṣaye vicikitsāyā asamudācāro 'vaśyaṃprahāṇaṃ ca bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3688_3: ato yo duḥkhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi. sa ity uktam abhisaṃdhiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3689: (VI.30ab) te punaḥ ṣaḍbhūmikā ity uktaṃ prāg iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_0: (VI.30cd) anaṃtaryaśakyatvād iti. kṛtyāś ca śaki liṅ ceti śakyārthe kṛtyapratyayaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_1: aṃtarayituṃ śakyā aṃtaryāḥ. nāṃtaryāḥ anaṃtaryāḥ. kleśaprāptiṃ te vicchindaṃti. viprakṛtāvasthā
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_2: sā teṣām iṣyate. ānaṃtaryamārgeṇeti bhāve svarthe vṛddhividhānaṃ. anantarabhāvo anaṃtaramārgo
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_3: vā ānaṃtaryaṃ. tasya mārgā ānaṃtaryamārgāḥ. vimuktimārgāḥ. vimuktimārgā iti. vimuktau
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_4: mārgā vimuktimārgāḥ. kleśavimuktyavasthāmārgā ity arthaḥ. dvābhyāṃ cauraniṣkāsanakapāṭapidhānavad
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_5: iti. yathā dvābhyām ekena cauro niṣkāsyate. dvitīyena tadapraveśāya kapāṭaḥ pidhīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_6: evam ānaṃtaryamārgeṇa kleśacauro niṣkāsyate. tatprāpticchedataḥ. vimukitmārgeṇa ca
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_7: visaṃyogaprāptikapāṭaṃ pidhīyate. vartamānīkaraṇataḥ. yadi punar iti vistaraḥ. [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_8: 206b] yadi punar dvitīyenānaṃtaryamārgeṇaiva duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtyā saha visaṃyogaprāptir
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_9: utpadyeta. naiva duḥkhe dharmajñānam utpadyate. yad anena kartavyaṃ. tad duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtyaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_10: kriyetety abhiprāyaḥ. prahīṇavicikitsaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivālaṃbane kāmāvacaraduḥkhe prahīṇavicikitsaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_11: jñānaṃ notpannaṃ syāt. tatra hi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāṃtiḥ savicikitsaiva vartate
SA01yabhkvyu:3692_12: vicikitsāyā aprahīṇatvāt. na ca tatra duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtiḥ prahīṇavicikitseti
SA01yabhkvyu:3693_0: kṣāṃtibhir iti vistaraḥ. kṣāṃtibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇād yo 'yaṃ sāstrapāṭhaḥ. navasaṃyojananikāyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3693_4: iti. sūtre 'py uktam. iti hi bhikṣavo jñānavadhyāḥ kleśāḥ. vidyudupamaṃ cittam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3694_0: kṣāṃtiprahātavyaḥ saṃyojananikāya ity uktaṃ. na kṣāṃtīnām iti [Tib. 207a] vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3694_1: naitad evaṃ. kasmāt. kṣāṃtīnāṃ jñānaparivāratvāt. kṣāṃtayo jñānasya parivārā ity
SA01yabhkvyu:3694_2: ataḥ kṣāṃtiprahātavyaḥ saṃyojananikāyo jñānaprahātavya ucyate. rājaparivārakṛtasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3694_3: rājakṛtavyapadeśavat. yathā rājaparivārakṛtasya kasyacid arthasya rājakṛta iti vyapadeśo
SA01yabhkvyu:3694_4: bhavati. tadvad bhāvanāprahātavyas tu saṃyojananikāyo jñānaprahātavya eva. tatra
SA01yabhkvyu:3694_5: ānaṃtaryamārgo 'pi jñānasvabhāva iti. kleśaprahāṇe hy ānaṃtaryamārga eva viśeṣeṇādhikriyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3695_0: (VI.31ab) adṛṣṭasatyadarśanād iti jñānena katham adṛṣṭasatyadarśanaṃ bhavati. tad
SA01yabhkvyu:3695_1: apy adṛṣṭe satyāṃtare sati bhavatīti darśanamārgāṃtarālavartijñānaṃ darśanamārgaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3695_2: pāraṃparyam abhisaṃdhāya. tenāpy adṛṣṭam iva paśyatīti. atha vā adṛṣṭadṛṣṭer aḍṛṣṭadarśanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3695_3: paṃcadaśakṣaṇā darśanamārgo yāvad asya pudgalasyādṛṣṭadarśanaṃ pravartate. tāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:3695_4: asya kṣaṇā darśanamārgaḥ. tasya dṛṣṭe 'pi duḥkhe adṛṣṭadarśanam asya samudaye pravartata
SA01yabhkvyu:3695_5: evety āha. bhāvanāmārga eva ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇa iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_0: nanu ca tenāpy adṛṣṭaṃ paśyati kiṃ tad adṛṣṭam ity āha. mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtim iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_1: mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtir ātmānaṃ virahayya śeṣam anvayajñānapakṣyaṃ mārgam ālaṃbate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_2: svātmani [Tib.207b] vṛttivirodhāt. tenocyate. mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtim adṛṣṭāṃ paśyatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_3: satyaṃ prati ciṃteti vistaraḥ. satyaṃ prati cintā dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭam iti. na tu kṣaṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_4: prati dṛṣṭaḥ kṣaṇo na veti. kasmāt. paṃcadaśena kṣaṇena yad anvayajñānapakṣalakṣaṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_5: satyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ. tad eva ṣoḍaśenāpīti. nāsty apūrvadṛṣṭasatyadarśanam iti. na ṣoḍaśakṣaṇo
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_6: darśanamārga iti vyavasthāpyate. na hy ekakṣaṇenādṛṣṭena mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtilakṣaṇena
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_7: satyaṃ tanmārgasatyam aḍṛṣṭaṃ bhavati. laukikaṃ dṛṣṭāṃtam āha. yathā naikaluṅgena
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_8: ekasasyaśalākayā dātreṇālūnenācchinnena kedāram alūnaṃ bhavati. kiṃ tarhi. lūnam
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_9: evety arthaḥ. tathā hi kecit pramādād alūne 'pi ekaluṃge vaktāro bhavaṃti lūnam asmābhiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_10: kedāram iti. phalatvād iti vistaraḥ. phalatvād ityadihetubhir bhāvanāmārgam eva ṣoḍaśakṣaṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_11: sādhayati. bhāvanāmārgaḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ kṣaṇaḥ. saṃskṛtaśrāmaṇyaphalatvāt. sakṛdāgāmiphalavat
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_12: yāvad arhattvaphalavad vā. tathā bhāvitāṣṭajñānaṣoḍasākāratvād vihīnapratipannakamārgatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_13: prābaṃdhikatvāc ca. [Tib. 208a] phalāṃtaravad eva bhāvanāmārgaḥ. ṣoḍaśe hi kṣaṇe
SA01yabhkvyu:3696_14: 'ṣṭau jñānāni bhāvyaṃte. duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ yāvan (Abhidh-k-vy 547)
SA01yabhkvyu:3697: mārge 'nvayajñānam iti. ākārā api ṣoḍaśānityādyā bhāvyaṃte. tadvad eva ca darśanamārge 'ṣṭajñānaṣoḍaśākārabhāvanā nāsti. tatra hi sabhāgajñānākārabhāvanaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_0: iti vacanāt. mārgānvayajñāne ca pūrvamārgasya pratipannakamārgasya vihāniḥ. na ca
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_1: darśanamārge pūrvamārgavihānir iti. prābaṃdhikaṃ cedaṃ mārgānvayajñānaṃ. na ca darśanamārge
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_2: kṣāṃtir jñānaṃ vā kiṃcit prābaṃdhikam astīty ato 'pi mārgānvayajñānaṃ bhāvanāmārga
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_3: iti. itaraḥ pratyavasthānaṃ karoti. darśanamārgaḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ kṣaṇaḥ. avaśyakāparihāṇitvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_5: 'yaṃ pakṣa iti. bhāvanāmārgatve 'pi sādhyamāne tad aparihāṇitvam anenānumānenāpatatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_6: tad idam aṃtarnītam abhisamīkṣya punar āha. aparihāṇis tv iti vistaraḥ. yasmād darśanaheyānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_8: ca tasmāt phalamārgāt ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇāt parihāṇiḥ syāt srotaāpattiphalāt parihāṇiḥ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_9: na ca srotaāpattiphalāt parihāṇir ity ato na tasmāt parihīyate. itara āha. ata eveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_10: kim ayam. aparihāṇihetur evocyate. vayam apy etam artham abhidadhmahe. kim ayam upalabdhisamam
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_11: iti cottaram udgrāhyate. ācārya āha. ata eva darśanamārga iti cet. yadi manyase yata
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_12: eva darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇaṃ mārgānvayajñānena. ata eva darśanamārga iti. tan
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_13: na. atiprasaṃgāt. yadi mārgānvayajñānena darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇam ity ato darśanamārgaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_14: syāt. evaṃ saty atiprasaṃgaḥ syāt. tasmān mārgānvayajñānāt pareṇa sarveṇa bhāvanāmārgeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_15: darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇam iti sarva eva darśanamārgaḥ syāt. aniṣṭaṃ caitat. ṣoḍaśa
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_16: eva hi kṣaṇo darśanamārgo bhavadhir iṣyate. na saptadaśāṣṭadaśa ityādikaḥ kṣaṇaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_17: pravāhanyāyenotpadyate. dvitīye tṛtīye vā divase ya utpadyate tajjātīyo viśeṣamārgasaṃgṛhītaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_18: tan nāsti. tato 'pi hi nāsti parihāṇiḥ. tad evaṃ saty āvaśyakāparihāṇitvaṃ yo hetur
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_19: uktaḥ. so 'naikāṃtika iti darśitaṃ bhavati. [Tib. 209a] tadanaikāṃtikatvāc cāpratisādhanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_20: tat. na pūrvapakṣadūṣaṇaṃ ceti. āha. sapta jñānāni duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ yāvan mārge
SA01yabhkvyu:3699_21: dharmajñānaṃ kasmād durśanamārgo na punar aṣṭamaṃ mārge 'nvayajñānam (Abhidh-k-vy 548)
SA01yabhkvyu:3700_0: ity abhiprāyaḥ. darśanasyāsamāptatvād iti. mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtau darśanaṃ samāptaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3700_1: sarveṣāṃ satyānāṃ tadānīṃ dṛṣṭatvāt. duḥkhe dharmajñāna utpanne yady api kāmāvacaraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3700_2: duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ. rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhādi tu na tāvad dṛṣṭam. evaṃ yāvat. mārge dharmajñāna
SA01yabhkvyu:3700_3: utpanne rūpārūpyapratipakṣo na tāvad dṛṣṭa iti. sāvaśeṣaṃ darśanaṃ na samāptam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3700_4: tadaṃtarālatvād iti. darśanamārgāṃtarālatvāt. tayor vā dvayoḥ kṣāṃtyor aṃtarālatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3700_5: tāny api sapta jñānāni darśanamārgaḥ. śeṣadraṣṭavyasākāṃkṣatvāt tasya yogina ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3701_1: ity arthaḥ. pūrvam iti viśeṣaṇena bhāvanākāle paropadeśanirapekṣam arthānusaraṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3701_2: iti kathitaṃ bhavati. evaṃ dharmānusārīti. dharmair anusāro dharmānusāraḥ. so 'syāstīti
SA01yabhkvyu:3701_3: dharmānusārī. dharmair anusartuṃ śīlam asyeti vā. [Tib. 209b] pūrvaṃ svayam eva sūtrādibhir
SA01yabhkvyu:3701_4: dharmair dvādaśāṃgaiḥ pravacanair arthānusaraṇāt. pūrvavad vyākhyānaṃ. yāvat paṃca
SA01yabhkvyu:3701_5: prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavaṃtīti. yāvacchabdena yady eko dvau trayaś catvāraḥ paṃca prahīṇāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3701_6: prakārā bhavaṃti. tathaiva prathamaphalapratipannakāv ucyete. yathā sakalabandhanau.
SA01yabhkvyu:3703_0: iti. dvitīye iti dvitīyanimittam ity arthaḥ. carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ haṃtīti yathā. arvāṅ
SA01yabhkvyu:3703_2: bhavati. yadi tayoḥ pudgalayos tasmāt paṃcaprakāraprahāṇāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptaṣṭau vā
SA01yabhkvyu:3703_3: prakārāḥ pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇā bhavaṃti. tau dvitīyaphalapratipannakāv
SA01yabhkvyu:3703_4: iti. dvitīya iti vacanāt. pratipannakāv iti cādhikārād evaṃ padārthavyavasthā labhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3703_5: ūrdhvaṃ ceti prathamadhyānavītarāgau. yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanād vītarāgau.
SA01yabhkvyu:3704_0: (VI.33) arhattvaṃ tu na śakyam āditaḥ prāptum iti. anāgāmiphalam aprāpyādita evārhattvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3704_1: prāptuṃ na śakyate. kasmād ity āha. bhāvanāheyaprahāṇāt. na hi darśanamārgeṇa bhāvāgrikāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3704_2: bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇam astīti. yathā darśanamārgasvabhāveṣu paṃcadaśasu kṣaṇeṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:3704_4: pratipannakaḥ syāt. ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne ādito 'nāgāmino 'rhan syāt. bhāvāgrikabhāvanāheyaprahāṇād
SA01yabhkvyu:3704_5: dhy arhattvaṃ pratisthāpyate. āha. yadi darśanamārgeṇa bhāvāgrikāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3705_0: pūrvam eva. tarhi pṛthagjanāvasthāyām eva bhāvanāmārgeṇa bhavāgravairāgyāt tatphalapratipannakaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3705_1: teṣu vartamāno 'rhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannako bhaviṣyati. ṣoḍaśe tu cittakṣaṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3705_2: ādito 'rhann iti. ata ucyate. pūrvaṃ ca bhavāgravairāgyasaṃbhavād iti. na hi pūrvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3705_4: tasmād āditaḥ pratipannako 'rhaṃś ca na syād iti. śraddhāprajñādhikatvenādhimokṣadṛṣṭiprabhāvitatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3705_6: śraddhādhimukta iti kṛtvā. na tu tasya prajñā naivāsti. tayā na tu prabhāvita iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3705_7: na tan nāma labhate. prajñādhikatvena dṛṣṭiprabhāvitatvāt dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ. na tu tasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3705_8: śraddhā nāsīti pūrvavad vācyaṃ. apare tu punaḥ. [Tib. 210b] nairuktavidhim ālaṃbya
SA01yabhkvyu:3705_9: vyācakṣate. śraddhādhipatyena darśanaheyebhyo muktaḥ śraddhādhimuktaḥ. dṛṣṭyādhipatyena
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_0: iti uktam. ataḥ pṛcchati kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam iti vistaraḥ. phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na labhyata
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_2: na bhāvyata ity arthaḥ. yāvan na viśeṣāya prayujyata iti. yāvan nāprahīṇakleśaprahāṇāya
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_3: phalāṃtaraprāptinimittaṃ prayogaṃ karoti. tāvat pratipannako nocyate. yadā prayujyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_4: tadā pratipannaka ity arthād uktaṃ bhavati. tadā hi pūrvaprahīṇakleśapratipakṣasyāpratilabdhapūrvasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_5: tatprahāṇasya cānāsravā prāptir utpadyata iti siddhāṃtaḥ. evam anyatrāpi phale veditavyam
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_6: iti. ṣoḍaśe citte srotaāpanna evocyata iti vacanāt. srotaāpanna ukta ity ato 'nyatrāpi.
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_7: sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale ca veditavyaṃ. laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇāṣṭaprakāro 'pi
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_8: ṣoḍaśe citte sakṛdāgāmy evocyate. nānāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ. yasmāt phale phalaviśiṣṭasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_9: mārgasya lābho nāstīti. evaṃ kāmavītarāga ūrdhvaṃ vā ṣoḍaśe citte nārhattvaphalapratipannaka
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_10: ucyate. yasmāt phale phalaviśiṣṭasyeti [Tib. 211a] pūrvavat. yas tu tṛtīyadhyānavītarāga
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_11: iti vistaraḥ. tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgaḥ adharāṃ bhūmiṃ niśrityānāgamyaṃ dhyānāṃtaraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_12: prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmatīty asti saṃbhavaḥ. so 'vaśyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_13: phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti tṛtīyadhyānasaṃgṛhītaṃ vā. yatas tṛtīyadhyānasaṃgṛhītam
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_14: anāsravaṃ sukhendriyaṃ labhyate. asti hi sambhāvanā yad asau phalaviśiṣṭamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkuryāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3707_15: yasmād asya tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaḥ kleśaḥ prahīṇa iti. tena so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_0: saṃmukhīkarotīti niyamyate. anyathā hi yadi na saṃmukhīkarotīty arthaḥ. sa tasmād
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_1: ūrdhvopapannaḥ. sa āryaḥ. tasmāt tṛtīyadhyānād ūrdhvaṃ caturthe dhyāne ārūpyeṣu vā
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_2: sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt. yad dhi sāsravaṃ sukhendriyaṃ. tad bhūmisaṃcārāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_3: tyaktaṃ. yad api cānāsravaṃ. tad api. yadi na saṃmukhīkṛtaṃ syād ubhayenāpi sukhendriyenāsamanvāgataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_4: syād āryāṇāṃ cordhvopapannānām avaśyaṃ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgama uktaḥ. sukhendriyeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_5: caturthadhyānārūpyopannaḥ pṛthagjano na samanvāgataḥ. āryas tu samanvāgata iti vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_6: yaś cāpi saumanasyendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ. so 'vaśyaṃ paṃcabhir upekṣājīvitamanaḥsukhasaumanasyendriyair
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_7: ity evamādivacanāc ca. [Tib. 211b] atra brūmaḥ. asty eṣa vibhāṣāyāṃ likhitapakṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_8: sa tu na sthāpanāpakṣo lakṣyate. apara āhur iti vacanāt. yo hi caturthadhyānalābhī
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_9: ṣaṇṇāṃ bhūmīnām anyatamāṃ bhūmiṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmati. sa ṣaḍbhūmikenānāgāmiphalenānāgamyabhūmikena
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_10: yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikena ṣoḍaśe citte samanvāgato bhavati. tathā vītarāgatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_11: yas tṛtīyadhyānalābhī. sa paṃcabhūmikena. caturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ hitvā. evaṃ yo dvitīyadhyānalābhī.
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_12: sa caturbhūmikena. tṛtīyacaturthabhūmike hitvā. yas tu vītarāgaḥ prathamadhyānalābhī
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_13: vā dvitīyālābhī. sa yady anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti. tribhūmikenāsāv anāgāmiphalena samanvāgataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3708_15: eva tribhūmikenānāgāmiphalena samanvāgata iti varṇayaṃti. tasmād aparapakṣāpekṣayaivam
SA01yabhkvyu:3709_0: (VI.35ab) evaṃ tāvad bhūyaḥkāmavītarāgāṇām iti. bhūyovītarāgāṇāṃ. kāmavītarāgāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3709_1: ca. tatra bhūyovītarāgo yasya saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇā
SA01yabhkvyu:3709_2: bhavaṃti. yasya [Tib. 212a] nava prakārāḥ prahīṇāḥ. sa kāmavītarāgaḥ. bhūyovītarāgāṇāṃ pudgalavyavasthā
SA01yabhkvyu:3716: iti vacanāt. kāmadhātau nava prakārāḥ kleśā upadiṣṭāḥ. celād iti vastrāt. eṣa dṛṣṭāṃtayoga iti. drstāṃtayuktir dṛṣṭāṃtayogo dṛṣṭāṃtaprakāra ity apare. (Abhidh-k-vy 551)
SA01yabhkvyu:3717_0: tad evam anayā yuktyānena vā prakāreṇānyo 'pi dṛṣṭāṃto vaktavya iti sūcayati. anyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:3717_1: hy eṣa dṛṣṭāṃta ity eva brūyāt. anādisaṃsāra iti. anādau saṃsāre. svahetuparaṃparayā
SA01yabhkvyu:3717_2: dhyāpitā abhivardhitās tataś cādhimātrapramāṇam eteṣām ity abhiprāyaḥ. teṣāṃ kleśānām
SA01yabhkvyu:3717_3: unmūlanāt prāpticchedataḥ. mūlasadharmiṇyo hi prāptayas tatprabaṃdhatvāt kleśānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3717_4: tṛvṛtkarṣaniṣkarṣaṇavad iti. yathā trivṛtkarṣeṇa dharaṇena subahukāle saṃvardhitānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3717_5: vātapittādīnāṃ doṣāṇāṃ niṣkarṣaṇaṃ. evaṃ kṣāṇikamṛdukenāpy āryamārgeṇa kleśānāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3717_6: yathā ca kṣaṇikenālpena pradīpena [Tib. 212b] mahatas tamaso ghātaḥ. tadvat kleśānām iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3718: (VI.35cd) saptakṛtvaḥ paramaṃ janmāsyeti. saptakṛtvo janmaprakarṣaṇāsya. nātaḥ param ity arthaḥ. tena mārgeṇa nirvāṇagamanād ity arthaḥ. srotasā hi loke gamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_0: ādyamārgalābhāc cet. ādyo 'nāsravo mārgo darśanamārgas tasya lābhāc cet srotaāpannaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_1: aṣṭamako 'pi syāt. srotaāpattiphalapratipannako 'pi syād ity arthaḥ. tathā hi pratilomakrameṇārhata
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_3: 'ṣṭamako bhavati śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī vā tasyāpy ādyamārgalābhāt so 'pi srotaāpannaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_4: syāt. ādyaphalalābhāc cet. atha mataṃ apūrvaphalasya lābhāt srotaāpanna iti. bhūyovītarāgo
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_5: 'pi syāt. yaḥ prahīṇaṣaṭkleśaprakāraḥ ṣoḍaśe kṣaṇe sakṛdāgāmī. so 'pi srotaāpannaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_6: syāt. tasyāpy apūrvaphalalābhāt. evaṃ kāmavītarāgo 'pi syāt. tasyāpi tad ādyaṃ phalam
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_7: iti. idānīṃ parihāra [Tib. 213a] ucyate. sarvaphalaprāpiṇam adhikṛtyādyaphalalābhād
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_8: iti. sarvaphalam iti. srotaāpattiphalādīni catvāri. tatprāptuṃ śīlam asyeti sarvaphalaprāpī.
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_9: sarvaphalaprāpti asyāsīti vā sarvaphalaprāpī. tam adhikṛtya tam abhisaṃdhāyādyaphalalābhād
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_10: apūrvaphalalābhāt srotaāpanna ucyate. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam iti vistaraḥ. kasmāt sa eva
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_11: srotaāpanna ucyate. nāṣṭamakaḥ sa cāpi hy āryamārgasrotaāpanna iti. pratipannakaphalamārgalābhād
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_12: iti vistaraḥ. yasmāt tena sarvaphalaprāpiṇā pratipannakamārgaḥ paṃcadaśakṣaṇasvabhāvaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_13: bhāvanāmārgaś ca ṣoḍaśakṣaṇo labdhaḥ. aṣṭamakena tu pratipannakaḥ mārga eva labdha
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_14: iti. itaś ca darśanabhāvanāmārgalābhāt. yasmāc ca tena darśanamārgaś ca sa eva bhāvanāmārgaś
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_15: ca sa eva labdhaḥ. aṣṭamakena tu darśanamārga eveti. sakalasroto'bhisamayāc ca mārgānvayajñāne.
SA01yabhkvyu:3719_16: yasmāc cānena sakalaṃ sroto'bhisamitaṃ mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtikṣaṇasyāpi darśanān na
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_0: ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sarvaphalaprāpy eva srotaāpanna ity ucyate nāṣṭamakaḥ. prakarṣagater
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_1: hi tathā vacanaṃ. tadyathā loke yaḥ prakarṣeṇa bhāsaṃ karoti. sa bhāskara ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_2: na khadyotakaḥ. [Tib. 213b] tadvat. tasmād anyān iti. tasmāt sāṃpratikād bhavād anyān.
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_3: saptasthānakauśalasaptaparṇavad iti. yathā saptakasāmānyāt saptasthānakuśalo bhikṣur
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_4: uktaḥ sūtre. kathaṃ. vistaram uktvāha. kathaṃ ca bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ saptasthānakuśalo
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_5: bhavati. rūpaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. rūpasamudayaṃ rūpanirodhaṃ rūpanirodhagāminīṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_6: pratipadaṃ rūpasyāsvādam ādīnavaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. evaṃ vedanāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_7: saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. vijñānasamudayaṃ vistareṇa yāvan
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_8: niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti. evam anena nyāyena paṃcasaptakāni paṃcatriṃśad
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_9: iti. paṃcatriṃśat kuśalaḥ prāpnoti. saptaparṇavac ca. yathā ca pattrikāyāṃ pattrikāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_10: saptaparṇasādṛśyād anekaśatapattro 'pi san sa vṛkṣaḥ saptaparṇa ity ucyate. tadvat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_11: prathamo dṛṣṭāṃtaḥ pravacane siddhaḥ. dvitīyo loka iti dṛṣṭāṃtadvayopanyāse prayojanam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3720_12: yadi saptakasāmānyāt saptakṛtvaḥ parama iti vyākhyāyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3721_0: yat tarhi sūtra uktaṃ. tad virudhyata ity ato 'pavyākhyānam etad ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3721_1: ekasyāṃ gatāv aṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayatīty avirodhaḥ. yathārutaṃ vā kalpyamāna
SA01yabhkvyu:3721_2: iti. saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca saṃsṛtya saṃdhāvya [Tib. 214a] duḥkhasyāṃtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3721_3: karotīti devamanuṣyavacanād aṃtarābhavo 'pi na syāt. iṣyate ca devamanuṣyagatyoḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3721_4: saptabhavābhinirvartanam. aṃtarābhavās tu na gaṇyāṃta iti. yadi aṃtarābhavaiḥ saha
SA01yabhkvyu:3721_5: saptabhavā gaṇyeran janmacatuṣṭayam evāsya syāt. tad evānenāniṣṭāpattivacanena tadātmīyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3721_6: vyākhyānam ekasyāṃ gatāv iti samarthayati. itara āha. evam apy ūrdhvaṃsrotasa iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3721_7: vistaraḥ. yady ekasyāṃ gatāv aṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayatīti vyākhyāpayasi. kathaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3721_8: tarhi ūrdhvasrotaso 'ṣṭamabhavābhinirvṛttir ekasyāṃ gatau bhavati. bhavāgraparamasyeti
SA01yabhkvyu:3721_9: viśeṣaṇaṃ kim artham. akaniṣṭhaparamasyāpi aṣṭamabhavābhinirvṛttiḥ saṃbhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3722: sa pluto 'rdhaplutaḥ sarvaś cyutaś cānyo bhavāgraga
SA01yabhkvyu:3723_0: iti vacanāt. sa cāpi vaktavyaḥ. bhavaprakarṣavivakṣāyāṃ tu bhavāgraparamagrahaṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3723_1: ity abhiprāyaṃ lakṣayāmaḥ. kāmadhātvabhisaṃdhivacanād iti. kāmadhātau caikā gatir
SA01yabhkvyu:3723_2: manuṣyagatiḥ. devagatir vā. tasyām aṣṭamabhavaṃ nābhinirvartayati. na tu rūpārūpyadhātvor
SA01yabhkvyu:3723_3: iti. kim atra jñāpakaṃ. sūtraṃ yuktir vā. kāmadhātum adhikṛtyedam uktam iti. [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_0: yuktir atrānumānaṃ. yena codakenaivaṃ coditaṃ kim atra jñāpakaṃ sūtraṃ yuktir veti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_1: sa eva punar āha. iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu iti vistaraḥ. pratyekaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_2: devamanyuṣyeṣu saptakṛtvaḥ saṃsṛtyeti. na punar ubhayeṣv eva devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtva
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_3: iti. tad uktaṃ bhavati. yo manuṣyeṣu dṛṣṭasatyaḥ. sa deveṣu triṣkṛtvaḥ saṃsṛtya manuṣyeṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_4: ca triṣkṛtva eva tato devān āgamya parinirvātīti. yo vā deveṣu dṛṣṭasatyaḥ. sa tathaiva.
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_5: sa manuṣyeṣu triṣkṛtvo deveṣu ca triṣkṛtva eva saṃsṛtya tato manuṣyān āgamya parinirvātīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_6: evaṃ hi paṭhyate saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ceti. sāmānyarūpeṇa hi paṭhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_7: na pratyekam iti viśiṣya paṭhyata ity arthaḥ. evaṃ vaibhāṣikapakṣe saṃśayāvasthe
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_8: kṛte ācāryaḥ samarthayann āha. pratyekam api tu kāśyapīyā iti vistaraḥ. kāśyapīyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_9: nikāyāṃtarīyāḥ. ta evaṃ paṭhanti. saptakṛtvo devān saptakṛtvo manuṣyān iti. evaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_10: pratyekamartho labhyate. tad anenobhayam api parihṛtaṃ bhavati. yad uktaṃ kim atra
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_11: jñāpakaṃ sūtraṃ yuktir vā kāmadhātum adhikṛtyedam uktam iti. yac coktam iha caiva
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_12: kiṃ jñāpakaṃ. pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtva iti. [Tib. 215a] pratyekamarthaparigraheṇaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_13: hi kāmadhātvabhisaṃdhir api sūcito bhavati. na hi rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ saptakṛtvo devamanuṣyeṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_14: saṃsaraṇaṃ yujyate. tatropapannānām anāgāmināṃ manuṣyānāgamanāt. yuktir apy ata eva
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_15: gamyate. yatraiva saptakṛtvobhavaparama uktaḥ. tatraiva bhūmāv aṣṭamabhavapratiṣedha
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_16: upapadyate nānyatreti. nātrābhiniveṣṭavyam iti. iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakam iti. tajjātīya
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_17: iti. tatprakāraḥ. yena tāvatā kālenāvaśyaṃ saṃtatiparipākān nāṣṭamaṃ bhavam abhinirvartayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_18: saptapadāśīrviṣadaṣṭavat. saptapadāśīrviṣeṇa tena daṣṭo yathā saptapadāni gatvā mriyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_19: na pareṇa nārvāk. viṣajātiḥ sā tādṛśī. cāturthakajvaravac ca. yathā cāturthako jvaraś
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_20: caturtha evāhani bhavati. na pareṇa nārvāk. rogajātiḥ sā tādṛśī. tadvat. dve avarabhāgīye
SA01yabhkvyu:3724_21: iti. kāmacchandavyāpādau. kāmāvītarāgatvād etau bhavataḥ. paṃcordhvabhāgīyānīti.

SA01yabhkvyu:3779_6: cetarasya. kathaṃ tathā sādhyatvam ity āha. ayatnayatnaprāptitas tatparinirvāṇasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3780_0: atha vāhyavāhimārgayor iti. mārgayor eva grahaṇaṃ na pudgalayor abhisaṃbaṃdhaḥ. vāhino
SA01yabhkvyu:3780_2: ayatnasaṃmukhībhāvataḥ pūrvamārgasya. yatnaprāptita itarasyeti. [Tib. 221a] tad evam
SA01yabhkvyu:3780_3: anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pūrvaṃ yujyate. āha. yady anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyiṇo vāhī (Abhidh-k-vy 560)
SA01yabhkvyu:3781_0: mārgo 'nabhisaṃskāraśādhyatvāt upapadyaparinirvāyiṇo 'pi vāhī mārga iti. kas tayor
SA01yabhkvyu:3781_1: viśeṣa iti. ata ucyate. upapadyaparinirvāyiṇas tu mārgo vāhitaro jitataraḥ. nānabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyiṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3781_2: evam adhimātrataro hetūpacayataḥ. mṛdutarāś cānuśayāḥ mārgādhimātrataratvena kṣapitatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3782: ūrdhvasrotā iti. ūrdhvasroto gatir asyeti ūrdhvasrotāḥ. yatra ūrdhvam iti paṭhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3784_1: nipātyata iti veditavyaṃ. yathā ciraśabdasya ciraṃtanam ity ūrdhvam iti nipāto 'stīty
SA01yabhkvyu:3784_2: apare. akārāṃto 'pi tūrdhvaśabdo 'sty eveti na vāryate. vyavakīrṇāvyavakīrṇadhyānatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3784_3: iti. miśritāmiśritadhyānatvād ity arthaḥ. anāsraveṇa sāsravasya dhyānasya miśritatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3784_4: iha dhyānāni vyavakīrya dhyānatrayāt parihīyata iti. dhyānavyavakiraṇaṃ caturthadhyānavyavakiraṇapūrvakam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_0: iti vacanāt. caturtham eva hi dhyānam ādito vyavakiraṇe samarthaṃ. nānyat. caturthāc
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_1: ca dhyānād aparihīṇasya prathamādiṣu dhyāneṣūpapattir nāstīty ata ucyate. dhyānatrayāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_2: [Tib. 221b] parihīṇa iti. kathaṃ ca parihīṇa ity āha. prathamaṃ dhyānam āsvādyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_3: madhyānimajjanāt madhye 'nimajjanāt. ardhapluto nāmeti vistaraḥ. ya ekam api sthānāṃtaraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_4: vilaṃghya śuddhāvāseṣūpapadyākaniṣṭhān praviśatīty evaṃ vākyābhisaṃbaṃdhaḥ. dṛṣṭisthānatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_5: iti. mahābrahmaṇāṃ prathamopapannānāṃ ca mahābahmaṇi nirmāyakābhimānataḥ. ekamāyakatvāc
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_6: ceti. kiṃ. mahābrahmasv āryo nopapadyate. āryasya hi prabhāvavatas tatrotpāde saty
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_7: ubhayanāyakatvaṃ syāt. niḥsapatnena ca karmaṇā tatrādhipatim. ataḥ sasapatnaṃ na
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_8: bhavatīti. sarvāṇi sthānāṃtarāṇīti. brahmakāyikebhyaś cyutvā brahmapurohitādīni sudarśanāntāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_9: caturdaśasthānāṃtarāṇi saṃcaryākaniṣṭhān praviśati. yatropapannas tatas tatra cātyaṃtam
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_10: anāgamanād iti. yatropapannas tadyathā. prathamadhyāne. tato 'tyaṃtam anāgamanāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_11: kāmadhātau. tathā yatropapannas tatra cātyaṃtam anāgamanāt. tatra ca punaḥ prathame
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_12: dhyāne 'tyaṃtam anāgamanāt. paripūrṇam anāgāmitvaṃ punas tatra dvitīyajanmākaraṇāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_13: śamathacarito hy eṣa iti. ya eṣa bhavāgraparamaḥ sa samādhipriyaḥ. ārūpyeṣu ca samādhir
SA01yabhkvyu:3786_14: atipraśāṃtaḥ. tasmād ayam ārūpyān praviśati. pūrvakas tu vipaśyanācarita iti. yo
SA01yabhkvyu:3787_0: uktaḥ. [Tib. 222a] sa prajñāpriyaḥ śuddhāvāsān praviśati. aṃtarāparinirvāṇam iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3787_1: vistaraḥ. naitat prati śāstrakārair niścitaṃ. na ca pratiṣiddham ato 'pratiṣedhād
SA01yabhkvyu:3787_2: ūrdhvasrotaso 'kaniṣṭhaparamasya bhavāgraparamasya cāṃtarā akaniṣṭhāṃ bhavāgraṃ ca
SA01yabhkvyu:3787_3: praviśya parinirvāṇaṃ yujyamānaṃ paśyāmaḥ. saṃbhavaṃ tu paśyāma ity arthaḥ. nanu
SA01yabhkvyu:3787_4: cākaniṣṭhaparamo bhavāgraparama iti coktam ata āha. akaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvaṃ tu
SA01yabhkvyu:3787_5: pareṇa gatyabhāvād akaniṣṭhebhyo bhavāgrāc cordhvaṃ gatyabhāvāt. tadyathā srotaāpannasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3787_6: saptakṛtvaḥ paramatvaṃ. na hi tasya dvau trīn vā bhavān abhinirvartya parinirvāṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3787_7: na saṃbhavatīti. tataḥ pareṇa tv aṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayatīti. saptakṛtvaḥ parama ukta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3788_0: sa punaś caturvidha ity aṃtarāparinirvāyyabhāvān na paṃcavidhaḥ. ete ṣaḍ anāgāmino
SA01yabhkvyu:3788_2: ūrdhvasrotāḥ ārūpyagaś ca. ṣaṣṭhaś caturdhābhedam avigaṇayyeti. dṛṣṭadharmaparinirvāyī.
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_0: (VI.40) katham eṣāṃ trayāṇām iti [Tib. 222b] vistaraḥ. trayo 'nāgāmina iti nirbhidya
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_1: noktā ity anavabudhyamāna itaraḥ pṛcchati. ācāryo 'py arthāpattyoktā eta iti paśyan
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_3: cety arthaḥ. ūrdhvasrotasaś ca tṛtīyasyeti. āśvanāśuciraparinirvāṇāt dṛṣṭāṃtatrayeṇeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_4: āśuparinirvāyī anāśuparinirvāyī ciraparinirvāyī ca dṛṣṭāṃtatrayeṇa yojayyitavyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_5: tadyathā parīttaḥ śakalikāgnir abhinirvartamāna eva nirvāyāt. evaṃ prathamo ya āśuparinirvāyī.
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_7: ayaḥprapāṭikotpataty eva nirvāyāt. evaṃ dvitīyo yo 'nāśuparinirvāyī. tadyathāyoguḍānām
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_8: iti pūrvavad yāvad ayaḥprapāṭikotplutya pṛthivyām apatitaiva nirvāyāt. evaṃ tṛtīyo
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_9: yaś ciraparinirvāyī. etac ca sūtraṃ vistareṇa purastāl likhitam iti na punar likhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_11: parinirvāṇāt [Tib. 223a] tridhābhedān navānāgāmino bhavaṃtīti saṃbaṃdhaḥ. upapadyaparinirvāyī
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_12: ya upapannamātraḥ parinirvāti. na tv abhisaṃskāreṇānabhisaṃskāreṇa vā parinirvāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_13: sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī tu nopapadyaiva parinirvāti. kiṃ tarhi. abhisaṃskāreṇāpratiprasrabdhasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_14: pūrvābhisaṃskārasya sāmarthyataḥ parinirvāti. asya hi yady api vāhī mārgo 'sti abhiyogena
SA01yabhkvyu:3789_15: tu parinirvāti. upapadyaparinirvāyī tu nābhiyogeneti viśeṣaḥ. anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī (Abhidh-k-vy 562)
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_1: eva eṣāṃ viśeṣo 'vagaṃtavyaḥ. yathā tu sābhisaṃskārānabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyiṇāv apy
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_2: upapadyaparinirvāyyākhyāṃ labhete. tathā darśayann āha. sarve hy eta upapadyaparinirvāṇād
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_3: upapadyaparinirvāyiṇa iti. plutādibhedād iti. plutārdhaplutasarvacyutabhedād ity
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_4: arthaḥ. sarveṣāṃ vā trayāṇām iti. aṃtaropapadyaparinirvāyyūrdhvasrotasām āśvanāśuciraparinirvāṇāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_5: [Tib. 223b] tridhābhedaḥ. kaścid aṃtarāparinirvāyī āśuparinirvāyī bhavati. kaścid
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_6: anāśuciraparinirvāyī. evam upapadyaparinirvāyī. ūrdhvasrotāś ceti. asmāc ca tridhābhedān
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_7: navānāgāmino bhavaṃtīti sa eva saṃbaṃdho vācyaḥ. tadviśeṣaḥ punar iti vistaraḥ. teṣāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_8: punas trayāṇām aṃtaropapadyaparinirvāyiṇoḥ ūrdhvasrotasaś ca. navānāṃ caiṣām eva
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_9: pratyekaṃ tridhābhedād yathā varṇitād viśeṣaḥ. karmakleśendriyaviśeṣāt. karmaṇaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_10: kleśasyendriyasya ca viśeṣād bhavati. katham ity āha. trayāṇām iti vistaraḥ. abhinirvṛttir
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_11: aṃtarābhāvaḥ abhinirvṛttivedanīyasya karmaṇa upacitatvād aṃtarāparinirvāyī. upapadyavedanīyasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_12: karmaṇa upacitatvād upapadyaparinirvāyī. aparaparyāyavedanīyasya karmaṇa upacitatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_13: ūrdhvaṃsrotā ity evaṃ tāvat teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaviśeṣād viśeṣaḥ. mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśasamudācāratvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_14: yathākramam eṣām eva kleśaviśeṣād viśeṣaḥ. adhimātramadhyamṛdvindriyatvāc ca yathākramam
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_15: eṣām evendriyaviśeṣād viśeṣa iti. teṣām api pratyekam ata eva yathāyogaṃ viśeṣa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_16: teṣām api pratyekaṃ bhinnānāṃ navānām ity arthaḥ. ata eva karmādiviśeṣāt [Tib. 224a]
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_17: yathāyogaṃ na yathākramaṃ. viśeṣo 'vagaṃtavyaḥ. katham ity āha. prathamayos trikayor
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_18: iti vistaraḥ. yac cāṃtarāparinirvāyiṇāṃ trikaṃ. yac copapadyaparinirvāyiṇāṃ. tayos
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_20: ca. yathākramaṃ viśeṣaḥ. na tu karmaviśeṣāt. yasmāt prathamasya trikasyābhinirvṛttivedanīyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_21: karma tulyaṃ. dvitīyasya copapadyavedanīyaṃ karma tulyam iti. paścimasya trikasyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmaviśeṣāc
SA01yabhkvyu:3790_22: ca viśeṣaḥ. plutādīnāṃ hy aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karma bhinnam
SA01yabhkvyu:3791_2: yathākramam ity arthaḥ. ta ete navaprakārakleśendrigatvād iti. ta ete navānāgāmino
SA01yabhkvyu:3791_3: navaprakārakleśatvāt. navaprakārendriyatvāc ca. navānāgāmino bhavaṃti. karmaṇo 'grahaṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3792_0: trikayoḥ karmaviśeṣād [Tib. 224b] viśeṣo 'stīti. kathaṃ punar ete navaprakārakleśā
SA01yabhkvyu:3792_1: bhavaṃti. iha kleśas triprakāro mṛdumadhyādhimātra iti. mṛdur aṃtarāparinirvāyiṇāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3792_2: madhya upapadyaparinirvāyiṇāṃ. adhimātra ūrdhvasrotasāṃ. tatra prathamo 'ntarāparinirvāyī
SA01yabhkvyu:3792_3: mṛdumṛdukleśaḥ. dvitīyo mṛdumadhyakleśaḥ tṛtīyo mṛdvadhimātrakleśaḥ. upapadyaparinirvāyiṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3792_7: 'dhimātrādhimātrakleśa iti. kathaṃ navaprakārendriyā bhavaṃti. tathaivendriyam api
SA01yabhkvyu:3792_8: triprakāram adhimātraṃ mṛdu ceti. adhimātram aṃtārāparinirvāyiṇāṃ. madhyam upapadyaparinirvāyiṇāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3792_13: api pluto mṛdvadhimātrendriyaḥ. ardhapluto mṛdumadhyendriyaḥ. sarvasthānacyuto mṛdumṛdvindriya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_0: (VI.41) kathaṃ tarhi sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitā iti. sapta vo 'haṃ bhikṣavaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_1: satpuruṣagatīr deśayiṣyāmi. anupādāya ca parinirvāṇam. ity etat sarvaṃ sūtraṃ gatisūtrata
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_2: ity atra pradeśe likhitam iti na punar likhyate. atra ca sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_3: deśitāḥ. trayo 'ṃtarāparinirvāyiṇāḥ. traya upapadyaparinirvāyiṇa iti ṣaṭ gatayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_4: ūrdhvaṃsroto gatiś ca saptamīti. ūrdhvasravaṇadharmeti. kṛdaṃtam etac chabdarūpam
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_5: iti. vidhārtham etac chabdarūpam iti darśayati. ūrdhvam iti ca kriyāviśeṣaṇam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_6: tasyābhedanirdeśād iti. tasyordhvaṃsrotasaḥ plutādibhedānirdeśād ity arthaḥ. vineyāśayāpekṣo
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_7: hi sūtranirdeśaḥ. nānyāḥ śaikṣā gataya iti. na srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmigataya ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_8: gatir utpattiḥ saṃparāya ity ete sūtre paryāyā ucyaṃte. teṣām ity anāgāmināṃ. sati
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_9: ca karmaṇi vṛttiḥ prāṇātipātādyakaraṇāt. asati cāvṛttir abrahmacaryādyakaraṇāt. [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_10: 225b] akuśalena hi cittenābrahmacaryādikaraṇam iti. teṣāṃ tu vītarāgāṇāṃ saty eva
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_11: karmaṇi vṛttir nāsati prahīṇakuśalatvāt. na punaḥ pratyāgatir iti. yāsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_12: tatratatra caiṣām atyaṃtam anāgamanam ity arthaḥ. na tv etad yathoktam anyatrāstīty.
SA01yabhkvyu:3793_13: yad etat saty eva vṛttir asati cāvṛttir evāpunaḥpratyāgamanaṃ ca. tad etat (Abhidh-k-vy 564)
SA01yabhkvyu:3795_0: anyeṣām apīti. srotaāpannasakṛdāgaminām apīty arthaḥ. pāryāyikam iti. paryāye bhavaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3795_1: pāryāyikaṃ. kenacit prakāreṇa bhavatīty arthaḥ. katham ity āha. paṃcavidhasya pāpasyātyaṃtamakaraṇasaṃvarapratilaṃbhād
SA01yabhkvyu:3795_3: saṃvaraḥ saṃvaraṇam. tasya pratilaṃbhāt. na hy āryā janmāṃtare 'py etat paṃcavidhaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3795_5: darśanagrahātavyānām akuśalānāṃ sarveṣām atyaṃtaprahāṇāt. bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ ca
SA01yabhkvyu:3795_6: kāmāvacarāṇāṃ keśāṃcit saṃbhavataḥ. yeṣām iti vistaraḥ. yeṣāṃ tu niḥparyāyeṇa na
SA01yabhkvyu:3795_7: prakārāṃtareṇa srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmivat satpuruṣatvaṃ. [Tib. 226a] kiṃ tarhi. sarvasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3795_9: kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt. bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ ca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ navaprakārāṇām
SA01yabhkvyu:3795_10: api prahāṇāt. teṣāṃ satpuruṣāṇām anāgāminām iha sūtre 'dhikāraḥ. sapta satpuruṣagataya
SA01yabhkvyu:3795_11: ity ato 'nyeṣāṃ pāryāyikaṃ satpuruṣatvaṃ na pratiṣidhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_0: (VI.42) kiṃ punaḥ parivṛttajanmano 'py anāgāmina eśa bhedo 'sti. aṃtarāparinirvāyīty
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_1: evamādikaḥ. parivṛttajanmānāgāmīyaḥ prathame janmani srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_2: vā prāpya dvitīye janmany anāgāmī bhavati. kāma iti viśeṣaṇaṃ. yasmāt rūpadhātau
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_3: parivṛttajanmā kadācid ārūpyān praviśatīti. tatraiva janmani parinirvāṇād iti. kāmadhātau
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_4: duḥkhabahulatvenāsya tīvrasaṃvegatvāt. yat tarhīti vistaraḥ. śakreṇoktam itaś cyuto
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_5: 'haṃ manuṣyeṣūpapanno yady arhattvaṃ prāpya na parinirvāmi. ye te devā akaniṣṭhā
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_6: iti viśrutāḥ. aṃte me hīyamānasya tatropapattir bhaviṣyatīti. sa hi deveṣv eva srotaāpanno
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_7: manuṣyāṃś cāgatya parinirvāsyāmīti vacanāt parivṛttajanmā bhavet. aṃte nikāyasabhāgāvasāne
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_9: bhaviṣyatīti prārthanāvacanād dhātvaṃtaragamanam astīti darśitaṃ bhavatīti gamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_10: tat kathaṃ kāmadhātau parivṛttajanmāṃtara āryo dhātvāṃtaraṃ na gacchatīty ucyata
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_11: iti. sūtrārtho dṛśyate. brūyās tvaṃ. dharmalakṣaṇānabhijñatvāc chakreṇaivam uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_12: tasmād adoṣa iti. bhagavatā tarhy evaṃ śṛṇvatā kasmād asau na nivārito mā tvam eva
SA01yabhkvyu:3796_13: voca ity ata ucyate. bhagavatāpy anivāraṇaṃ. saṃharṣaṇīyatvād iti. kāmaduḥkhaparityāgābhilāṣeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3798_0: indriyāṇāṃ paripakvataratvād iti. prajñādīnām indriyāṇāṃ niṣyandaphalapuṣṭiviśeṣād
SA01yabhkvyu:3798_1: ity arthaḥ. āśrayaviśeṣalābhāc ca. yasmāc cāśrayaviśeṣam anupahataṃ mārgasaṃmukhībhāvānukūlaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3798_2: pratilabhate. dṛṣyaṃte hi tīkṣṇendriyā api saṃta āśrayavaiguṇyāt guṇebhyaḥ parihīyamāṇā
SA01yabhkvyu:3798_3: ity ato janmāṇtaraparivāsenendriyāṇāṃ paripakvataratvād indriyasaṃcāro nāsti. āśrayaviśeṣalābhāc
SA01yabhkvyu:3798_4: ca parihāṇir nāsty anenaiva janmāṃtaraparivāsena dhātvaṃtaragamanaṃ na bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3799_0: mārgasyājitatvād asaṃmukhībhāvata iti. [Tib. 227a] yasmān mārgasyājitatvād asaṃmukhībhāvaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3799_1: tasmāt kāraṇād avītarāgaḥ śaikṣaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī ca nāṃtarāparinirvāyī bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3799_2: anuśayānāṃ ca nātimandatvāt. yasmāc cānuśayās tasya nātimandāḥ. ato nāṃtarāparinirvāyī
SA01yabhkvyu:3799_3: bhavatīty ayam ācāryasya parihāraḥ. vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ kaḥ parihāra ity āha. dussamatikramatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3799_4: kāmadhātor iti vaibhāṣikā iti. katham ity ucyate. bahu hy anena kartavyaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3799_5: akuśalāvyākṛtakleśaprahāṇam akuśalānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ avyākṛtānāṃ ca rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3799_6: kleśānāṃ prahāṇam anena kartavyaṃ. vītarāgeṇa punaḥ śaikṣeṇāvyākṛtānām eva prahāṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3799_7: iti. dvitriśrāmaṇyaphalaprāptir iti. dve vā trīṇi vā śrāmaṇyāni phalāni prāptavyāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3799_8: sakṛdāgāminā dve śrāmaṇyaphale prāptavye. anāgāmiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ ca. srotaāpannena
SA01yabhkvyu:3799_9: trīṇi sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ ca. vītarāgeṇa punar ekam evārhattvaphalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3799_10: prāptavyam iti. tridhātusamatikramaś cāvītarāgeṇa kartavyaḥ. vītarāgeṇa tu rūpāvītarāgeṇāṃtarāparinirvāyinā
SA01yabhkvyu:3800_0: (VI.43) ākīryata iti. vyavakīryate vyatibhidyate. anāsravābhyāṃ sāsravaṃ caturthaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3800_1: dhyānaṃ miśrīkriyata ity arthaḥ. sukhapratipadām agratvād iti. sukhāḥ pratipadaś
SA01yabhkvyu:3802_0: vacanāt. tāsāṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam agram aṣṭāpakṣālamuktatvāt. yadā kileti. kilaśabdo
SA01yabhkvyu:3802_1: vaibhāṣikamatadyotakaḥ. svamataṃ tu paścād darśayiṣyati. aśakyaṃ tu kṣaṇavyavakiraṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3802_2: iti vistareṇa dvau hi kṣaṇāv ānaṃtaryamārgasadṛśāv iti. anāsravasāsravau. tṛtīyo
SA01yabhkvyu:3802_3: vimuktimārgasadṛśa ity anāsravaḥ. mṛdvindriyāḥ kleśabhīrutayā ca vyavakiraṃti. caśabdāc
SA01yabhkvyu:3803_0: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārtham eva ca vyavakiraṃti. na kleśabhīrutayā. teṣāṃ parihāṇyasaṃbhavāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3803_1: kathaṃ punaḥ kleśabhīrutayā aparihāṇyarthaṃ vyavakiraṃtīty āha. āsvādanāsaṃprayuktasamādhidūrīkaraṇāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3803_2: aparihāṇyartham iti. phalān na parihīyeyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3804_1: [Tib. 228a] prathamāyāṃ trīṇi cittānīti. tasya pudgalasya tāvatī śaktir ity evam
SA01yabhkvyu:3804_2: upariṣṭhād api vaktavyaṃ. dvitīyāyāṃ ṣaḍ iti. anāsravaṃ sāsravam anāsravam iti trīṇi.
SA01yabhkvyu:3804_3: punar anāsravaṃ sāsravam anāsravam ity aparāṇi trīṇīti ṣaḍ bhavaṃti. evam eva ca
SA01yabhkvyu:3804_4: tṛtīyāyāṃ nava caturthyāṃ dvādaśa paṃcamyāṃ paṃcadaśeti yojyaṃ. tāsāṃ yathāsaṃkhyam
SA01yabhkvyu:3804_5: iti. tāsāṃ vyavakīrṇabhāvanānāṃ yathākramaṃ paṃca śuddhāvāsāḥ phalaṃ. mṛdvyā bhāvanāyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3804_6: avṛhāḥ phalam evaṃ yāvad adhimātratamāyā bhāvanāyā akaniṣṭhāḥ phalam iti. śraddhādīndriyādhikyād
SA01yabhkvyu:3804_7: iti bhadaṃtaśrīlātamatam. śraddhādhikāyā bhāvanāyā avṛhāḥ phalaṃ. evaṃ yāvat prajñādhikāyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3805_0: (VI.44cd) yo hi kaścid anāgāmīti. śraddhādhimukto vā dṛṣṭiprāpto vā. kāyena sākṣātkaraṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3805_1: iti. cittābhāvāt kāyenaiva sākṣātkaroti. kathaṃ kāyenaivety āha. kāyāśrayotpatteḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3805_2: evaṃ tu bhavitavyam iti svamatam ācāryasya. prāpti jñānasākṣātkriyābhyām iti. samādhikāle
SA01yabhkvyu:3805_5: sākṣātkriyā yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. savijñānakakāyaśāṃtipratilaṃbhena vā avijñānakakāyaśāṃtyavasthāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3806_0: aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā ity atra sūtra iti. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavaṃtam apṛcchat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3806_1: kati bhadaṃta dakṣiṇīyā iti. bhagavān āha. aṣṭādaśa gṛhapate śaikṣā navāśaikṣā dakṣiṇīyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3806_2: iti. aṣṭādaśa śaikṣāḥ katame. srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ. srotaāpannaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3806_5: dharmānusārī. śraddhādhimuktaḥ. dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ. kulaṃkulaḥ. ekavīcikaḥ. aṃtarāparinirvāyī.
SA01yabhkvyu:3806_7: itīme gṛhapate 'ṣṭādasa śaikṣāḥ. navāśaikṣāḥ katame. parihāṇadharmā. cetanādharmā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3807_0: ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ. itīme gṛhapate navāśaikṣā iti. tisraḥ śikṣās tatphalaṃ ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3807_1: adhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñam iti tisraḥ śikṣā āryamārgalakṣaṇāḥ. tāsāṃ phalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3807_2: visaṃyogaḥ. tadviśeṣeṇa hi śaikṣāṇāṃ vyavasthānam iti. śikṣāviśeṣeṇa tatphalaviśeṣeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3807_3: cety arthaḥ. kathaṃ punas tadviśeṣaḥ. anyādṛsyo 'nyādṛśyo 'ṣṭādaśānāṃ śaikṣāṇāṃ śikṣāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3807_4: visaṃyogaphalaṃ ceti. nirodhasamāpattiś ca na śaikṣā aprahāṇamārgasvābhāvyāt. na
SA01yabhkvyu:3807_5: śikṣā phalam avisaṃyogaphalasvābhāvyāt. ato na tadyogān nirodhasamāpattiyogāt śaikṣaviśeṣa
SA01yabhkvyu:3807_6: uktaḥ. yathaite 'ṣṭādaśa śaikṣāḥ. na punar asau na śaikṣaḥ. tatra yad idam ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3807_7: aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā ity atra sūtre kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kāyasākṣī noktaḥ śaikṣa ity evaṃ noktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_0: ity evamādi. sūkṣmaṃ tu bhidyamānā iti vistaraḥ. atrācāryo gaṇanopāyapradarśanārthaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_2: kiṃ kāraṇam. tadbhede hi gaṇite yathāṃtarāparinirvāyiṇa indriyādibhedād bhedaḥ. evaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_3: yāvad ūrdhvasrotasa iti sukham atideśaṃ kariṣyāmīti. bhūmibhedāś catvāra iti. te
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_4: evāṃtarāparinirvāyiṇaḥ. bhūmayaś catvāri dhyānāni. rūpopagānām anāgāmināṃ vivakṣitatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_5: tatra prathame dhyāne 'ṃtarāparinirvāyī yāvac caturtha iti catvāraḥ. parihāṇadharmādigotrabhedāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_6: ṣaḍ iti. ta eva parihāṇadharmā cetanādharmā anurakṣaṇādharmā sthitākaṃpyaḥ prativedhanābhavyaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_7: akopyadharmā ceti. sthānāṃtarabhedāt ṣoḍaśeti. brahmakāyikādīny akaniṣṭhāṃtāni. mahābrahmaṇo
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_9: ity agaṇanaṃ. tad evaṃ sthānāṃtarabhedāt ṣoḍaśāṃtarāparinirvāyiṇaḥ. bhūmivairāgyabhedāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_10: ṣaṭtriṃśad iti. bhūmibhedāt tadvairāgyabhedāc ca ṣaṭtriṃśad aṃtarāparinirvāyiṇaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_11: katham iti pratipādayati. rūpadhātan [Tib. 230a] sakalabandhana iti vistaraḥ. rūpadhātau
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_12: prathame dhyāne sakalabandhana ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti nava.
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_13: dvitīye 'pi nava sakalabandhano yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti. tathā tṛtīye nava.
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_14: tathā caturthe naveti. catvāro navakāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad bhavaṃti. yāvac caturthadhyānāṣṭaprakāravītarāga
SA01yabhkvyu:3810_16: nocyate. yasmād asāv ārūpye sakalabandhano bhavati. na cehārūpyago 'dhikriyate. rūpopagānām
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_0: iti. tathā ca sati sthānāṃtaragotravairāgyendriyabhedād iti vistaraḥ. sthānāṃtarāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_1: gotrāṇāṃ vairāgyāṇām indriyāṇāṃ ca bhedāt. dvānavatīni dvānavatyadhikāni paṃcaviṃśatiśatāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_2: bhavaṃti teṣām aṃtarāparinirvāyiṇāṃ. kathaṃ kṛtvā tatha bhavaṃtīty āha. ekasmiṃ sthāne.
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_3: tadyathā brahmapurohite ṣaṭ gotrāṇi parihāṇadharmādibhedāt. gotragotra iti vīpsā
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_4: nava pudgalāḥ. sakalabandhano yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāgaḥ svasmāt sthānāt. tadyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_7: aṣṭau śatāni. indriyabhedāt tu triguṇū mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedāt. ity evaṃ kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_8: kiṃ dvānavatīni paṃcaviṃśatiśatāni bhavaṃti. yena nyāyena sakalabandhano yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_9: iti nava pudgalā vyavasthāpitāḥ. taṃ nyāyaṃ darśayann āhayo hy adhare dhyāna iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_10: vistaraḥ. yo hy adhare dhyāne prathame yāvat tṛtīye navaprakāravītarāgaḥ. sa uttare
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_11: dhyāne dvitīye yāvac caturthe sakalabandhana ity uktaḥ. kasmād ity āha. samagaṇanārtham
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_12: iti. caturṣu dhyāneṣu navanava yathā syur iti. anyathā hi viṣamā gaṇanā syāt. prathame
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_13: dhyāne daśa syuḥ sakalabandhano yāvan navaprakāravītarāga iti. dvitīye nava ekaprakāravītarāgo
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_14: yāvan navaprakāravītarāga iti. evaṃ tṛtīye nava caturthe tv aṣṭau syuḥ. ekaprakāravītarāgo
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_16: uktaṃ evaṃ yāvad ūrdhvasrotasa iti. evam upapadyasābhisaṃskārānabhisaṃskārordhvasrotasām
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_18: bhavaṃtīty abhisamasya punaḥ paṃcābhedāṃś catvāriṃśadūnāni trayodaśasahasrāṇy anāgāmināṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_19: bhavaṃti. ārūpyagais tu sahopapadyādicaturbhedabhinnair atitarāṃ bahavo bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3811_20: anayā tu vartanyā gamyata eveti na likhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3813_0: iti. ābhavāgrād āṣṭau prakārān kṣiṇotīty ābhavāgrāṣṭabhāgakṣid ābhavāgrāṣṭaprakārakṣayakṛd
SA01yabhkvyu:3813_1: ity arthaḥ. ayam anāgāmī prathamadhyānaikaprakāravairāgyāt prabhṛtīti. yasmāt kāmavairāgyād
SA01yabhkvyu:3813_2: anāgāmī vyavasthāpyate. tasmāttataḥ pareṇārhattvaphalapratipannako bhavati. yathā
SA01yabhkvyu:3813_3: vajraḥ sarvaṃ bhinatti. evam ayaṃ samādhiḥ sarvam anuśayaṃ bhinattīti sāmarthyāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3813_4: vajra upamā asyeti vajropamaḥ. bhinnatvād asau na sarvāṃ bhinattīti. traidhātukān (Abhidh-k-vy 569)
SA01yabhkvyu:3814_0: darśanaprahātavyān bhāvanāprahatavyāṃś ca kāmāvacarān yāvad bhāvāgrikān aṣṭau prakārān.
SA01yabhkvyu:3814_1: yadi sarvān na bhinatti kasmāt sarvānuśayabhedīty ucyata ity āha. sarvāṃs tu bhettuṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3814_2: samartha iti. saṃbhavam adhikṛtyoktam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3815_0: anāgamyasaṃgṛhītā iti vistaraḥ. nava bhūmīḥ anāgamyaṃ dhyānāṃtaraṃ [Tib. 231b] catvāri
SA01yabhkvyu:3815_1: dhyānāni trīṃś cārūpyān bhavāgravarjyān niśrityārhattvaprāptir ity ata evaṃ pratanyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3815_4: aparaiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra ity aṣṭau. evam eva nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā
SA01yabhkvyu:3816: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpathe
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_0: iti siddhāṃtāt tayor evehopanyāso na duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānayor grahaṇaṃ. evaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_1: yāvad iti. yāvacchabdena yathā prathamadhyānanirodhālaṃbanākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_3: pratyekaṃ catvāraś catvāro vaktavyāḥ. mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_4: ity atra pratibhūmimārgālaṃbanānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāraḥ catvāra iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_5: nocyate. kasmād ity āha. kṛtsnasyānvayajñānapakṣasyālaṃbanād iti. aviśiṣṭo hy anvayajñānapakṣo
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_6: mārgaḥ pratipakṣabhāvenānyonyahetukaś ca mārga iti samastam evālaṃbyate. [Tib. 232a]
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_7: na nirodhavad ity ataś catvāra eva mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā iti. ta ime
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_8: jñānākārālaṃbanabhedabhinnā iti. jñānākārabhedenālaṃbanabhedena ca bhinnāḥ. atha
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_9: vā jñānānām ākārāṇām ālaṃbanānāṃ ca tribhedena bhinnāḥ. jñānākārabhedabhinnās tāvat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_11: ityevamādivacanāt. dvāpaṃcāśad iti. ādito dvyaṣṭāv iti ṣoḍaśa. prathamadhyānanirodhālaṃbanāś
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_12: catvāro yāvan mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra iti navacatuṣkāṇi ṣaṭtriṃśat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_13: ṣoḍaśa ca ṣaṭtriṃśac ca dvāpaṃcāśad bhavaṃti. yathānāgamyasaṃgṛhīta iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_14: maulaṃ dhyānam anāgamyapraviśyotpadyata ity anāgamyaṃ. yena prakāreṇānaṃtaroktenānāgamyasaṃgṛhītā
SA01yabhkvyu:3818_15: dvāpaṃcāśad vajropamā bhavaṃti. tenaiva prakāreṇa dhyānāṃtarasaṃgṛhītā dvāpaṃcāśad
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_0: saṃprayuktā aṣṭau. nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ [Tib. 232b] saṃprayuktā aṣṭau. nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_1: saṃprayuktāḥ prathamadhyānanirodhālaṃbanāś catvāraḥ. evaṃ yāvad bhavāgranirodhālaṃbanāś
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_3: ta ime jñānākārālaṃbanabhedabhinnā dvāpaṃcāśad bhavaṃti. yathā dhyānāṃtarasaṃgṛhītā
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_4: evaṃ prathamadhyānasaṃgṛhītā dvāpaṃcāśāt. yāvac caturthadhyānasaṃgṛhītā dvāpaṃcāśad
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_5: iti. yathāsaṃkhyam iti vistaraḥ. ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ. vijñānānaṃtyāyatanasaṃgṛhītāś
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_6: caturviṃśatiḥ. ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā viṃśatiḥ. bhavāgra āryamārgo nāstīti tatsaṃgṛhītā
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_7: na saṃtīti na ciṃtyaṃte. teṣu dharmajñānasyābhāvād iti. teṣv ākāśānaṃtyāyatanādiṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_9: saṃprayuktā aṣṭau na bhavaṃti. adhobhūminirodhālaṃbanasya cānvayajñānasyābhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_10: nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś caturdhyānanirodhālaṃbanāḥ ṣoḍaśa punar na bhavaṃtīty
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_11: aṣṭāviṃśatir bhavaṃti. dvāpaṃcāśato 'ṣṭau ṣoḍaśa caivāpanīyeti kṛtvā. katham. ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_14: saṃprayuktāś catvāra iti. ta ime jñānākārālaṃbanabhedabhinnā aṣṭāviṃśatir bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_15: evaṃ vijñānānaṃtyāyatananirodhālaṃbanāś caturo 'panīya caturviṃśatir yojyāḥ. ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_16: vijñānānaṃtyāyatananirodhālaṃbanān apy aparān apanīya viṃśatir iti. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_17: svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmikanirodham evālaṃbaṃta ārūpyā nādhobhūmikaṃ dhyānavat. na hy adhobhūmikaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3819_18: duḥkham anālaṃbya tannirodhaḥ śakyam ālaṃbituṃ. duḥkhaṃ ca sarvaṃ sāsravam eva. eṣa ca niyamaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3821: ity etat kāraṇaṃ. dhyānānāṃ tu samastālocanatvān na pratiṣedhaḥ. vakṣyati hi
SA01yabhkvyu:3823_0: iti. atha kasmān nirodham evālaṃbaṃte na punar duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ vā. bhavāgrād adhobhūmer
SA01yabhkvyu:3823_1: vītarāgatvāt. tasya hi bhāvāgrika eva navamaḥ prakāro vajropamavadhyo 'vaśiṣṭa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3823_2: adhobhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanaṃ tu bhavatīti anvayajñānam adhikṛtaṃ. tac ca vajropamasamādhisaṃprayuktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3826: iti vacanāt. sarvaṃ hi mārgānvayajñānaṃ navabhūmikānvayajñānapakṣālaṃbanam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_0: yeṣāṃ tv iti vistaraḥ. yeṣām ābhidhārmikānāṃ mārgānvayajñānam api na kevalanirodhānvayajñānam
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_1: ekaikabhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanam iṣṭaṃ. teṣām aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipya anāgamyasaṃgṛhītā
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_2: aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃti. kathaṃ kṛtvā. pūrvakāḥ kṛtsnasyānvayajñānapakṣyasyālaṃbanā
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_5: saṃprayuktāś catvāraḥ. evaṃ yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanā mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_6: saṃprayuktāś catvāra ity evam aṣṭāviṃśatir adhikā bhavaṃti. evam aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_7: prakṣipya dvāpaṃcāśad aśītir bhavaṃti. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanā
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_8: mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāro na gaṇyaṃte. āha. na bhavāgrasaṃgṛhīto
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_9: 'nāsravo mārgo bhavāgrapratipakṣo 'sti. prathamadhyānabhūmikas tv asti. yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmika
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_10: iti. tasmāt tadbhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanā evoktāḥ. na bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_11: apare punar vyācakṣate. yeṣāṃ tu mārgānvayajñānam apy ekaikabhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanam
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_12: [Tib. 234a] iṣṭaṃ. yathā nirodhānvayajñānam iṣṭam ity abhiprāyaḥ. teṣāṃ bhāvāgrikaduḥkhasamudayānvayajñānākāraiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_13: saṃprayuktā aṣṭau. nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau. nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_14: saṃprayuktāḥ prathaṃadhyānanirodhālaṃbanāś catvāraḥ. evaṃ yāvad bhavāgranirodhālaṃbanāś
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_15: catvāra iti dvātriṃśad bhavaṃti. evaṃ mārgānvayajñānākārair api saṃprayuktās tathaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_16: dvātriṃśad iti kṛtvā. aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipyānāmyasaṃgṛhītā aśītir vajropamā
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_17: bhavaṃtīti. teṣāṃ hi ye hi kṛtsnasyānvayajñānapakṣasyālaṃbanān mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_18: saṃprayuktāś catvāras te na saṃti. bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanās tu tatsthāne bhavaṃtīty
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_19: ato aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃtīti. evaṃ yāvac caturthadhyānasaṃgṛhītāḥ katham. aṣṭāviṃśatim
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_20: adhikān prakṣipya dhyānāṃtarasaṃgṛhītā aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃti. yathā dhyānāṃtarasaṃgṛhītāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_22: ākāśānaṃtyāyatanādiṣv iti. bhavāgravarjyeṣu triṣv ārūpyeṣu yathākramaṃ catvāriṃśat
SA01yabhkvyu:3827_23: dvātriṃśac caturviṃśatiś ca bhavaṃti. kathaṃ kṛtvā. [Tib. 234b] ākāśānaṃtyāyatane
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_0: mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipya yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_1: catura iti. dvādaśa prakṣipya catvāriṃśad bhavaṃti. evaṃ caturviṃśatyāṃ vijñānāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_3: evaṃ viṃśatyām ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipya caturviṃśatir
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_4: bhavaṃti. āha. nanv apadiṣṭam adhobhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanaṃ tu bhavati. tasyānyonyahetutvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_5: iti. atha kasmāt svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmipratipakṣālambanā evoktā ākāśānaṃtyāyatanādisaṃgṛhītāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_6: nādhobhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanā iti. atrocyate. aviśeṣya navabhūmikam anvayajñānapakṣaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_7: mārgam adhobhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanaṃ bhavatīty uktaṃ. na punar ākāśānantyāyatanādisaṃgṛhītasyādhobhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_9: anvayajñānaṃ bhavati. na viśeṣasvarūpeṇa. svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmyālaṃbanaṃ tu viśeṣarūpeṇāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_10: bhavatīti. eṣa tu pūrvako vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ sthāpanāpakṣaḥ. sāmānyarūpeṇaiva sarvam anvayajñānapakṣam
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_11: ālaṃbate 'nvayajñānam iti. [Tib. 235a] tathā hy ācāryasaṃghabhadreṇoktaṃ. sarvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_12: hi mārgānvayajñānaṃ navabhūmikānvayajñānapakṣālaṃbanam iti. apare tv evaṃ vyācakṣate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_14: saṃprayuktā ākāśānaṃtyāyatananirodhālaṃbanāś catvāraḥ. evaṃ yāvad bhāvāgrikanirodhālaṃbanāś
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_15: catvāra iti ṣoḍaśa. mārgānvayajñanākārair api saṃprayuktā ākāśānaṃtyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāś
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_16: catvāraḥ. evaṃ yāvad bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanāś catvāra iti ṣoḍaśa. ta ete dviṣoḍaśa
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_17: pūrvoktāś cāṣṭāv iti. catvāriṃśad ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā vajropamā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3828_20: apy aparān aṣṭāv apanīyeti. bhavāgrasyāpi hi te 'dhobhūmikaṃ pratipakṣamārgam ācakṣata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3829_0: punar gotrendriyabhedād bhūyāṃso bhavaṃtīti. kathaṃ. ye tāvad aṣṭau sarvaprathamā
SA01yabhkvyu:3829_2: tasya ṣaḍgotrabhedāt ṣoḍhābhedaḥ. evaṃ duḥkhādyākārasaṃprayuktānāṃ trayāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3830_0: api pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyabhedād bhedaḥ. yathā caiṣāṃ pratyekaṃ gotrendriyabhedāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3830_1: evaṃ bhāvāgrikasamudayālaṃbanānāṃ caturṇāṃ pratyekaṃ ṣaḍgotrabhedāt ṣoḍhābhedaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3830_2: indriyabhedāc ca tridhābhedaḥ. yathā caiṣām aṣṭānāṃ gotrendriyabhedāt pratyekaṃ ṣoḍhā
SA01yabhkvyu:3830_3: tridhā ca bhedaḥ. evaṃ sarveṣām anāgāmyasaṃgṛhītānāṃ jñānākārālaṃbanabhedabhinnānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3830_4: yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītānāṃ gotrendriyabhedād bhedaḥ. anayā vartanyā yojyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3830_5: evaṃ vā yojyaḥ. prathame pakṣe dvāpaṃcāśad anāgāmyasaṃgṛhītāḥ. yāvad viṃśatir ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā
SA01yabhkvyu:3830_6: ity abhisamasya caturaśītir uttarāṇi trīṇi śatāni vajropamānāṃ bhavaṃti. tāni ṣaḍguṇīkṛtya
SA01yabhkvyu:3830_7: triguṇīkṛtya ca ṣaṭsahasrāṇi navaśatāni dvādaśottarāṇi bhavaṃti. dvitīyapakṣe yatrādito
SA01yabhkvyu:3830_8: 'śītiḥ. yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatane caturviṃśatir iti. ekapiṇḍataḥ ṣaṭsaptatyuttarāṇi paṃcaśatāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3830_9: bhavaṃti. gotrendriyabhedāt ṣaṭguṇīkṛtya triguṇīkṛtya ca. daśasahasrāṇi aṣṭaṣaṣṭyuttarāṇi
SA01yabhkvyu:3831_0: ata eva tat kṣayajñānam iti. kuta ity āha. sarvāsravakṣayaprāptisahajatvāt prathamata
SA01yabhkvyu:3831_1: iti. yasmāt sarvāsravakṣayaprāptyā saha jātaṃ tatprathamato jñānaṃ. tasmāt kṣayajñānam
SA01yabhkvyu:3831_2: ity ucyate. madhyapadalopāt. nairuktividhānato vā. sarvagrahaṇaṃ srotaāpannādijñānaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3831_4: ata eva sa iti. svarthaparisamāpteḥ. sa parārthakaraṇārhattvād arhan. parārthakaraṇayogyatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3831_5: ity arthaḥ. sarvasarāgapūjārhattvāc ceti. sarāgāḥ pṛthagjanaśaikṣāḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3831_6: pūjām arhatīty arhan. siddhaṃ bhavatīti. kiṃ siddhaṃ bhavatīty āha. anye sapta pūrvoktāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3831_7: pudgalāḥ śaikṣā iti. trayaḥ phalasthāś catvāraś ca pratipannakā uktāḥ. asāv evāśaikṣa
SA01yabhkvyu:3831_8: ity avadhāraṇād etadanye āryāḥ śaikṣā iti siddhaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3832_0: kena te śaikṣā iti. kena kāraṇena te sapta pudgalāḥ śaikṣā ity ucyaṃta ity āha. āsravakṣayāya
SA01yabhkvyu:3832_1: nityaṃ śikṣaṇaśīlatvād iti. śikṣā śīlam eṣām iti śaikṣāḥ. śīlaṃ. chattrādibhyo ṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3832_2: iti lakṣaṇāt. kva śikṣaṇaśīlāḥ. śikṣātraye. [Tib. 236b] kiṃ śikṣātrayam. adhiśīlam
SA01yabhkvyu:3832_3: adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca. kiṃsvabhāvās tā ity āha. tāḥ punaḥ śīlasamādhiprajñāsvabhāvā
SA01yabhkvyu:3832_4: iti. śīle śīkṣā adhiśīlam evaṃ yāvat prajñāyāṃ śikṣety adhiprajñam iti. avyayaṃ vibhaktāv
SA01yabhkvyu:3832_5: ity avyayībhāvasamāsaḥ. śikṣākriyāṇāṃ tv avyatirekāc chīlādisvabhāvāḥ śikṣā iti vyācaṣṭe.
SA01yabhkvyu:3832_6: pṛthagjano 'pi śaikṣaḥ prāpnotīti. pṛthagjano 'pi vinayoktāsu śikṣāsu śikṣata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3832_7: na. yathābhūtaṃsatyāprajñānāt. naitad evaṃ. kasmāt. yathābhūtaṃ satyānāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3833_0: dṛṣṭaṃ yad āryayā prajñayeti vacanāt. tathā hi sūtre adhiśīlam adhicittaṃ vā śikṣāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3833_1: vistareṇoktvāha. adhiprajñaṃ śikṣā katamā. idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3833_2: prajānāti. ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ. ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ. iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad
SA01yabhkvyu:3833_3: āryasatyam iti. yathābhūtasatyaprajñānāt. yatra ca śikṣitāḥ śīlādiṣu. tatra punar
SA01yabhkvyu:3833_4: aparaśikṣaṇāt. prātimokṣasaṃvaraparityāgataḥ uṣmagatādiparihāṇitaś cāryaḥ punar yady
SA01yabhkvyu:3833_5: api kiṃcit parityajati. na tu sarvaṃ. [Tib. 237a] na hy āryasya kadācid api śikṣātrayaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3833_6: nāstīti. prakṛtistha ārya iti. asamāhitāvasthā sattvānāṃ prakṛtiḥ. tatrastha āryaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3833_7: piṇḍapātacārādigataḥ. na śikṣaṇaśīla iti. na śaikṣaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. āśayata
SA01yabhkvyu:3833_8: iti chandataḥ. sthitādhvagavat. adhvaga ucyate yo 'dhvānaṃ gacchati. saṃsthito 'py
SA01yabhkvyu:3833_9: adhvaga ity ucyate. gamanāśasyāparityāgāt. tadvat. prāptyanuṣaṃgataś ca. śīlasamādhiprajñānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3833_10: ca prāptayaḥ prakṛtisthasyāpy anuṣajyaṃte. tasmāt prakṛtistho 'pi nāśikṣaṇaśīla eveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3834: śaikṣāśaikṣanirdeśapraśaṃgenedam ucyate. atha śaikṣā dharmāḥ katamā ityādi. śaikṣasyānāsravā dharmāḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ. evam aśaikṣasyāśaikṣā dharmāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3835: nirvāṇaṃ kasmān na śaikṣaṃ. yac chaikṣeṇa prāptam ity abhiprāyaḥ. aśaikṣapṛthagjanayor api tadyogād iti. pṛthagjano 'pi laukikamārgaprāptena nirvāṇena yujyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3836_0: prathamaḥ pratipannaka iti. darśanamārgasthaḥ. śeṣāṇām iti vistaraḥ. śeṣāṇāṃ pratipannakānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3836_3: srotaāpannādibhyo nānya ity arthaḥ. anupūrvādhigamaṃ praty evam ucyata iti. anupūrveṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3836_4: catuḥphalaprāptiṃ praty ucyate. dravyata paṃceti. bhūgaḥkāmavītarāgau tu syātāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3836_5: bhūyovītarāgaḥ kṣīṇaṣaṭprakāraḥ. kāmavītarāgaḥ kṣīṇanavaprakāraḥ. darśanamārge darśanamārgāvasthāyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3836_6: yathākramaṃ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalapratipannakau syātāṃ. na ca srotaāpannasakṛdāgāminau.
SA01yabhkvyu:3836_7: kiṃ tarhi. tadvyatiriktau. tathā ca sati dravyataḥ sapta bhavaṃti. srotaāpattisakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalapratipannakās
SA01yabhkvyu:3836_8: trayaś catvāraś ca phalasthā ity arhattvaphalapratipannaka eko 'nāgāmiphalasthān
SA01yabhkvyu:3839: iti vacanāt. tatkleśānuśayitatvād iti yasmāt tadbhūmikaḥ kleśas tatra laukike (Abhidh-k-vy 575)
SA01yabhkvyu:3840_0: mārge ālaṃbanato 'nuśayitaḥ. yo hi kleśa iti vistareṇa sādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāṃtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3840_1: darśayati. yo yadbhūmiko mārgaḥ. na sa tadbhūmikakleśapratipakṣaḥ. [Tib. 238a] tatkleśānuśayitatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3840_3: pratipakṣamārgavad vā. laukikenāpi vairāgyam iti. uparibhūmisāmaṃtakena. lokottareṇāpīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3842: iti. tadyathā srotaāpannaḥ śamathacaritaḥ. laukikena mārgeṇa vairāgyaṃ gacchataḥ pratiprakāraṃ viśaṃyogaprāptayaḥ sāsravo 'nāsravaś cotpadyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3843: dhyānaṃ niśrityeti. yasmāc chaikṣaḥ ṣaḍ bhūmīr niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati. nārūpyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3844: aśaikṣo nava niśritya bhūmīḥ śaikṣas tu ṣaḍ
SA01yabhkvyu:3845_0: iti vacanāt tenāha. yo dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati. sa kṛtsnapūrvamārgatyāgād
SA01yabhkvyu:3846: sa viśeṣaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā phalm āproti vardhayann
SA01yabhkvyu:3847_1: syāt. ayaṃ cāparo doṣaḥ. tyakte ca tasminn ūrdhvabhūmikleśavisaṃyoge [Tib. 238b]
SA01yabhkvyu:3847_2: taiḥ kleśair ūrdhvabhūmikaiḥ samanvāgataḥ syād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3849_0: ity ardhena vimukto 'rdhavimuktaḥ. bhavāgrād ardhavimukto bhavāgrārdhavimuktaḥ. ūrdhvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3849_1: jāta ūrdhvajātaḥ. bhavāgrārdhavimuktaś cordhvajātaś ca bhavāgrārdhavimuktordhvajātau.
SA01yabhkvyu:3849_2: tayor iveti. bhavāgrārdhavimuktordhvajātavat. samanvayas taiś tasyeti vākyaśeṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3849_3: tuśabdaḥ pūrvadoṣavyāvartanārthaḥ. tam arthaṃ vivṛṇvann āha. asatyām iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3849_4: asatyām api tasya pudgalasya laukikyāṃ visaṃyogaprāptau. na taiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgamaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3849_5: syāt tadyathā bhavāgrārdhaprakāravimuktasyeti vistaraḥ. tasya hi laukikī bhavāgrārdhaprakāravisaṃyogaprāptir
SA01yabhkvyu:3849_6: nāsti. tatpratipakṣalaukikamārgābhāvāt. lokottarā ca tadvisaṃyogaprāptir dhyānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3849_7: niśrityendriyasaṃcāreṇa tyaktā syāt. na ca punas tair bhāvāgrikakleśaprakāraiḥ samanvāgamo
SA01yabhkvyu:3849_8: bhavatīty abhyupagamyate bhavadbhiḥ. tadvad asya syāt. yathā ca pṛthagjanasya prathamadhyānabhūmer
SA01yabhkvyu:3853_0: iti niyamāt tyāgo bhavati. tasmān na punas taiḥ kāmāvacaraiḥ [Tib. 239a] kleśaiḥ
