SA01yabhkvyu:3879_7: nirodhamārgasatye api yojye. āha. yadi prati satyam evaṃ bhavaṃti. trayaḥ parivartā
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_8: dvādaśa cākārāḥ [Tib. 244b] dvādaśa parivartāḥ aṣṭacatvāriṃśac cākārāḥ prāpnuvaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_9: kasmāt triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāram ity uktam. ata ucyate. trikadvādaśakasādharmyāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_10: tu triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāram uktam iti. dvayasaptasthānakauśaladeśanāvad iti. dvayadeśanāvat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_11: saptasthānakauśaladeśanāvac ca. tadyathā vistaram uktvā tena hi bhikṣo dvayaṃ te
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_12: deśayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye. dvayaṃ katamat. cakṣūrūpāṇi
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_13: yāvan manodharmāś ceti. yatheha dvayasādharmyād dvayam ity uktam. evaṃ trikadvādaśakasādharmyāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_14: triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāram uktaṃ. yathā ca saptasthānakuśalo bhikṣuḥ rūpaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_15: prajānāti. rūpasamudayaṃ. rūpanirodhaṃ. rūpanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadaṃ. rūpasyāsvādaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_16: cādīnavaṃ ca. niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti. saptasthānakuśalo bhikṣuḥ trividhārthopaparīkṣī
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_17: kṣipram evāsmin dharmavinaye duḥkhasyāṃtaṃ prajānātīti. pratyekaṃ skaṃdheṣu saptasthānakauśalasādharmyāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_18: evam ihāpi trikadvādaśakasādharmyāt triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāram uktam iti. ebhiś ceti
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_19: vistaraḥ. ebhiś ca parivartair yathāsūtranirdiṣṭair darśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgā [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_20: 245a] yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśitāḥ. idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam ity ārabhya yāvad iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_21: pratipad āryasatyam iti darśanamārgo darśitaḥ. tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_22: parijñātavyam ity ārabhya yāvat tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_23: abhijñayā bhāvayitavyam iti bhāvanāmārgo darśitaḥ. tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_24: parijñātam ity ārabhya yāvat tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_25: bhāvitam ity aśaikṣamārgo darśita iti. atrācārya āha. yady evam iti vistaraḥ. yady
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_26: evam ebhiḥ parivartair darśanādimārgā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśitāḥ. na tarhi darśanamārga
SA01yabhkvyu:3879_27: eva triparivarto dvādaśākāraḥ. kiṃ tarhi. ekaparivartaś caturākāra iti. katham asau
SA01yabhkvyu:3880_0: cakrasādharmyābhāvān na cakraṃ yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. tasmāt sa eva dharmaparyāyo
SA01yabhkvyu:3880_1: dharmacakraṃ. tad eva sūtraṃ dharmacakraṃ. dharmacakraprakāśanāt. triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3880_2: ca yujyate. tadarthaprakāśanāt. triḥparivartanād iti. duḥkhaṃ yāvan mārga ity ekaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3880_3: parivartanaṃ. [Tib. 245b] parijñātavyaṃ yāvad bhāvayitavyam iti dvitīyaṃ. parijñātaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3880_4: yāvad bhāvitam iti tṛtīyaṃ. caturṇāṃ satyānāṃ tridhākaraṇād iti. duḥkhaṃ samudayo
SA01yabhkvyu:3880_5: nirodho mārga iti satyasvarūpaṃ praty eka ākaraṇaprakāraś caturākāraḥ. parijñātavyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3880_6: prahātavyaṃ sākṣātkartavyaṃ bhāvayitavyaṃ iti kartavyarūpāṃ parijñānakriyāṃ prati
SA01yabhkvyu:3880_7: dvitīya ākaraṇaprakāraś caturākāraḥ. parijñātaṃ prahīṇaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ bhāvitam iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3881_0: prati tṛtīya ākaraṇaprakāraś caturākāra iti. dvādaśākāraṃ bhavati. tasya punar iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3881_1: dharmaparyāyasya. pravartanaṃ parasaṃtānme gamanaṃ vineyajanasaṃtāne preraṇaṃ. kathaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3881_2: gamanam. arthajñāpanāt. atha vā sarva evāryamārgo darśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgo dharmacakraṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3881_3: vineyajanasaṃtāne kramaṇāt. kramaṇāc cakram iti kṛtvā. yadi sarva evāryamārgo dharmacakraṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3881_4: katham āryājñātakauṇḍinyasya darśanamārgamātrotpāde tat pravartitam ity uktaṃ. ata
SA01yabhkvyu:3881_5: ucyate. tat tu parasaṃtāne āryakauṇḍinyasaṃtāne. darśanamārgotpādanād vartayitum
SA01yabhkvyu:3881_6: ārabdham ādau vartitam ity etat pravartitam ity ucyate. ādikarmaṇi praśabdo vartate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3882: (VI.57) tṛtīyasya tu kasmād aprāptir iti. rūpadhātūpapanno [Tib. 246a] yadi niyāmam avakrāmet. ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe kasmād anāgāmiphalaprāptir na syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. parihāra ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3884_0: iti. śravaṇābhāvād iti. ārūpyeṣu śrāvakabodhir eva bhavaṃtī bhavet. svayaṃbhubodher
SA01yabhkvyu:3884_1: asaṃbhavāt. śrāvakābhisamayaś ca parato ghoṣam aṃtareṇa na bhavati. kiṃ ca adhodhātvanālaṃbanāc ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:3886: iti. traidhātukālaṃbanena ca darśanamārgeṇa bhavitavyam ity ataḥ. sa tatra na bhavatīti. vidhānaṃ vidhā upāya ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3887_0: (VI.58, 59ab) parihāṇaṃ dharmaḥ svabhāvo 'syeti parihāṇadharmā. cetanādharmā ātmamāraṇadharmā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3887_1: anurakṣaṇādharmā yas tāṃ vimuktim anurakṣituṃ śaknoti. sthitākaṃpyaḥ yasyāṃ viomuktau
SA01yabhkvyu:3887_2: sthitaḥ. tasyāṃ akaṃpyaḥ. prativedhanābhavyaḥ. indriyasaṃcārabhavyaḥ. akopyadharmākopyo
SA01yabhkvyu:3887_3: 'nivāryo dharmo 'syety akopyadharmā. sa ca dvividhaḥ. svabhāvatas tīkṣṇendriyaḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 583)
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_0: evety avadhāraṇaṃ. śraddhādhimuktā bhūtvā ete jātā ity arthaḥ. śraddhādhimuktapūrvakā
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_1: iti yāvad uktaṃ bhavati. ṣaṣṭhas [Tib. 246b] tv anyathāpi bhavatīti vyākhyātaṃ sāmayikīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_2: samaye upakaraṇārogyadeśaviśeṣādilakṣaṇe bhavā sāmayikī. kāṃtā ca. kāṃtā cetovimuktiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_3: kasmāt kāṃteti. nityānurakṣyatvāt. kāṃtaṃ hi nityam anurakṣyam iti loke dṛśyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_4: sūtre 'py uktaṃ. tadyathā nāmaikākṣasya puruṣasya jñātaya ekam akṣi sādhu ca suṣṭhu
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_5: cānurakṣitavyaṃ manyeran. māsya śītaṃ māsyoṣṇaṃ māsya rajo'ṃśavaś cakṣuṣi nipateyur
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_6: māsya yad apy ekaṃ cakṣur avinaṣṭaṃ tad api vinaśyed iti. evam eva samayavimuktasyārhato
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_7: 'nurakṣya eṣa dharmo 'nukaṃpyo 'nugrāhyaḥ. tata evaṃ samayavimukto 'rhan sādhu ca
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_8: suṣṭhu cānurakṣitavyaṃ manyate. kaccid aham etasmād dharmān na parihīyeyeti. sa tasmān
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_9: na parihīyata iti. ghṛtaghaṭavad iti. yathā ghṛtasya pūrṇo ghaṭo ghṛtaghaṭa iti bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_10: madhyagatasya pūrṇaśabdasya lopāt. yathā vā ghṛtāpekṣo ghaṭo ghṛtaghaṭo yatra ghṛtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_11: prakṣepsyate. apekṣaśabdalopāt ghṛtaghaṭa iti bhavati. evam ihāpi madhyagatasyāpekṣaśabdasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_12: lopāt samayāapekṣāś caite vimuktāś ceti samayavimuktāḥ. samayaḥ punar upakaraṇādir
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_13: ity [Tib. 247a] uktaṃ. kathaṃ kopayitum aśakyatvād ity āha. aparihāṇita iti. kālāṃtarātyaṃtavimuktito
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_15: ity arthaḥ. katham evam ity āha. parihāṇisaṃbhavāsaṃbhavataḥ. parihāṇisaṃbhavāt kālāṃtaravimuktyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3890_16: samayavimukta ity ucyate. parihāṇyasaṃbhavād atyaṃtavimuktyāsamayavimukta ity ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3892_0: iti. yadā śaikṣo bhūtvendriyāṇi saṃcarati. sa dṛṣṭiprāptatām āpadyate. atha svabhāvatas
SA01yabhkvyu:3892_1: tīkṣṇendriyaḥ sa ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe dṛṣṭiprāpta eva. tasmād asāv akopyadharmā dṛṣṭiprāptapūrvaka
SA01yabhkvyu:3892_2: ity ucyate. yas tv arhattvāvasthāyām indriyāṇi saṃcarati. nāsāv akopyadharmā dṛṣṭiprāptapūrvaka ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3894_0: iti. parihāṇadharmā nocyate. yasmād uttāpanāgato na bhavatīti. tadgotrā āditaḥ kecid
SA01yabhkvyu:3894_1: ity apadiṣṭaṃ. tat kim idaṃ parihāṇadharmagotraṃ nāma yāvad akopyadharmagotram [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3894_2: 247b] iti na taiḥ parihāṇadharmādigotram apadiṣṭaṃ. tatra kecid evaṃ varṇayaṃti kuśalamūlāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3894_3: gotram iti. kasyacid dhi tādṛśāni kuśalāni bhavaṃti. yaḥ parihāṇadharmā yāvad akopyadharmā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_0: punar āhuḥ pṛthagjanāvasthām ārabhyendriyabhedo gotram iti. sautrāṃtikāḥ punar varṇayaṃti
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_1: bījaṃ sāmarthyaṃ cetaso gotram iti. pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ ca parihāṇadharmabīje
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_2: sati hetau parihāṇadharmagotraka ity ucyate. evam aśaikṣāvasthāyāṃ tadbījavṛttilābhāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_3: parihāṇadharmety ucyate. evaṃ yāvad akopyadharmeti. tatra parihāṇadharmeti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_4: parihāṇadharmā yaḥ parihātuṃ bhavya iti. yady etāvad brūyāt. na ca cetanādidharmety
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_5: etan na brūyāt. sarva evaite cetanādharmādayaś catvāraḥ parihātuṃ bhavyā ity eṣām
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_6: evānyataraḥ parihāṇadharmā syāt. na tebhyo 'nyaḥ paṃcamaḥ. atas tebhyo 'nya evāyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_7: paṃcama iti viśeṣayan na ca cetanādidharmety āha. cetanādharmādīnāṃ punaś caturṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_8: parihāṇadharmakatve 'sati [Tib. 248a] ekaikasya viśeṣalakṣaṇāpadeśād eva punar idaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_9: vaktavyaṃ jāyate. cetanādharmā cetayituṃ bhavyo na cānurakṣaṇādharmā yāvat prativedhanābhavya
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_10: iti. evam anurakṣaṇādharmā parihāṇipratyayaṃ balavaṃtam aṃtareṇeti. yadi parihāṇipratyayo
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_11: balavān syāt parihīyeta sa ity abhiprāyaḥ. anena balavatpratyayavacanena parihāṇadharmaṇaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_12: pūrvoktād viśinaṣṭi. parihāṇadharmā hy abalavatāpi parihāṇipratyayena parihīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_13: parihāṇipratyayāḥ punar yathā sūtraṃ. paṃca hetavaḥ paṃcapratyayāḥ samayavimuktasyārhataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_14: parihāṇāya saṃvartaṃte. katame paṃca. karmāṃtaprasṛto bhavati. bhāṣyaprasṛto bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_15: adhikaraṇaprasṛto bhavati. dīrghacārikāyogam anuyukto bhavati. dīrgheṇa ca rogajātena
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_16: spṛṣṭo bhavatīti. ananurakṣann apīty anenānurakṣaṇādharmaṇo viśinaṣṭi. sa hy anurakṣann
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_17: eva na parihīyeta. ayaṃ tv ananurakṣann apīti. ananurakṣayann api tatphalaṃ sthātuṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_18: bhavyas tatphale. na hātuṃ tatphalāt. nāpi vardhayituṃ prativedhanābhavyatāprāptyā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_19: vinābhiyogena vinā vīryeṇa. anenārthād uktaṃ bhavati. yady abhiyogaṃ kuryād bhavyaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3895_20: syād iti prativedhanābhavyāc cāyam evaṃ viśeṣito bhavati. [Tib. 248b] sa hi vinā
SA01yabhkvyu:3896_0: prathamau dvāv iti vistaraḥ. parihāṇadharmā sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogavikalaḥ. cetanādharmāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:3896_1: sātatyaprayogeṇa vikalaḥ. viśeṣeṇa tu satkṛtyaprayogeṇa vikala ity anayor viśeṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3896_2: mṛdvindriyas tv iti ṣaṣṭhād viśinaṣṭi. ṣaṣṭho hi tīkṣṇendriyaḥ. indriyakṛto hy anayor
SA01yabhkvyu:3896_3: viśeṣo na prayogakṛta iti. evaṃ ca kṛtveti vistaraḥ. yasmān nāvaśyam evaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3896_4: tasmād rūpārūpyadhātvor api ṣaḍ arhaṃto na kevalaṃ kāmadhātāv eva ṣaḍ ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3896_5: rūpārūpyadhātvor dvau sthitākaṃpya ekaḥ. akopyadharmā ca dvitīyaḥ. sthitākaṃpyas (Abhidh-k-vy 585)
SA01yabhkvyu:3897_0: tāvad baddhābhiruciḥ syān na prativedhanābhavyatākriyādaravān iti. na kāmadhātau
SA01yabhkvyu:3897_1: sthitākaṃpyaḥ prativedhanābhavyatām āpadyate. rūpārūpyadhātvaś ca parihāṇipratyayo
SA01yabhkvyu:3897_2: balavān nāstīti. nāsau parihīyate. na cendriyāṇi saṃcaraṃtīti sthitākaṃpyagotraka
SA01yabhkvyu:3897_3: eva saṃ tatra bhavati. akopyavimuktiyogāc cākopyadharmāpi bhavati. eveti dvāv eva
SA01yabhkvyu:3897_4: tau bhavataḥ. nāto 'nye. tayo rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ parihāṇicetanendriyasaṃcārābhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3897_5: parihāṇadharmā tāvat tatra nāsti. parihāṇyabhāvāt. anurakṣaṇādharmāpi nāsti. parihāṇyabhāvenānurakṣitavyāyogāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3897_6: [Tib. 249a] ata eva cendriyasaṃcārābhāvāt prativedhanābhavyo 'pi na bhavati. tathā coktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3899: iti. tatra ca nātmasaṃcetanā na parasaṃcetanāstīti cetanādharmāpi na bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3900_1: na hi parihāṇadharmā punaḥ svagotrāt parihīyata iti. tasya gotrasyākṛtrimatvāt. parihāṇadharmādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3900_2: paṃcānām iti. yasmāt parihāṇadharmaṇo 'pi phalāt parihāṇiḥ saṃbhavati. phalasyāgaṃtukatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3902_0: iti. gotrāt phalāc ca. sa tasmān na parihīyata ity arhan. kasmād ity āha. śaikṣāśaikṣamārgābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3902_1: dṛḍhīkṛtatvād iti. yac chaikṣāvasthāyāṃ gotram asti. tac chaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa bhāvitaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3902_2: aśaikṣāvasthāyāṃ ca punar bhāvitam iti. tābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvān na tasmāt so 'rhan
SA01yabhkvyu:3902_3: parihīyate. śaikṣas tu katham ity āha. śikṣas tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3902_4: prathamāt gotrān na parihīyate. yat tad ātmīyaṃ prathamaṃ gotraṃ tal laukikena mārgeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3902_5: pūrvaṃ bhāvitaṃ. śaikṣeṇa ca mārgeṇa punar bhāvitam iti. tato [Tib. 249b] na parihīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3903_0: atra kaścid āha. yad ucyate. yasya yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ. sa tasmān na parihīyate
SA01yabhkvyu:3903_1: śaikṣāśaikṣamārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvād iti. tad etad akāraṇaṃ. yasmād yo 'pi cetanādharmā
SA01yabhkvyu:3903_2: uttāpanāgatas tasmāt gotrāt parihīyate. tad gotraṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtam
SA01yabhkvyu:3903_3: iti. parihāṇir na prāpnoti. tasmāt gotram eva tat tādṛśaṃ yasmād ādyān na parihīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3903_4: uttāpanāgatāt tu parihīyata iti. yad apy uktaṃ śaikṣas tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvān
SA01yabhkvyu:3903_5: na parihīyata ity etad apy akāraṇaṃ. srotaāpannasya parihāṇiprasaṃgāt. na hi srotaāpattiphalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3903_6: laukikena mārgeṇa dṛḍhīkṛtam iti. kartavyo 'tra yatna iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_0: atra vayam ācāryasyābhiprāyaṃ darśayāmo yenaivam uktaṃ. katham iti. yat tāvad uktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_1: cetanādharmā uttāpanāgatas tasmāt gotrāt parihīyata iti. tad ayuktaṃ. yad dhi cetanādharmagotraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_2: śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ bhāvitaṃ punaś cāśaikṣāvasthāyām api bhāvitam iti dṛḍhīkṛtaṃ. naiva
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_3: sa tasmād arhattvāt parihīyamāṇaḥ parihīyate. śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ prathamībhūtatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_4: uktaṃ cācāryasaṃghabhadreṇa yaḥ śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ gotrāṃtaram adhigamyārhattvaṃ prāpnoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_5: asāv [Tib. 250a] api taṃ mārgaṃ parityajati. na cottāpanāgata eva gotre nāvatiṣṭhata
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_6: iti. yat tu cetanādharmagotram aśaikṣāvasthāyām idānīm evādhigataṃ na śaikṣāvasthāyām
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_7: adhigataṃ. sa tasmāt parihīyamāṇaḥ parihīyate. tadavasthādvayādṛḍhīkṛtatvāt. iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_8: na kāraṇam evaitad bhavati. yad apy uktaṃ śaikṣas tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_9: dṛḍhīkṛtatvān na parihīyeta ity etad apy akāraṇaṃ. srotaāpannasya parihāṇiprasaṃgāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_10: na hi srotaāpattiphalaṃ laukikena lokottareṇa dṛḍhīkṛtam iti. tad apy anavabuddhyābhihitaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_11: tad gotraṃ prati kāraṇam ucyate. na phalaṃ prati. tatra hi kāraṇāṃtaraṃ vakṣyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_12: yena prathamāt phalān na parihīyate. na hi kiṃcid apy asti phalaṃ yad yugapad ubhābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_13: laukikalokottarābhyāṃ prāpyate. gotraṃ tu laukikalokottarābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_14: bhavati. aihajanmikenoṣmagatādinā pārajanmikena vā prahāṇamārgeṇānyena vā laukikena
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_15: mārgeṇa lokottareṇa śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ bhāvitatvāt. yat tu paścātpratilabdham uttāpanayeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3905_16: yad āgaṃtukaṃ gotraṃ paścād eva na dvayor avasthayor adhigataṃ tasmāt [Tib. 250b] parihīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3906_0: gotraṃ nirdiśya phalaṃ nirdiśyate. yasya ca yat prathamaṃ phalam iti vistaraḥ. ata
SA01yabhkvyu:3906_1: eva ca srotaāpattiphalān nāsti parihāṇir iti. yasmāt srotaāpattiphalaṃ yadi prāpyate
SA01yabhkvyu:3906_2: 'vaśyaṃ prathamaṃ bhavati. sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphale tu kadācit tu prathame bhavato
SA01yabhkvyu:3906_3: yadi bhūyovītarāgakāmavītarāgayoḥ. kadācid aprathame yady ānupūrvikasya. tatra yadyat
SA01yabhkvyu:3906_4: phalaṃ prathamaṃ bhavati srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ vā. na
SA01yabhkvyu:3906_5: tasmāt parihīyate. yat tu paścāt sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalaṃ arhattvaphalaṃ vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3906_6: tataḥ parihīyate. evaṃ ca kṛtveti. yasya ca yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ phalaṃ ca. sa tasmān
SA01yabhkvyu:3906_7: na parihīyata iti kṛtvā. yathākramaṃ paṃca ṣaṭ sapta prakārā iti. anurakṣaṇādharmaṇaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3906_8: paṃca prakārā bhavaṃti. tadavasthasya parinirvāṇam indriyasaṃcāraḥ parihāya vā śaikṣatvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3907_0: ta eva ca paṃca anurakṣaṇādharmagotrapratyāgamanaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ. prativedhanābhavyasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3907_1: sapta prakārā bhavaṃti. eta eva ca ṣaṭ sthitākaṃpyagotrapratyāgamanaṃ ca saptamam
SA01yabhkvyu:3907_2: iti. yasya ca yat [Tib. 251a] prathamaṃ gotraṃ śaikṣāvasthāyām āsīt. sa śaikṣībhūtaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3907_3: punar iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ. tatraivāvatiṣṭhate nānyasmin. anyathā hi gotraviśeṣalābhāc
SA01yabhkvyu:3907_4: chaikṣāvasthād gotrād viśiṣṭaṃ tad gotraṃ bhavatīti. ato viśiṣṭagotralābhāt vṛddhir
SA01yabhkvyu:3907_5: evāsya pudgalasya syāt. na parihāṇir iti. kathaṃ kṛtvā. yathā tāvat parihāṇadharmā
SA01yabhkvyu:3907_7: śaikṣībhūtas tadgotrād api parihīyamāṇo na sthitākaṃpyagotre tiṣṭhati. pratilomato
SA01yabhkvyu:3907_8: yāvan na cetanādharmagotre. kiṃ tarhi. parihāṇadharmagotra eva tiṣṭhatīti. anyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:3907_9: hīti yady anyagotre 'vatiṣṭheta. gotraviśeṣalābhād iti parihāṇadharmagotraviśiṣṭagotralābhāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3907_10: tasmād avaśyam arhattvāt parihīyamāṇa indriyottāpanād api gotrāt parihīyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamāt phalān nāsti parihāṇir iti. yasya yat prathamaṃ phalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_1: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā. darśanaheyānām avastukatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_2: anadhiṣṭhānatvād ity arthaḥ. ātmādhiṣṭhānapravṛttā hy eta iti vistaraḥ. ātmano 'dhiṣṭhānena
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_3: pravṛttā ete darśanaheyāḥ. kasmād ity āha. satkāyadṛṣṭimūlatvāt. yasmād [Tib. 251b]
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_4: ātmadarśanavaśena darśanaheyānāṃ samudācāraḥ. uktaṃ ca yāni vā punaḥ pṛthag loke
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_6: satkāyadṛṣṭiprabhavānīti. sa cātmā nāstīty avastukatvān nāsti parihāṇir iti. satyālaṃbanatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_7: iti. satyānāṃ nityādito grahanāt. katamaś ca kleśo naivaṃ. bhāvanāprahātavyo 'pi
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_8: hi rāgādir vitathālaṃbanaḥ. śucisukhanityātmākāraiḥ satyāditattvālaṃbanāt. ātmatvam
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_9: abhūtam adhyāropayaṃtīti. yathoktaṃ. ye kecid bhikṣava ātmeti ātmīya iti samanupaśyaṃtaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_10: samanupaśyaṃti. imān eva te paṃcopādānaskandhān ātmata ātmīyataś ca samanupaśyaṃtīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_11: tadadhiṣṭhānānupravṛttāś cāṃtagrāhādaya iti. ātmādhiṣṭhānānupravṛttāḥ. śāśvata ātmā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_12: ucchedīti vā. nāsty ātmā. ayam evāgraḥ. iyam eva śuddhiḥ. kim asāv asti nāstītyevamādyākārapravṛttās
SA01yabhkvyu:3908_13: tadanyaddarśanaheyā avastukā ucyaṃte. niradhiṣṭhānā ucyaṃta ity arthaḥ. na tv ātmādileśo
SA01yabhkvyu:3909_0: vastu. pratighasyāmanaāpaṃ tadaśubhatādilakṣaṇaṃ. mānasyāpi manaāpaṃ avidyāyā api
SA01yabhkvyu:3909_1: tad eva dvayaṃ saṃmohanīyaṃ kiṃcid iti. na tu darśanaheyānām ātmādilakṣaṇam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3909_2: na tu darśanaheyānām ātmātmīyalakṣaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ vastu kiṃcid asti. anyatra tadālaṃbanebhyo
SA01yabhkvyu:3909_3: rāgādibhyaḥ. tasmād avastukā ucyaṃte. tasmān na pratiniyatavastukā ucyaṃta ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3910_0: api khalv iti vistareṇācāryaḥ. āryasya śaikṣasyānupanidhyāyato 'saṃtīrayataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3910_1: kliṣṭasmṛtiyogāt kleśa utpadyate. rāgādikaḥ. nopanidhyāyataḥ. rajjvām iva sarpasaṃjñā
SA01yabhkvyu:3910_2: kasyacid anupanidhyāyataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāj jāyate. nopanidhyāyataḥ. tadvat. ātmadṛṣṭyādīnām
SA01yabhkvyu:3910_3: iti. aṃtagrāhadṛṣṭyādīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ. na cānupanidhyāyata ātmadṛṣṭyādīnām
SA01yabhkvyu:3910_4: utpattir yujyate. saṃtīrakatvāt. keṣām. ātmadṛṣṭyādīnāṃ kleśānāṃ. ato 'nupanidhyānād
SA01yabhkvyu:3910_5: āryasyātmadṛṣṭyādīnām utpattir na yujyata iti. parihāṇikāraṇābhāvān nāsti darśanaheyaprahāṇāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3911_0: arhattvād api nāstīti. na kevalaṃ darśanaheyaprahāṇān nāsti parihāṇir arhattvād api
SA01yabhkvyu:3911_1: nāsti parihāṇir ity apiśabdena darśayati. aprathamābhyāṃ tu sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3911_2: parihāṇiḥ saṃbhavati. laukikena mārgeṇa tatprāptisaṃbhavād ity abhiprāyaḥ. eṣa eva
SA01yabhkvyu:3911_3: ca nyāya ity ācāryaḥ samarthayati. tad dhi bhikṣavaḥ prahīṇam iti. tad eva prahīṇaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3911_4: yad āryaprajñayā prahīṇaṃ. tad dhi na punar utpadyate. laukikyā tu yat prahīṇaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3911_5: tat punar utpadyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. śaikṣasya cāpramāda iti vistareṇa dvitīyaṃ sūtrapadaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3911_6: jñāpakam arhattvān nāsti parihāṇir iti. ayaṃ cāsyārthaḥ śaikṣasyāpramādanimittam
SA01yabhkvyu:3911_7: apramādakarma pravedayāmy apramādaḥ śaikṣeṇa kartavya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3912_0: nanu ca śaikṣasyāpy āryayā prajñayā prahāṇam asti. kathaṃ tasyāpramādakaraṇīyaṃ śāstīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3912_1: yasmād anadhigatam anena phalāṃtaram adhigaṃtavyaṃ. laukikamārgagataṃ ca tasya prahāṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3912_2: astīti. atra vaibhāṣiko brūyād arhato 'py aham ānanda lābhasatkāram aṃtarāyakaraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3912_3: vadāmīti sūtre vacanād asty arhato 'pi parihāṇir ity ata idam ucyate. arhato 'pi
SA01yabhkvyu:3912_4: vistareṇa yāvad atra sūtre dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramātrād eva parihāṇir ukteti. [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3912_5: 253a] kathaṃ. yatra bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtam ānandam āmaṃtrayate sma. arhato 'py aham
SA01yabhkvyu:3912_6: ānanda lābhasatkāram aṃtarāyakaraṃ vadāmīti. āyuṣmān ānanda āha. tat kasmād bhagavān
SA01yabhkvyu:3912_7: evam āha. arhato 'py aham ānanda lābhasatkāram aṃtarāyakaraṃ vadāmīti. bhagavān āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:3912_8: na haivānandāprāptasya prāptaye. anadhigatasyādhigamāya. asākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai.
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_0: ādhicaitasikā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāḥ. tato 'ham asyānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_1: vadāmi. tac cākīrṇasya viharataḥ. yā tv anenaikākināvyapakṛṣṭenāpramattenātāpinā
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_2: prahitātmanā viharatā akopyā cetovimuktiḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtā. tato 'syāhaṃ na kenacit
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_3: paryāyeṇa parihāṇiṃ vadāmi. tasmāt tarhy ānandaivaṃ te śikṣitavyaṃ. yal lābbasatkāram
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_4: abhibhaviṣyāṇo na cātyantair lābhasatkārakaiś cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati. evaṃ te
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_5: ānanda śikṣitavyam iti. yadi vaibhāṣika evaṃ brūyāt. akopyā iti viśeṣaṇāt sāmayikyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_6: asti parihāṇir iti. tata āha. sāmayikyā astīti ced iti. vayam apy evaṃ brūmaḥ. sāmayikyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_7: asti parihāṇir iti. sā tu vicāryā sā tu sāmayikī vimuktir vicāryā. katham ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_8: kim arhattvaṃ sāmayikī vimuktir asti. [Tib. 253b] āhosvid dhyānāny eva laukikāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_9: sāmayikī vimuktir iti. kasmād evam āśaṃkyata ity āha. maulo hi dhyānasamādhir iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_10: dhyānam eva samādhir dhyānasamādhiḥ. mauladhyānagrahaṇaṃ sukhapratipadām agratvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_11: samaye saṃmukhībhāvāt. kasmiṃścit kāle niḥśabdādike saṃmukhībhāvāt. samaye bhavā
SA01yabhkvyu:3913_12: samāyikī vimuktir ity ucyate. punaḥpunar eṣaṇīyatvāt kāṃteti. parihāṇau parihāṇau
SA01yabhkvyu:3914_0: āsvādanīyatvād ity apara iti bhadaṃtarāmaḥ. sāsravatvād āsvādanāsaṃprayuktadhyānayogāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3914_1: kāṃtety abhiprāyaḥ. arhattvavimuktis tv iti vistaraḥ. arhattvam eva vimuktir arhattvavimuktiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3914_2: nityānugatatvāt prāptiyogena. na yujyate sāmayikīty anena sāmayikyā vimukter viparyayeṇārhattvavimuktiṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3914_3: darśayati. apunaḥprārthanīyatvān na kāṃtety anena kāṃtaviparyaye 'rhattvavimuktir
SA01yabhkvyu:3914_4: na kāṃteti. nityānugatatvenāstitvād aprārthanīyatvān na kāṃtety arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3915_0: ādhicaitasikebhya eveti. adhicetasi bhavā [Tib. 254a] ādhicaitasikā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3915_1: tebhya eva. kim arthaṃ parihāṇim avakṣyad iti. ye te caitasikā drṣṭadharmasukhavihārā
SA01yabhkvyu:3915_2: adhigatāḥ. tato 'ham asyānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmīti vacanāt. yady arhattvāt sāmayikī
SA01yabhkvyu:3915_3: vimuktilakṣaṇāt parihāṇisaṃbhavo 'bhaviṣyat. kim arthaṃ tebhya eva parihāṇim avakṣyat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3915_4: na tebhya eva parihāṇim avakṣyad ity arthaḥ. vaśitvabhraṃśād iti. samādhisaṃmukhībhāvavaśitvabhraṃśād
SA01yabhkvyu:3915_5: ity arthaḥ. so 'parihāṇadharmeti. aparihāṇadharmā akopyadharmaṇo 'nyaḥ sūtre paṭhitaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3915_6: aṣṭādaśaśaikṣān vistareṇoktvāha. navāśaikṣāḥ katame. parihāṇadharmā. aparihāṇadharmā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3916_0: prajñāvimuktaḥ. ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ. ima ucyaṃte navaśaikṣā iti. yaḥ parihīyate
SA01yabhkvyu:3916_1: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ. sa parihāṇadharmā. yo na parihīyate tata eva. so 'parihāṇadharmā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3916_2: evaṃ [Tib. 254b] cetanādharmādayo 'pi yojyāḥ. kathaṃ. yaḥ samādhibhraṃśabhayād ātmānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3916_3: cetayate. sa cetanādharmā. yo 'nurakṣati kathaṃcid guṇaviśeṣaṃ. so 'nurakṣaṇādharmā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3916_4: yo yasminn eva guṇe sthitaḥ. tasmād ananurakṣann api na kaṃpyate. sa sthitākaṃpyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3916_5: yaḥ pareṇa pratividhyati. guṇaviśeṣam utpādayatīty arthaḥ. sa prativedhanābhavyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3916_6: yo na kupyati utpannebhyo na parihīyate. so 'kopyadharmā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3917_0: ko viśeṣa iti. aparihāṇadharmādīnāṃ trayāṇām aparihāṇiyogād viśeṣam apaśyan praśnayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3917_1: anuttāpanāgata iti. svabhāvatas tīkṣṇendriyaḥ. neṃdriyottāpanāṃ prāpta ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3917_2: tasmān na kaṃpyata iti. tasmāt guṇaviśeṣād ity arthaḥ. eṣa viśeṣo lakṣyata iti. ācāryaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3917_3: svamataṃ darśayati. nanu cāyuṣmān gautiko 'rhattvāt parihīṇa ity evaṃ yadi vaibhāṣiko
SA01yabhkvyu:3917_4: brūyād ity asya pratividhānam ārabhyate. āyuṣmān gautika iti vistaraḥ. śaikṣībhūta
SA01yabhkvyu:3917_5: iti na tāvad arhan. śastram ādhārayann iti. śastraṃ vāhayan. kāyajīvitanirapekṣatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3917_6: kāraṇān maraṇakāla evārhattvaṃ prāptaḥ. śastrādhārād uttarakāla ity arthaḥ. [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_0: daśottare ceti. daśottaranāmasūtre. kim uktam ity āha. eko dharma utpādayitavyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_1: katama ity āha. sāmayikī kāṃtā cetovimuktir iti. dṛṣṭadhārmasukhavihāra ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_2: eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ. katama ity āha. akopyā cetovimuktir iti. arhattvam ity
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_3: abhiprāyaḥ. pṛthagvacanād dhy akopyavimuktilakṣaṇād arhattvād arhattvasvabhāvā na
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_4: kāṃtā cetovimuktir uktety abhiprāyaḥ. dviprakāratvād arhattvasya pṛthagvacanam iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_5: vaibhāṣikavacanāvakāśaṃ paśyan punar āha. yadi cārhattvam iti vistaraḥ. yady arhattvam
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_6: eva sāmayikī kāṃtā cetovimuktir abhaviṣyat. kim arthaṃ tatraiva daśake na sūtrāṃtare
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_7: arhattvasya dvigrahaṇam akariṣyat. eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ. akopyā cetovimuktir
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_8: iti. naivākariṣyad ity arthaḥ. evaṃ hy avakṣyat. eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaś cetovimuktir
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_9: iti. brūyās tv arhattvaṃ dviprakāram. ato vacanavibhāgenocyate. ekam utpādayitavyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_10: dvitīyaṃ sākṣātkartavyam iti. atra brūmaḥ. na ca kvacid arhattvam utpādayitavyam
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_11: uktaṃ. [Tib. 255b] kiṃ tarhi. sākṣātkartavyam iti. tatratatra sūtre. abhyupetyāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_12: brūmaḥ. mṛdvindriyasaṃgṛhītaṃ cotpādayitavyam iti. kim anena jñāpanena jñāpitaṃ kathitaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3918_13: bhavati. yadi tāvad utpādayituṃ śakyam ity etaj jñāpitaṃ bhavati. (Abhidh-k-vy 591)
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_0: śaki liṅ ceti kṛtyapratyayalakṣaṇāt. anyad api śakyaṃ yat tīkṣṇendriyasaṃgṛhītam
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_1: arhattvaṃ. tathā ca saty evaṃ sūtre vaktavyaṃ syāt. eko dharma utpādayitavyaḥ. cetovimuktir
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_2: iti. athotpādanam arhatīty etaj jñāpitaṃ bhavati. arhe kṛtyatṛcaś ceti lakṣaṇaparigrahāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_3: anyat sutarām arhati yat tīkṣṇendriyasaṃgṛhītam arhattvaṃ. tad dhy akopyatvāt suṣṭhūtpādayitum
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_4: arhatīty abhiprāyaḥ. kathaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. yadi sāmayikī vimuktir arhattvaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_5: evaṃ tadyogāt samaya vimukto 'rhann iti yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. samayāpekṣaḥ samādhisaṃmukhībhāva
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_6: iti. yasmād asya samādhiḥ sāsravo 'nāsravo 'pi vā samayam ārogyadeśaviśeṣādilakṣaṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_7: apekṣate. abhidharme 'pi coktam iti vistaraḥ. kāmarāgānuśayo 'prahīṇo bhavatīty etad
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_8: udāharaṇam. idaṃ cāpy udāharaṇaṃ. tatra cāyoniśomanaskāra iti. paripūrṇotpattir evam
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_9: iti cet. syān matā paripūrṇakāraṇasya kleśasyaivam utpattiḥ. aparipūrṇakāraṇasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_10: tu kleśasya viṣayabalād eveti. [Tib. 256a] tad ayuktaṃ. kasmād ity āha. kasya vāparipūrṇakāraṇasyotpattir
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_11: iti. kasyotpattiḥ. yataḥ aparipūrṇakāraṇasyotpattir asti. yāvatī hi hetupratyayasāmagrī
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_12: kāryasyotpattaye prasiddhā. sā tadekadeśavikalā satī tasyotpattaye na bhavati. tadyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_13: cakṣū rūpālokamanaskārasāmagrī cakṣurvijñānasyotpattaye prasiddhā. sa tadanyetaravikalā
SA01yabhkvyu:3919_14: satī tadutpattaye na bhavatīti. tasmān na kiṃcid etat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3920_0: tadrūpa iti tatprakāraḥ. tatsvabhāva iti vā. atha notpanna iti pratipakṣaḥ tadbījadharmatāyām
SA01yabhkvyu:3920_1: iti. kleśabījasvabhāva ity arthaḥ. tasyām anapoddhṛtāyām anunmūlitāyāṃ kathaṃ kṣīṇāsravo
SA01yabhkvyu:3920_2: bhavatīti. brūyās tvaṃ na bhavatīti. ata āha. akṣīṇāsravo vā katham arhan bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3921_0: evaṃcarata iti. smṛtimataś carata ity arthaḥ anaṃtaraṃ smṛtivacanāt. śaikṣas sa ity
SA01yabhkvyu:3921_1: asya vacanasya parihārārthaṃ sa eva parihāṇivādy āha. sa hi tatrārhann eva jñāpita
SA01yabhkvyu:3921_2: iti. kathaṃ kṛtvā jñāpita ity āha. dīrgharātram iti vistaraḥ. aparihāṇivādinaḥ syād
SA01yabhkvyu:3921_3: evaṃ vacanāvakāśaḥ. śaikṣasyedaṃ vivekanimnacittam ucyate yāvan nirvāṇaprāgbhāram
SA01yabhkvyu:3921_4: iti. asya parihārārthaṃ parihāṇivādī punar āha. arhato hy etad balam anyatroktam
SA01yabhkvyu:3921_5: iti sūtre. kathaṃ. kati bhadaṃtārhato bhikṣoḥ kṣīṇāsravasya balāni. [Tib. 256b] aṣṭau
SA01yabhkvyu:3921_6: śāriputrārhato bhikṣor dīrgharātraṃ vivekanimnaṃ cittaṃ yāvan nirvāṇaprāgbhāraṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3921_7: aṃgārakarṣūpamāś cānena kāmā dṛṣṭā bhavaṃti. yathāsya kāmān jānataḥ kāmān paśyato
SA01yabhkvyu:3921_8: yaḥ kāmeṣu kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ vistareṇa yāvat kāmādhyavasānaṃ. tatrāsya cittaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3921_9: na paryādāya tiṣṭhatīti vistaraḥ. kiṃ ca śītībhūtaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 592)
SA01yabhkvyu:3922: vāṃtībhūtam iti cābhidhānāt. tatraivāṃgārakarṣūpame sūtre 'rhann eva jñāpita iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3923_0: asty etad evam iti. aṃgārakarṣūpame yad uktam arhann eva jñāpita iti. yāvat tu cāro
SA01yabhkvyu:3923_1: na supratividdha iti. piṇḍapātādicāraḥ. śaikṣāvasthām adhikṛtyaivaṃvacanād adoṣa
SA01yabhkvyu:3923_2: iti. yad etad uktaṃ. kadācit smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyaṃte pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3923_3: tac chaikṣām adhikṛtyoktaṃ nārhattvāvasthāṃ. yat tūktaṃ dīrgharātraṃ vivekanimnaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3923_4: iti. tac chaikṣasyāpi saṃbhavati. arhatas tu prakarṣeṇa bhavatīti viśeṣāḥ. yac cāpy
SA01yabhkvyu:3923_5: uktaṃ sāsravasthānīyair dharmaiḥ śītībhūtaṃ vāṃtībhūtam iti. tad api śaikṣāvasthām
SA01yabhkvyu:3923_7: arhattvāvasthāṃ cādhikṛtya tathābhidhānād adoṣa iti ācāryasyābhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3924_0: (VI.60cd) prayogāsaṃbhavān na darśanamārga iti. paṃcadaśakṣaṇo darśanamārgaḥ. tatrendriyasaṃcāre
SA01yabhkvyu:3924_1: prayogāvakāśo nāsti. kaścit pṛthagjanāvasthāyām indriyāṇi saṃcaratīti. [kim anityādyākārapatitena
SA01yabhkvyu:3924_2: mārgeṇendriyāṇi saṃcarati.] kim audārikādyākāreṇa mārgeṇendriyāṇi saṃcarati. utāho
SA01yabhkvyu:3924_3: śāṃtādyākāreṇeti. aviśeṣitatvād ubhayathāpi saṃbhavatīti paśyāmaḥ. tathā hy enam
SA01yabhkvyu:3924_4: artham ācāryaḥ sūcayiṣyati. na hi sāsraveṇa mārgeṇāryāṇām indriyasaṃcāra ity āryāṇām
SA01yabhkvyu:3924_5: iti viśeṣaṇāt. api nāma mamendriyāṇi tīkṣṇāni syur iti prayogam abhisaṃdhāya. mārgaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3925_0: (VI.61) katham akopyadharmaṇo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇir iti. tīkṣnendriyatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3925_1: asya dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇir na saṃbhavet. kim utākopyāyā vimukter
SA01yabhkvyu:3925_2: ity asaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati. buddhasyopabhogaparihāṇir eveti. vineyakāryavyāpṛtatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:3925_3: [Tib. 257b] dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārān nopabhuṃkte. na saṃmukhīkarotīty arthaḥ. sā cāprāptaparihāṇiś
SA01yabhkvyu:3925_4: ceti. akopyadharmaṇaḥ sā copabhogaparihāṇiḥ kutaścid vyāsaṃgāt. aprāptiparihāṇiś
SA01yabhkvyu:3925_5: ca pudgalaviśeṣadharmaprāpaṇāt. yasmād akopyadharmāpi kaścin mahāśrāvakāṇām āryaśāriputramaudgalyāyanādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3925_6: prāṃtakoṭikādīn dharmān. svayaṃbhuvāṃ ca kāṃścid dharmān na prāpnoti. mahāśrāvakā
SA01yabhkvyu:3925_7: api svayaṃbhuvāṃ kāṃścid viśeṣadharmān na prāpnuvaṃtītyādi. anyasyārhata iti parihāṇadharmāder
SA01yabhkvyu:3925_8: mṛdvindriyasya prāptaparihāṇir apy asti. apiśabdāt pūrvokta api (Abhidh-k-vy 593)
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_0: parihāṇī sta iti. akopyadharmaṇa upabhogaparihāṇivacanāt sūtravirodha iti. yad etad
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_1: uktaṃ. ye 'nena catvāra iti vistareṇa. yāvat tato 'ham asyānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_2: vadāmīti. tasya sutrasyāvirodhaḥ. ṣaṇṇām apy arhatām akopyā vimuktir ity ukte vaibhāṣiko
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_3: brūyāt. yadi sarvasyaivārhato 'nāsravā vimuktir akopyā. kasmād asamayavimukta evākopyadharmā
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_4: vyavasthāpito nānya iti. ata idam ucyate. sarvasyānāsravā vimuktir [Tib. 258a] akopyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_5: satyam asty etat. akopyadharmavyavasthānaṃ tu yathā tathoktam iti. dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyas
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_6: tu kaścil lābhasatkāravyākṣepadoṣāt parihīyate vaśitvabhraṃśāt. yo mṛdvindriyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_7: kaścin na parihīyate. yas tīkṣṇendriyaḥ. sa evākopyadharmā vyavasthāpitaḥ. yata eva
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_8: ca dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyo lābhasatkāravyākṣepadoṣāt parihīyate. mṛdvindriyo na
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_9: tīkṣṇendriyaḥ. ata etad acodyaṃ. katham. akopyadharmaṇo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇir
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_10: ity aparihāṇivādī. atha vā ayam anyaḥ saṃbaṃdhaḥ. pūrvam akopyadharmaṇo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_11: parihāṇir nāstīty uktaṃ. sūtre ca. yasyākopyā vimuktiḥ. tasya dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_12: parihāṇir uktā. aviśeṣyābhidhānād ata idam ucyate. sarvasyānāsravā vimuktir akopyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_13: na tayaivākopyadharmā vyavasthāpyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. ata evocyate akopyadharmavyavasthānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3926_14: tu yathā tathoktam iti. ata etad acodyam iti. yad uktaṃ sūtram āśritya katham akopyadharmaṇo
SA01yabhkvyu:3927_0: (VI.62) dhandhā iti mandāḥ. anyathā hy [Tib. 258b] anāśvāsikam iti. yady arhattvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3927_1: parihīṇaḥ punar jāyeta sucīrṇabrahmacarye 'smin mārge cāpi subhāvite tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣayād
SA01yabhkvyu:3927_2: bhavati rogasyāpagame yathety āśvāsaḥ. evaṃvidho na syād iti. tad akāryam abrahmacaryādilakṣaṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3927_3: śūrapraskhalanāpatanavad iti. yathā śūrasya praskhalane apatanaṃ bhavati śaktita
SA01yabhkvyu:3927_4: ātmadhāraṇāt. tadvad āryaḥ phalāt parihīṇo 'pi tatphalam alabdhvā na mriyate. śūragrahaṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3928: (VI.63, 64) katham abhyastam ity āha. śaikṣāśaikṣamārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvād iti prayogamārgas tu sarvatraika eveti. akopyaprativedhe dṛṣṭiprāptatāyāṃ ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:3929: na hi sāsraveṇeti. āryendriyasaṃcārasya vivakṣitatvāt. anyathā hi kaścit pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ indriyāṇi saṃcaratīty etad virudhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3930_0: nānyatra parihāṇyasaṃbhavād iti. parihāṇibhayād dhīndriyasaṃcāra iṣyate. anyatra
SA01yabhkvyu:3930_1: ṣaṭsu kāmāvacareṣu devanikāyeṣu rūpārūpyadhātvoś ca parihāṇir nāstīty āha. ūrdhavdhātūpapanna
SA01yabhkvyu:3931_0: parihīyate [Tib. 259a] iti. uktam atra kāraṇaṃ. kālāntaraparivāsenendriyāṇāṃ paripakvataratvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3931_1: āśrayaviśeṣalābhāc ceti. atha kasmāt kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu parihāṇir nāsti. ye pūrvam
SA01yabhkvyu:3931_2: abhyudārebhyo 'pi viṣayebhyaḥ saṃvijaṃto niyataṃ satyāni paśyaṃti. te kathaṃ tān
SA01yabhkvyu:3931_3: evālaṃbya parihāsyaṃte. avaśyaṃ hi te tīkṣṇendriyā bhavantīty abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3933_0: tatphalasya navabhūmisaṃgṛhītatvasaṃbhavāt. phalaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ ceti. phalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3933_2: phalamārgam eva pratilabhata iti. kāmadhātuvairāgyamātrasaṃgṛhītaṃ. na cānāgāmiphalam
SA01yabhkvyu:3933_3: ārūpyasaṃgṛhītam iti. paṃcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāmīti sūtre vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3933_4: darśanamārgasya ca tatrābhāvāt. tadabhāvaḥ kāmadhātvanālaṃbanād iti vyākhyātam etat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3934: (VI.65ab) akopyadharmā ca dvividha iti. sūtre paṭhitatvāt akopyabheda eva
SA01yabhkvyu:3936_0: iti. akopyadharmā mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyabhedāt tridhā bhidyate. śrāvako hy akopyadharmādhimātramṛdvindriyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3936_2: iti. mṛdumṛdvādinavaprakārendriyabhedād iti. parihāṇidharmā mṛdumṛdvindriyo yāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:3937_1: eveti kṛtvā. pūrvam eveti vistaraḥ. pūrvam eva pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ parapratyayena
SA01yabhkvyu:3937_2: parataḥ śrutvā smṛtyupasthānādīn dharmān. paścād artheṣu prayogāt. cintābhāvanāsevanād
SA01yabhkvyu:3937_3: ity arthaḥ. tathā pūrvam eva pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ prajñayā dvādaśāṃgapravacanadharmānusāreṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3937_4: svayam evaṃ bodhipakṣādīn dharmān anusarann artheṣu prayogāt. cintābhāvanāsevanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3937_5: ity evaṃ prayogataḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇau bhavataḥ. śraddhādhimokṣaprajñādhikyata
SA01yabhkvyu:3937_6: iti. śraddhādhimokṣādhikyataḥ prajñādhikyataś ca. śraddhayādhimokṣaḥ śraddhādhimokṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3937_7: tasyādhikyān mṛdvindriyatvaṃ. prajñādhikyāt tīkṣṇendriyatvaṃ. vimuktita iti. kleśavimuktitaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3937_8: prajñayā kleśād vimuktaḥ prajñāvimukta iti kṛtvā. samāpattivimuktita iti. samāpattito vimuktitaś ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:3938: tatrendriyata [Tib. 260a] iti vistaraḥ. yathaite śraddhānusāriṇo gaṇyaṃte. tathā yathāgranthaṃ pradarśayiṣyāma. indriyatas trayaḥ. mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyatvāt. (Abhidh-k-vy 595)
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_0: atra punar evam avagantavyaṃ. yady api śraddhānusāriṇaḥ sarva eva mṛdvindriyāḥ. tathāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_1: tāratamyenāvasthānād eṣāṃ punas tridhābhedaḥ mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyā iti. gotrataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_2: paṃca. kathaṃ. parihāṇadharmagotrako yāvat prativedhanābhavyagotraka iti paṃca bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_3: punar eṣāṃ gotrendriyabhedāt paṃcadaśānām ekaiko mārgataḥ paṃcadaśa bhavaṃti. katham
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_4: ity ucyate. aṣṭakṣāntisaptajñānasthā iti. darśanamārgo hi paṃcadaśakṣaṇāḥ. aṣṭau
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_5: kṣāntayaḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāṃtir yāvan mārge anvayajñānakṣāntiḥ. sapta jñānāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_6: duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ yāvan mārge dharmajñānaṃ. mārge 'nvayajñānasya bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_7: aṣṭau ca sapta ca paṃcadaśa bhavanti. ta evaṃ tatrasthāḥ paṃcadaśa bhavaṃti. evam
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_8: eṣāṃ mārgataḥ paṃcadaśadhābhinnānāṃ punar ekaiko vairāgyatas trisaptatiḥ. kathaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_9: sakalabandhanas tāvat kāmadhātāv ekaḥ. kāmavairāgyān nava. ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvan
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_10: navaprakāravītarāgaḥ. evaṃ yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanavairāgyān naveti. bhavāgravairāgyān
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_11: naveti na saṃbhavati. laukikasya mārgasya bhavāgrapratipakṣasyābhāvāt. ta ete 'ṣṭau
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_12: navakā dvisaptatiḥ. [Tib. 260b] sakalabandhanena pūrvoktena saha trisaptatir bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_13: punar ete vairāgyataḥ pratyekaṃ trisaptatibhinnāḥ. pratyekam āśrayato nava. katham
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_14: ity āha. tridvīpaṣaḍdevanikāyajā iti. trayo dvīpā uttarakuruvarjyāḥ. uttarakurau
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_15: mārgābhāvāt. ṣaḍ devanikāyāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ. tata ūrdhvaṃ darśanamārgābhāvāt. teṣu jātā
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_16: iti. pratyekam ete navaguṇā bhavaṃti. indriyagotramārgavairāgyāśrayataḥ piṇḍitā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_17: nigamana ucyate. iyanta iti vṛttau likhitāḥ. evam anye 'pi pudgalāḥ saṃbhavataḥ saṃkhyeyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_19: saṃkhyātāḥ. tathaiva saṃkhyeyāḥ saṃbhavata iti. dharmānusāridṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_20: gotrabhedo nāsti. śraddhādhimuktasamayavimuktayos tu gotrabhedo 'py astīti. saṃbhavata
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_21: ity ucyate. tatrendriyatas trayo dharmānusāriṇaḥ. gotrata eka eveti bhedo nāsti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_22: mārgataḥ paṃcadaśa aṣṭakṣāntisaptajñānasthāḥ. vairāgyatas trisaptatiḥ. sakalabandhanaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_23: kāmavairāgyān nava. evaṃ yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanavairāgyāt. [Tib. 261a] āśrayato nava.
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_24: tridvīpaṣaḍdevanikāyajā iti. evam indriyamārgavairāgyāśrayataḥ piṇḍitāḥ. sahasrāṇy
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_25: ekānnatriṃśat saṃpadyaṃte. śatāni ca paṃca paṃcaṣaṣṭiś ca. evam indriyatas trayaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_26: śraddhādhimuktāḥ. gotrataḥ paṃca pratyekaṃ. vairāgyatas trisaptatiḥ pratyekameva
SA01yabhkvyu:3939_27: pūrvavat. āśrayato nava. tridvīpaṣaḍdevanikāyajā iti. evam indriyagotravairāgyāśrayataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3940: śatāni cāṣṭau paṃca paṃcāśac ca. kevalaphalastho ṣoḍaśacittaprāpto 'dhikṛtaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_0: bhagavadviśeṣas tv āha. mārgato nava bhavaṃti. bhāvanāmārgasthatvād iti. tan na budhyāmahe
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_1: kenābhiprāyeṇaivam uktam iti. yady ayam abhiprāyo bhavet. mārgato bhūmaubhūmau nava
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_2: bhavantīti. vairāgyatas trisaptatir iti sa evārtho darśito bhavet. tatavyatirekād
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_3: iti. yuktaṃ syāt. tad eva hi parimāṇaṃ syāt. atha navabhūmikānāsravabhāvanāmārgasthatvān
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_4: navatvam eṣāṃ vyavasthāpyeta. tathā sati. tatparimāṇaṃ punar navaguṇīkriyeta. etāvantaś
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_5: ca bhaveyur aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi. śatāni ca ṣaṭ. paṃcanavatiś cety evam uttaratrāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_6: vaktavyaṃ. yadi tu śraddhādhimukta ā vajropamāt samādher gṛhyeta. tato 'nyathā gaṇayitavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_7: indriyatas trayaḥ śraddhādhimuktāḥ. [Tib. 261b] gotrataḥ paṃca pratyekaṃ. vairāgyata
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_8: ekāśītiḥ trisaptattau bhavāgrāṣṭaprakāravītarāgān aṣṭāv adhikān prakṣipya. āśrayata
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_9: ekānnatriṃśat. kathaṃ kāmadhātau navopapattisthānāni. rūpadhātau ṣoḍaśa sthānāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_10: catvāraś cārūpyā iti. evam indriyagotravairāgyāśrayataḥ piṇḍitāḥ sahasrāṇi paṃcatriṃśat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_11: śate ca dve. paṃcatriṃśac ceti. dṛṣṭiprāptasya gotrabhedo nāsti. indriyavairāgyāśrayataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_12: piṇḍitāḥ sahasraṃ saṃpadyante. śatāni ca nava. ekā saptatiś ca. yadi tv ā vajropamāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_13: samādher dṛṣṭiprāpto gṛhyate. tata evaṃ saṃkhyātavyāḥ. indriyavairāgyāśrayataḥ piṇḍitāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_14: saptacatvāriṃśad adhikāni sapta sahasrāṇi saṃpadyante. kāyasākṣī śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptayor
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_15: antarbhūta iti na gaṇyate. yadi punar gaṇyate indriyatas trayaḥ. yadi śraddhādhimuktaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_16: sa kāyasākṣī gotrataḥ paṃca. yadi dṛṣṭiprāpto nāsti gotrabhedaḥ. mārgata ubhayor
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_17: api nāsti bhedaḥ. ākiṃcanyāyatanavītarāgatvāt vairāgyato 'pi nāsti bhedaḥ. yady api
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_18: bhavāgre sakalabandanaḥ ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti. mārgato
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_19: vairāgyato vāsti bhedaḥ. na tu mārgavairāgyakṛtaṃ kāyasākṣitvam iti. nāsya tatkṛtas
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_20: tadbhedo vyavasthāpyate. [Tib. 262a] āśrayato vā bahudhābhedaḥ. kāmāvacarāśrayatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_21: yāvad bhavāgrāśrayatvād iti bhagavadviśeṣaḥ. katham ākāśānaṃtyāyatanādyāśrayaḥ kāyasākṣī
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_22: bhavati. evaṃ tu yuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. āśrayataḥ paṃcaviṃśatiḥ. kāmadhātau navopapattisthānāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3943_23: rūpadhātau ca ṣoḍaśa sthānāniti. tatra hy āryo nirodhasamāpattim utpādayet. yadi
SA01yabhkvyu:3944_0: paścād api bhavāgrāśrayaṃ kāyasākṣitvam iṣyeta. bhavāgraṃ ṣaḍviṃśatitama āśrayaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3944_1: syād ity avagantavyaṃ. evam indriyagotrāśrayataḥ parigaṇya gaṇayitavyaḥ. prajñāvimuktasyāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:3944_2: bhedaḥ. indriyatas trayaḥ prajñāvimuktaḥ. gotrataḥ paṃca. yadi samayavimuktāḥ. athāsamayavimuktā
SA01yabhkvyu:3945_1: kleśāvaraṇavimuktatvāt. samādhibalena ca vimokṣāvaraṇavimuktatvāt. vimokṣāḥ punar
SA01yabhkvyu:3945_2: aṣṭau vakṣyante rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatīti vistaraḥ. tatra kleśāvaraṇam [Tib. 262b] iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3945_3: kleśā evāvaraṇaṃ. vimokṣāvaraṇaṃ iti. vimokṣāṇām āvaraṇaṃ. tat punaḥ kāyacittayor
SA01yabhkvyu:3945_4: akarmaṇyatā. yayā vimokṣān utpādayituṃ na śaknotīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_0: (VI.67) kleśān prahāyeha hi yas tu paṃceti. paṃcāvarabhāgīyāni saṃyojanāni satkāyadṛṣṭyādīny
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_1: uktāni. ahāryadharmety aparihāṇidharmety arthaḥ. phalata eveti vistaraḥ. śraddhādhimuktatvān
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_2: nendriyataḥ paripūrṇatvam. akāyasākṣitvān na samāpattitaḥ. anāgāmitvāt tu phalataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_3: paripūrṇatvam asti. indriyata eveti. dṛṣṭiprāptatvād indriyataḥ paripūrṇatvam. avītarāgatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_4: tu na phalato nāpi samāpattitaḥ. anāgāmiphalasamāpattyor abhāvāt evam anyeṣām api
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_5: saṃbhavato yojyaṃ. samāpattita eveti. samāpattita eva paripūrṇatvaṃ nendriyaphalābhyām
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_6: iti nāsty etat. kasmāt. na hy asatyām anāgāmiphalaprāptau nirodhasamāpattir asti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_7: samāpattīndriyataś ca vinā phaleneti. samāpattīndriyata eva ca paripūrṇatvaṃ na phalata
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_8: ity etad api nāsti. yasmād anāgāmiphalam aprāptasya nirodhasamāpattir nāstīti. indriyataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_9: samāpattitaś ceti. [Tib. 263a] tīkṣṇendriyatayā nirodhasamāpattilābhatayā cety arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_10: indriyata eveti vistaraḥ. asamayavimuktasyeti vacanāt. asyendriyataḥ paripūrṇatvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_11: prajñāvimuktasyeti vacanāt. na samāpattito 'sya paripūrṇatvaṃ. anirodhasamāpattilābhī
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_12: hi prajñāvimukta ity uktaṃ. samāpattita eveti. samayavimuktasyeti vacanāt. nendriyataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_13: paripūrṇatvam asya bhavati. ubhayatobhāgavimuktasyeti vacanāt. samāpattito 'sya paripūrṇatvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_14: nirodhasamāpattilābhīty ubhayatobhāgavimukta ity uktaṃ. indriyasamāpattibhyāṃ. kiṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3946_15: paripūrṇatvaṃ. asamayavimuktatvād indriyataḥ ubhayatobhāgavimuktatvāt samāpattita iti darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3947: (VI.68) ānantaryamārgo yenāvaraṇaṃ prajahātīti. aprahāṇamārgasaṃbhavāt. asti sa ānantaryamārgo yenāvaraṇaṃ na prajahāti. indriyasaṃcārādiṣu. (Abhidh-k-vy 598)
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_0: yas tatpraheyāvaraṇanirmuktaḥ prathamata iti. ya ānantaryamārgapraheyeṇāvaraṇena
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_1: nirmuktaḥ. prathamata iti viśeṣaṇaṃ. yasmāt tṛtīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu tajjātīyo [Tib. 263b]
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_2: mārgo viśeṣamārga itīṣyate. tena eva cāha. viśeṣamārgo ya ebhyo 'nyo mārga iti. prayogamārgādibhyo
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_3: 'nya ity arthaḥ. kiṃ ca yadi prathamata iti na brūyāt. vimuktimārgo yas tatpraheyāvaraṇanirmukta
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_4: ity etāvad brūyāt. evaṃ sati duḥkhadharmajñānāt pareṇa sarve ānantaryamārgādayas
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_5: tatpraheyāvaraṇanirmuktā utpadyanta iti. sarve vimuktimārgāḥ syuḥ. aniṣṭaṃ caitat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_6: ānantaryamārgādiṣv api vimuktimārgaprasaṃgāt. tasmād ānantaryamārgasya duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntyāder
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_7: yatpraheyam āvaraṇaṃ. duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyo yāvad bhāvanāprahātavyaḥ. tena
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_8: praheyāvaraṇena nirmukto yaḥ prathamata utpadyate. sa vimuktimārgaḥ. nānyas tat praheyāvaraṇanirmuktatve
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_9: 'pīti. ya ebhyaḥ prayogamārgādibhyas tribhyo 'nyaḥ. sa viśeṣamārgaḥ. ṣoḍaśān mārgānvayajñānakṣaṇāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_10: pareṇa saptadaśādayas tajjātīyā ye 'nāsravāḥ kṣaṇāḥ. te viśeṣamārgasvabhāvā ity avagantavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_11: evam anyad api vimuktijñānaṃ. yat prākarṣikaṃ kṣayajñānādi. tad api vaktavyaṃ. yaś
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_12: ca dṛṣṭadharmasakhavihārāya vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāya vā mārgaḥ. so 'pi viśeṣamārga
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_13: [Tib. 264a] eva prayogamārgo yasmād ānantaryamārgotpattir ity uktaṃ. ato laukikā
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_14: agradharmāḥ prayogamārga iti gamyate. yas tu pratilomataḥ kṣāntyādimārgaḥ. sa kasminn
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_15: antarbhavatīti vaktavyam. āha. prayogamārga evāntarbhavati. viprakṛṣṭas tv asau prayogamārga
SA01yabhkvyu:3948_16: ity ayaṃ tasyāgradharmebhyo viśeṣaḥ. udāharaṇārthatvāc cācāryeṇa saṃnikṛṣṭa eva prayogamārga ukta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3949_0: eṣa hi nirvāṇasya panthāḥ. tena tadgamanād iti. loke yena gamyate. sa mārga iti pratītaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3949_1: anena ca nirvāṇaṃ gamyate prāpyate. tasmān mārga iti darśayati. mārgayaṃty anena
SA01yabhkvyu:3949_2: veti. mārgo 'nveṣaṇa iti dhātuḥ paṭhyate. tasyaitad ghañi rūpaṃ mārga iti. yena nirvāṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3949_3: anviṣyate. sa mārga iti. vimuktiviśeṣamārgayoḥ kathaṃ mārgatvam iti. na hi tābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3949_4: nirvāṇaṃ prāpyate. prayogānantaryamārgayor eva tatprāptau sāmarthyān na tayor iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3949_6: adhimātratarau ca hetūpacayataḥ. yathā hy ānantaryamārgaś catuḥsatyālaṃbanaṣoḍaśākāro
SA01yabhkvyu:3949_7: 'nāsravaś ca. evaṃ vimuktiviśeṣamārgāv api. adhimātrataratvenaiva tu tasmād viśeṣa
SA01yabhkvyu:3949_8: iti. [Tib. 264b] uttarottaraprāpaṇāt. nirupadhiśeṣapraveśād veti. yasmād vimuktimārgeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:3950: mārgaḥ prāpyate. tasmāt anayor mārgatvam ity arthaḥ. yasmād vā tābhyāṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇaṃ praviśati. yadutpattau nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇapraveśa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3951: apare punar evaṃ vyācakṣate. uttarottaraprāpaṇān nirupadhiśeṣapraveśaḥ. tasmād anayor mārgatvam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3952_0: (VI.69) nirvāṇapratipādanād iti. yasmād anena nirvāṇaṃ pratipadyata ity arthaḥ. evaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3952_1: sukhāpi dvividheti. asti pratipat sukhā dhandhābhijñā. asti sukhā kṣiprābhijñeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3952_3: śamathavipaśyanayoḥ samatvaṃ. aṃgaparigrahaś ca śamathavipaśyanāsamatvaṃ ca. tābhyām
SA01yabhkvyu:3952_4: ayatnavāhitvaṃ. tasmāt sukhā pratipat. yasmād aṃgaparigṛhītāni dhyānāni śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3952_5: samāni ca. tasmād ayatnavāhīni. ataś ca sukhāsau pratipad iti. aṃgāparigrahād iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3952_7: ca saṃbhavatas te [Tib. 265a] yatnavāhinaḥ. śamathanyūnatvād anāgamyadhyānāṃtare
SA01yabhkvyu:3952_8: yathavāhinī. vipaśyanānyūnatvāc cārūpyā yatnavāhinaḥ. tadbhāvāt. te 'nāgamyādayo
SA01yabhkvyu:3952_9: duḥkhā pratipad iti. dhandhābhijñeti. dhandhābhijñāsyām iti. dhandhābhijñā mandaprajñety
SA01yabhkvyu:3952_10: arthaḥ. kṣiprābhijñeti tīkṣṇaprajñā. dhandhasya mandasya pudgalasyeyam abhijñā dhandhābhijñeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3952_11: ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣeṇāpy etat sidhyatīti darśayati. evaṃ kṣiprasya tīkṣṇasya pudgalasyābhijñā
SA01yabhkvyu:3953_1: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni. utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3953_2: janayati. vyāyacchate. vīryam ārabhate. cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti. pradadhāti. anutpannānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3953_3: pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat. anutpannānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3953_4: kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat. utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3953_6: chandaṃ janayatīti pūrvavat. catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ. chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata
SA01yabhkvyu:3953_10: smṛtir eva saṃbodhyaṃgaṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃgam. evaṃ yāvad upekṣaiva saṃbodhyaṃgaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 600)
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_0: upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṃgam iti. āryāṣṭaṃgo mārgaḥ. samyagdṛṣṭiḥ. samyaksaṃkalpaḥ. samyagvāk.
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_1: samyakkarmāntaḥ. samyagājīvaḥ. samyagvyāyāmaḥ. samyaksmṛtiḥ. samyaksamādhir iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_2: aśeṣavidyāprahanād iti. yasmād aśeṣatraidhātukyavidyāprahāṇaṃ. tasmād ubhayaṃ bodhiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_3: anena śaikṣapṛthagjanānāṃ prajñā na bodhir vyavasthāpyata iti darśayati. kiṃ ca yathākramaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_4: tābhyāṃ svārthasya yathābhūtaṃ kṛtāpunaḥkartavyatāvabodhāc ca. kṣayajñānena yathābhūtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_5: kṛtāvabodhāt tat kṣayajñānaṃ bodhiḥ. duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_6: samudayo me prahīṇa iti. nirodho me sākṣātkṛta iti. mārgo me bhāvita iti yathābhūtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_7: prajānātīti. anutpādajñānena yathābhūtam apunaḥkartavyam iti. [mārgo me bhāvito na
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_8: punar bhāvayitavya] tad anutpādajñānam api bodhiḥ. duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_9: parijñātavyam. [Tib. 266a] iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. samudayo me prahīṇo na punaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_10: prahātavya iti. nirodho me sākṣātkṛto na punaḥ sākṣātkartavya iti. mārgo me bhāvito
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_11: na punar bhāvayitavya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti. duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam ity anena
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_12: kṣayajñānaṃ. na punaḥ parijñātavyam ity anenānutpādajñānam. ity ubhayam api tīkṣṇendriyasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_13: pudgalasya darśayatīti sarvaṃ neyaṃ. tad evaṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ ca bodhir
SA01yabhkvyu:3954_14: ity avayavārthaṃ prasādhya samudayārthaṃ prasādhayann āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:3957_0: iti. tasyā bodher anulomas tadanulomaḥ. tadbhāvas tādanulomyaṃ. tasmāt. tādanulomyato
SA01yabhkvyu:3957_1: bodhipakṣā. bodhipakṣe sādhavo 'nulomā iti bodhipakṣāḥ. smṛtyupasthānādayaḥ saptatriṃśad ucyaṃte pravācane.
SA01yabhkvyu:3958: (VI.71) daśa dravyāṇīti. keṣāṃcin matena. vakṣyati hi vaibhāṣikāṇām ekādaśa kāyavākkarmaṇor asaṃbhinnatvād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3960: iti. prajñā smṛtyupasthānam ity arthaḥ. smṛtir upatiṣṭhate 'nayeti kṛtvā. tathā hi sūtra uktaṃ. kāye [Tib. 266b] kāyanupaśyī vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3962: iti. yasmād uktam utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati. vyāyacchate. vīryam ārabhata iti sarvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3965_0: bhāvayatīti sarvaṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāḥ punar atrāṣṭau sūtre paṭhyante. kathaṃ. tathābhūtasya
SA01yabhkvyu:3965_1: yaś chandaḥ. yo vyāyāmaḥ. yā śraddhā. yā praśrabdhiḥ. yā smṛtiḥ. yat saṃprajanyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3965_2: yā cetanā. yopekṣā. ima ucyante prahāṇasaṃskārā iti. indriyāṇi tāvad iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3965_4: paṃca. teṣāṃ prajñaiva sā yāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni. yac ca bodhyaṃgeṣu dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṃgaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3965_5: yā ca mārgāṃgeṣu samyagdṛṣṭiḥ. na dravyāntaraṃ. vīryam eva tad yāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3965_6: yac ca bodhyaṃgeṣu vīryasaṃbodhyaṃgaṃ. yaś ca mārgāṃgeṣu samyagvyāyāmaḥ. samādhir
SA01yabhkvyu:3965_7: eva ca sa ye catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ. yac ca bodhyaṃgeṣu samādhisaṃbodhyaṃgaṃ. [Tib. 267a]
SA01yabhkvyu:3965_8: yac ca mārgāṃgeṣu samyaksamādhiḥ. kim avaśiṣyate yan na prajñendriyādisvabhāvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3965_10: śīlāṃgāni ca trīṇi. samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīva iti. daśa dravyāṇīti. śraddhādīni
SA01yabhkvyu:3965_11: paṃca. prītisaṃbodyaṃgādīni ca paṃceti. śīlāṃgāni trīṇy avijñaptisvabhāvānīti kṛtvaikaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3966_0: vaibhāṣikāṇām ekādaśa dravyāṇi. kāyavākkarmaṇor asaṃbhinnatvāt dve dravyaṃ iti kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3966_1: abhiprāyavaśāt pakṣadvaye 'py adoṣaḥ. yadi tu mukhyavṛttyā tasmin kalāpe yāvaṃti
SA01yabhkvyu:3966_2: dravyāṇi saṃti. tāvaṃti gaṇyeran. naiva tāni daśa dravyāṇi samāhitavijñaptirūpāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3967_0: (VI.72) pradhānagrahaṇenaivam uklaṃ. prajñādisvabhāvāḥ smṛtyupasthānādaya iti. sarve
SA01yabhkvyu:3967_1: tu prāyogikaguṇāḥ sāsravānāsravāḥ śrutacintābhāvanāmayā yathāyogaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3967_2: prādhānyaṃ punas tadbalenānyeṣāṃ [Tib. 267b] vṛtteḥ. na punas te na santi. prajñāpradhānāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3967_3: hi smṛtyupasthānānīty ataḥ prajñāgrahaṇaṃ. na tu prajñaiva smṛtyupasthānaṃ. kiṃ tarhi.
SA01yabhkvyu:3968: ṛddhipādāḥ samādhaya iti kuta etat. sūtrāt. uktaṃ hi chandaṃ cāpi bhikṣavo bhikṣur adhipatiṃ kṛtvā labhate samādhiṃ. so 'sya bhavati chandasamādhiḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 602)
SA01yabhkvyu:3969: cittaṃ vīryaṃ mīmāṃsāṃ cāpi bhikṣavo bhikṣur adhipatiṃ kṛtvā labhate samādhiṃ. so 'sya bhavati mīmāṃsāsamādhir iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3970_0: tena hi samyak kāyavāṅmanāṃsi pradhīyaṃta iti. pradhīyaṃte dhāryaṃte niyamyante pravartyante
SA01yabhkvyu:3970_1: vā kadācid aneneti pradhānaṃ. tatpratiṣṭhitatvād iti. yasmāt sarvaguṇasaṃpattilakṣaṇā
SA01yabhkvyu:3970_2: ṛddhis tasmin samādhau pratiṣṭhitā. ṛddheḥ pādaḥ pratiṣṭheti ṛddhipāda iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_0: ye tv āhuḥ samādhir eva ṛddhiḥ. pādāś chaṃdādayaḥ. chandacittavīryamīmānsā iti. teṣām
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_1: evaṃvādināṃ vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ trayodaśa bodhipakṣāḥ prāpnuvanti. chandacittayor ādhikyād
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_2: ekādaśasu [Tib. 268a] prakṣepe. vīryaprajñe tv atra nādhike. samyakpradhānasmṛtyupasthāneṣv
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_3: antarbhāvāt. bahudhā bhavatīti vistara iti. bahudhābhūtvaiko bhavati. āvirbhavaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_4: tirobhāvaṃ jñānadarśanena pratyanubhavati. tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥ prākāram asajjamānaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_5: kāyena gacchati. tadyathākāśe. pṛthivyām unmajjananimajjanaṃ karoti. tadyathodake.
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_6: udake 'bhidyamānena srotasā gacchati. tadyathā pṛthivyām. ākāśe paryaṃkeṇa krāmati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_7: tadyathā śakuniḥ pakṣī. imau vā punaḥ bhūyo candramasāv evaṃ mahardhikāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_8: pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi. yāvad brahmalokaṃ kāyena vaśe vartayata iti. iyam ucyate
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_9: ṛddhiḥ. ṛddhipādāḥ katame. chandasamādhiḥ. vīryasamādhiḥ. cittasamādhiḥ. mīmānsāsamādhiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_10: ima ucyante ṛddhipādā iti. evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ samādhiḥ. tasmān na samādhir eva rudhir iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_11: atrācāryasaṃghabhadra āha. na bhavaty eṣa teṣāṃ doṣaḥ. samādhiṃ hi te ṛddhipādam
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_12: icchanti. ṛddhir apīti. chandādayas tūcyante samādheś catustvajñāpanārthaṃ. kaścid
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_13: dhi samādhiḥ kuśalamūlaprayogāvasthāyāṃ pradhānī bhavati. kaścit kuśalamūlaniṣpannāvasthāyāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3971_14: pūrvo 'tra rddhipādaḥ. uttara rddhir iti. sūtravirodho 'pi caiṣāṃ na bhavati. ṛddhipādaphalam
SA01yabhkvyu:3972_0: mṛdvadhimātrabhedād iti. mṛdūnīndriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi balāni. katham eṣāṃ mṛdvadhimātrabheda
SA01yabhkvyu:3972_1: iti hetum āha. avamardanīyānavamardanīyatvād iti. tadvipakṣabhūtair āśraddhyakausīdyamuṣitasmṛtitāvikṣepāsaṃprajanyair
SA01yabhkvyu:3972_2: antarāsamudācārād indriyāṇy avamṛdyante na tv cvaṃ balānīti. punas tāny uktani.
SA01yabhkvyu:3978_0: prabhāvyaṃte vyavasthāpyante pradhānīkriyante vā. ādikarmikāvasthāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3978_2: indriyāṇi. laukikāgradharmāvasthāyāṃ balāni. bhāvanāmārgāvasthāyāṃ bodhyaṃgāni. darśanamārgāvasthāyām
SA01yabhkvyu:3978_3: āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga iti. viśeṣādhigamahetur vīryasaṃvardhanaṃ. tasmād uṣmagateṣu samyakpradhānāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3978_4: [Tib. 269a] aparihāṇīyakuśalamūlapraveśatvāt. mūrdheṣv iti. aparihāṇyanukūlānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ praveśo mūrdhataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_0: iti vacanāt. praviśaty ebhir iti kṛtvā praveśaḥ. aparihāṇir hi kṣāntiṣu bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_1: tadavasthāḥ. samādhayaḥ samṛddher āśrayībhavaṃtīti. mūrdhasv ṛddhipādā vyavasthāpyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_2: apunaḥparihāṇita iti vistaraḥ. yasmāt kṣāntiṣu punaḥparihāṇir nāsti. ādyayor eva
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_3: hi parihāṇisaṃbhavaḥ. tasmād ādhipatyaprāptāni śraddhādīni bhavaṃti. tadbhāvāt kṣāntiṣv
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_4: indriyāṇi vyavasthāpyaṃte. kleśānavamardanīyatvād iti. yasmāt kleśair nāvamṛdyante.
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_5: tasyām avasthāyāṃ kleśāsamudācārāt. laukikānyadharmānavamardanīyatvād vā. atha vā
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_6: laukikair anyair dharmair anavamardanīyatvād agradharmāvasthāyāṃ śraddhādīni balānīti
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_7: prabhāvyante. bodhyāsannatvād iti. kṣayānutpādajñānāsannatvād ity arthaḥ. bhāvanāmārgo
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_8: hi kṣayānutpādajñānāsannaḥ. darśanamārgas tu dūro tadantarālabhāvanāmārgavyavahitatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_9: gamanaprabhāvitatvād iti. mārgo hi loke gamanaprabhāvitaḥ. gacchaṃty aneneti mārgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_10: gacchatīti vā mārgaḥ. pāṭaliputram ayaṃ panthā gacchatīti loke vacanāt. darśanamārgaś
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_11: cātiśayena gamanaprabhāvito na bhāvanāmārgaḥ. katham ity āha. tasyāśugāmitvād [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3980_12: 269b] iti. tadvān api tenāśu gacchati. bhāvanāmārgeṇa tu bhūmibhedena prākarṣakatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:3981_0: apare punar āhur ity ācāryaḥ. asmadādaya ity abhiprāyāt. yathā vaibhāṣikair bhinnaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3981_1: kramaḥ. tathā tam abhittvā bodhipakṣāṇām ānupūrvīṃ varṇayaṃti. darśanamārge bodhyaṃgānīti
SA01yabhkvyu:3981_2: kṛtvā. bahuvidheti vistaraḥ. bahuprakāro viṣayo rūpādibhedāt. nīlādibhedāc ca. tasmin
SA01yabhkvyu:3981_3: vyāseko vikṣepaḥ. bahuvidhaviṣayavyāsekena visartuṃ śīlam āsām iti. bahuvidhaviṣayavyāsekavisāriṇyo (Abhidh-k-vy 604)
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_0: buddhayaḥ. tāsāṃ nigrahārthaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni. gardhāśritānāṃ tṛṣṇāśritānām ity
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_1: arthaḥ. smarasaṃkalpānām ity anubhūtaviṣayasmṛtisaṃkalpānām ity arthaḥ. kāmasaṃkalpānām
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_2: iti vā. tadbaleneti. catuḥsmṛtyupasthānabalenety arthaḥ. caturvidhakāryasaṃpādanāyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_3: caturvidhaṃ kāryam utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam. anutpannānām
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_4: anutpādaḥ. tathānutpannānāṃ kuśalānām utpādaḥ. utpannānāṃ sthityādīni. tataḥ samādhiviśodhanād
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_5: iti. tataḥ samyakpradhānebhyo 'nataraṃ samādher viśodhanād ṛddhipādāḥ [Tib. 270a]
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_8: bhavaṃti. tadā balāni. indriyāvasthāyāṃ hi kleśasamudācāraḥ saṃbhavati. kṣāntyavasthāyāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_9: prākarṣakatvāt. darśanamārge bodhyaṃgānīti. anāsravā prajñā bodhir iti kṛtvā. ubhayor
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_10: mārgāṃgānīti. darśanabhāvanāmārgayoḥ. katham ity āha. tathā hy uktam iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_11: bhāvanayā paripūrir bhāvanāparipūriḥ tāṃ gacchaty āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaḥ. tasmin gacchati
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_12: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvanāparipūriṃ yacchaṃti. yācat sapta bodhyaṃgānīti. bhāvanāparipūriṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_13: gacchaṃtīti vacanāt bhāvanāmārge 'pi āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgo bhavatīti gamyate. na hi darśanamārge
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_14: bhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati. kiṃ tarhi bhāvanāmārga iti. punaś coktam ubhayor mārgāṃgāni
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_15: vyavasthāpyaṃta iti. caturṇām āryasatyānām etad adhivacanam iti darśanamārgaṃ darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_16: yathāgatena mārgeṇa prakramaṇam iti vistareṇa yāvan mārgasyaitad [Tib. 270b] adhivacanam
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_17: iti bhāvanāmārgaṃ darśayati. yathāgatena yathāprāptena mārgeṇa prakramaṇaṃ yāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_18: bodhir iti. tad evaṃ darśanamārge bhāvanāmārge ca mārgāṃgāni vyavasthāpyanta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3982_19: ata ubhayor āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga eṣṭavya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3983: (VI.74) siddho 'nukramaḥ. pūrvaṃ bodhyaṃgāni paścād āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3988_0: (VI.75) balavāhanīyatvād iti. balena vīryeṇa saṃmukhīkaraṇīyatvāt. anāgamye prītyabhāvaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3988_1: sukhādhigamyaṃ cittaṃ prīṇāti. netarad iti. kiṃ cādharabhūmisāśaṃkatvāc ca. parihāṇiṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3988_2: prati sāśaṃka iti. ataś ca tatra prītyabhāvaḥ. sāśaṃkatāyāṃ hi cittaṃ na prīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3990: iti. kathaṃ bhavāgre kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhavati. na hi tatra kāyo vidyate. kāyālambanā hi prajñā kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ. na ca bhavāgraṃ kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātuṃ cālāmbate. [Tib. 271a]
SA01yabhkvyu:3992_0: iti siddhāntāt. naitat kenacid vyākhyākāreṇa likhitaṃ. tad idam atra vyavasthāpayāmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3992_1: kāyasya kaḥ svabhāvaḥ. bhautikatvam ity uktaṃ. bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ ca kāya ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3992_2: tatra yadi kevalabhūtālaṃbanā kevalabhautikālaṃbanā tadubhayālaṃbanā vā prajñā bhavet.
SA01yabhkvyu:3992_3: kāyasmṛtyupasthānam eva tad bhavet. bhavāgre ca kuśalasāsravā prajñā mārgata iti
SA01yabhkvyu:3992_4: nyāyata iti vānāsravasaṃvaramārgālaṃbanata iti. sāsravadharālaṃbanā hi maulāḥ kuśalārūpyā
SA01yabhkvyu:3992_5: neṣyaṃte. na tv anāsravadharālaṃbanā iti. atas tad atra kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3993_1: ca śīlānīti. tatra duḥkhasatyādīnāṃ dharmatvād abuddhasaṃghasvabhāvatvāc ca. yathākramaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3993_2: satyatrayam abhisamayan paśyan dharme cāvetyaprasādam āryakāntāni cāśīlāni anāsravāṇi
SA01yabhkvyu:3993_3: pratilabhate. na buddhe na saṃghe vā avetyaprasādaṃ. [duḥkhasatyādīnāṃ dharmatvād.
SA01yabhkvyu:3993_4: abuddhasaṃghasvabhāvatvāc ca. yathā] mārgasatyam abhisamayato buddhe tasya ca srāvakasaṃghe
SA01yabhkvyu:3993_6: dharmo 'bhipreta [Tib. 271b] iti. bahavo dharmāḥ kuśalā dharmā ity evamādayaḥ. tat
SA01yabhkvyu:3993_7: ko 'yam iha dharmo 'bhipretaḥ. yad uktaṃ dharme cāvetyaprasādaṃ pratilabhata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3993_8: atha vā buddharatnaṃ saṃgharatnaṃ cedam ucyate. tasmād idam api dharmarātnam ihābhipretaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3993_9: bhavet. ratnatrayasya hy ayaṃ svabhāva uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3994: buddhasaṃghakarāṃ dharmān aśaikṣān ubhayāṃś ca saḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:3995: nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śaraṇatrayam
SA01yabhkvyu:3996: iti. tat kim ayaṃ nirvāṇadharmo 'bhipreta ity ataḥ pṛcchati. ko 'yam iha dharmo 'bhipreta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3998: iti vistaraḥ. duḥkhasamudayanirodhasatyāni. bodhisattvasya ca śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 606)
SA01yabhkvyu:3999_0: anāsravo mārgaḥ. pratyekabuddhasya ca śaikṣāśaikṣalakṣaṇo mārgo dharma ihābhipreta
SA01yabhkvyu:3999_1: iti. ataś catvāry apīti vistaraḥ. mārgasatyam apy abhisamayan dharmam api bodhisattvapratyekabuddhamārgalakṣaṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:3999_2: abhisamayati. tasmāc catvāry api satyāny abhisamayato dharme 'vetyaprasādalābha ity
SA01yabhkvyu:3999_3: uktam iti. buddhasaṃghayor mārgo dharma iti nocyate. yasmāt tadabhisamayato buddhe
SA01yabhkvyu:3999_4: saṃghe cāvetyaprasādalābha iti. kathaṃ punar mārgasatyābhisamayataḥ śraddhālakṣaṇānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:3999_5: trayāṇāṃ buddhadharmasaṃghāvetyaprasādānāṃ yugapat saṃmukhībhāvaḥ. saiva śraddhādhiṣṭhānabhedāpekṣayā
SA01yabhkvyu:3999_6: [Tib. 272a] nāmatrayaṃ labhata ity adoṣaḥ. atha vā dharme 'vetyaprasādo vartamānaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4001_1: syād ity ata āha. yathā tu vyutthitaḥ saṃmukhīkaroti. tathaiṣām ānupūrvam iti. vaidyabhaiṣajyopasthāyakabhūtatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:4001_2: iti. vaidyabhūto bhagavān anuttaro viṣak śalyaharteti sūtrāt. dharmabhaiṣajyadaiśikatvāc
SA01yabhkvyu:4001_3: ca. bhaiṣajyabhūto dharmaḥ kleśavyādhibhaiṣajyatvāt. nirvāṇārogyasaṃprāpakatvāc copasthāyakabhūtaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4001_4: saṃgho nirvāṇārogyaprāptaye parasparopasthānāt. cittaprasādakṛtaḥ śīlaprasāda iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4001_5: trividhaś cittaprasādaḥ. samyaksaṃbuddho bata bhagavān. svākhyāto 'sya dharmavinayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4001_6: supratipanno 'sya śrāvakasaṃgha iti. tena kṛtaḥ śīlaprasādaḥ. śīlam eva prasādaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4001_7: śīlasya vā prasādo 'nāsravatvaṃ śīlaprasādaḥ. ante trayāṇāṃ prasādānāṃ caturtha uktaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4001_8: śīlaprasādaḥ. kasmād ity āha. evaṃ prasannasya samyaksaṃbuddho bata bhagavān iti
SA01yabhkvyu:4001_9: vistareṇaiṣā pratipattiḥ. [Tib. 272b] āryakāntaśīlapratipattir ity arthaḥ. ārogyabhūtatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:4001_10: vā. kim ante śīlaprasāda uktaḥ. vaiyabhaiṣajyopasthāyakārogyānukramataḥ. daiśikamārgasārthikayānavad
