SA01yabhkvyu:4065_14: ārabhate. tāvad ayaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ cittam anuprāpto bhavatīti. aṃtarā na jānāti. prathamadvitīyapaṃcadaśān
SA01yabhkvyu:4065_15: iti etān eva trīn jānāti. kathaṃ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ dharmajñānaṃ ca jñātvā
SA01yabhkvyu:4065_16: prayogāntaraṃ ca kṛtvā paṃcadaśakṣaṇaṃ mārgānvayajñānakṣāntiṃ jānātīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4066_0: (VII.7) katham anāsraveṇa jñānenaivaṃ janātīti. anāsravaṇāṃ duḥkhādyākāratvat. idaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4066_1: ca saṃvṛtyākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam ity evamādyākāratvād ataḥ pṛcchati. tadviśeṣeṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:4066_2: tayor viśeṣa iti. tasya saṃvṛtijñānadvayasya tatpṛṣṭhalabdhasya viśeṣeṇa duḥkhaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4066_3: me parijñātaṃ yāvan me mārgo bhāvita iti jānāti. duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñeyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4066_4: yāvan mārgo me bhāvito na punar bhāvayitavyaḥ iti ca jānātīty evaṃrūpeṇa tayor anāsravayoḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4066_5: kṣayānutpādajñānayor viśeṣaḥ śāstre jñāpito darśitaḥ. ata eva tad upādāyety uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4066_6: tad upādāyeti pūrvīkṛtya tat puraskṛtyety arthaḥ. niṣyaṃdane tayor nirvikalpayor
SA01yabhkvyu:4067: anāsraveṇāpy evaṃ jānātīti. ṣoḍaśākāravyatirikto 'sty anāsrava ākāraḥ. (Abhidh-k-vy 615)
SA01yabhkvyu:4068_0: tenaivaṃ jānātīty apare. yadi tad upādāya yaj jñānaṃ darśanam iti śāstravacanena
SA01yabhkvyu:4068_1: duḥkhaparijñānādisaṃvṛtijñānaphalam [Tib. 279a] amāsravaṃ kṣayānutpādajñānam ucyate. yad idam ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:4070_0: iti na dṛṣṭir iti. tad virudhyate. tenāha. darśanavacanaṃ tu bhāṣyākṣepād iti. yad
SA01yabhkvyu:4070_1: etac chāstre vacanaṃ yaj jñānaṃ darśanam iti. bhāṣyākṣepād bhavati. duḥkhajñānādiṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:4070_2: hi jñānaṃ darśanaṃ vidyā buddhir bodhir iti paṭhyate. tatpāṭhākṣepeṇāyam upatiṣṭhate
SA01yabhkvyu:4070_3: tatpāṭhināṃ pāṭhaḥ. na tu te kṣayānutpādajñāne darśanasvabhāve. na dṛṣṭisvabhāve
SA01yabhkvyu:4070_4: ity arthaḥ. pratyakṣavṛttitvād veti. pratyakṣā vṛttir asya jñānadvayasya. tad iyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4070_5: pratyakṣavṛttiḥ. tadbhāvat. anayor darśanavacanaṃ. na hy etajjñānadvaye ānumānikavad
SA01yabhkvyu:4070_6: āgāmikavad vā parokṣavṛttiḥ. pratyakṣavṛttiś ca darśanam iṣyate. tadyathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4070_7: tadsādharmyād etad api jñānadvayaṃ darśanam ity uktam. ata evoktam iti. ata eva pratyakṣavṛttitvād
SA01yabhkvyu:4070_8: uktaṃ śāstre yat tāvaj jñānaṃ. darśanam api tat. syāt tu darśanaṃ na jñānam aṣṭāv
SA01yabhkvyu:4070_9: ābhisamayāntikāḥ kṣāntayaḥ. tad idam uktaṃ bhavati darśanatvam anayor iṣyate. na dṛṣṭitvam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_0: tatreti teṣu daśasu jñāneṣu saṃvṛtijñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānam eva svabhāvasaṃgrahataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_1: ekasya ca paracittajñānasya bhāga ekadeśaḥ. tasya hi sāsravānāsravasya [Tib. 279b]
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_2: sāsrava eva bhāgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ. nānāsravo bhāga iti. dharmajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_3: ekaṃ jñānaṃ dharmajñānam eva. saptānāṃ ca bhāgo duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgaparacittakṣayānutpādajñānānām.
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_4: kathaṃ. duḥkhajñānaṃ hi dharmānvayajñānasvabhāvaṃ. tasya yo dharmajñānabhāgaḥ. tad
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_5: dharmajñānam. evaṃ samudayajñāsya yāvad anutpādajñānasya dharmānvayajñānasvabhāvasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_6: yo dharmajñānabhāgaḥ. tad dharmajñānaṃ. na tv anvayajñānabhāga iti. paracittajñānasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_7: tu dharmānvayamārgasaṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvasya dharmajñānabhāgo dharmajñānam iti. evam
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_8: anvayajñānam ekam anvayajñānam eva. saptānāṃ ca bhāgaḥ. teṣām eva duḥkhajñānādīnām
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_9: yo 'nvayajñānabhāgaḥ. tad anvayajñānam iti yojyaṃ. duḥkhajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_10: jñānaṃ. tad eva duḥkhajñānaṃ. caturṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmānvayakṣayānutpādajñānānām.
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_11: etāni hi dharmajñānādīni catvāri catuḥsatyālaṃbanāni bhavanti. ya eṣāṃ duḥkhasatyālambano
SA01yabhkvyu:4071_12: bhāgaḥ. tad duḥkhajñānaṃ. nānyo bhāgaḥ. ity evaṃ samudayanirodhajñāne (Abhidh-k-vy 616)
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_0: yojye pratyekam. ekaṃ jñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ vā. caturṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmānvayakṣayānutpādajñānānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_1: yaḥ samudayālaṃbanabhāgo nirodhālaṃbanabhāgo vā. tat samudayajñānaṃ nirodhājñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_2: ca. mārgajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv [Tib. 280a] ekaṃ jñānaṃ tad eva mārgajñānaṃ. paṃcānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_3: ca bhāgaḥ. dharmānvayakṣayānutpādaparacittajñānānaṃ. etāni paṃca mārgajñānāni mārgajñānasvabhāvāni
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_4: bhavanti. ya eṣāṃ mārgajñānabhāgaḥ. tan mārgajñānaṃ netara iti. paravittajñānaṃ daśasu
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_5: jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ. caturṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmānvayamārgasaṃvṛtijñānānāṃ. etāni hi
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_6: catvāri jñānāni paracittāparacittajñānaṃ svabhāvāni bhāvaṃti. ya eṣāṃ paracittajñānabhāgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_7: tat paracittajñānaṃ. netara iti. kṣayajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ tad eva kṣayajñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_9: kṣayajñānaṃ duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam ity evamādyākārajñānaniṣyandaṃ. tatra yat kāmāvacaraduḥkhādyālaṃbanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_10: tad dharmajñane 'ntarbhavati. yad rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhādyālaṃbanaṃ. tad anvayajñāne
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_11: 'ntarbhavati. yat pratyekaṃ duḥkhādyālaṃbanaṃ. tad duḥkhajñānaṃ yāvan mārgajñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_12: vā bhavati. tatra ya eṣām evaṃlakṣaṇo bhāgaḥ. tat kṣayajñānaṃ netara iti. ṣaṇṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_13: bhāga ity ucyate. [Tib. 280b] evam anutpādajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ tad
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_15: bhāgaḥ. duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñeyam ity evamādyākāraniṣyandaṃ. tad
SA01yabhkvyu:4072_16: anutpādajñānaṃ. rūpārūpyāvacraduḥkhādyālaṃbanam. tad anvayajñānaṃ. netaro bhāga iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4074_0: iti. ākāraś ca gocaraś cākāragocaraṃ. ākāraś cākāragocaraṃ. ākārākāragocaram. tasmāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4074_1: svabhāvataḥ saṃvṛtijñānam iti. svabhāvena svabhāvataḥ. saṃvṛtijñānaṃ. kasmād ity
SA01yabhkvyu:4074_2: āha. apramārthajñānatvād iti. kāmadhātupratipakṣo dharmajñānaṃ. ūrdhvadhātupratipakṣo
SA01yabhkvyu:4074_3: 'nvayajñānaṃ. tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ. dharmajñānaṃ katamat. kāmapratisaṃyukteṣu saṃskāreṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_0: saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ. kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_1: yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yad anāsravaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_2: jñānaṃ. idam ucyate dharmajñānam. api khalu dharmajñāne dharmajñānabhūmau ca yad
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_3: anāsravaṃ. idam ucyate dharmajñānam. anvayajñānaṃ katamat. rūpārūpyapratisaṃyukteṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_4: saṃskāreṣu yad anāsravaṃ jñānam. rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ [Tib. 281a]
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_5: hetau yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ. rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yad anāsravaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_6: jñānaṃ. rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_7: idam ucyate anvayajñānaṃ. api khalv anvayajñāne anvayajñānabhūmau ca yad anāsravaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_8: jñānam. idam ucyate 'nvayajñānam iti. ākārato duḥkhasamudayajñāne iti. ākārata eva
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_9: nālaṃbanataḥ paṃcopādānaskaṃdhalakṣaṇatvena tayor abhedāt. tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_10: duḥkhajñānaṃ katamat. paṃcopādānaskaṃdhān anityato duḥkhataḥ śunyato 'nātmataś ca
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_11: manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ. idam ucyate duḥkhajñānaṃ. samudayajñānaṃ katamat.
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_12: sāsravaṃ hetukaṃ hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataś ca manasikurvato yad
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_13: anāsravaṃ jñānam. idam ucyate samudayajñānaṃ. ākārālaṃbanato nirodhamārgajñāne iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_14: ākārataś cālaṃbanataś ca nirodhamārgajñāne vyavasthāpyete. tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_15: nirodhajñānaṃ katamat. nirodhaṃ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ. praṇītato niḥsaraṇataś ca manasikurvato
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_16: yad anāsravaṃ jñānam. idam ucyate nirodhajñānam iti. mārgajñānaṃ katamat. mārgaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_17: mārgato nyāyataḥ pratipattito nairyāṇikataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_18: idam ucyate mārgajñānam iti. prathamata [Tib. 281b] iti grahaṇam anutpādajñānaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_19: tad api hi kṛtakṛtyasaṃtāna utpadyate. sarvānāsravahetukatvād iti. prathamotpannāni
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_20: daśa jñānāny adhikṛtya sabhāgahetunā sarvānāsravahetukam anutpādajñānaṃ. kṣayajñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4075_21: tu na sarvānāsravahetukaṃ. na hy anutpādajñānam asya hetur bhavati viśiṣṭatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4076_0: (VII.9) sakalasya sakalapratipakṣatvād iti. sakalasya kāmadhātor darśanabhāvanāprahātavyasaṃgṛhītasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4076_2: pratipakṣa iti kṛtvā kāmadhātor eva pratipakṣo dharmajñānam ity uktam. api tv asti
SA01yabhkvyu:4076_3: saṃbhavo yad rūpārūpyadhātor api dharmajñānaṃ pratipakṣaḥ. katamat tad dharmajñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4076_4: yan nirodhe mārge ca dharmajñānaṃ. nirodhamārgau hy adhātupatitau. tāv adharāv api
SA01yabhkvyu:4077: adharabhūmike nihīne. na tad ālambanaṃ dharmajñānaṃ rūpārūpyadhātupratipakṣa ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4079_0: grahaṇaṃ tu rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaheyānām anvayajñānakṣāntivadhyatvāt. anvayajñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4079_1: tarhi nirodhamārgālaṃbanabhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ kasmāt tridhātupratipakṣo na bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:4079_2: kāmadhātor jitatvāt. dharmajñānenaiva kāmadhātuḥ [Tib. 282a] pūrvatarajito bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:4079_3: tataḥ paścād anvayam utpadyate. tataḥ kāmadhātor jitatvān na tat kāmadhātupratipakṣa
SA01yabhkvyu:4079_4: iti. dharmajñānaṃ tu rūpārūpyadhātor ajitatvāt pratipakṣo yujyate. [karmān nirodhamārgadharmajñānābhyām
SA01yabhkvyu:4079_6: na hi kāmāvacarasaṃskārāṇāṃ. nirodhāt pratipakṣād vā rūpārūpyāvacarasaṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4079_7: pratipakṣasya vāsti kaścid viśeṣaḥ. sarvo hi nirodhaḥ kuśalo 'saṃskṛto mārgaś ca
SA01yabhkvyu:4079_8: nairyāṇikaḥ.] anvayam ity anvetīty anvayaṃ jñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4080_0: (VII.10-12ab) sarvatheti. bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītam api. tān purastād iti. tān anityādīn
SA01yabhkvyu:4080_1: ākārān ūrdhvaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. ṣoḍaśākāram uṣmagatādiṣu. svasāmānyalakṣaṇādigrahaṇād
SA01yabhkvyu:4080_2: iti. svalakṣaṇagrahaṇāt sāmānyalakṣaṇagrahaṇāc ca. ādiśabdena bhuṃkṣva tiṣṭha gacchety
SA01yabhkvyu:4080_3: evam ākāraṃ ca. na hy ete svalakṣaṇākārāḥ. kiṃ tarhi. evamākārā eveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4081_0: ubhayam api tv iti. sāsravānāsravaṃ. yat tarhīti vistaraḥ. rāgasya ca cittasya ca
SA01yabhkvyu:4081_1: yugapadgrahaṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ. sūtraṃ punar evaṃ paṭhyate. sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4081_2: cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4081_3: prajānāti. yathā sarāgaṃ vigatarāgam. evaṃ sadveṣaṃ vigatadveṣaṃ samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4081_4: saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam [Tib. 282b] anuddhatam avyupaśāntaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4081_5: bhāvitam avimuktaṃ vimuktam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti. vastramalāyugapadgrahaṇavad
SA01yabhkvyu:4081_6: iti. yathā vastramalayor na yugapadgrahaṇaṃ. tadvat. kathaṃ. yathā yadā vastram iti
SA01yabhkvyu:4081_7: paricchinnākāraṃ vijñānam utpadyate na tadā malaṃ gṛhṇāti. yadā ca malam iti paricchinnākāraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4081_8: vijñānam utpadyate. na tadā vastraṃ gṛhṇāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4082_0: saṃsṛṣṭasarāgatā saṃyuktasarāgatā ceti. saṃsṛṣṭasarāgatā saṃprayogāt. saṃyuktasarāgatā
SA01yabhkvyu:4082_1: rāgaprāptyanubaṃdhād ity eke. anuśayānarāgālaṃbanatvād ity apare. dvābhyām iti. saṃsṛṣṭasarāgatayā
SA01yabhkvyu:4083: 'nyat sāsravam iti. yat kliṣṭam avyākṛtaṃ kuśalaṃ ca laukikaṃ. tat saṃyogasarāgatayā sarāgaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4084_0: tad evam ubhayam apy etat sarāgam evoktaṃ. āha. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam ekīyamatena rāgapratipakṣo
SA01yabhkvyu:4084_1: vigatarāgam ity ucyate. yatas ta āhuḥ. yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syād
SA01yabhkvyu:4084_2: anyakleśasaṃprayuktam api. dveṣādisaṃprayuktam api. syāt vigatarāgaṃ. [Tib. 283a]
SA01yabhkvyu:4084_3: tad api hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ saṃprayuktam api. na ca sūtre dveṣādisaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgam
SA01yabhkvyu:4084_4: ity uktaṃ. sadveṣaṃ samoham ityādivacanāt. yeṣāṃ punā rāgapratipakṣo vigatarāgam
SA01yabhkvyu:4084_5: iti. teṣām ayam adoṣaḥ. na hi rāgapratipakṣo dveṣādibhiḥ saṃprayujyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4085_0: evaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. yadi rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ rāgapratipakṣo vigatarāgaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4085_1: tadapratipakṣaḥ sarāgacittasyāpratipakṣaḥ. cittam akliṣṭam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ. naiva
SA01yabhkvyu:4085_2: sarāgaṃ rāgeṇāsaṃprayogāt. na viyatarāgaṃ rāgasyāpratipakeṣatvāt. evamādīti. ādiśabdena
SA01yabhkvyu:4085_3: sadveṣaṃ samoham iti tulyaprasaṃgo yojyaḥ. katham. atra tu sūtre dveṣasaṃprayuktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4085_4: cittaṃ sadveṣaṃ dveṣapratipakṣo vigatadveṣam iti. yadi hi dveṣeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ vigatadveṣaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4085_5: syāt. anyakleśasaṃprayuktam iti syād ity eke. evaṃ tarhi tad [Tib. 283b] apratipakṣaś
SA01yabhkvyu:4085_6: cittam akliṣṭaṃ naiva sadveṣaṃ syāt na vigatadveṣam. ity evaṃ samohaṃ cittaṃ vigatamoham
SA01yabhkvyu:4085_7: iti vaktavyaṃ. tasmād rāgasaṃyuktatayāpi sarāgaṃ cittam atreṣṭavyaṃ. apiśabdād rāgasaṃprayuktatayāpīty
SA01yabhkvyu:4085_8: apare. ābhidhārmikāḥ. evaṃ yāvat samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ ceti. tasmād dveṣasaṃyuktatayāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:4085_9: sadveṣaṃ mohasaṃyuktatayāpi samoham atra sūtre eṣṭavyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4086: ālaṃbanābhisaṃkṣepād iti. kuśalaṃ cittaṃ vikṣepeṇa na saṃprayujyate. tasmāt tadālaṃbane tasyābhisaṃkṣepa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4087_0: saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ ca syāt. kliṣṭamiddhasaṃprayogād iti. dvividhaṃ middhaṃ. kliṣṭam
SA01yabhkvyu:4087_1: akliṣṭaṃ ca. tad eva hi cittaṃ kliṣṭaṃ middhasaṃprayuktam iti saṃkṣiptaṃ syād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4087_2: kliṣṭam iti ca vikṣiptaṃ syād iti sāṃkaryadoṣaḥ. sāstravirodhaś ceti. kathaṃ. saṃkṣiptaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4087_3: cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajānāti vistareṇa yathā vṛttau. teṣām anvayajñānaṃ tāvat
SA01yabhkvyu:4087_4: saṃkṣiptacittālaṃbanaṃ na saṃbhavati. kāmadhātor ūrdhvaṃ middhabhāvād anvayajñānasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4088_0: ca kāmadhātvanālaṃbanatvāt. mārgajñānam api saṃkṣiptacittālaṃbanaṃ na saṃbhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:4088_1: mārgajñānaṃ hi mārgālaṃbanaṃ. na ca mārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ cittaṃ middhasaṃprayogīti. tenaivaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4088_2: vaktavyaṃ abhaviṣyat tajjñānaṃ dve [jñāne]. dharmajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ ceti. ye tu
SA01yabhkvyu:4088_3: varṇayanti saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ kuśam ālaṃbanābhisaṃkṣepād iti. teṣām etad doṣadvayaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4088_4: na bhavati. tad akliṣṭena middhena na saṃprayujyata iti saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ ca na
SA01yabhkvyu:4088_5: prāpnoti. nāpi śāstravirodhaḥ. kuśalaṃ traidhātukasaṃgṛhītam asaṃgṛhītaṃ ca saṃkṣiptaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4088_6: cittaṃ tajjñānaṃ catvāri jñānānīti siddhaṃ. rūpārūpyakuśalacittālaṃbanam anāsravaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4088_7: jñānaṃ anvayajñānaṃ bhavati. mārgasaṃgṛhītakuśalālaṃbanaṃ mārgajñānam apīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_0: vyavadānaparīttair niṣevitatvād iti. alpakuśalamūlair niṣevitatvād ity arthaḥ. tadviparyayād
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_1: iti. vyavadānamahadbhir niṣevitatvād ity arthaḥ. mūlādīnaṃ balāntānāṃ alpabahutvam
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_2: ekaikasya mūlasyālpabahutvād yathākramaṃ parīttaṃ ca veditavyaṃ. katham ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_3: kliṣṭaṃ hi [Tib. 284b] dvābhyām akuśalamūlābhyāṃ samūlaṃ mohena lobhadveṣayoś cānyatareṇa.
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_4: ekasmin kalāpe 'nayor asamavadhānāt. kuśalaṃ tribhir alobhādveṣāmohair eṣām avinābhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_6: kuśalasaṃskṛtā dharmā bhāvayitavyā iti nyāyāt. tribhiś ca skaṃdhaiḥ sānuparivartaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_7: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāraskaṃdhaiḥ. na vijñānaskandhena. ekasmin kalāpe dvitīyavijñānābhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_8: na ca svātmanā svātmani vṛttivirodhāt. kuśalaṃ tu mahāparivāraṃ tajjātīyānāgatabhāvanāsadbhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_9: caturbhiś ca skaṃdhaiḥ sānuparivartaṃ. taiś ca vedanādibhis tribhiḥ. rūpaskaṃdhena
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_11: api kliṣṭam iti. nanu ca kuśalam api durbalam ekena mithyādṛṣṭikṣaṇena kuśalapaṃcaskaṃdhasamudghātāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_12: na tad atyaṃtam ucchidyate punaḥ pratisaṃdhānāt. duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāṃtya tu daśānām
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_13: anuśayānām atyaṃtasamuccheda iti tasād apīty apiśabdena pūrvoktād apīti. tatpratipakṣatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_14: iti. auddhatyapratipakṣatvād ity arthaḥ. evam avyupaśāntaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ ceti. avyupaśāṃtaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_15: [Tib. 285a] kliṣṭam auddhatyasaṃprayogāt. vyupaśāntaṃ kuśalaṃ tatpratipakṣatvād iti
SA01yabhkvyu:4089_16: kleśasaṃprayogāsaṃprayogato vā tad avyupaśāntaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ ca bhavati. samāhitaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4090: niṣevaṇaṃ. te eva bhāvane. tābhyām abhāvitatvāt abhāvitaṃ. na hi kliṣṭaṃ kuśalavad anāgataṃ bhāvyate. na ca niṣevaṇārhaṃ bhavati nihīnatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4092_0: iti. tābhyām iti pratilambhaniṣevaṇābhyām ity arthaḥ. svabhāvasaṃtānavimuktibhyām
SA01yabhkvyu:4092_1: avimuktatvād iti. kleśaiḥ saṃprayogān na svabhāvavimuktyā vimuktaṃ. kṣīṇakleśasaṃtānānutpatteś
SA01yabhkvyu:4092_2: ca na saṃtānavimuktyā ca vimuktaṃ. kuśalaṃ tu kleśāsaṃprayogāt. kṣīṇakleśasaṃtānotpatteś ca vimuktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4093_1: iti. etad eva nigamayati na tu vipaśyanayā samanvāgatam iti. anuvikṣiptam ity asya
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_0: middhasahagatasya kliṣṭasya vikṣiptatvāpratijñānād [Tib. 285b] iti. kim iti kṛtvā
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_1: vikṣiptatvam atra na pratijñāyate. kiṃ middhasahagate kliṣṭe citte vikṣiptatvaṃ nāstīti
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_2: na pratijñāyate. āhosvid vidyamānam apy atra vikṣiptatvam. saṃkṣiptatvenaiva sthāpitatvān
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_3: na pratijñāyate. ubhayathāpi vyācakṣate. kecid vyācakṣate. middhasahagatād dhi kliṣṭād
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_4: yad anyat kliṣṭaṃ. tad vikṣiptaṃ pratijñāyate. middhasahagataṃ tu kliṣṭam akliṣṭaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_5: cāviśeṣeṇa saṃkṣiptam eveti. apare punar vyācakṣate. yan middhasaṃprayuktaṃ. tat
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_6: saṃkṣiptam eva na vikṣiptaṃ. yat tu viṣayeṣu visṛtaṃ. tad eva vikṣiptam ity ato 'tra
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_7: middhasaṃprayukte citte. na pratijñāyata iti. varaṃ śāstravirodha iti. abuddhoktam
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_8: abhidharmaśāstram ity abhiprāyaḥ. abhinnalakṣaṇavacanād iti. sarvāṇi tāni kliṣṭāny
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_9: uktānīti. kliṣṭatvalakṣaṇam eṣāṃ vikṣiptādīnām avimuktāntānām. kliṣṭatvaṃ punaḥ kleśamahābhūmikaiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_10: saṃprayogaḥ. saṃkṣiptapragṛhītādīnāṃ cābhinnalakṣaṇavacanān nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavatīti
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_12: 286a] grahaṇaṃ. kuśalam eṣām abhinnaṃ. kiṃ punaḥ kuśalatvaṃ. kuśalaṃ mahābhūmikaiḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_13: saṃprayogaḥ. na vai nokta iti vistaraḥ. vai iti nipātaḥ. na nokta iti dvau pratiṣedhau
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_14: ukta evety arthaḥ. ka uktaḥ. padānām arthaviśeṣaḥ. ity āha. kliṣṭasāmānye 'pi vikṣiptādīnāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_15: tulye kliṣṭatve teṣāṃ doṣāviśeṣasaṃdarśanād ity apy etat kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣepayogād
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_16: vikṣiptaṃ kliṣṭaṃ. kausīdyayogāl līnam auddhatyayogād uddhatam ity evamādidoṣe viśeṣasaṃdarśanād
SA01yabhkvyu:4094_17: ukta evārthaviśeṣo bhavati. evaṃ kuśalasyāpi saṃkṣiptāder (Abhidh-k-vy 622)
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_0: guṇaviśeṣasaṃdarśanād ity apy etat kuśalaṃ cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ pragṛhītam iti vistareṇokta
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_1: evārthaviśeṣo bhavati. sūtravirodhasyāparihārād iti. sūtre hi styānamiddhasahagataṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_2: saṃkṣiptam uktaṃ. styānayogena yat kliṣṭaṃ middhasaṃprayuktaṃ. tat saṃkṣiptaṃ na
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_3: kuśalaṃ. styānasya kleśamahābhūmikatvāt. yadi ca sūtre iti vistaraḥ. yadi [Tib. 286b]
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_4: yuṣmannītyā sūtre līnam evoddhataṃ bhagavatābhipretaṃ syāt. līnoddhatayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_5: noktaṃ syāt. katham ity āha. yasmin samaye cittaṃ līnaṃ kausīdyasaṃprayuktaṃ. līnābhiśaṃki
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_6: līnam etad bhaviṣyatīty abhiśaṃkato līnābhiāśaṃki. akālas tasmin samaye praśrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_7: bhāvanāyā ity eṣa niyamo na syāt. evaṃ ca vaktavyaṃ syāt. akālas tasmin samaye dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_8: bhāvanāyā apīti. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. tad eva līnaṃ cittam uddhatam iti kṛtvā. tathā yasmin
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_9: samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ bhavaty auddhatyābhiśaṃki. akālas tasmin samaye dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_10: bhāvanāyā ity eṣa niyamo na syāt. evaṃ ca vaktavyaṃ syāt. akālas tasmin samaye praśrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃbodhyaṃgānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_11: bhāvanāyā apīti. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. tad evoddhataṃ cittaṃ līnam iti kṛtvā. avibhāgena vā
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_12: vaktavyaṃ syāt. yasmin samaye cittaṃ līnaṃ bhavati līnābhiśaṃki uddhataṃ vā bhavaty
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_14: bhāvanāyā iti. smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃgasyāgrahaṇaṃ sarvatragatvāt smṛteḥ. ubhaye 'pi citte
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_15: 'nukta siddhitaḥ. [Tib. 287a] smṛtiṃ khalv ahaṃ sarvatragatāṃ vadāmīti sūtre vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_16: kathaṃ punar vaibhāṣikeṇa yad eva līnaṃ. tad evoddhatam ity abhīṣṭaṃ gamyate. līnaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_17: cittaṃ kliṣṭaṃ kausīdyasaṃprayogāt. uddhataṃ cittaṃ kliṣṭam auddhatyasaṃprayogād
SA01yabhkvyu:4095_18: iti vacanāt. kiṃ punar atra bodhyaṃgānāṃ vyagrā bhāvaneti. kiṃ kadācit praśrabdhyādibhāvanaiva
SA01yabhkvyu:4096_0: na praśrabdhyādibhāvaneti vyagrā bhāvanā. manasikaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ bhāvaneṣṭā. na saṃmukhībhāva
SA01yabhkvyu:4096_1: iti. manasikaraṇam ālaṃbanīkaraṇaṃ. līne citte akālaḥ praśrabdhyādīnām ālaṃbanīkaraṇasyābhogakaraṇasyety
SA01yabhkvyu:4096_2: arthaḥ. uddhate ca citte akālo dharmavicayādīnām iti. na tu saṃmukhībhāvo bhāvaneṣṭā.
SA01yabhkvyu:4096_3: tasmin kāle na praśrabhdyādayaḥ saṃmukhīkartavyāḥ. dharmavicayādayas tu saṃmukhīkartavyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4096_4: dharmavicayādayo vā na saṃmukhīkartavāḥ. praśrabdhyādayas tu kartavyā (Abhidh-k-vy 623)
SA01yabhkvyu:4097_0: iti. kausīdyādhikam atreti vistaraḥ. yatra kausīdyam [Tib. 287b] adhikam auddhatyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4097_1: tu nyagbhāvena vartate. tal līnaṃ. yatra cauddhatyam adhikaṃ kausīdyaṃ tu nyagbhāvena.
SA01yabhkvyu:4097_2: tad uddhatam. ity anayor viśeṣād avirodhaḥ sūtrasya pṛthagvacane. tayos tu sahabhāvād
SA01yabhkvyu:4097_3: ekasmin kalāpe yugapad bhāvāt tad eva līnaṃ tad evoddhatam iti brūma iti. līnaṃ kliṣṭaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4097_4: kausīdyasaṃyogāt. uddhataṃ kliṣṭam auddhatyasaṃyogād iti. ācārya āha. ābhiprāyikaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4097_5: yāvat sūtre tu nāyam abhiprāya iti. kausīdyādhikaṃ līnam auddhatyādhikam uddhatam
SA01yabhkvyu:4097_6: iti. yasmād āha. yasmin samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati vistareṇa na tv evaṃ viśinaṣṭi
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_0: yat tūktaṃ sarvam eva rāgasaṃyuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgam iti. katham uktaṃ. tatra rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_1: cittaṃ dvābhyāṃ sarāgaṃ. tato 'nyat sāsravaṃ saṃyogasarāgam iti vacanāt. tatra rāgasaṃyuktatayāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_2: sarāgaṃ cittam atreṣṭavyam iti vacanāt. anāsravam api sarāgaṃ prāpnoti śaikṣam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_3: śaikṣasaṃtāne rāgasya sāvaśeṣatvāt. [Tib. 288a] rāgālaṃbanaṃ cet. atha mataṃ rāgasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_4: yad ālaṃbanaṃ. tad rāgasaṃyuktaṃ sarāgaṃ ca bhavati. arhato 'pi sāsravaṃ cittaṃ parakīyasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_5: rāgasyālaṃbanatvāt rāgasaṃyuktam iti kṛtvā sarāgam iti gṛhṇīyāt paracittavit paracittajñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_6: vā. atha mataṃ na tad rāgeṇālaṃbyata iti. tata ucyate. kathaṃ vā tat sāsravam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_7: sāmānyakleśālaṃbanatvād iti cet. atha mataṃ sāmānyakleśānāṃ dṛṣṭivicikitsāvidyānām
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_8: ālaṃbaṇaṃ tad ataḥ sāsravam iti. evam api samohaṃ grḥṇīyāt. arhataḥ sāsravaṃ cittaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_9: mohālaṃbanatvāt. moho 'pi sāmānyakleśaḥ. parakīyasya ca mohasyārhaccittam ālaṃbanībhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_10: na ca paracittajñānaṃ prāptyālaṃbanam iti. yasmāt paracittajñānaṃ cittacaittālaṃbanam
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_11: iṣyate. tasmān na rāgapraptisahitatvena rāgasaṃyuktatvāt sarāgam iti. nāpi taccitālaṃbanarāgālaṃbanam
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_12: iti. tad iti yat tat parakīyaṃ cittaṃ paracittajñānena [Tib. 288b] gṛhyate. tat tacchabdenocyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_13: [tasyālaṃbanaḥ]. taccittālaṃbanas taccittālaṃbano rāgaḥ. ālaṃabanam asya paracittajñānasyeti
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_14: tad bhavati taccittālaṃbanarāgālaṃbanaṃ. yasmād evaṃvidhaṃ rāgaṃ nālaṃbate paracittajñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_15: viprakṛṣṭatvāt. ekaikadravyagocaraṃ hi paracittajñānaṃ. na ca parakīyacittajñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_16: tasya cittasyālaṃbanaṃ gṛhṇāti. ākārālaṃbananirapekṣaṃ hi tad iti vacanāt. raktam
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_17: idaṃ eittaṃ jānātīti vacanāc ca. tasmād api na rāgasaṃyogāt sarāgaṃ cittam iti. asaṃprayuktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4098_18: vigatarāgam iti. satyām api rāgaprāptāv ity abhiprāyaḥ. tatra tat saṃdhāyoktam iti
SA01yabhkvyu:4099_0: na saṃprayogam iti darśayaty anāvartikadharmi kāmabhave rūpabhave ārūpyabhave iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4099_1: traidhātukavairāgyasaṃdarśanād ity abhiprāyaḥ. nanu coktam iti vistaraḥ. kvoktam.
SA01yabhkvyu:4099_2: atra tu sūtra iti vistareṇa yāvad yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syād
SA01yabhkvyu:4099_3: anyakleśasaṃprayuktam [Tib. 289a] api vigatarāgaṃ syād ity atra. etenābhisaṃdhinā
SA01yabhkvyu:4099_4: rāyaviprayuktatvād vigatarāgam anyakleśasaṃprayuktam apīty anena. yady evaṃ sadveṣaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4099_5: samoham ity evamādi. na vaktavyaṃ syād ity ata āha. na tu tad vigatarāgam ityādi.
SA01yabhkvyu:4099_6: na tu tad dveṣādisaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgam api sad vigatarāgam iti kṛtvā gṛhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:4099_7: kiṃ tarhi. sadveṣaṃ samoham ity evamādi dveṣādisaṃprayogitayā viśiṣṭatvāt. ādiśabdena
SA01yabhkvyu:4099_8: cātra saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptam ity evamādisūtroktāni padāni gṛhyante.
SA01yabhkvyu:4100_0: anyathā hīti vistaraḥ. yady asmin vastuni rūpādike raktam iti vijānīyāt tad rūpālaṃbanam
SA01yabhkvyu:4100_1: api syāt. tathā ca sati na tat paracittajñānaṃ syād rūpālaṃbanatvāt. tadālaṃbanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4100_2: ca paracittaṃ gṛhṇataḥ svabhāvagrahaṇaṃ prāpnuyād iti. sālaṃbanaparacittagrahaṇe
SA01yabhkvyu:4100_3: hīṣyamāṇe svātmā paracittajñānena gṛhyeta. asti hi saṃbhavo yat paracittavid yasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4100_4: cittaṃ gṛhṇāti. asāv api tasya paracittavidaś cittam ālaṃbeta. tataś ca paracittajñānasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4100_5: svālaṃbanaparijñānāt [Tib. 289b] svam evāsau paracittavic cittam ālambeta. na caitat

SA01yabhkvyu:4157_0: ubhayor api sarāgavītarāgayor [Tib. 301a] vimuktimārge bhāvaneti. prayogamārge tu

SA01yabhkvyu:4166_4: 302a] daśa tad eva prakṣipya. aṣṭau nava ceti. samayavimuktasyāṣṭau akopyadharmaṇo

SA01yabhkvyu:4170_0: (VII.31, 32) atha kasmin mārga iti laukike lokottare vā. yadbhūmiko mārga iti. anāgamyādikaḥ

SA01yabhkvyu:4170_4: sāmantakasvabhāvaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca maulasvabhāvaṃ. navame vimuktimārge
SA01yabhkvyu:4170_6: dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate. tathaiva dvitīyadhyānasāmantakasaṃgṛhītaṃ mauladvitīyadhyānasaṃgṛhītaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4170_8: bhavāgraṃ labhata iti vistareṇa yojyaṃ. yadāpy anāsravānāgamyabhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa kāmadhātuvairāgyāt
SA01yabhkvyu:4170_9: [Tib. 303b] prathamadhyānaṃ labhate. tadāpi tathaiva tatsaṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate. yadāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:4170_12: dvitīyadhyānasāmantakasaṃgṛhītaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ labhate. sā hi prathamato bhūmis tadā

SA01yabhkvyu:4181_0: 'nāsravajñānaṃ. katham iti vṛttyā vyācaṣṭe. yadbhūmivairāgyāyāpi hi na kevalaṃ yadbhūmika
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_1: ity apiśabdaḥ. dvividho 'pi mārgo bhavatīti. laukiko lokottaraś ca. prayogamārgādi
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_2: ādiśabdenānantaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgagrahaṇaṃ. yāṃ ca bhūmiṃ labhate vairāgyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_3: uparibhūmikaṃ. tadbhūmikāny adhobhūmikāni vānāsravāṇi bhāvanāṃ gacchanti. tadyathā
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_4: dvitīyam anāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya tṛtīyadhyānavairāgyaṃ [Tib. 304a] karoti. yadbhūmiko
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_5: mārgo dvitīyadhyānabhūmikas tadbhūmikam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati. yasyāś
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_6: ca bhūmervairāgyaṃ karoti tṛtīyāyā bhūmes tadbhūmikaṃ tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ navame
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_7: vimuktimārge 'nāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati. adhobhūmikaṃ ca prathamadhyānabhūmikam
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_8: anāgamyabhūmikaṃ vānāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati. adhobhūmikam api hi tatprayogamārgādikaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_9: saṃbhavāmi tajjātīyam iti bhāvanāṃ gacchati. atha tu tṛtīyadhyānasāmantakaṃ niśritya
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_10: dvitīyadhyānavairāgyaṃ karoti. tatrāṣṭāsv ānantaryamārgeṣu vimuktimārge ca tasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_11: sāmantakasya sāsravatvāt tadbhūmikam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ na bhāvanāṃ gacchati. abhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_12: adhobhūmikaṃ tu tajjātīyaṃ dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ dhyānāntarabhūmikaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikam
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_13: anāgamyabhūmikaṃ ca tajjātīyam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati. evam anyatrāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_14: yojyam eṣā dig iti. sāsravāś ca kṣayajñāna iti. anāsravāś ceti caśabdaḥ. yān guṇān
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_15: arhadbhūtvā saṃmukhīkuryāt te sāsravās tasyām avasthāyāṃ. bhāvanāṃ gacchaṃti. apramāṇavimokṣādaya
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_17: [Tib. 304b] yā peḍā rajjvā nipīḍya baddhā. sā rajjūcchedād ucchvasatīva peḍocyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:4181_18: ucchvastīva pratirūpakaśabdābhidhānāt. tasya rajjūcchedād ucchvasantīva peḍāyāḥ sādharmyeṇa.
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_0: peḍā rajjūcchedād ucchvasatīva. evaṃ yathoktā aśubhādayo guṇā vajropamena samādhinā
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_1: kleśaprāptirajjūcchedād aśailṣasaṃtāne vartsyanta ucchvasantīva. ucchvāsasya prāṇidharmatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_2: aupamikaṃ. kasmād ity āha. svacittādhirājyaprāptasyeti sarvaṃ. sarveṣām rājñām adhiko
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_3: rājādhirājaḥ. tadbhāva ādhirājyaṃ. svacitte 'dhirājyaṃ kleśaparādhīnatāvigamāt. svacittaiśvaryam
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_4: ity arthaḥ. tatprāptasyārhataḥ prāptibhiḥ prābhṛtasthānīyābhiḥ sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_5: dharmāṇāṃ pratyudgamanānte guṇā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti. ādhirājye prāptau kasyacid rājādhirājasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_6: prābhṛtena vastrādinā viṣayāṇāṃ janapadānāṃ. yathā pratyudgamanaṃ. tadvat tad eva
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_7: kleśaprāptirajjūcchede sati svaprāptilābhāt ucchvasantīva guṇā uttaptatarāṇāṃ teṣāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_8: prāptir utpadyata ity arthaḥ. kāmadhātāv arhattvaprāptāv evāśubhādayo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_9: śrutacintābhāvanāmayās traidhātukā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti. rūpārūpyadhātvos tv arhattvaprāptau
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_11: tadbhūmikā eva ity avagaṃtavyaṃ. yat kiṃcil labhyata iti vistaraḥ. yad vihīnaṃ punar
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_12: labhyate saṃmukhīkriyate saṃsārocitaṃ. na tad anāgataṃ bhāvyate. bhāvitotsṛṣṭatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_13: saṃsāre. yad evātra dhyānāpramāṇādyanucitaṃ saṃsāre viśiṣṭām anāsravāṇuguṇaṃ. tat
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_14: saṃmukhībhāve tajjātīyam evānāgataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ bhāvyata iyt ācāryo darśayati. ācāryasaṃghabhadro
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_15: 'py etam evārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe. labdhapūrvaṃ na bhāvyate. yat pratilabdhavihīnaṃ punar
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_16: labhyate na tad bhāvyaṃ. arthād gamyate yad alabdhapūrvaṃ labhyate tad bhāvyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_17: yatnābhimukhīkaraṇāt. apratiprasrabdho hi mārgo yatnenābhimukhīkriyata iti. tadāvedhasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_18: balavattvād anāgato bhāvanāṃ gacchati. pratiprasrabdhapūrvas tv ayatnena saṃmukhībhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_19: bhāvitapratiprasrabdhatvāt kṛtakṛtyadattaphalatvāc ca vegahīna iti tatsaṃmukhībhāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_20: anāgato na bhāvyata iti. yo 'nāgato yatnena janyate. sa bhāvyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_21: tad evaṃ sati yad uktaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tāvad iti vistareṇa. tad āryasaṃtānapatitam
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_22: eva gṛhyate saṃsārānucitatvād iti ācāryavasumitreṇātra likhitam. atra kila vaibhāṣikā
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_23: āhuḥ. naitad evaṃ. [Tib. 305b] kutaḥ. yasmād alabdham eva tad bhavati tyaktatvāt.

SA01yabhkvyu:4182_26: vyācakṣate. ekaṃ janmedam adhikṛyoktam na janmāntaraṃ. yad vihīnam asminn eva janmani
SA01yabhkvyu:4182_27: punar labhyate. na tad bhāvyate. bhāvitotsṛṣṭatvāt. janmāntare tu yal labhyate. tad
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_0: (VII.33) caturvidhā hi bhāvaneti. pratilambha eva bhāvanā pratilambhabhāvana. anāgataprāptir
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_1: eva bhāvanety arthaḥ. evaṃ niṣevaṇam eva pratipakṣa eva vinirdhāvanam eva bhāvāneti
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_2: vaktavyaṃ. kiṃ niṣevaṇaṃ. kiṃ ca yāvad vinirdhāvanam iti. niṣevaṇaṃ punaḥpunaḥsaṃmukhīkaraṇaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_3: pratipakṣo mārgo yathoktaṃ sūtre. bhāvitakāyo bhāvitacitta iti. bhāvitapratipakṣakāyacitta
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_4: ity arthaḥ. kāyapratipakṣaḥ punaś caturdhyānavirāgyāya yo mārgaḥ. tathā hy uktaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_5: bhāvitakāyo bhikṣur ity ucyate bhāvitacitto bhāvitaśīlaḥ. katḥaṃ bhāvitakāyo bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_6: kāyād vigatarāgo vigataspṛho vigatapipāso vigatapremā vigataniyaṃtiḥ. atha vā yo
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_8: vinirdhāvanaṃ kleśaprāptichedaḥ. anāgatānām eketi. pratilambhabhāvanā. pratyutpannānām
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_9: ubhe iti. pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane. tad evam iti vistaraḥ. yasmāt pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_10: kuśalasaṃskṛtānām ity aviśeṣeṇoktaṃ sāsravāṇām anāsravaṇāṃ ca. pratipakṣavinirdhāvanabhāvane
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_11: ca sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇām ity aviśeṣeṇoktaṃ kliṣṭānām akliṣṭānāṃ ca. tasmād evam itthaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_12: kuśalasāsravāṇāṃ catasro bhāvanā bhavanti. yeṣāṃ bhāvanā kuśalatvāt pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_13: bhavataḥ. sāsravatvāc ca pratipakṣavinirdhāvanabhāvane bhavata iti. ye tarhi na kuśalasāsravāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_14: ye saṃskṛtā ye 'nāsravā ye ca kliṣṭāvyākṛtāḥ. teṣāṃ kati bhāvanā ity āhānāsravāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4184_15: dve iti. pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane. kliṣṭāvyākṛtānāṃ ca. kiṃ dve bhāvane bhavataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4185_0: indriyāṇāṃ pūrveti. cakṣurādīnāṃ saṃvarabhāvanety arthaḥ. kāyasyottareti. vibhāvanabhāvanā.
SA01yabhkvyu:4185_1: tat punar bhāvanādvayam āgamena yathākramaṃ darśayati. ṣaḍ imānīndriyāṇīti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4185_2: sa punar indriyasaṃvaraḥ smṛti [Tib. 306b] saṃprajñānasvabhāva uktaḥ. vibhāvanāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:4185_3: kāyālambanasya kleśasya nirdhāvanaṃ. te tv iti vistaraḥ. te tu saṃvaravibhāvanabhāvane
SA01yabhkvyu:4185_4: pratipakṣanirdhāvanabhāvanāntarbhūte yathākramam ubhayam ubhayatrāntarbhūtam ity api na virudhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:4186: (VII.34ab) sāmānyena sarveṣām iti. śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ kṣayajñānakṣaṇe guṇabhāvanoktā
SA01yabhkvyu:4188: iti vacanāt. daśa balānīti vistaraḥ. ete balādyā mahākaruṇāntā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā vaibhāṣikair vyavasthāpyaṃte. balādivyatiriktān kecid anyān aṣṭādaśāveṇikān (Abhidh-k-vy 641)
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_0: buddhadharmān varṇayanti. tadyathā. nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitaṃ. nāsti ravitaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_1: nāsti dravatā. nāsti nānātvasaṃjñā. nāsty avyākṛtaṃ manaḥ. nāsty apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_2: nāsty atīteṣu pratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ. nāsty anāgateṣu pratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_3: nāsti pratyutpanneṣu pratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ. sarvaṃ kāyakarma jñānānuparivarti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_4: sarvaṃ vākkarma jñānānuparivarti. sarvaṃ manaskarma jñānānuparivarti. nāsti chaṃdahāniḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_5: nāsti vīryahāniḥ. nāsti smṛtihāniḥ. nāsti samādhihāniḥ. [Tib. 307a] nāsti prajñāhāniḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_6: nāsti vimuktijñanadarśanahānir iti. tatra ravitaṃ nāma sahasā kriyā. dravatā krīḍābhiprāyatā.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_7: nānātvasaṃjñā sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukheṣu viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohato nānātvasaṃjñā. śeṣaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_8: sugamaṃ. daśa balāni. sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ. karmavipākajñānabalaṃ. dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_11: sūtraṃ tu daśāyuṣmantas tathāgatabalāni. katamāni daśa. ihāyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_12: ca sthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. asthānaṃ cāsthānataḥ. idaṃ prathamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_13: yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhasthānaṃ pratijānāti
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_14: brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati. parṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati. punar aparam āyuṣmantas
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_16: vastuto vipākataś ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat. yāvad
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_17: vipākataś ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. idaṃ dvitīyaṃ tathāgatabalam. yena baleneti pūrvavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_18: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānavyavasthānaviśuddhiṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_19: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_20: tathāgataḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ indriyaparāparatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_21: yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat. idaṃ caturthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ. yena baleneti
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_22: pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato nānāvimuktikaṃ lokam anekavimuktikam
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_23: iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yad āyuṣmaṃtas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat. idaṃ paṃcamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_24: yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmaṃtas tathāgto nānādhātukaṃ anekadhātukam
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_25: iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ [Tib. 308a] pūrvavat. idaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_26: tathāgatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ sarvatragāminīṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4189_27: pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ (Abhidh-k-vy 642)
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_0: pūrvavat. idaṃ saptamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_1: tathāgato 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati. tadyathaikām api jātiṃ dve tisraś
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_2: catasraḥ paṃca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśa viṃśatiṃ yāvad anekān api saṃvartavivartakalpān
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_3: anusmarati. amī nāma te bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ. yatrāham āsa evaṃnāmā evaṃjātya evaṃgotra
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_4: evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃ dīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitikaḥ evamāyuṣparyantaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_5: so 'haṃ tasmāt sthānāc cyuto 'mutropapannaḥ tasmād api cyuta ihopapannaḥ. iti sākāraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_6: sanidānaṃ soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_7: pūrvavat. idam aṣṭamāṃ tathāgatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_8: tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāṃtamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavanān
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_9: apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān durvarṇān durbalān hīnān praṇītān sugatim api gacchato
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_10: durgatim api yathākarmopagān sattvān [Tib. 308b] yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty amī bhavantaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_11: kāyaduścaritena smanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvagatāḥ. āryāṇām apavādakāḥ mithyādṛṣṭayo
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_12: mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetuṃ tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_13: apāyadurgativinipāte narakeṣūpapadyaṃte. amī punar bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyasucaritena
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_14: samanvāgatāḥ vāṅmanaḥsucaritena samanvāgatāḥ āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_15: samyagdṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetuṃ tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatan
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_16: svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat. idaṃ navamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_17: . yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_18: cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_19: prativedayate kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4190_20: prajānāmīti. yad āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ pūrvavat. idaṃ daśamaṃ tathagatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:4191_0: (VII.34cd-36) sthānāsthāne daśa jñānānīti. sthānaṃ cāsthānaṃ sthānāsthānaṃ. tatra
SA01yabhkvyu:4191_1: jñānam eva balaṃ jñānabalaṃ. tad daśajñānāni. [Tib. 309a] daśajñānasvabhāvam ity
SA01yabhkvyu:4191_2: arthaḥ. kathaṃ kṛtvā. sthānāsthānaṃ samāsena saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ca tad api saṃskṛtam
SA01yabhkvyu:4191_4: saṃskṛtaṃ dvidhā bhettavyaṃ. kuśalāvyākṛtabhedāt. tatra saṃvṛtijñānabalasya daśāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:4192_0: daśasv api dharmeṣu tasya vṛttir ity arthaḥ. dharmajñānasya paṃca. kāmāvacarānāsravāś
SA01yabhkvyu:4192_1: catvāraḥ kuśalaṃ cāsaṃkṛtaṃ. anvayajñānasya sapta. rūpārūpyāvacarānāsravāḥ ṣaṭ kuśalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4192_3: kuśalam evāsaṃskṛtaṃ. mārgajñānasya dvāv anāsravau. paracittajñānasya trayaḥ. kāmarūpāvacarānāsravāḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4192_4: saṃprayuktāḥ. kṣayānutpādajñānayor nava dharmā viṣayaḥ. avyākṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ muktvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:4192_5: evaṃ kṛtvā sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ daśa jñānāni. kathaṃ punar daśā dharmāḥ sthānāsthānam
SA01yabhkvyu:4192_6: ity uccyaṃte. saṃbhavaḥ sthānaṃ asaṃbhavo 'sthānam iti. atha vā asthānam anavakāśo
SA01yabhkvyu:4192_7: yaḥ strī buddhatvaṃ kārayiṣyati. sthānam etad yat puruṣa iti. asthānam anavakāśo
SA01yabhkvyu:4192_8: yaḥ strī brahmatvaṃ [Tib. 309b] kārayiṣyati. sthānam etat purusa iti. tathā sthānam
SA01yabhkvyu:4192_9: etad yad duḥkhasya nirodha iti. evamādyākārapravṛttaṃ sthānāsthānajñānabalam avagaṃtavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4192_10: aṣṭau karmaphala iti. karmaṇaḥ sāsravasya tadvipākasya ca duḥkhasamudayasatyasaṃgṛhītatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4192_11: nirodhamārgajnāne na bhavata iti. ato 'nyāni tadālaṃbanāni aṣṭau jñānāni saṃbhavanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_0: iti vistaraḥ. dhyānam ādir āsām iti dhyānādayo dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_1: dhyānāni catvāri. vimokṣā aṣṭau. samādhayas trayaḥ śūnyatādyāḥ. samāpattī dve. asaṃjñinirodhasamāpattī.
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_3: cākṣāṇi cādhimokṣāś ceti dvandvaḥ. teṣu nava jñānāni nirodhajñānaṃ hitvā. kathaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_4: kṛtvā. dhyānādīnāṃ sāsravānāsravasaṃprayuktaviprayuktabhedāt tadālaṃbanāni nava jñānāni
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_5: saṃbhavanti. nirodhajñānaṃ tu na bhavati. [teṣāṃ san nirodhajñānaṃ tu na bhavati.]
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_6: teṣāṃ saṃskṛtatvāt. indriyeṣv api śraddhādiṣu. [Tib. 310a] yat pradhānāpradhānajñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_7: mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyabhedena. tat parāparajñānabalaṃ. teṣv api sāsravānāsravabhedabhinneṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_8: nava jñānāni saṃbhavanti nirodhajñānaṃ hitvā. pradhānādiṣu rucayo nānādhimuktayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_9: tāḥ punaḥ sāsravānāsravās traidhātukāś ca tadālambanatvāt nirodhajñānaṃ hitvā. evaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_10: nānādhātujñānabalaṃ. tatra hi dhātuḥ pūrvābhyāsavāsanāsamudāgata āśayo dhātur ity
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_11: ācāryasaṃghabhadraḥ. sa punas tu eva te cittacaittā viśiṣṭāḥ. teṣāṃ tathaiva sāsravānāsravabhedabhinnānāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4194_12: nirodhajñanaṃ hitvā nava jñānāni bhavantīti pūrvavad yojyaṃ. pratipatsv iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_0: yāvad devagāminī. nirodhagāmini ca. tatra yā narakādigāminyaḥ pratipadaḥ. tā hetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_1: pratipadyante tābhir iti kṛtvā. mārgo hi pratipady ucate. tena hi visaṃyogaḥ pratipadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_2: nirodhas tu kathaṃ. sa cāpi pratipat. pratipadyate tam iti kṛtvā. pratipatphalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_3: vā pratipad ity ucyate. ata evāha. yadi saphalā pratipad gṛhyata iti. hetur hi sarvatragāmini
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_4: pratipad iheṣyate. [Tib. 310b] tathā hi vyācakṣate. sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalam
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_5: iti. satkāyasamudayagāminīty artha iti. tatra satkāyaḥ paṃcopādānaskaṃdhāḥ. samudaya
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_6: utpāda ihābhipretaḥ. evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskaṃdhasya samudayo bhavatīti
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_7: vacanāt. satkāyanirodho visaṃyogaḥ. tatra sarvatra gaṃtuṃ śīlam asyā iti sarvatragāminī
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_8: cāsau pratipac ca sarvatragāminīpratipat. tat jñānaṃ tad eva ca balam iti. sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_9: tad daśa jñānāni yojyāni. yadi nirodhajñānam evāsravakṣayajñānam iti. āsravāṇāṃ kṣaye
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_10: nirodhe jñānam. āsravanirodhālambanaṃ jñānam ity arthaḥ. evaṃ sati ṣaḍ jñānāni bhavanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_11: nirodhajñānajātir eva dharmajñānādibhedabhedinīkṛtvā. atha kṣīṇāsravasaṃtāna iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4195_12: āsravakṣaye sati yaj jñānaṃ. tad āsavakṣayajñānam ity arthaḥ. kṣīṇāsravasaṃtāne sarvāṇi
SA01yabhkvyu:4196: anyatra buddhānutpādād iti. jaṃbūdvīpād anyatra buddhānutpādad iti jaṃbūdvīpapuruṣāśrayāṇi daśa balāni buddhāśrayotpatter ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4197_0: tad eva daśavidhajñānam anyasya balaṃ nocyata iti. anyasyāpy etad asti na tu balaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4197_1: vyāhatatvāt. [Tib. 311a] yat tv avyāhataṃ. tad balam āveṇika ity abhiprāyaḥ. pravrajanaprekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānam
SA01yabhkvyu:4197_2: iti vistaraḥ. pravrajanaṃ pravrajyā prekṣyate pravrajanaprekṣaḥ. tasya pravrajanaprekṣasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4197_3: puruṣasya pratyākhyānaṃ pravrajanaprekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānaṃ. tad udāharaṇaṃ yathā
SA01yabhkvyu:4197_4: anyasya vyāhanyate jñānam iti. āryaśāriputreṇa kila kasyacit pravrajyāprekṣasya puruṣasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4197_5: mokṣabhāgīyaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ vyavalokayatā na dṛṣṭam iti pratyākhyāto na pravrājita
SA01yabhkvyu:4197_6: ity arthaḥ. bhagavatā tu dṛṣṭaṃ pravrājitaś ca. taṃ cādhikṛtya bhikṣubhiḥ prṣṭena
SA01yabhkvyu:4197_7: bhagavatoktaṃ. anenaivedaṃ karma kṛtaṃ. yad arhattvaṃ prāptā. na hi karmāṇi pṛthivīdhātau
SA01yabhkvyu:4197_8: vipacyante. nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau. api tūpātteṣv eva skaṃdhadhātvāyataneṣv
SA01yabhkvyu:4198: mokṣabījam ahaṃ hy asya svasūkṣmam upalakṣaye.
SA01yabhkvyu:4203: iti. balasyeyaṃ saṃjñā nārāyaṇam iti. yasya ca tad balam. asāv api nārāyaṇa ity ucyate. cāṇūramahānagnavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:4204_0: bhadanta iti [Tib. 311b] dārṣṭāṃtikaḥ sthaviraḥ. anyathā hīti. yadi mānasavat kāyikabalaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4204_1: neṣyate. anaṃtasya jñānabalasya sahiṣṇur na syāt. sahanaśīlo bhagavān na bhaved ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4205_0: saṃdhiṣv anya ity uktam asthisaṃdhiviśeṣopanyāsaḥ. nāgagraṃthir iti vistaraḥ. nāgagranthisaṃdhayo
SA01yabhkvyu:4205_1: buddhāḥ. nāgapāśo nāgagraṃthiḥ. śaṃkalāsaṃdhayaḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ. śaṃkusaṃdhayaś cakravartinaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4208_1: tasya balaṃ daśabhir adhikaṃ daśabhyo vādhikaṃ. katham ity āha. yad daśānāṃ prākṛtahastināṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4208_2: sānānyahastināṃ balaṃ. tad ekasya gandhahastino balaṃ. evaṃ yad daśānāṃ gandhahastināṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4208_3: balaṃ. tad ekasya mahānagnasya balaṃ. yāvad yad daśānāṃ cāṇūrāṇāṃ balaṃ. tad ekasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4209: daśottaravṛddhinagaḥ. daśottaravṛddhyārdhanārāyaṇabalam iti. āditas tathaiva prakramya yad daśānāṃ praskandināṃ balaṃ. tad ardhanārāyaṇaṃ. taddviguṇaṃ nārāyaṇam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4210_0: yathā tu bahutaraṃ. tathā yujyata ity ācāryaḥ. pūrvakam eva pakṣaṃ samarthayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:4210_1: anyathā hy anantajñānabalasahiṣṇur na syād iti tad eva kāraṇaṃ. devadattahatahastipādāṃguṣṭhasaptaprākāraparikhākṣepaś
SA01yabhkvyu:4211: mahābhūtaviśeṣa eveti. mahābhūtaviśeṣasvabhāvam evedaṃ balaṃ na bhautikam iti darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:4212: upādāyarūpasaptabhyo 'rthāntaram iti. ślakṣnatvādibhyaḥ pūrvoktebhyo 'nyad eva balaṃ nāmopādāyarūpam ity apare.
SA01yabhkvyu:4213_0: (VII.38ab) yathāsūtram eveti. catvārīmāni śāriputra tathāgatasya vaiśāradyni. yair
SA01yabhkvyu:4213_1: vaiśaradyaiḥ samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4213_2: pratijānāti brāhmyaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadati. katamāni
SA01yabhkvyu:4213_3: catvāri. samyaksaṃbuddhasya bata me sato ime dharmā (Abhidh-k-vy 646)
SA01yabhkvyu:4214_0: anabhisaṃbuddhā ity atra māṃ kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā saha dharmeṇa codayet.
SA01yabhkvyu:4214_1: smārayet. tatrāhaṃ nimittam api na samanupaśyāmi. evaṃ cāhaṃ nimittam asamanupaṣyan
SA01yabhkvyu:4214_2: kṣemaprāptaś ca viharāmy abhayaprāptaś ca vaiśāradyaprāptaś ca udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4214_3: pratijānāmi brāhmyaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmi. parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi. idaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4214_4: prathamaṃ vaiśāradyaṃ. kṣīṇāsravasya bata me sata ime āsravā aprahīṇā ity atra māṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4214_5: kaścid iti pūrvavat. yāvat parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ [Tib. 312b] nadāmi. idaṃ dvitīyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4214_6: vaiśāradyaṃ. ye vā punar mayā śrāvakāṇām āntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātāḥ. tān pratiṣevamāṇasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4214_7: nālam antarāyāyety atra māṃ kaścid iti pūrvavat. idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vaiśāradyaṃ. yo vā
SA01yabhkvyu:4214_8: punar mayā śrāvakāṇāṃ mārga ākhyātaḥ āryo nairyāṇiko nairvedhiko niryāti. tatkarasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4214_9: samyagduḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai sa na niryāsyatīty atra māṃ kaścid iti pūrvavat.

SA01yabhkvyu:4214_16: ca. evaṃ ya vā punar mayā śrāvakāṇām āntarāyikā iti vistareṇa tṛtīyaṃ vaiśāradyam.
SA01yabhkvyu:4214_17: atrāpi tathaiva dharmāṇāṃ bhedaṃ kṛtvā duḥkhasamudayasatyasaṃgṛhītā evāntarāyikāḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:4214_19: daśa jñānāni nava vā sarvabhūmisaṃgṛhītaṃ ca. evaṃ yo vā mayā śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya

SA01yabhkvyu:4214_22: jñānair nirbhayo bhavatīti jñānāni vaiśāradyānīti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4215_0: ācārya āha. jñānakṛtaṃ tu vaiśāradyaṃ. na jñānam eveti. atha va ācāryavacanam evaitat

SA01yabhkvyu:4215_2: bhayam api caitasiko dharma iti. ebhiś ca jñānair hetubhūtair nirbhayo bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4215_3: tat kathaṃ jñānam eva vaiśāradyaṃ. jñānakṛtaṃ tu vaiśāradyaṃ yujyate na jñānam eveti.

SA01yabhkvyu:4322_4: sa hīti vistaraḥ. sa hy aṃgasamāyuktaḥ samādhiḥ śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ yuganaddhābhyām
SA01yabhkvyu:4322_5: ivāśvābhyāṃ ratho vahatīti yuganaddhavāhī. tadbhāvāt dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāra uktaḥ

SA01yabhkvyu:4325_0: iti vacanāt. mithyopanidhyānād iti. mithyānitīraṇād ity arthaḥ. atiprasaṃga iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_1: kāmarāgaparyavasthitenāpi cetasā mithyopanidhyānāt tatprasaṃgaḥ. na. tatpratirūpa
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_2: eveti vistaraḥ. naitad evaṃ atiprasaṃga iti. tat pratirūpa eva hi nātibahuvilakṣaṇe
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_3: kliṣṭe dhyānam iti saṃjñāsaṃniveśaḥ. pūtibījavat. yathā kiṃcid abījaṃ pāṣāṇādy atyantatajjātivilakṣaṇam
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_4: na pūtibījam ity ucyate. kiṃ tarhi. bījajātīyam evopahataṃ yad bhavati. tasminn eva
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_5: saṃjñāsaṃniveśaḥ pūtibījam iti. uktāni cākuśalāny api dhyānānīti. sa kāmarāgaparyavasthitaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_6: [Tib. 331a] kāmarāgaparyavasthānam antarīkṛtvā dhyāyati pradhyāyatīti vistaraḥ. anena
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_7: kāmarāgādiparyavasthānasyāpi dhyānatve sati na doṣa iti darśayati. dhūmāgnivad iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_8: yathā dhūmo 'treti dhūmavacanenāgnir apy ukto bhavati sāhacaryāt. na vināgninā dhūmo
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_9: bhavatīti. anenaiva cāvinābhāvitvena dhūmasyābhyarhitatvaṃ. yatra hi dhūmaḥ. tatrāgniḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_10: na tu yatrāgniḥ. tatra dhūmaḥ. tathā hy ayoguḍāṃgārādiṣv agnir eva gṛhyate. na dhūmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_11: asmāc cābhyarhitatvād dhūmasya pūrvanipāto vāsudevārjunavat. anyathā hi dvaṃdve 'pīty
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_12: agniśabdasya pūrvanipātaḥ syāt. kathaṃ punaḥ sāhacaryeṇa hi prītisukhavān vicāro
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_13: vinā vitarkeṇa nāsti. yathā dhyānāntaravicāraḥ. na prītisukhavān ity avitarkaḥ. naivam
SA01yabhkvyu:4325_14: ayaṃ vicāraḥ. viśeṣito hy ayaṃ vicāraḥ. prītisukhasahapaṭhitaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4327: iti. prītisukhavatā vicāreṇa prītisukhena ca saṃprayuktaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam ity arthaḥ. yadi punar vitarkaprītisukhavad iti sūtraṃ kriyeta ko doṣaḥ syāt. na śakyam evaṃ kartuṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4329_0: iti vakṣyati. vitarkavarjitaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam [Tib. 331b] iti dhyānāntaram api dvitīyaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4329_1: dhyānaṃ prāpnoti. kiṃ ca catvāry aṃgāni prathamadhyānanirdeśāvasāne 'nenānukrameṇoktāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:4329_2: savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4329_3: tatra vicāraprītisukhasamādhayaḥ prathame dhyāne bhavaṃti. ebhiś caturbhir aṃgair
SA01yabhkvyu:4329_4: vitarkeṇa ca sarvaprathamoktena paṃcāṃgam ucyate. dvitīyaṃ punar ucyate. avitarkam
SA01yabhkvyu:4329_5: avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti. (Abhidh-k-vy 666)
SA01yabhkvyu:4330_0: caturṇām eṣāṃ pūrvāṃgena vicāralakṣaṇena varjitam iti. tṛtīyam apy evam ucyate. sa
SA01yabhkvyu:4330_1: prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati vistareṇa yāvat sukhavihārīti. tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
SA01yabhkvyu:4330_2: viharatīti. prītilakṣaṇenāpareṇāṃgena varjitam iti. caturthaṃ punar evam ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:4330_3: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād vistareṇa yāvad aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddaṃ caturthaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4330_4: dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīti. sukhenāpy aṃgena varjitaṃ samādhir evātra kevalam

SA01yabhkvyu:4337: iti. vivicyate aneneti vivekaḥ. yena mārgeṇeti. ānaṃtaryamārgeṇa vimuktimārgeṇāpi vā tad ekakāryatvāt. vairāgyagamanād iti. tadvaimukhyagamanād ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4339: iti. vibhūtā rūpasaṃjñāsyeti vibhūtarūpasaṃjñaḥ. vibhūtarūpasaṃjñā ity ākhyā eṣām iti vibhūtarūpasaṃjñākhyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4340_0: sādhyaṃ tāvad etad iti. nikāyāntarīyāḥ. yadi hi syād hi syād iti vaibhāṣikāḥ. āpiṃgalavad
SA01yabhkvyu:4340_1: iti. yathā īṣat piṃgala āpiṃgalaḥ. evam īṣad rūpā ārūpyā iti. kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṇvarau
SA01yabhkvyu:4340_2: kāyavāksaṃvarau bhaviṣyataḥ. na cāsati bhūte ārūpyāvacare saṃvarabhautikam ārūpyāvacaraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4340_3: yujyate. anāsravasaṃvaravac cet. tatraitat syāt. yathā na saṃty anāsravāṇi bhūtāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:4340_4: asti cānāsravasaṃvaro bhautikaṃ rūpam. evam ihāpi nārūpyāvacarāṇi bhūtāni syuḥ. atha
SA01yabhkvyu:4340_5: vārūpyāvacarasaṃvaraḥ syāt bhautikaṃ rūpam iti. tac ca na. sāsravabhūtasadbhāvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:4340_6: sāsravāṇi [Tib. 332b] bhūtāni saṃti. tāny ārūpyeṣu bhaveyuḥ. anāsravāṇi tu bhūtāni
SA01yabhkvyu:4340_7: na saṃti. ato 'nāsravasaṃvaro yatra jātaḥ. tatratyāni sāsravāṇy upādāya bhavatīty
SA01yabhkvyu:4340_8: akalpaneyam asāmyāt. samāpattāv api tatpratiṣedha ukta iti. anenaivopapattirūpapratiṣedhena
SA01yabhkvyu:4340_9: samāpattāv api rūpapratiṣedha ukto bhavati. nātra yatnāṃtaram anuṣṭheyaṃ. kathaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_0: kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṃvaro bhaviṣyati. na cāsati bhūte bhautikaṃ yujyate. anāsravasaṃvaravac
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_1: cet. na. sāsravabhūtasadbhāvād iti. sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramād iti vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_2: samāpattāv api tatpratiṣedha ukta ity apare. tad evaṃ nārūpyasamāpattiṣu nārūpyopapattiṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_3: rūpam astīti darśitaṃ bhavati. parimāṇālpatvāc cet. atha mataṃ. paramāṇumātraṃ rūpam
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_4: asti. atas ta īṣadrūpā iṣyanta iti. udakajaṃtukeṣv apy aṇutvād adṛśyarūpeṣu prasaṃgaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_5: ārūpyaprasaṃga ity arthaḥ. acchatāc cet. tatraitad syād rūpasyācchatvād ārūpyā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_6: antarābhavarūpāvacareṣv apu prasaṃgaḥ. antarābhavarūpāvacarā hi vajramayeṣv api parvateṣv
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_7: acchatvād asajjamānā [Tib. 333a] gacchaṃti. teṣv ārūpyaprasaṃgaḥ. samāpattivat tadupapattiviśeṣād
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_8: iti. yathaiva hy ākāśānantyādisamāpattayo viśiṣṭatamāḥ. evam upapattiviśeṣo 'pi tāsām
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_9: abhyupagantavyo 'cchācchataratama iti. ataḥ samāpattivad upapattiviśeṣo 'py acchataratama
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_11: agrahaṇam ity ārūpyā ucyaṃte. dhyānopapattirūpasyāpi ceti vistaraḥ. eṣa saṃbhavo
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_15: cādharabhūmikenendriyeṇāgrahaṇāt kas tatra viśeṣaḥ. ārūpyadhātau yad acchataratamābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_16: sāmānye 'pi ta evārūpyā iṣyaṃgte na rūpāvacarāḥ. tasmān na tatra rūpaṃ. atha mataṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_17: dvayor dhātvor anvarthā saṃjñā. kāmaguṇaprabhāvitaḥ kāmadhātuḥ. rūpaprabhāvito rūpadhātur
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_18: iti. nārūpyadhātor [Tib. 333b] anvarthā saṃjñā. kiṃ tarhi yādṛcchikī ti. kātra yuktiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_19: dvayor dhātvor anvarthā saṃjñā. nārūpyadhātor iti. yuktyā pratiṣidhya nārūpyadhātau
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_20: rūpam astīti āgamaṃ parigṛhyāśaṃkitaṃ vāryate. tatra rūpaprasiddhyārtham āyurūṣmaṇor
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_21: iti vistaraḥ. ārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhir iti ced ity etat padaṃ pratyekaṃ yojyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_22: katham. āyurūṣmaṇoḥ saṃsṛṣṭavacanād rūpāstitvasiddhir iti cet. tatraitat syāt sūtra
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_23: uktaṃ. yac cāyuṣman kauṣṭhila āyur yac coṣmakaṃ saṃsṛṣṭāv imau dharmau. na visaṃsṛṣṭāv
SA01yabhkvyu:4341_24: iti vistaraḥ. atas tatrāyuṣi saty ūṣmaṇā bhavitavyaṃ. ūṣmā ca rūpam iti sidhyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:4342_0: anyonyaniśritavacanāt. ārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhir iti cet. sūtra uktaṃ. tadyathāyuṣman
SA01yabhkvyu:4342_1: śāriputra dve naḍakalāpyāv ākāśe ucchrite syātāṃ. te anyonyaniśrite anyonyaṃ niśritya
SA01yabhkvyu:4342_2: tiṣṭheyātām. tatra kaścid ekām apanayet. dvitīyā nipatet. dvitīyām apanayet. ekā
SA01yabhkvyu:4342_3: nipatet. evam āyuṣman śāriputra nāmaṃ ca rūpaṃ cānyonyaniśritaṃ. anyonyaṃ niśritya
SA01yabhkvyu:4342_4: tiṣṭhatīti vistaraḥ. vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam iti vacanāt. tasmād ārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhir
SA01yabhkvyu:4342_5: iti cet. [Tib. 334a] pratītyasamutpādasūtra uktaṃ. ārūpyaprasiddhikṣaṇe vijñānapratyayaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4342_6: nāmarūpam iti vacanāt tasmād ārūpyeṣu rūpam astīti sidhyati. anyatra rūpād iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4342_7: sūtra uktaṃ. rūpopagaṃ bhikṣavo vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhati. iti rūpālambanarūpapratiṣṭhaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4342_8: yaḥ kaścid bhikṣava evaṃ vadet. ahaṃ anyatra rūpād vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo

SA01yabhkvyu:4343: asmād api cāgamād ārūpyeṣu rūpam astīti sidhyaty evaṃ cet. tan na. saṃpradhāryatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4344: āhosvit sarvam iti. kāmarūpārūpyāvacaraṃ. ayam atrābhiprāyārthaḥ. kāmāvacaram evāyuḥ saṃdhāyaivam uktam iti. tathā hy uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4345: āyur ūṣmātha vijñānaṃ yadā kāyaṃ jahaty amī.
SA01yabhkvyu:4346: apaviddhas tadā śete yathā kāṣṭham acetana
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_0: iti. na cārūpyadhātau kāyo 'sti. kuta eva kāyanidhanaṃ. rūpadhātau tu yady api kāyo
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_1: 'sti. na tu kāyanidhanaṃ prajñāyata iti. yac ca nāmarūpayor anyonyāśritatvam uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_2: tad api kāmarūpāvacaram eva saṃdhāyoktam iti lakṣyate. dvayasaṃbhave hy anyonyāśritatvaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_3: saṃbhavati. [Tib. 334b] yac ca vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam iti. vijñānaṃ pratyayo
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_4: 'syeti vijñānāpratyayaṃ nāmarūpam ity evaṃ ṣaṣṭhībahuvrīhisamāse. kim atra sarvavijñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_6: āhosvit sarvaṃ nāmarūpaṃ vijñānapratyayam iti. vayaṃ brūmo vijñānapratyayaṃ māmarūpam
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_7: ity evaṃ sarvasya nāmarūpasya vijñānaṃ pratyaya ity avadhāryate. na tu sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_8: nāmarūpasya pratyaya ity avadhāryate. kiṃcid vijñānaṃ nāmna eva pratyayo yad ārūpyāvacarasaṃskārapratyayaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_9: kiṃcin nāmarūpasya yat kāmarūpāvacarasaṃskārapratyayaṃ. tad idam uktaṃ bhavati. pratyaya
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_10: eva vijñānam asya nāmarūpasya. na tv asyaiva samuditasya nāmarūpasya pratyaya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_11: saṃbhavaṃ praty evam ucyate. tathā hy upapādukānāṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam eva
SA01yabhkvyu:4347_12: bhavati. na nāmarūpam aniṣpannaṣaḍāyatanāvasthā hi paṃca skaṃdhā nāmarūpam (Abhidh-k-vy 669)
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_0: ity ākhyāyante. sūtraṃ caitam evārthaṃ dyotayati. vijñānaṃ ced ānanda mātuḥ kukṣiṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_1: nāvakrāmed api tu tan nāmarūpaṃ kalalatvāya saṃmūrchet. na bhadanta. vijñānaṃ ced
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_2: ānandāvakrāmya kṣipram evāpakrāmed api tu tan nāmarūpam itthavtāya prajñāyeta. [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_3: 335a] no bhadanta. vijñānaṃ ced ānanda daharasya kumārasya kumārikāyā vā ucchidyeta
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_4: vinaśyen na bhaved api tu tan nāmarūpaṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatām āpadyeta. no bhadanta.
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_5: tad anenāpi paryāyeṇa veditavyaṃ. yad vijñānasya pratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ. nāmarūpapratyayaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_6: ca vijñānam iti vistaraḥ. kim atra sarvair etai rūpādibhir vinā tatpratiṣedha āgatigatipratiṣedhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_7: tatra pūrvasmāl lokād aṃtarābhavasaṃtatyā ihopapattir āgatiḥ. aṃtarābhavasaṃtatyā
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_8: punar asmāl lokāt paraloka upapattir gatiḥ. āhosvid ekenāpi rūpādīnām anyatamam eva.
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_9: vayaṃ brūmaḥ. sarvair vinā tatpratiṣedha iti. aviśeṣavacanān na saṃpradhāryam iti
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_10: cet. syād eṣā buddhir aviśeṣeṇedaṃ sūtravacanaṃ. yac cāyuṣman mahākauṣṭhila āyur
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_11: iti vistareṇa yāvad rūpopagaṃ vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhatīty anena sūtravacanena viśeṣitaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_12: rūpāvacaraṃ vāyuḥ saṃdhāyoktaṃ yāvat sarvair eva tair vinā rūpādibhis tatpratiṣedha
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_13: iti. atrocyate. astiprasaṃgaḥ. bāhyasyāpi hy ūṣmaṇa āyuṣā vinābhāvo na prāpnotīty
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_14: aviśeṣavacanāt. na hy evaṃ viśeṣitaṃ yac cāyuṣman kauṣṭhila āyur yac coṣmā ādhyātmika
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_15: ityādi. [Tib. 335b] bāhyasyāpi ca rūpasya kāṣṭhakuḍyāder asattvasaṃkhyātasya vijñānāśritatvaṃ

SA01yabhkvyu:4348_17: aviśeṣavacanād ārūpyadhātau tava rūpāstitvam. evaṃ tavāhāracatuṣkavacanād rūpārūpyadhātau
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_18: kavaḍīkārāhāraprasaṃgaḥ. evaṃ hi sūtraṃ paṭhyate. catvāra āhārā bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ

SA01yabhkvyu:4348_20: sparśo dvitīyaḥ. manaḥsaṃcetanā tṛtīyaḥ. vijñānam āhāraś caturtha iti. evam āhāracatuṣkavacanāt
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_21: sattvānāṃ sthityārtham aviśeṣeṇa. kāmāvacarāṇām ity aviśeṣitatvāt tava rūpārūpyadhātvor
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_22: api kavaḍīkārāhāraprasaṃgaḥ. atikramyeti vistaraḥ. tatra nikāyāntarīyasyaitat syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_23: asty asyotsargasyāpavādhaḥ. atikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhārabhakṣān iti vacanāt. udāyisūtrādiṣu
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_24: bhedāc ca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhārabhakṣān anyatamasmin divye manomayakāya
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_25: upapadyata iti. prītyāhāravacanāc ceti. bhavati bhikṣavaḥ sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4348_26: saṃvartate. saṃvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā sattvā [Tib. 336a] ābhāsvare (Abhidh-k-vy 670)

SA01yabhkvyu:4412_6: ārūpyānām ālambanāni saṃbhavanti. adharagrahaṇam ūrdhvaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ. ūrdhvabhūmikasāsravālambanasaṃbhavāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4412_7: anāsravaṃ tv ālambanam ity udgrāhya darśyati sarvānvayajñānapakṣa iti. sarva iti

SA01yabhkvyu:4413: ca gṛhyante. [Tib. 347b] na dharmajñānapakṣaḥ. kāmaduḥkhādyālambanatvena viprakṛṣṭatvāt. nādhobhūminirodhaḥ. adhobhūmigrahaṇaprasaṃgād iti. vyākhyātam etat purastāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4415: iti. dhyānārūpyāṇāṃ yo 'nāsravaḥ saṃbhavati. tena yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kleśāḥ prahīyante. katamenānāsraveṇa maulena. vakṣyate hi
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_0: apavādarūpeṇa sāmantakena śuddhakena kleśāḥ prahīyanta ity adhikṛtaṃ. kuta eva kliṣṭeneti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_1: kliṣṭena kleśaprahāṇaṃ naiva saṃbhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ śuddhakena kleśā
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_2: na prahīyanta ity āha. vītarāgatvān nādha iti vistaraḥ. adharabhūmivītarāgatvān na
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_3: śuddhakenādharabhūmikāḥ prahīyante. kuta eva kliṣṭena. tasyaiva tadapratipakṣatvān
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_4: na svabhūmau. tasyaiva prathamadhyānasya yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya. tadapratipakṣatvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_5: tasyāpratipakṣas tadapratipakṣaḥ. tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt. tadapratipakṣatvān na svabhūmau
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_6: kleśāḥ prahīyante. na hi bhavena bhavasya niḥsaraṇam asti. viśiṣṭataratvān nordhvam
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_7: iti. nordhvabhūmikāḥ [Tib. 348a] kleśāḥ adharabhūmikena śuddhakena prahīyante. viśiṣṭataratvāt
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_8: kleśānāṃ. na ca nyūnam āśritya viśiṣṭānāṃ prahāṇaṃ yujyate. ity anena śuddhakenāpi
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_9: kleśā na prahīyante. kuta eva kliṣṭeneti siddham etat. śuddhakenāpīty apiśabdād anāsraveṇāpīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_10: saṃbhavatas tv etad uktaṃ. ata evocyate. adhobhūmipratipakṣatvāt iti. kāmāvacarā
SA01yabhkvyu:4417_11: hi kleśāḥ prathamadhyānasāmantakena prahīyante. prathamadhyānabhūmikā dvitīyadhyānasāmantakena.
SA01yabhkvyu:4418_0: (VIII.22) yena tatpraveśa iti. yena sāmantakena teṣāṃ maulānāṃ dhyānārūpyāṇāṃ praveśaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4418_1: kiṃ tāny api trividhānīti. āsvādanāsaṃprayuktādibhedāt. tathaiva ca teṣu vedaneti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4418_2: prathamayor dhyānayoḥ prītiḥ. tṛtīye sukhaṃ. caturtha upekṣety uktaṃ. kim evaṃ sāmantakeṣu.
SA01yabhkvyu:4418_3: upekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yatnavāhyatvād iti. anābhisaṃskāravāhī mārgaḥ prītisukhābhyāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4418_4: saṃprayujyate. tāni ca sāmantakāni yatnavāhyāni sābhisaṃskāravāhyānīty ata upekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:4418_5: [Tib. 348b] punar adhobhūmyudvegānapagamāt prītisukhayor ayoga iti. ato 'py upekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:4418_6: vairāgyapathatvāc ca. nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktānīti. yadi hy āsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni syur
SA01yabhkvyu:4418_7: vairāgyamārgo na syāt. na hi tṛṣṇāsaṃprayukto mārgaḥ kleśaprahāṇāya (Abhidh-k-vy 682)
SA01yabhkvyu:4419_0: bhavati. atha vāyam abhisaṃbandhaḥ. upekṣeṃdriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yatnavāhyatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4419_1: adhobhūmyudvegānapagamād vairāgyapathatvāc ceti dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktānīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4419_2: pūrvavad vaktavyaṃ śeṣaṃ. yady api sāmantakacittena saṃdhibandha iti. aṣṭāsv api
SA01yabhkvyu:4419_3: dhyānārūpyeṣu yasya yat sāmantake. tasya tena sāmantakacittena kliṣṭenāsamāhitena
SA01yabhkvyu:4419_4: saṃdhibandha ity eṣa siddhāntaḥ iti. ata idam ucyate. yady api sāmantakacitteneti
SA01yabhkvyu:4419_5: vistaraḥ. āsvādanāsaṃprayuktam apy anāgamyam iti. anāgamyasya paṭutvāt. yathā hi
SA01yabhkvyu:4419_6: tad anāsravam api saṃbhavati. tathāsvādanāsaṃprayuktam apīty abhiprāyaḥ. maulapratispardhitvād
SA01yabhkvyu:4420_0: (VIII.23) dhyānaviśeṣatvād iti. tad eva maulaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vitarkāpaganmād
SA01yabhkvyu:4420_1: viśiṣṭaṃ [sa] dhyānāntaram ity ucyate [Tib. 349a] ity arthaḥ. viśeṣābhāvād iti. yathā
SA01yabhkvyu:4420_2: prathame dhyāne viśeṣo bhavati. kvacid vitarkavicārau. kvacid vicāra eveti. na tathā
SA01yabhkvyu:4420_3: dvitīyādiṣv iti. ato dhyāneṣu na vyavasthāpyate dhyānāntaram. ata eva duḥkhā pratipad
SA01yabhkvyu:4420_4: iti. ata eva hi saṃskāravāhitvāt. vitarkamātrapratiṣedhād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4423_0: (VIII.24, 25) tadālambanaḥ samādhir ānimitta iti. animitte bhava ānimittaḥ. daśākāra

SA01yabhkvyu:4423_2: anityaduḥkhataddhetubhya udvegād iti. anityād duḥkhāt taddhetoś ca. tasya duḥkhasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4423_3: hetoś ca samudayād udvegāt. kiṃ. apraṇihitaḥ. akṛtasaṃskāra ity arthaḥ. mārgasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4423_4: kolopamatayāvaśyatyājyatvāt. kola ucyate uḍupaḥ. sa upamāsyeti kolopamaḥ. mārgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4423_5: tadbhāvaḥ. tayā. kolopamatayā mārgasyāvaśyatyājyatvaṃ. tasmād apraṇihita ity adhikṛtaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4423_6: yathā hi kolam āśritya nadīm uttaran na kolaniṣṭho bhavati. tasyāvaśyatyājyatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:4423_7: evaṃ mārgam āśritya na mārganiṣṭho bhavati. tasyāvaśyatyājyatvāt. tadākāra iti. taddaśākāro
SA01yabhkvyu:4423_9: anenāvaśyatyājyatvam asya darśayati. anityaduḥkhataddhetvatikramābhimukha ity anuktam
SA01yabhkvyu:4423_10: apy etad gamyata eva. śūnyatā-anātmatābhyāṃ tu nodvega iti. śūnyānātmākārābhyāṃ tu
SA01yabhkvyu:4423_11: nodvego yogino bhavati. yady api hi duḥkhasatyaṃ śūnyānātmākārābhyām ākāryate. na
SA01yabhkvyu:4423_12: tu tābhyāṃ tasmād duḥkhād udvegaḥ. kasmāt. nirvāṇasāmānyāt. nirvāṇam api śūnyānātmalakṣaṇaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4424_0: iti. na ca tābhyāṃ tasmān nirvāṇād udvegaḥ. tasmān na tadākāro 'praṇihitasamādhir
SA01yabhkvyu:4424_1: iti. laukikā ekādaśasv iti. kāmadhātāv anāgamye dhyānāntare dhyānārūpyeṣu ceti. yatra
SA01yabhkvyu:4425: (VIII.25, 26) śūnyatādyālambanatvāt tan nāmeti. śūnyatāpraṇihitānimittālambanatvāt. śūnyatāśūnyateti nāma. apraṇihitāpraṇihiteti. ānimittānimitta iti ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:4427: iti. yathāsaṃkhyena. śūnyatāśūnyatā [Tib. 350a] hi śūnyatākāreṇāśaikṣaṃ śūnyatāsamādhim ālambate nāyam ātmīyam iti. nānātmākāreṇa.
SA01yabhkvyu:4428_0: āha. kim atra kāraṇaṃ yac chūnyatāśūnyatāsamādhiḥ śūnyatākāra eva. na punar anātmākāro
SA01yabhkvyu:4428_2: arthaṃ punaḥ śūnyatākārapravṛttaśūnyatāpṛṣṭhenotpattir na punar anātmākārapravṛttaśūnyatāpṛṣṭheneti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4428_3: atrocyate. tadutpattyānukūlyāt. sa eva hi śūnyatākārapravṛttaśūnyatāsamādhis tasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4428_4: śūnyatāśūnyatāsamādher utpattāv ānukūlyenāvatiṣṭhate. nānātmākāraḥ. na hy evam anātmadarśanam
SA01yabhkvyu:4428_5: udvejayati yathā śūnyadarśanaṃ. dṛṣṭeṣv api hy anātmato bhaveṣv abhiratir asti saṃsāre
SA01yabhkvyu:4428_6: śūnyadarśanābhāvāt. tadyathādhvagasyāsaṃbaṃdhād adhvagadarśanād api prītiḥ. ekākinas
SA01yabhkvyu:4429_0: anityākāreṇeti. daśānām ākārāṇāṃ. na duḥkhata iti vistaraḥ. na duḥkhata ākārayaṃty
SA01yabhkvyu:4429_1: anāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvāt. āryapratikūlatayā hi duḥkham iṣyate. na hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayākārair
SA01yabhkvyu:4429_2: anāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvād evānāsravasyāsamudayādilakṣaṇatvād ity arthaḥ. na mārgākārair
SA01yabhkvyu:4429_3: [Tib. 350b] dūṣaṇīyatvād iti. so 'śaikṣaḥ samādhir dūṣayitavyo na ca mārgākārā dūṣaṇarūpā
SA01yabhkvyu:4429_4: iti. ato na mārgākārais taṃ samādhim ālambate. nirodhākārais tu naiva sambandha iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4431_0: ity apratisaṃkhyānirodham ity arthaḥ. aśaikṣasyānimittasya samādher apratisaṃkhyānirodham
SA01yabhkvyu:4431_1: ālambate. śāntataḥ śānto 'yam iti. kathaṃ tasyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. aśaikṣād ānimittāt
SA01yabhkvyu:4431_2: samādher vyutthitasya tadanantaraṃ ye sāsravāḥ kṣaṇā atikrāmanti anye cānāsravāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_0: ānimittakṣaṇā utpannāḥ syuḥ. teṣāṃ sāsravāṇām anyānāsravāṇāṃ cotpattikāle teṣām aśaikṣāṇāṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_1: ānimittakṣaṇānām apratisaṃkhyānirodho labhyate. pratyayavaikalyāt. tam apratisaṃkhyānirodham
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_2: ālambate śāntākāreṇa. anāsravasya pratisaṃkhyānirodhābhāvāt. na pratisaṃkhyānirodham
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_3: ālambate. kasmāt punar anāsravasya pratisaṃkhyānirodho nāsti. apratikūlatvāt. yad
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_4: dhi pratikūlam āryāṇāṃ. tat saṃyogasya visaṃyogāya yatas te yatante. visaṃyogaś ca
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_5: pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ. ato 'nāsravasya na pratisaṃkhyanirodhaḥ. kiṃ cāśaikṣasyānimittasya
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_7: tatprotsāhanenaiva tadvidūṣaṇam abhilaṣaṃs tadapratisaṃkhyānirodham evālambate. śatrūpagraheṇa
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_8: hi loke māryopaghātaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyata iti. na nirodhapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārair iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_9: nirodhaḥ sādhāraṇāḥ. na nirodha iti. tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt. anityatānirodhasadhāraṇatvād
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_10: ayam apratisaṃkhyānirodho na nirodhākāreṇākāryate. anyathā hi śāntākāreṇa tadviśiṣṭena
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_11: nālambitaḥ syāt. nirodhākāreṇa hy anityatānirodhenaiva dūṣita evāsāv apratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_12: syāt. taddūṣaṇena nāśaikṣa ānimittasamādhidūṣitaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. na praṇītākāreṇa.
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_13: avyākṛtatvād apratisaṃkhyānirodhasya. kuśalaṃ hi praṇītaṃ nāvyākṛtam. ato na praṇītākāreṇālambate.
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_14: avisaṃyogāc cāpratisaṃkhyānirodhasya. na niḥsaraṇākāreṇa tam ālambate. saṃkleśaviyogo
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_15: hi saṃkleśaniḥsaraṇam iṣyate. yasmān nāpratisaṃkhyānirodhena saṃsāraniḥsaraṇaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_16: tathā hi saty apy apratisaṃkhyānirodhe keṣāṃcit kuśalākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ taiḥ saṃprayukta
SA01yabhkvyu:4432_17: eva tatprāptyavicchedāt. āryamārgadveṣitvād [Tib. 351b] iti. kathaṃ dviṣati. śūnyatādibhir
SA01yabhkvyu:4434_0: akopyadharmaṇaḥ. tasya tīkṣṇendriyatvāt tadutpādane sāmarthyam asti. nānyasyārhataḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:4435_1: vartate. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā divyacakṣurabhijñājñānadarśanāya

SA01yabhkvyu:4437_0: āha. divyacakṣurabhijñājñānadarśanāya saṃvartata ity uktaṃ. na ca divyacakṣurabhijñāsamādhibhāvanā.
